 of nag[94m_[0m[94mts[0m[94ma[0m[94m_[0mspectrum[94m_[0m[94mb[0m[94miv[0mar[94m_[0m[94mcov[0m[94m [0m[94m([0m[94mg[0m1[94m3[0m[94mccc[0m[94m)[0m or nag[94m_[0m[94mts[0m[94ma[0m[94m_[0m[94mspect[0m[94mrum[0m[94m_[0m[94mb[0m[94miv[0m[94mar[0m [94m([0m[94mg[0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0mcd[94mc[0m[94m)[0m[94m which[0m calculated the[94m smooth[0med sample cross spectrum[94m.[0m[94m n[0m[94m is[0m used[94m in[0m[94m calculating[0m[94m the[0m[94m imp[0m[94mulse[0m[94m response[0m[94m function[0m standard error[94m ([0m[94mrf[0mse[94m).[0m[94m
[0mConstraint[94m:[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0m[94mn[0m}}\ge[94m [0m[94m1[0m$.[94m
[0m8:[94m [0m   [94m er[0m[ng[94m][0m[94mdouble[0mOutput[94m
[0m[94mOn[0m exit[94m:[0m the ng[94m estimates[0m of[94m the[0m noise spectrum,[94m ${\[0m[94mstack[0m[94mrel[0m[94m{[0m[94m^[0m[94m}{[0mf}}_{y[94m\[0mmid x[94m}\[0mleft[94m(\[0momega[94m \[0mright)$ [94mat[0m each frequency[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m9[0m[94m:[0m[94m [0m   [94m er[0ml[94mw[0m[94mdouble[0m *Output[94m
[0m[94mOn[0m[94m exit[0m[94m:[0m[94m the[0m[94m noise[0m[94m spectrum[0m lower limit[94m multip[0mlying factor[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m:[0m[94m [0m [94m er[0mupdouble [94m*[0m[94mOutput[0m[94m
[0m[94mOn[0m[94m exit[0m[94m:[0m[94m the[0m[94m noise[0m[94m spectrum[0m[94m upper[0m[94m limit[0m[94m multip[0m[94mlying[0m[94m factor[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m[94m [0m [94m r[0m[94mf[0m[94m[[0m[94ml[0m]doubleOutput[94m
[0m[94mOn[0m[94m exit[0m[94m:[0m[94m the[0m imp[94mulse[0m[94m response[0m[94m function[0m[94m.[0m Caus[94mal[0m responses[94m are[0m stored[94m in[0m[94m asc[0m[94mending[0m frequency[94m in[0m[94m ${\[0mmathbf[94m{[0mrf}}\left[94m[[0m[94m0[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m]$[0m [94mto[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0m[94mrf[0m[94m}}\[0m[94mleft[0m[{\[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mng[94m}}[0m-1[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m]$[0m and[94m anticip[0m[94matory[0m responses[94m are[0m[94m stored[0m[94m in[0m[94m desc[0m[94mending[0m[94m frequency[0m[94m in[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0m[94mrf[0m[94m}}\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m[[0m{\[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mng[94m}}\[0mright[94m]$[0m [94mto[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0m[94mrf[0m[94m}}\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m[[0m[94m{\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0m[94ml[0m}}\right[94m]$.[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m:[0m[94m [0m  rfs[94med[0mouble [94m*[0m[94mOutput[0m[94m
[0m[94mOn[0m[94m exit[0m[94m:[0m[94m the[0m[94m imp[0m[94mulse[0m[94m response[0m[94m function[0m standard[94m error[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m[94m:[0m  [94m fail[0mNagError [94m*[0mInput/Output[94m
[0mThe NAG error argument (see[94m Section[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m.[94m6[0m in[94m the[0m Ess[94mential[0m[94m Introduction[0m).[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## [94m6[0m  Error Indicators and Warn[94mings[0m[94m
[0m
[94mNE[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m_INT[94m_[0mAR[94mG[0m[94m_[0mCONS[94m
[0m[94mOn[0m entry, ${\mathbf[94m{[0ml}}=[94m�[0m[94m�[0m�\mathit[94m{\[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m[94mvalue[0m[94m}}[0m[94m�[0m��$ [94mwhile[0m ${\[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mng[94m}}=[0m[94m�[0m[94m�[0m�[94m\[0m[94mmath[0mit{\[94mtext[0m{[94mvalue[0m}}[94m�[0m[94m�[0m�$.[94m These[0m arguments[94m must[0m satisfy[94m ${\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0m[94mng[0m[94m}}[0m[94m=\[0mleft[94m[[0m[94m{\[0mmathbf[94m{[0ml[94m}}[0m/2[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m]+[0m1[94m$[0m when[94m ${\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mng[94m}}[0m>[94m0[0m[94m$.[0m[94m
[0mNE[94m_[0m[94mAL[0mLOC[94m_[0mFAIL
Dynamic memory allocation failed[94m.[0m[94m
[0mNE_B[94mIV[0mAR_[94mS[0mPECTRAL_[94mE[0mSTIM[94m_[0m[94mZ[0mER[94mO[0m[94m
[0mA bivariate spectral estimate is zero[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m this[94m frequency[0m[94m the[0m noise[94m spectrum[0m is set[94m to[0m[94m zero[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m contributions[0m to[94m the[0m[94m imp[0m[94mulse[0m For instance[94m,[0m Lum[94mo[0m Play and Mot[94mion[0mMagix provide[94m a[0m[94m commercial[0m software solution[94m both[0m[94m with[0m[94m over[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m different[94m games[0m that[94m can[0m[94m be[0m bought[94m.[0m38 Many of[94m these[0m systems[94m and[0m[94m games[0m[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m make[0m use[94m of[0m tracking[94m of[0m players[94m ([0m[94musing[0m[94m both[0m[94m the[0m location[94m and[0m[94m identity[0m[94m),[0m instead[94m in[0m such[94m games[0m[94m it[0m simply[94m suff[0m[94mices[0m[94m to[0m detect movement[94m on[0m[94m locations[0m[94m,[0m for[94m example[0m[94m,[0m[94m sc[0m[94maring[0m fish[94mes[0m[94m or[0m dispers[94ming[0m[94m a[0m[94m p[0mile of virtual leaves[94m.[0m[94m If[0m such[94m a[0m[94m system[0m[94m is[0m[94m also[0m[94m tracking[0m[94m people[0m[94m ([0mposition + id[94m),[0m[94m it[0m allows[94m for[0m[94m even[0m[94m more[0m[94m kinds[0m[94m of[0m interactions[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m instance[0m[94m,[0m[94m Mor[0meno et al[94m.[0m created[94m the[0m interactive tag[94m play[0mground[94m,[0m[94m an[0m interactive floor projection[94m for[0m[94m research[0m purposes [[94m1[0m39].[94m In[0m[94m the[0m tag[94m game[0m[94m,[0m each[94m player[0m[94m has[0m[94m one[0m circle following them[94m,[0m[94m indicating[0m[94m their[0m[94m role[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m children tag each[94m other[0m by letting[94m their[0m[94m circles[0m col[94mlide[0m[94m,[0m[94m see[0m Fig. 6[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### [94m3[0m.3 Ge[94mo[0m-location[94m devices[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mGE[0m[94mO[0m[94m-[0m[94mlocation[0m[94m devices[0m[94m make[0m[94m use[0m[94m of[0m GPS[94m ([0m[94ms[0mometimes[94m W[0mifi[94m,[0m Bl[94muetooth[0m[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m R[0mFID enabled[94m loc[0mating[94m)[0m to[94m respond[0m[94m to[0m[94m being[0m[94m located[0m somewhere[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m games[0m[94m played[0m[94m with[0m it,[94m ge[0m[94mo[0m[94m-[0m[94mlocation[0m games[94m,[0m[94m clearly[0m[94m provide[0m[94m a[0m form[94m of[0m interactive play[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m We[0m[94m will[0m[94m not[0m focus[94m on[0m[94m them[0m[94m as[0m[94m they[0m differ[94m slightly[0m from[94m most[0m previous[94m systems[0m[94m as[0m[94m they[0m trigger[94m moving[0m[94m over[0m[94m larger[0m distances[94m,[0m are (ideally/[94mthe[0moret[94mically[0m[94m)[0m[94m not[0m conf[94mined[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m certain[0m[94m space[0m[94m,[0m[94m nor[0m[94m do[0m[94m they[0m need[94m co[0m[94m-[0m[94mlocated[0m social interactions[94m,[0m and[94m ([0m[94mmost[0m) do[94m not[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m played[94m by[0m[94m people[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m time[94m.[0m[94m Therefore[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m following[94m set[0m[94m of[0m[94m systems[0m can[94m be[0m[94m seen[0m[94m as[0m less[94m complete[0m than the previous[94m types[0m of[94m systems[0m[94m.[0m We provide[94m a[0m[94m description[0m[94m of[0m several[94m types[0m[94m of[0m[94m systems[0m[94m that[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m encountered[94m in[0m[94m this[0m domain[94m,[0m mainly[94m using[0m[94m the[0m ‘[94mear[0mly[94m’[0m[94m and[0m/or[94m famous[0m examples[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m recent hype around Pokémon Go[94m and[0m[94m its[0m success clearly[94m shows[0m[94m that[0m[94m these[0m[94m games[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m large[94m att[0m[94mraction[0m value.[94m One[0m reason[94m for[0m[94m this[0m[94m rise[0m[94m,[0m besides target[94mting[0m a nostalgic[94m fant[0m[94masy[0m world[94m [[0m[94m7[0m[94m5[0m[94m],[0m[94m is[0m[94m prob[0m[94mab[0maly[94m the[0m[94m now[0m easily available location-[94mspecific[0m infrastructure[94m [[0m[94m8[0m5[94m].[0m39 The[94m games[0m[94m have[0m great[94m att[0m[94mraction[0m value[94m and[0m[94m are[0m successful[94m in[0m[94m getting[0m children[94m to[0m move[94m.[0m However[94m,[0m[94m only[0m[94m the[0m[94m future[0m can show[94m us[0m whether such[94m games[0m[94m are[0m[94m actually[0m suitable[94m enough[0m ([94mfor[0m[94m young[0m[94m children[0m[94m).[0m[94m The[0m issue of[94m safety[0m[94m,[0m especially[94m,[0m[94m could[0m become[94m a[0m concern if[94m the[0m[94m games[0m[94m could[0m persu[94made[0m[94m children[0m[94m to[0m go[94m to[0m unsafe[94m zones[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mV[0m[94mog[0miaz[94mou[0m et[94m al[0m. created[94m C[0mitiTag,[94m a[0m game where[94m a[0m[94m P[0mDA device[94m is[0m[94m used[0m[94m to[0m play[94m a[0m location based version[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m lets[0m make[94m the[0m[94m simplest[0m[94m sh[0maders[94m:[0m Ver[94mtex[0m[94m Sh[0mader[94m:[0m #version[94m [0m[94m3[0m30 core layout(location =[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m)[0m in vec[94m3[0m aPos; layout[94m([0mlocation[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m)[0m[94m in[0m vec[94m3[0m[94m a[0mNormal; [0m[94m3[0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0m core out vec4 Output[94m;[0m in vec[94m2[0m Text[94mure[0m[94mCo[0m[94mordinate[0m[94m;[0m[94m in[0m vec[94m3[0m[94m Norm[0m[94mals[0m[94m;[0m uniform sampler2D diffuse[94m;[0m uniform[94m sam[0mpler[94m2[0m[94mD[0m specular[94m;[0m void main[94m()[0m[94m {[0m Output[94m =[0m texture[94m([0mdiff[94muse[0m, Text[94mure[0m[94mCo[0m[94mordinate[0m[94m);[0m[94m }[0m Will this[94m work[0m[94m?[0m I mean[94m,[0m assimp says[94m that[0m[94m each[0m mesh[94m has[0m[94m only[0m[94m one[0m material[94m that[0m[94m covers[0m[94m it[0m[94m,[0m but[94m that[0m material[94m how[0m[94m many[0m diff[94muse[0m[94m and[0m spec[94mular[0m text[94mures[0m[94m can[0m[94m it[0m have[94m?[0m[94m Does[0m[94m it[0m[94m makes[0m[94m sense[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m material[94m to[0m[94m have[0m[94m more[0m[94m than[0m[94m one[0m diff[94muse[0m[94m or[0m[94m more[0m[94m that[0m one spec[94mular[0m[94m text[0m[94mures[0m[94m?[0m[94m If[0m[94m each[0m material[94m has[0m[94m only[0m[94m two[0m[94m text[0m[94mures[0m[94m,[0m[94m one[0m for[94m the[0m[94m diff[0m[94muse[0m[94m and[0m[94m one[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m spec[94mular[0m[94m then[0m[94m its[0m[94m easy[0m,[94m i[0m'[94mm[0m using[94m the[0m[94m spec[0m[94mular[0m texture[94m on[0m[94m the[0m lighting calculations[94m and[0m[94m the[0m diff[94muse[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m actual[0m output[94m.[0m But[94m what[0m[94m happens[0m[94m if[0m[94m the[0m text[94mures[0m[94m are[0m more[94m?[0m How[94m am[0m[94m i[0m[94m defining[0m[94m them[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m fragment sh[94mader[0m[94m without[0m[94m knowing[0m[94m the[0m[94m actual[0m number[94m?[0m[94m Also[0m[94m how[0m[94m do[0m[94m i[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m ## How to[94m start[0m[94m for[0m[94m new[0m[94mbie[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m[94m you[0m[94m'[0m[94mre[0m[94m wanting[0m[94m to[0m[94m pick[0m[94mup[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0mD game development[94m then[0m[94m a[0m[94m very[0m[94m good[0m[94m option[0m would[94m be[0m[94m learning[0m[94m C[0m# and Unity[94m.[0m[94m
[0m45[94m.[0m ##[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m absolutely[0m[94m no[0m clue[94m what[0m I’[94mm[0m[94m doing[0m[94m ([0m[94mad[0mvice[94m for[0m[94m a[0m beginner[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWel[94mcome[0m[94m![0m[94m You[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m few[0m[94m options[0m. You[94m can[0m either build[94m on[0m[94m your[0m Python[94m with[0m[94m Py[0mGame[94m:[0m https[94m://[0m[94mwww[0m[94m.[0m[94mpy[0m[94mgame[0m[94m.[0m[94morg[0m[94m/[0mnews You[94m can[0m look into[94m Game[0mMaker Studio [94m2[0m[94m which[0m[94m has[0m drag[94m and[0m[94m drop[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m slowly[0m[94m get[0m[94m into[0m[94m their[0m script[94ming[0m language[94m which[0m[94m is[0m[94m c[0m[94m sty[0mled[94m '[0m[94mG[0mML[94m':[0m[94m https[0m[94m://[0m[94mwww[0m[94m.[0myoyogames[94m.[0m[94mcom[0m[94m/[0m[94mg[0mamemaker[94m Bey[0m[94mond[0m[94m that[0m[94m,[0m there[94m is[0m[94m always[0m C# and Unity[94m if[0m[94m you[0m'[94mre[0m[94m up[0m[94m to[0m[94m it[0m[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m would[0m[94m suggest[0m.[94m quantum[0m Datasource component host[94m data[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m scope[94m of[0m[94m knowledge[0m[94m where[0m[94m the[0m dat[94mam[0miner act[94m.[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m # [94m4[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m: Class[94mify[0m Triangles by Angle Measure[94mment[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIdent[94mify[0m tri[94mangles[0m as[94m ac[0m[94mute[0m, right[94m,[0m obt[94muse[0m[94m or[0m equiangular[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Tri[94mangle[0m Classification by[94m Ang[0mles
[94m
[0m[94mMichael[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m mother bought[94m a[0m caddy that[94m fits[0m in a corner[94m.[0m[94m She[0m[94m uses[0m[94m the[0m c[94maddy[0m[94m to[0m store[94m their[0m brooms[94m and[0m mops in[94m the[0m gar[94mage[0m[94m.[0m His[94m mother[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m c[94maddy[0m[94m had[0m[94m the[0m appearance[94m of[0m a right triangle[94m when[0m viewed[94m from[0m above[94m and[0m[94m fit[0m perfectly in[94m the[0m corner[94m.[0m[94m Michael[0m liked[94m the[0m[94m c[0m[94maddy[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m he[0m[94m couldn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m afford[94m to[0m[94m buy[0m[94m one[0m like hers,[94m so[0m[94m he[0m decided[94m to[0m make his[94m own[0m[94m.[0m He bought wood and n[94mails[0m and[94m put[0m it together[94m,[0m but when[94m he[0m tried[94m to[0m[94m put[0m[94m it[0m in[94m the[0m corner in his room[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m wouldn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m fit[0m[94m.[0m He[94m measures[0m the[94m angles[0m[94m of[0m[94m his[0m caddy[94m and[0m real[94mizes[0m that[94m the[0m[94m top[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m triangle[0m below:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWhat[0m[94m is[0m the[94m classification[0m[94m of[0m Michael[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m triangle[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m this concept[94m,[0m you will learn[94m how[0m[94m to[0m use angles[94m to[0m[94m class[0m[94mify[0m tri[94mangles[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m Class[0mifying[94m Tri[0m[94mangles[0m[94m by[0m[94m Ang[0m[94mles[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m prefix “tri” means three. Triangle means three[94m angles[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTo[0m class[94mify[0m[94m a[0m[94m triangle[0m according[94m to[0m[94m its[0m[94m angles[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m must[94m look[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m angles[0m inside the[94m triangle[0m[94m.[0m Use[94m the[0m number[94m of[0m degrees in these[94m angles[0m[94m to[0m[94m class[0m[94mify[0m[94m the[0m[94m triangle[0m[94m.[0m Let’[94ms[0m look[94m at[0m a picture[94m of[0m[94m a[0m triangle to explain.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mLook[94m at[0m[94m the[0m measure[94m of[0m each[94m angle[0m inside[94m the[0m[94m triangle[0m[94m to[0m figure[94m out[0m[94m what[0m kind[94m of[0m[94m triangle[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m.[0m There[94m are[0m[94m four[0m types[94m of[0m tri[94mangles[0m[94m based[0m[94m on[0m angle[94m measures[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0m[94m right[0m[94m triangle[0m is[94m a[0m triangle[94m that[0m has[94m one[0m right[94m angle[0m and[94m two[0m[94m ac[0m[94mute[0m[94m angles[0m[94m.[0m[94m One[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m angles[94m in[0m[94m the[0m triangle[94m measures[0m[94m $$[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m^{\[94mcirc[0m}$$ and[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m two[0m angles[94m are[0m less[94m than[0m[94m [0m9[94m0[0m[94m.[0m Here is a picture[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m right[0m[94m triangle[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mYou[94m can[0m[94m see[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m degree[94m angle[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m one[94m in[0m[94m the[0m bottom[94m left[0m corner[94m.[0m[94m You[0m[94m can[0m even[94m draw[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m small[94m box[0m[94m to[0m identify[94m it[0m[94m as[0m a[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m degree[94m angle[0m[94m.[0m If[94m you[0m look[94m at[0m[94m the[0m other[94m two[0m angles[94m you[0m can[94ms[0m see[94m that[0m those angles[94m are[0m less[94m than[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m degrees[0m[94m and[0m[94m are[0m ac[94mute[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mLet[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m look[0m[94m at[0m an example[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m right[0m[94m angle[0m.[94m
[0m
[94mhis[0m[94m triangle[0m[94m has[0m one $$[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m^{\[0m[94mcirc[0m[94m}$$[0m angle[94m and[0m[94m two[0m $$4[94m5[0m^{\[94mcirc[0m[94m}$$[0m angles[94m.[0m Find[94m the[0m[94m sum[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m three[0m[94m angles[0m.

$$[94m9[0m[94m0[0m+[94m).[0m
[94m
[0m[94msch[0m[94meme[0m[94m![0m scheme[94m![0m[94m scheme[0m[94m![0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m...[0mAnyway[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m major[0m[94m issue[0m I[94m have[0m[94m with[0m LISP[94m-[0mesque languages[94m is[0m the syntax[94m.[0m[94m Gen[0m[94mius[0m[94m as[0m it may[94m be[0m[94m,[0m I[94m find[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m pro[0mlifer[94mation[0m[94m of[0m[94m par[0m[94manth[0m[94meses[0m[94m makes[0m[94m it[0m[94m difficult[0m[94m to[0m[94m disc[0m[94mern[0m[94m structure[0m[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m''[0m[94md[0m[94m recommend[0m following[94m D[0myl[94man[0m[94m''[0m[94ms[0m[94m example[0m[94m and[0m[94m transform[0m[94ming[0m an[94m easier[0m-to[94m-[0m[94mread[0m syntax into[94m an[0m[94m underlying[0m[94m L[0m[94mIS[0m[94mP[0m[94m format[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mant[0m[94mare[0mus:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mH[0mmm[94m,[0m[94m my[0m[94m understanding[0m was that ''double dispatch[94m''[0m[94m was[0m[94m the[0m[94m official[0m term[94m for[0m[94m anything[0m[94m that[0m[94m wasn[0m''[94mt[0m single dispatch[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m always[0m call it[94m ''[0mmultiple dispatch[94m''[0m in[94m my[0m[94m head[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m usually[0m[94m correct[0m[94m it[0m[94m as[0m[94m it[0m comes[94m out[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m my[0m[94m to[0my language[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m documentation embedded[94m as[0m XML[94m as[0m[94m so[0m[94m:[0m[94m

[0m[94m
[0m[94mf[0m[94mag[0m[94miano[0m[94m:[0m[94m Assuming[0m[94m I[0m understand you[94m correctly[0m[94m,[0m you[94m suggest[0m[94m no[0m[94m garbage[0m collection[94m or[0m reference counting?[94m I[0m[94m don[0m''[94mt[0m[94m know[0m[94m what[0m[94m "[0mlinear[94mity[0m[94m"[0m[94m means[0m[94m here[0m[94m,[0m[94m could[0m[94m you[0m clarify?[94m

[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Multiple[0m paradig[94mm[0m support[94m ([0mimperative/[94mO[0mO/functional)[94m y[0mep[94m

[0mPLo[94m Algorithm[0m[94m Flow[0mcharts [94m1[0m[94m.[0m The Pse[94mudo[0m Code[94m is[0m[94m the[0m portion[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m overall[0m system functionality[94m that[0m[94m we[0m[94m want[0m[94m to[0m[94m deliber[0m[94mately[0m[94m leave[0m[94m fluid[0m[94m.[0m[94m From[0m my[94m understanding[0m pseudo[94m code[0m[94m is[0m[94m just[0m[94m a[0m rough[94m outline[0m[94m of[0m your[94m code[0m[94m that[0m[94m doesn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m really[94m conform[0m[94m to[0m any[94m strict[0m syntactical[94m standard[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m flowchart editor displays[94m a[0m[94m diagram[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m procedure control flow[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m,[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m,[0m Windows Vista[94m and[0m Windows[94m XP[0m[94m,[0m Linux[94m and[0m Mac OS X.[94m These[0m[94m languages[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m specific[0m syntax[94m that[0m[94m must[0m[94m be[0m[94m ad[0m[94mher[0med[94m to[0m when[94m writing[0m program[94m'[0m[94ms[0m source[94m code[0m[94m.[0m Try it out[94m at[0m Web[94mPR[0mANK.[94m In[0m crypt[94mography[0m[94m,[0m pseudor[94mandom[0m noise (PR[94mN[0m[94m)[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m signal[0m similar[94m to[0m[94m noise[0m[94m which[0m[94m satisfies[0m[94m one[0m or[94m more[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m standard[0m[94m tests[0m[94m for[0m statistical random[94mness[0m[94m.[0m "FALSE:[94m ~[0m Pse[94mudo[0m[94mcode[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m outline[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m logic of[94m the[0m program you will[94m write[0m. [0m##[94m#[0m[94m pack[0m_rat2[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m phenolphthalein[94m is[0m[94m an[0m indicator[94m:[0m it changes color[94m at[0m[94m a[0m particular[94m ([0m[94mn[0marrow) pH range[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m thus[0m tells[94m you[0m when[94m the[0m[94m H[0mCl has[94m been[0m neutralized[94m.[0m It[94m doesn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m neutralize[94m anything[0m itself[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m amount used[94m,[0m[94m which[0m should[94m be[0m[94m V[0mERY[94m little[0m[94m,[0m[94m is[0m[94m generally[0m[94m un[0mimportant[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m usual[0m procedure[94m for[0m titrations[94m is[0m[94m as[0m[94m follows[0m... For[94m H[0m[94mCl[0m,[94m it[0m is first standardized[94m.[0m[94m H[0mydroch[94mlor[0m[94mic[0m[94m acid[0m consists[94m of[0m a[94m solution[0m[94m of[0m hydrogen ch[94mlor[0mide in water[94m.[0m[94m Its[0m[94m concentration[0m[94m can[0m[94m vary[0m[94m a[0m[94m little[0m[94m over[0m[94m time[0m[94m,[0m[94m so[0m the lab acid[94m can[0m[94m not[0m[94m be[0m[94m obtained[0m[94m as[0m a[94m standard[0m[94m in[0m[94m its[0m[94m own[0m right,[94m off[0m the sh[94melf[0m[94m.[0m You will[94m normally[0m make[94m an[0m[94m approximate[0m solution[94m of[0m[94m say[0m[94m,[0m ~[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m1[0mM[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m titrate[94m that[0m with[94m a[0m[94m basic[0m solution[94m of[0m accurately known concentration[94m.[0m Na2CO[94m3[0m[94m is[0m commonly[94m used[0m for this.[94m First[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m thoroughly[94m d[0m[94mried[0m[94m.[0m Then a[94m quantity[0m is we[94mighed[0m[94m on[0m an analyt[94mical[0m balance[94m.[0m[94m That[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m put[94m in[0m a volumetric flask[94m.[0m Water[94m is[0m added[94m,[0m to dissol[94mve[0m it[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m filled[0m[94m with[0m[94m more[0m[94m water[0m[94m,[0m up[94m to[0m[94m the[0m mark on[94m the[0m flask neck[94m.[0m Na[94mOH[0m[94m isn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m a good choice[94m,[0m since it[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m too[0m[94m h[0mygroscop[94mic[0m[94m ([0mit[94m can[0m abs[94morb[0m mo[94mist[0mure[94m while[0m you[94m'[0m[94mre[0m[94m trying[0m[94m to[0mand[94m...[0m formally correct).
[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m some APIs[94m,[0m[94m '[0m[94mwa[0mits[94m'[0m are allowed[94m to[0m w[94make[0m[94m up[0m spuriously ([94mear[0m[94mly[0m[94m,[0m[94m without[0m[94m the[0m condition[94m actually[0m[94m being[0m[94m met[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mUn[0mlikely[94m,[0m[94m Windows[0m[94m tends[0m[94m to[0m[94m o[0mvers[94mleep[0m[94m ([0m[94mwell[0m[94m-[0m[94mknown[0m[94m)[0m[94m but[0m[94m it[0m[94m makes[94m it[0m[94m mag[0m[94mically[0m work[94m [0m[94m9[0m9.9[94m%[0m[94m reli[0m[94mably[0m[94m),[0m[94m and[0m[94m to[0m my[94m knowledge[0m never sp[94mur[0miously[94m w[0m[94makes[0m[94m,[0m[94m except[0m[94m in[0m[94m one[0m[94m condition[0m that pract[94mically[0m never[94m happens[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m only[0m[94m situation[0m[94m of[0m which[94m I[0m[94m'[0m[94mm[0m[94m aware[0m[94m of[0m[94m in[0m[94m which[0m[94m this[0m can[94m happen[0m[94m is[0m[94m being[0m[94m in[0m[94m an[0m alertable event class around[94m a[0m[94m key[0med[94m event[0m[94m or[0m[94m a[0m critical section[94m ([0mwhich uses[94m a[0m[94m key[0m[94med[0m[94m event[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m shouldn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m happen[0m[94m.[0m[94m Since[0m[94m you[0m[94m have[0m[94m to[0m[94m deliber[0m[94mately[0m do[94m something[0m very[94m specific[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m would[0m[94m likely[0m know[94m if[0m[94m that[0m was[94m the[0m[94m case[0m.[94m I[0m[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m know[0m[94m how[0m[94m M[0mSVC[94m there[94m.[0m[94m Though[0m why a sp[94mur[0mious w[94make[0m[94m should[0m cause[94m a[0m dead[94mlock[0m is beyond[94m my[0m[94m understanding[0m...
[94m
[0m[94mEd[0m[94mited[0m[94m by[0m[94m sam[0moth

[0m[94m####[0m#[94m Share[0m[94m on[0m other sites[94m

[94mwhile[0m (!condition.wait_[94mfor[0m[94m([0mlk[94m,[0m std::chron[94mo[0m::milliseconds([94m0[0m[94m),[0m [this]() { return flag;[94m }[0m))[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIs[94m this[0m deliber[94mate[0m[94m?[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThat[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m not[0m[94m likely[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m the[94m cause[0m[94m of[0m[94m your[0m problem[94m,[0m[94m but[0m you[94m do[0m[94m know[0m[94m that[0m this[94m is[0m not[94m the[0m same as calling wait()?[94m [0m On[94m the[0m [94m contrary[0m,[94m given[0m a zero timeout you[94m are[0m[94m never[0m waiting[94m,[0m[94m this[0m is[94m busy[0m spinning[94m.[0m[94m

[0m##### Share[94m on[0m[94m other[0m[94m sites[0m[94m

[0m
[94mlong[0m[94m explanation[0m[94m
[0m
[94mEvery[0m[94mthing[0m you say[94m is[0m[94m perfectly[0m[94m correct[0m[94m under[0m[94m those[0m[94m very[0m narrow assumptions[94m ([0mWindows[94m X[0m86[94m system[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m M[0mSVC compiler),[94m but[0m[94m I[0m guess[94m what[0m[94m H[0modgman[94m
[0m[94mI[0m[94m agreed[0m[94m with[0m him[94m if[0m[94m he[0m[94m tal[0m[94mks[0m[94m hypoth[0m[94met[0m[94mically[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m pointed[94m out[0m my reply was just[94m a[0m[94m po[0m[94mke[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m narrow[0m[94m case[0m[94m the[0m[94m topic[0m st[94marter[0m[94m has[0m[94m.[0m[94m ([0m[94mas[0m[94m nobody[0m[94m even[0m tried[94m to[0m help[94m for[0m I[94m can[0m[94m do[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m numbers[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m for[0m[94m example[0m[94m,[0m[94m is[0m so[94m easy[0m[94m to[0m multiply or[94m divide[0m[94m by[0m[94m.[0m[94m If[0m I[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m multiply[0m[94m a[0m[94m number[0m[94m by[0m,[94m say[0m[94m,[0m something near thirty[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m a delight to[94m triple[0m[94m it[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m multiply[0m[94m by[0m ten[94m.[0m Twelve[94m and[0m[94m [0m24 and[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94m are[0m fun[94m because[0m[94m they[0m’[94mre[0m so[94m relatively[0m easy[94m to[0m[94m find[0m parts[94m of[0m[94m.[0m[94m Even[0m numbers often do seem easier[94m to[0m work[94m with[0m[94m,[0m[94m just[0m[94m because[0m[94m splitting[0m an[94m even[0m[94m number[0m in[94m half[0m[94m saves[0m[94m us[0m[94m from[0m dealing[94m with[0m[94m dec[0m[94mim[0m[94mals[0m[94m or[0m[94m fra[0m[94mctions[0m[94m.[0m Roy[94mboy[0m[94m sees[0m all[94m this[0m as[94m s[0milliness[94m,[0m[94m which[0m seems[94m out[0m of character for him[94m,[0m really[94m.[0m I’[94md[0m[94m expect[0m[94m him[0m[94m to[0m be[94m up[0m[94m for[0m[94m assigning[0m[94m tra[0mits[94m to[0m[94m numbers[0m[94m like[0m that[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mB[0mill[94m Griff[0mith’[94ms[0m Zippy the Pinhead[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0mth[94m mentions[0m Albert Ein[94mstein[0m and relativ[94mity[0m[94m.[0m And Z[94mipp[0m[94my[0m r[94mumin[0mates on[94m the[0m[94m idea[0m[94m that[0m[94m there[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m duplicates[94m of[0m everything[94m,[0m in[94m the[0m vast[94mness[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m universe[94m.[0m It[94m’[0m[94ms[0m an[94m un[0msett[94mling[0m[94m idea[0m[94m that[0m[94m isn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m obviously[94m ruled[0m[94m out[0m[94m by[0m mathematics alone[94m.[0m[94m There[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m,[0m pres[94mumably[0m[94m,[0m[94m some[0m[94m chance[0m[94m that[0m[94m a[0m bunch[94m of[0m carbon[94m and[0m hydro[94mgen[0m and o[94mxygen[0m[94m and[0m other atoms happened[94m to[0m come together in such[94m a[0m[94m way[0m as to[94m make[0m[94m our[0m[94m world[0m as we[94m know[0m[94m it[0m[94m today[0m[94m.[0m[94m If[0m there[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m a[0m vast[94m enough[0m universe[94m,[0m[94m isn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m there[0m a[94m chance[0m[94m that[0m[94m a[0m[94m bunch[0m[94m of[0m[94m carbon[0m[94m and[0m[94m hydro[0m[94mgen[0m[94m and[0m[94m o[0m[94mxygen[0m[94m and[0m[94m other[0m[94m atoms[0m happened[94m to[0m[94m come[0m[94m together[0m that same[94m way[0m twice[94m?[0m[94m Three[0m times?[94m If[0m[94m the[0m universe[94m is[0m infinitely large[94m,[0m might it not[94m happen[0m infinitely[94m many[0m[94m times[0m?[94m In[0m[94m any[0m[94m number[0m[94m of[0m variations? [0m[94m
[0mTony[94m C[0mochrane’[94ms[0m[94m Ag[0mnes[94m attempts[0m[94m to[0m use mathematics[94m to[0m[94m reason[0m her[94m way[0m[94m to[0m a better bedtime[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m1st.[94m She[0m’[94ms[0m[94m not[0m[94m doing[0m well.[94m Also[0m[94m this[0m[94m seems[0m[94m like[0m[94m it[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m more of an[94m or[0m plain[94m text[0m formats[94m;[0m[94m to[0m do[94m this[0m[94m,[0m[94m choose[0m Ex[94mport[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m File menu[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m select[0m[94m the[0m format[94m to[0m export[94m to[0m. NOT[94mE[0m: If[94m you[0m plan[94m on[0m[94m editing[0m[94m the[0m document again[94m in[0m[94m Ly[0mX[94m,[0m be[94m sure[0m[94m to[0m save[94m the[0m[94m actual[0m .ly[94mx[0m[94m'[0m[94m document[0m file[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m [[0m[94m <[0m[94m ][0m[94m [[0m >[94m ][0m[94m [[0m << ][94m [[0m[94m Up[0m[94m ][0m[94m [[0m >> ][94m [[0m[94mTop[0m[94m][0m[94m [[0mContents[94m][0m[94m [[0mIndex[94m][0m[94m [[0m ? ] ###[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m.[94m3[0m.[94m3[0m Learning More[94m about[0m Ly[94mX[0m The[94m Ly[0m[94mX[0m Documentation[94m Project[0m[94m has[0m[94m over[0mseen[94m the[0m[94m creation[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m great deal[94m of[0m free documentation for Ly[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m including[0m hands-[94mon[0m tutorials[94m,[0m user manual[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m example[0m documents[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m Ly[0m[94mX[0m[94m Graph[0mical[94m Tour[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m Web[94m-[0m[94mbased[0m tutorial[94m that[0m[94m shows[0m[94m you[0m[94m how[0m[94m to[0m[94m create[0m[94m and[0m[94m edit[0m[94m a[0m simple Ly[94mX[0m[94m file[0m[94m.[0m[94m Ly[0m[94mX[0m[94m has[0m[94m a[0m compreh[94mensive[0m[94m set[0m[94m of[0m a positive map[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mA[0m[94m quantum[0m channel[94m is[0m[94m a[0m completely positive trace preserving map[94m.[0m[94m A[0m[94m un[0mital[94m quantum[0m channel[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m quantum[0m[94m channel[0m $$\mathcal[94m{[0mN}$$[94m such[0m[94m that[0m $$\[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mN[0m}(I_A)=[94mI[0m[94m_[0m[94mB[0m[94m$[0m$.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0m trace norm[94m of[0m an operator $$M[94m\[0m[94min[0m[94m\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0mL}(\[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0mH[94m},\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0mH'[94m})$[0m[94m$[0m[94m is[0m[94m defined[0m[94m as[0m[94m $\[0m|[94mM[0m[94m\|[0m_1=\mathrm[94m{[0m[94mTr[0m}\sqrt[94m{[0m[94mM[0m^\dagger M[94m}\[0m .[94m$[0m
[94m
[0mThe[94m trace[0m distance between[94m two[0m[94m operators[0m $$M$$[94m and[0m[94m $$[0m[94mM[0m[94m'[0m[94m$$[0m on $$\[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mL[0m[94m}(\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mH[0m[94m},\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mH[0m[94m'[0m[94m})$[0m[94m$[0m[94m is[0m[94m given[0m[94m by[0m[94m $\[0mfrac[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m|[94mM[0m-[94mM[0m[94m'[0m[94m\|[0m[94m_[0m[94m1[0m\ .[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mA[94m positive[0m operator val[94mued[0m measure (POVM[94m)[0m[94m is[0m a set $$\[94m{[0m[94mM[0m_j[94m\[0m[94m}_[0m[94mj[0m$$ of[94m operators[0m[94m that[0m[94m satisfy[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0mneg[94mativity[0m[94m and[0m comple[94mten[0m[94mess[0m[94m.[0m Mean[94ming[0m[94m that[0m[94m $\[0mtext[94m{[0m[94mfor[0m[94m all[0m[94m }[0m[94mj[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m M[94m_[0m[94mj[0m[94m\[0mgeq[94m [0m[94m0[0m,[94m \[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m and[94m }[0m[94m \[0m[94msum[0m_j M[94m_[0m[94mj[0m=I[94m\[0m .[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Properties[94m of[0m quantum entropy
[94m
[0mDenote $$S(\rho[94m)$$[0m[94m the[0m[94m entropy[0m[94m value[0m of[94m a[0m density matrix $$\[94mrho[0m\[94min[0m[94m\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mD[0m[94m}(\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mH[0m})$[94m$.[0m Several[94m quantum[0m entropies[94m are[0m defined[94m and[0m[94m described[0m[94m below[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m each of[94m them[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m following[0m[94m properties[0m are[94m discussed[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Non[0m neg[94mativity[0m[94m:[0m[94m For[0m density operator $$\[94mrho[0m[94m$[0m$,[94m the[0m[94m entropy[0m $$[94mS[0m[94m(\[0m[94mrho[0m)$$[94m is[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0m[94mnegative[0m[94m.[0m Mean[94ming[0m
[94m
[0m$[94mS[0m[94m(\[0m[94mrho[0m)\[94mgeq[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m\[0m .[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Min[0m[94mimum[0m[94m value[0m[94m:[0m[94m The[0m[94m minimum[0m[94m value[0m[94m of[0m[94m
[0m
[94m$[0m[94mS[0m[94m(\[0m[94mrho[0m[94m)=[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m if and[94m only[0m[94m if[0m $$\[94mrho[0m$$[94m is[0m[94m a[0m pure state.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Max[0m[94mimum[0m[94m value[0m[94m:[0m[94m The[0m entropy[94m is[0m bounded from above[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m a[0m[94m density[0m operator $$\[94mrho[0m$$ ach[94mieves[0m[94m that[0m[94m bound[0m[94m whenever[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m maxim[0mally mixed[94m,[0m[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m.[94m $$\[0m[94mrho[0m=\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0md[94m}[0mI$[94m$,[0m[94m where[0m $$[94md[0m$$ is[94m the[0m dimension[94m of[0m[94m a[0m Hil[94mbert[0m space $$\mathcal[94m{[0m[94mH[0m}$$.[94m
[0m• Is[94mometric[0m invar[94miance[0m[94m:[0m[94m If[0m $$U:\mathcal[94m{[0mH[94m_[0mA}\to[94m\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mH[0m[94m_[0m[94mB[0m}$$[94m is[0m an[94m is[0mometry[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m
[0m
$[94mS[0m[94m(\[0m[94mrho[0m)=S(U \[94mrho[0m[94m\,[0m U^{\dagger[94m})\[0m .[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• Add[94mitivity[0m[94m:[0m Let $$\mathcal[94m{[0mH}_[94mA[0m$$[94m and[0m $$\[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mH[0m[94m}_[0m[94mB[0m$$[94m be[0m[94m two[0m Hil[94mbert[0m spaces.[94m Suppose[0m there[94m are[0m density operators $$\[94mrho[0m[94m$$[0m[94m on[0m $$\ization of[94m time[0m and[94m distribution[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWe[0m would[94m at[0m[94m first[0m[94m like[0m[94m to[0m state[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m distance[0m[94m between[0m[94m the[0m model[94m and[0m[94m another[0m[94m set[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m continuous[94m at[0m[94m every[0m appearance even[94m if[0m[94m the[0m[94m distance[0m to[94m the[0m[94m un[0m[94mmodel[0mled collective[94m is[0m continuous[94m at[0m[94m .[0m This[94m point[0m can also[94m be[0m made for Equation ([94m3[0m[94m)[0m but[94m we[0m stick[94m to[0m[94m Equ[0m[94mation[0m[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m)[0m[94m for[0m reasons[94m of[0m simplicity[94m.[0m Such[94m a[0m[94m case[0m[94m is[0m illustrated[94m in[0m[94m Fig[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m2[94m.[0m[94m As[0m[94m the[0m[94m original[0m un[94mmodel[0m[94mled[0m[94m collect[0m[94mive[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m appearance[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m[94m necessarily[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m convex[94m or[0m even connected[94m,[0m given[94m the[0m settings ,[94m the[0m[94m un[0mfree[94m parts[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m sens[94mors[0m[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m connected[0m[94m,[0m either.[94m The[0m[94m model[0m[94m is[0m constructed[94m of[0m[94m an[0m[94m intersection[0m[94m of[0m[94m these[0m[94m parts[0m (see Equ[94mation[0m[94m ([0m[94m2[0m[94m)).[0m[94m But[0m[94m,[0m[94m as[0m[94m inter[0m[94msections[0m of dis[94mconnected[0m[94m parts[0m[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m continuous[0m[94m on[0m (e[94m.[0m[94mg[0m[94m.[0m[94m referring[0m[94m to[0m Haus[94mdor[0m[94mff[0m[94m–[0mmetrics[94m),[0m[94m the[0m[94m distance[0m[94m between[0m[94m the[0m[94m model[0m[94m and[0m[94m another[0m[94m set[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m continuous[0m[94m at[0m[94m every[0m[94m appearance[0m[94m .[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSince[0m only integr[94mals[0m with[94m continuous[0m integrants can generally[94m be[0m[94m calculated[0m[94m as[0m[94m a[0m[94m whole[0m[94m or[0m else[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m spl[94mitted[0m,[94m such[0m[94m a[0m dis[94mcontinu[0m[94mous[0m[94m function[0m becomes a problem[94m when[0m[94m being[0m[94m an[0m[94m integr[0mant[94m as[0m[94m of[0m Formula[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m).[0m[94m In[0m our[94m case[0m a[94m point[0m of[94m dis[0m[94mcontinu[0m[94mity[0m of[94m the[0m[94m distance[0m[94m as[0m[94m a[0m[94m function[0m[94m of[0m cannot[94m be[0m[94m derived[0m easily,[94m as[0m[94m it[0m[94m would[0m[94m have[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m extracted[94m from[0m[94m an[0m individual nonrelated[94m analysis[0m depending not only[94m on[0m or but[94m also[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m sensor[94m settings[0m .[94m While[0m in simple[94m cases[0m[94m this[0m[94m is[0m[94m possible[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m spare such an altering analysis by discret[94mizing[0m[94m appearance[0m[94m and[0m[94m time[0m. Here[94m,[0m just the[94m most[0m important appearances[94m of[0m[94m the[0m un[94mmodel[0m[94mled[0m[94m collect[0m[94mive[0m[94m and[0m[94m most[0m important time steps with[94m and[0m and[94m with[0m[94m their[0m[94m weights[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m [94mω[0ml,h[94m=[0m[94mP[0m[94m([0mal[94m([0mth))∈[[94m0[0m[94m,[0m1[94m][0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mare modelled.[94m According[0m[94mly[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m following[0m weight[94med[0m[94m sum[0m[94m approxim[0mates[94m the[0m[94m integral[0m[94m of[0m Formula[94m ([0m[94m3[0m[94m):[0m[94m

###[94m I[0mv-B Discret[94mizing[0m space[94m by[0m voxels

[94mThe[0m next challenge –[94m building[0m[94m an[0m[94m intersection[0m[94m of[0m (free[94m-[0m[94mform[0m) solids –[94m has[0m[94m claimed[0m to[94m be[0m[94m subject[0m of discussion for more[94m than[0m a[94m qu[0m[94mater[0m of a[94m century[0m[94m and[0m still is an issue[94m of[0m recent investig[94mations[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m publication[94m [[0m[94m2[0m3[94m][0m describesventional. This[94m is[0m not[94m true[0m to[94m the[0m extent[94m claimed[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mComput[0mer[94m algebra[0m[94m is[0m[94m useful[0m but[94m discover[0m[94ming[0m new[94m algorithms[0m[94m to[0m autom[94mate[0m[94m mathematical[0m work[94m is[0m hard[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAs[0m Robin Hanson[94m and[0m[94m Steve[0m Lev[94mitt[0m say[94m,[0m life[94m is[0m[94m long[0m[94m.[0m[94m There[0m’[94ms[0m lots[94m of[0m[94m time[0m[94m to[0m[94m do[0m lots[94m of[0m[94m different[0m[94m things[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mRe[0m[94m:[0m[94m Where[0m[94m are[0m[94m All[0m[94m the[0m Success[94mful[0m[94m R[0mational[94mists[0m?,[94m rational[0m[94mity[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m important[0m scientific[94m concept[0m[94m in[0m[94m A[0m[94mI[0m[94m,[0m fin[94mance[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m statistics[0m;[94m its[0m[94m value[0m as[94m a[0m self[94m-[0m[94mhelp[0m technique[94m is[0m[94m not[0m so clear[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mJuer[94mgen[0m Schmidhuber[94m is[0m right[94m and[0m Ty[94mler[0m Cow[94men[0m[94m is[0m[94m wrong[0m: China[94m will[0m sur[94mpass[0m[94m the[0m US[94m in[0m[94m domin[0mance[94m this[0m[94m century[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mGe[0m[94moff[0m[94mrey[0m Miller[94m and[0m[94m Robin[0m[94m Hans[0m[94mon[0m[94m have[0m[94m different[0m[94m views[0m[94m on[0m[94m what[0m people[94m are[0m[94m signal[0m[94ming[0m when[94m they[0m eng[94mage[0m[94m in[0m[94m politics[0m[94m:[0m Miller[94m says[0m[94m personal[0m traits[94m and[0m Hans[94mon[0m[94m says[0m trib[94mal[0m loyal[94mty[0m[94m.[0m Pres[94mumably[0m it’[94ms[0m[94m some[0m[94m of[0m each[94m but[0m I[94m find[0m Miller[94m more[0m[94m convin[0m[94mcing[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mRob[0m[94min[0m[94m Hans[0m[94mon[0m[94m says[0m[94m med[0m[94mitation[0m[94m is[0m about signal[94ming[0m[94m who[0m’[94ms[0m[94m a[0m[94m better[0m med[94mit[0mator[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m example[0m[94m of[0m meta[94m-[0m[94mcontr[0marian[94mism[0m at[94m one[0m[94m too[0m many[94m levels[0m of[94m meta[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mHere[0m[94m Robin[0m[94m Hans[0m[94mon[0m propos[94mes[0m[94m a[0m[94m much[0m[94m more[0m efficient[94m method[0m of[94m small[0m claims resolution[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m En[0m[94mlight[0m[94men[0mment was about[94m such[0m ideas: approaching economic[94m problems[0m rationally[94m where[0m previously no[94m one[0m[94m realized[0m[94m there[0m[94m was[0m a problem[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe rapid[94m decision[0m[94m-[0m[94mmaking[0m ab[94milities[0m[94m of[0m basketball[94m and[0m soccer[94m players[0m impress[94m me[0m[94m as[0m much as[94m the[0m physical[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m“Up to [94m4[0m[94m0[0m%[94m”[0m of[94m travel[0m[94mers[0m[94m from[0m developed to developing countries get[94m travel[0mers’ diarrhea;[94m “[0m[94min[0m[94m the[0m normal population[94m [0m[94m1[0m% to[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m%[0m[94m of[0m[94m persons[0m per[94m year[0m will[94m develop[0m[94m ir[0mritable bowel synd[94mrome[0m (IB[94mS[0m[94m),[0m and[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m%[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m%[0m[94m of[0m[94m travel[0m[94mers[0m[94m after[0m travel[94mer[0m’[94ms[0m diarrhea[94m will[0m[94m develop[0m I[94mBS[0m”;[94m and[0m “the pre[94mval[0mence[94m of[0m[94m de[0mpression and anx[94miety[0m[94m in[0m IBS patients is[94m [0m3[94m7[0m[94m.[0m[94m1[0m and[94m [0m[94m3[0m1[94m.[0m[94m4[0m[94m%[0m respectively[94m”.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m Princeton[94m Comp[0m[94man[0mion to Mathemat[94mics[0m[94m says[0m[94m “[0malgebra[94mists[0m like to work[94m with[0m[94m exact[0m[94m formulas[0m[94m and[0m analyst[94ms[0m[94m use[0m estimates.[94m Or[0m[94m,[0m to[94m put[0m[94m it[0m[94m even[0m[94m more[0m succ[94minct[0m[94mly[0m[94m,[0m algebra[94mists[0m[94m like[0m equalities and analyst[94ms[0m like inequal[94mities[0m”.[94m In[0m computer science,[94m algebra[0mists[94m like[0m[94m programming[0m[94m languages[0m and analyst[94ms[0m[94m like[0m[94m algorithms[0m[94m and[0m complexity[94m.[0m[94m Or[0m[94m,[0m to put[94m it[0m[94m even[0m[94m more[0m succinct[94mly[0m[94m,[0m[94m algebra[0m[94mists[0m[94m like[0m lambda[94m calculus[0m[94m and[0m analyst[94ms[0m[94m like[0m[94m T[0m[94muring[0m machines[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#[94m >[0m data[94m is[0m[94m fact[0mual[94m,[0m[94m and[0m not fictional[94m/[0mcreative/[94moriginal[0m[94m might[0m be another challenge[94m
[0m>[94m >[0m in[94m quite[0m[94m a[0m few[94m cases[0m I bet.
[94m
[0m> I think[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m generally[0m[94m easy[0m[94m to[0m tell[94m if[0m something[94m is[0m[94m a[0m fact[94m or[0m[94m not[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m
[94m>[0m I doubt[94m any[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m datasets[94m in[0m R[94m are[0m fictional[94m.[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m ## Water drop[94m [0m[94m3[0mb[94m –[0m Phys[94mically[0m based wet[94m [0msurfaces[94m
[0m[94m
[0mVersion[94m :[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m.[94m3[0m[94m –[0m Living blog[94m –[0m[94m First[0m version was [94m1[0m[94m5[0m avril [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis[94m is[0m[94m the[0m third post[94m of[0m[94m a[0m series about simulating rain[94m and[0m[94m its[0m[94m effect[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m world in game.[94m As[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m pretty big post[94m,[0m[94m I[0m split it in[94m two[0m[94m parts[0m A[94m and[0m[94m B[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mW[0m[94mater[0m[94m drop[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m –[0m[94m Ob[0m[94mserve[0m ra[94miny[0m world[94m
[0m[94mW[0m[94mater[0m[94m drop[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0ma[94m –[0m Dynamic[94m rain[0m[94m and[0m[94m its[0m[94m effects[0m[94m
[0mW[94mater[0m[94m drop[0m[94m [0m2[94mb[0m[94m –[0m Dynamic[94m rain[0m[94m and[0m[94m its[0m[94m effects[0m[94m
[0m[94mW[0m[94mater[0m[94m drop[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94ma[0m[94m –[0m Phys[94mically[0m[94m based[0m[94m wet[0m surfaces[94m
[0m[94mW[0m[94mater[0m[94m drop[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mb[0m[94m –[0m Phys[94mically[0m[94m based[0m[94m wet[0m[94m surfaces[0m[94m
[0m[94mW[0m[94mater[0m[94m drop[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94ma[0m[94m –[0m Ref[94mlect[0m[94ming[0m[94m wet[0m[94m world[0m[94m
[0m[94mW[0m[94mater[0m[94m drop[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94mb[0m[94m –[0m[94m Ref[0m[94mlect[0m[94ming[0m[94m wet[0m[94m world[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mDirect[0mly following[94m the[0m part A let[94m’[0m[94ms[0m continue[94m with[0m[94m other[0m[94m rain[0m effects[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m Appro[0mxim[94mation[0m[94m for[0m[94m game[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWe[0m[94m have[0m begun this[94m post[0m by studying[94m the[0m influence[94m of[0m[94m water[0m[94m on[0m lighting[94m for[0m[94m wet[0m[94m surfaces[0m[94m.[0m[94m Then[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m seen[94m two[0m[94m real[0m time implementations with analyt[94mic[0m[94m light[0m[94m for[0m both optical phen[94momena[0m[94m which[0m[94m were[0m[94m inherited[0m[94m directly[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m observation[94m.[0m[94m They[0m[94m have[0m some drawbacks, they miss[94m an[0m[94m image[0m based light[94ming[0m implementation and[94m their[0m cost for[94m in[0m[94m-[0mgame usage still[94m a[0m[94m problem[0m[94m for[0m XBOX360/PS3 game[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m computer[0m graph[94mic[0m there[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m different[0m[94m path[0m available[94m to[0m simulate optical phen[94momena[0m other[94m than[0m changing the[94m light[0m[94ming[0m model[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m could[0m[94m simply[0m create[94m/[0medit[94m/[0m[94mcapt[0m[94mure[0m[94m both[0m wet[94m and[0m dry surfaces[94m BR[0mDF parameters[94m ([0mdiffuse[94m,[0m specular[94m,[0m specular power…[94m)[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m light[94ming[0m[94m model[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m is[0m[94m not[0m really a “simulation[94m”[0m as we[94m know[0m the[94m final[0m[94m wet[0m[94m state[0m of[94m the[0m surface but[94m we[0m[94m are[0m[94m now[0m able[94m to[0m render wet[94m surfaces[0m[94m and[0m to dynamically[94m wet[0m our[94m game[0m world[94m.[0m[94m Sim[0m[94mply[0m interpol[94mating[0m[94m between[0m dry and[94m [0m wet BR[94mDF[0m parameters without[94m changing[0m[94m the[0m[94m light[0m[94ming[0m[94m model[0m[94m do[0m the effect. Nevertheless[94m this[0m approach[94m is[0m[94m stuck[0m to[94m the[0m[94m sub[0msur[94mface[0m scattering[94m events[0m inside[94m the[0m[94m wet[0m material[94m and[0m[94m its[0m[94m top[0m[94m,[0m[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m the diffuse and spec[94mular[0m[94m of[0m the[94m wet[0m[94m surface[0m[94m itself[0m[94m.[0m It will not allow to[94m simulate[0m[94m the[0m[94m dual[0m[94m layer[0m[94ming[0m light[94ming[0m we[94m have[0m[94m pill[0m[94m A[0m[94m to[0m your[94m hand[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m grind[94m the[0m[94m four[0m pills with a mortar and pestle[94m.[0m Div[94mide[0m[94m the[0m pow[94mder[0m[94m into[0m two p[94miles[0m and take[94m one[0m[94m p[0m[94mile[0m today and[94m the[0m[94m other[0m tom[94morrow[0m[94m.[0m[94m ~[0m[94mSte[0mphen[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWell[0m[94m,[0m my[94m first[0m thought would[94m be[0m[94m to[0m[94m count[0m[94m all[0m[94m the[0m remaining[94m p[0m[94mills[0m,[94m so[0m I know if[94m I[0m've[94m got[0m[94m two[0m A or[94m two[0m[94m B[0m in my[94m hand[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mMy[0m second[94m thought[0m would[94m be[0m[94m to[0m set aside[94m all[0m[94m three[0m,[94m take[0m[94m one[0m pill out at a[94m time[0m[94m from[0m my[94m remaining[0m supply[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m use[0m[94m the[0m time[94m I[0m have[94m to[0m sue[94m my[0m doctor[94m for[0m malpractice[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m I suspect[94m that[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m not[0m[94m the[0m[94m solution[0m you[94m want[0m[94m.[0m[94m -[0m[94mJohn[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m.[94m2[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m.1[94m5[0m[94m6[0m.[94m9[0m[94m2[0m 23:[94m3[0m[94m9[0m, [94m1[0m[94m1[0m February[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m09 (UTC[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mGet[0m out[94m another[0m[94m A[0m pill then[94m cut[0m all[94m the[0m p[94mills[0m in half and[94m then[0m[94m take[0m[94m one[0m half of[94m each[0m pill[94m that[0m[94m day[0m and[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m half[0m[94m the[0m[94m next[0m[94m day[0m[94m.[0m -dw[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mBut[0m then you[94m might[0m[94m still[0m[94m take[0m[94m the[0m wrong[94m hal[0mves[94m.[0m My solution[94m would[0m be[94m to[0m[94m split[0m the [94m2[0m[94m*[0mA[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m*[94mB[0m up infinitely[94m,[0m[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.[0m grind them into a pow[94mder[0m, mix it[94m properly[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m cut[0m that in[94m half[0m.[94m Then[0m you[94m'[0m[94md[0m[94m have[0m roughly[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m*[0m[94mAB[0m[94m.[0m I[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m know[94m if[0m[94m the[0m problem[94m statement[0m requires[94m an[0m integer[94m solution[0m and[94m the[0m[94m p[0mills[94m have[0m to[94m be[0m[94m taken[0m[94m as[0m a[94m whole[0m,[94m can[0m anyone clear[94m that[0m up? --[94mSte[0mve[94m
[0mI think[94m the[0m half[94m solution[0m[94m is[0m fine[94m -[0m[94m after[0m[94m cho[0mpping you have ([94ma[0m[94m,[0m[94ma[0m[94m)[0m ([94mb[0m,b[94m)[0m (b,b).[94m If[0m[94m you[0m remove[94m just[0m[94m the[0m left[94m hal[0mves[94m,[0m[94m you[0m know[94m you[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m full[0m[94m B[0m[94m pill[0m[94m and[0m[94m half[0m an[94m A[0m pill[94m in[0m your[94m hand[0m[94m.[0m[94m Then[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m get[0m[94m another[0m A[94m pill[0m[94m,[0m[94m cut[0m it[94m in[0m[94m half[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m add that[94m to[0m[94m your[0m[94m hand[0m[94m.[0m[94m You[0m[94m now[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m full[0m[94m A[0m[94m and[0m[94m a[0m[94m full[0m[94m B[0m[94m pill[0m in[94m your[0m[94m hand[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m the[94m remaining[0m[94m half[0m[94m p[0m[94mills[0m being[94m what[0m[94m you[0m should[94m take[0m[94m tom[0m[94morrow[0m[94m ([0m[94manother[0m[94m full[0m A[94m and[0m[94m a[0m[94m full[0m[94m B[0m[94m).[0m[94m From[0m then on[94m,[0m[94m you[0m return[94m to[0m[94m your[0m original routine[94m,[0m possibly[94m after[0m pour[94ming[0m food colouring into one bott[94mle[0m[94m [0m[94m;[0m) -[94m Tim[0m J[94m [0m[94m1[0m5[94m0[0m.[94m2[0m[94m0[0m3.[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m.[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m1[0m 0[94m1[0m:[94m1[0m[94m7[0m,[94m [0m[94m1[0m2 February[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m0[94m9[0m[94m ([0mUTC[94m)[0m[94m
[0mYou can[94m actually[0m make sure[94m that[0m you[94m take[0m[94m the[0m[94m right[0m[94m hal[0m[94mves[0m[94m.[0m Take out[94m another[0m[94m A[0m[94m pill[0m[94m,[0m so[94m you[0m[94m have[0m [94m2[0m As[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m B[94ms[0m[94m;[0m put[94m them[0mS and[94m have[0m[94m some[0m[94m concept[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m learning[94m task[0m[94m due[0m[94m to[0m[94m their[0m prior[94m learning[0m experiences[94m.[0m They[94m serve[0m[94m as[0m the[94m experienced[0m participants assigned[94m to[0m[94m be[0m leaders[94m in[0m[94m three[0m[94m original[0m groups[94m ([0m[94mg[0m1[94m,[0m[94m g[0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m g[0m[94m3[0m[94m)[0m[94m to[0m initi[94mate[0m[94m and[0m facil[94mitate[0m group[94m discuss[0m[94mions[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m rest[94m of[0m[94m the[0m nine students[94m are[0m allocated[94m to[0m[94m three[0m[94m original[0m[94m groups[0m[94m on[0m a random[94m basis[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m[94m each[0m[94m group[0m[94m having[0m four[94m members[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mEach[0m group member[94m is[0m required[94m to[0m[94m research[0m[94m one[0m OSL[94mMS[0m[94m ([0m[94mAt[0mutor,[94m M[0moodle[94m,[0m or Sakai[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m has[0m[94m to[0m set[94m up[0m the assigned platform[94m and[0m to[94m be[0m[94m acquaint[0m[94med[0m[94m with[0m its operation[94m and[0m[94m the[0m functions[94m of[0m[94m the[0m administrator client[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m teacher[0m client[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m student[0m[94m client[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m[94m j[0migsaw experiment[94m,[0m[94m they[0m meet[94m in[0m expert[94m groups[0m[94m with[0m their[94m counter[0m[94mparts[0m to discuss[94m both[0m[94m the[0m strengths[94m and[0m weak[94mness[0m[94mes[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m assigned OS[94mL[0m[94mMS[0m[94m.[0m Meanwhile[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m three[0m original[94m group[0m leaders[94m are[0m[94m also[0m assigned as[94m expert[0m group leaders to initi[94mate[0m[94m and[0m facil[94mitate[0m[94m the[0m[94m group[0m discussion[94m.[0m Later[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m students[0m return[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m original[0m[94m groups[0m for sharing their[94m expert[0m group discussion out[94mcomes[0m with their[94m team[0m[94mm[0m[94mates[0m[94m.[0m Their[94m overall[0m[94m goal[0m[94m is[0m[94m to[0m compare[94m the[0m[94m three[0m OS[94mL[0m[94mMS[0m in[94m several[0m aspects[94m.[0m Fig. [94m1[0m[94m shows[0m[94m the[0m[94m group[0m compos[94mitions[0m[94m.[0m The[94m students[0m[94m are[0m told prior[94m to[0m[94m their[0m participation that we[94m were[0m interested[94m in[0m expl[94moring[0m how GS[94m can[0m support[94m group[0m interaction[94m and[0m[94m K[0m[94mB[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m j[0m[94migs[0m[94maw[0m[94m method[0m[94m;[0m[94m they[0m[94m are[0m not[94m told[0m[94m,[0m[94m however[0m[94m,[0m[94m what[0m types[94m of[0m results[94m are[0m expected[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFig[0mure[94m [0m   [94mFig[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m. Group[94m compos[0m[94mitions[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m
### 3.2 How[94m Group[0m[94m S[0m[94mcri[0mbb[94mles[0m Works[94m
[0m
GS is[94m based[0m[94m on[0m[94m a[0m[94m simple[0m but flexible[94m,[0m[94m powerful[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m extensible software[94m engine[0m called[94m Tu[0mple[94m Sp[0m[94maces[0m[94m from[0m IBM[94m that[0m[94m allows[0m[94m for[0m[94m coord[0m[94mination[0m among[94m many[0m concurrent[94m process[0m[94mors[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m network[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m designed[94m to[0m[94m support[0m[94m the[0m[94m coord[0m[94mination[0m[94m of[0m[94m different[0m[94m process[0m[94mors[0m[94m and[0m[94m oper[0mates[94m on[0m[94m a[0m[94m variety[0m[94m of[0m[94m client[0m[94m computing[0m devices[94m,[0m including lapt[94mops[0m[94m,[0m Tablet PC[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m PDAs[94m [[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m3[94m].[0m[94m The[0m G[94mS[0m interface[94m presents[0m[94m each[0m student[94m with[0m[94m a[0m[94m three[0m-paned window[94m,[0m as[94m shown[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m student[94m'[0m[94ms[0m interface in[94m Fig[0m[94m.[0m 2[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFigure[94m [0m   [94mFig[0m[94m.[0m 2[94m.[0m[94m Stud[0m[94ments[0m' interface in G[94mS[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m lower p[94mane[0m is the user[94m'[0m[94ms[0m personal work area[94m,[0m or "private board,"[94m with[0m a virtual[94m pad[0m of[94m fresh[0m[94m "[0mscribble[94m notes[0m[94m"[0m on which[94m the[0m[94m student[0m can draw or type[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m "[0mtool[94m bar[0m,"[94m shown[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m right[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m private[0m board[94m,[0m[94m allows[0m users[94m to[0m select[94m the[0m color[94m of[0m note[94m and[0m[94m choose[0m[94m either[0m drawing

4[94m.[0m StackOverflow[94m:[0m Use[94m the[0m [[94mray[0m[94m][0m[94m tag[0m questions about Ray[94m.[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m # Resol[94mution[0m[94m ([0mlogic[94m)[0m

[94mIn[0m mathematical logic and automated theorem prov[94ming[0m[94m,[0m resolution[94m is[0m[94m a[0m rule[94m of[0m inference[94m leading[0m[94m to[0m a refutation theorem[94m-[0mpro[94mving[0m technique for[94m sentences[0m[94m in[0m propos[94mitional[0m[94m logic[0m[94m and[0m first[94m-[0m[94morder[0m[94m logic[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m other[0m[94m words[0m[94m,[0m[94m iter[0matively[94m applying[0m[94m the[0m resolution[94m rule[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m suitable[0m[94m way[0m[94m allows[0m[94m for[0m telling whether[94m a[0m propos[94mitional[0m formula[94m is[0m satisfi[94mable[0m[94m and[0m for prov[94ming[0m[94m that[0m[94m a[0m[94m first[0m[94m-[0m[94morder[0m[94m formula[0m[94m is[0m uns[94matisf[0m[94mi[0m[94mable[0m[94m.[0m Att[94mempt[0m[94ming[0m[94m to[0m prove[94m a[0m[94m satisf[0m[94mi[0m[94mable[0m first[94m-[0m[94morder[0m[94m formula[0m[94m as[0m[94m uns[0m[94matisf[0m[94mi[0m[94mable[0m[94m may[0m[94m result[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m non[0mtermin[94mating[0m computation;[94m this[0m problem[94m doesn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m occur[94m in[0m propos[94mitional[0m[94m logic[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m resolution[94m rule[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m trac[94med[0m[94m back[0m[94m to[0m Davis and Putnam[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m);[[94m1[0m[94m][0m however[94m,[0m[94m their[0m algorithm required[94m trying[0m all ground instances[94m of[0m[94m the[0m given formula[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m source[0m[94m of[0m combin[94matorial[0m explos[94mion[0m was elimin[94mated[0m[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m5[0m[94m by[0m[94m John[0m[94m Alan[0m Robinson'[94ms[0m syntactical[94m un[0mification algorithm[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m allowed[0m one[94m to[0m instantiate[94m the[0m formula[94m during[0m[94m the[0m proof[94m "[0mon demand[94m"[0m just[94m as[0m far[94m as[0m needed[94m to[0m[94m keep[0m ref[94mut[0m[94mation[0m completeness.[2[94m][0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m clause[0m[94m produced[0m by a resolution[94m rule[0m is sometimes called[94m a[0m resolvent.
[94m
[0m## Resol[94mution[0m in propos[94mitional[0m[94m logic[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Resol[94mution[0m rule
[94m
[0mThe[94m resolution[0m[94m rule[0m[94m in[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitional[0m[94m logic[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m single[0m valid inference[94m rule[0m[94m that[0m[94m produces[0m[94m a[0m[94m new[0m clause[94m imp[0mlied[94m by[0m[94m two[0m cla[94muses[0m[94m containing[0m complement[94mary[0m liter[94mals[0m[94m.[0m[94m A[0m literal[94m is[0m[94m a[0m propos[94mitional[0m variable or[94m the[0m neg[94mation[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m propos[94mitional[0m[94m variable[0m[94m.[0m[94m Two[0m liter[94mals[0m[94m are[0m[94m said[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m comple[0mments[94m if[0m[94m one[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m neg[94mation[0m[94m of[0m the other[94m ([0m[94min[0m the following, ${\displaystyle[94m \[0mlnot c}$ is taken[94m to[0m[94m be[0m the[94m complement[0m[94m to[0m ${\[94mdisplaystyle[0m c[94m}$[0m).[94m The[0m[94m resulting[0m clause[94m contains[0m[94m all[0m[94m the[0m liter[94mals[0m[94m that[0m[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m have[0m comple[94mments[0m[94m.[0m Formally:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m${\displaystyle {\[94mfrac[0m {a[94m_{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}\[0mlor[94m a[0m[94m_{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m[94mlor[0m \cdots \lor[94m c[0m[94m,\[0mquad b_{1[94m}\[0m[94mlor[0m b[94m_{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m[94mlor[0m[94m \[0m[94mcdots[0m[94m \[0m[94mlor[0m[94m \[0mneg c}{[94ma[0m_{[94m1[0m[94m}\[0m[94mlor[0m[94m a[0m[94m_{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0mlor[94m \[0mcdots[94m \[0mlor[94m b[0m[94m_{[0m[94m1[0m}\[94mlor[0m b[94m_{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m[94mlor[0m[94m \[0m[94mcdots[0m[94m }[0m}}$[94m
[0m[94m
[0mwhere[94m
[0m
[94mall[0m ${\[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m a[0m[94m_{[0mi[94m}}$,[0m ${\displaystyle[94m b[0m[94m_{[0m[94mi[0m}}$,[94m and[0m ${\[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m c[0m}$[94m are[0m liter[94mals[0m[94m,[0m
the[94m div[0miding line stands for "[94ment[0m[94mails[0m[94m".[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m above[0m[94m may[0m also[94m be[0m[94m written[0m[94m as[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$[94m{\[0m[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m {\[0m[94mfrac[0m {[94m$$[0m
[94m
[0m$$[94m4[0m\lambda[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m$$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$$[0m[94m\[0m[94mlambda[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m4[94m}{[0m[94m7[0m[94m}$$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$$A -[94m \[0m[94mlambda[0m I[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94m \[0mbegin[94m{[0m[94marray[0m[94m}{[0mccc[94m}[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m4[0m[94m}[0m[94m &[0m[94m [0m0[94m &[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m \\[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m &[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m5[94m}{[0m[94m7[0m[94m}[0m[94m &[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m \\[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m &[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m &[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m \[0m[94mend[0m[94m{[0m[94marray[0m[94m}[0m[94m \[0m[94mright[0m)$$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$$[94m\[0mfrac[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m4[0m[94m}[0m[94mx[0m_[94m1[0m =[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m$$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$$[0m[94m\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m5[94m}{[0m[94m4[0m[94m}[0m[94mx[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m +[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94mx[0m[94m_[0m[94m3[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m$$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mE[0migenvector[94m =[0m[94m $$\[0mleft[94m([0m[94m \[0m[94mbegin[0m[94m{[0m[94marray[0m[94m}{[0m[94mccc[0m[94m}[0m [94m0[0m \\[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m \\[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m \[0m[94mend[0m[94m{[0m[94marray[0m[94m}[0m[94m \[0m[94mright[0m[94m)$$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mLast[0m edited: Oct [94m2[0m6[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m9

[0m[94m

[94m
[0mVisual Studio .NET [94m2[0m[94m0[0m03[94m
[0m
[94mWhen[0m creating formulas[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m have[0m the option of[94m using[0m either Cry[94mstal[0m[94m or[0m[94m Basic[0m syntax[94m.[0m[94m Al[0mmost any formula written with[94m one[0m syntax can[94m be[0m written with the[94m other[0m[94m.[0m Reports can contain formulas that use[94m Basic[0m syntax[94m as[0m well as formulas that use[94m Cry[0m[94mstal[0m syntax[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mTo insert a formula into[94m a[0m report

1[94m.[0m In the Field Explorer[94m,[0m right[94m-[0m[94mclick[0m Formula Fields[94m and[0m click New[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mT[0mip   To display[94m the[0m Field Explorer, click the View menu, point to Other Windows,[94m and[0m click Document Outline[94m.[0m[94m
