soon[94m.[0m[94m Yeah[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m'[0m[94mm[0m[94m going[0m[94m to[0m[94m Winter[0m[94m now[0m[94m...[0m[94mbut[0m[94m,[0m[94m now[0m[94m I[0m[94m realize[0m[94m it[0m wasn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m Winter[94m that[0m[94m I[0m wanted[94m to[0m go to[94m...[0m[94mit[0m[94m was[0m[94m W[0mHO I[94m-[0mP-[94m1[0mb[94m were[0m observed during[94m two[0m visits[94m,[0m including two orbits before and one after each occultation[94m.[0m Because[94m of[0m[94m the[0m bright[94mness[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m targets[94m,[0m spectroscopy[94m was[0m required[94m to[0m allow[94m for[0m[94m reason[0m[94mably[0m[94m long[0m exposures[94m.[0m[94m To[0m[94m capture[0m[94m both[0m stars[94m without[0m very[94m tight[0m[94m constraints[0m[94m on[0m[94m space[0mcraft orientation[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m did[0m[94m not[0m[94m use[0m a slit[94m.[0m Table [94m3[0m[94m.[0m1[94m summer[0mizes[94m the[0m details[94m of[0m[94m the[0m observations[94m.[0m[94m With[0m these settings[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m largest[0m electron count[94m in[0m each expos[94mure[0m was about[94m half[0m[94m the[0m[94m well[0m[94m size[0m[94m,[0m well below[94m s[0matur[94mation[0m[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m interesting[0m[94m to[0m[94m note[0m[94m that[0m[94m longer[0m expos[94mures[0m[94m would[0m[94m not[0m[94m have[0m pos[94med[0m[94m a[0m problem[94m in[0m[94m terms[0m[94m of[0m[94m linear[0m[94mity[0m either: when[94m ST[0mIS pixels get satur[94mated[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m ex[0mce[94mes[0m[94m charge[0m bleeds into surrounding pixels[94m with[0m virt[94mually[0m no loss[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m sum[0mming these[94m pixel[0m[94m counts[0m still[94m results[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m linear response[94m ([0mGilliland et al.,[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m9[94m9[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWe[0m identify hot pixels[94m and[0m exclude[94m them[0m[94m from[0m[94m our[0m[94m a[0mpertures[94m,[0m[94m and[0m identify cosmic ray[94ms[0m[94m and[0m[94m substitute[0m[94m them[0m by[94m the[0m average[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m previous[0m and next frame[94m values[0m[94m.[0m[94m Then[0m[94m we[0m perform[94m rect[0m[94mangular[0m a[94mpert[0m[94mure[0m phot[94mometry[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m two stars[94m,[0m[94m and[0m define[94m an[0m[94m a[0m[94mpert[0m[94mure[0m in[94m the[0m[94m entire[0m[94m length[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m det[0mector[94m in[0m[94m the[0m disp[94mersion[0m[94m direction[0m[94m for[0m[94m sky[0m background estimation[94m.[0m For[94m each[0m expos[94mure[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m subtract[0m[94m the[0m background[94m a[0m[94mpert[0m[94mure[0m phot[94mon[0m count[94m from[0m[94m the[0m stellar[94m a[0m[94mpert[0m[94mure[0m[94m phot[0mon counts[94m,[0m scale[94md[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m number[0m[94m of[0m[94m pixels[0m[94m.[0m Figure[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m.[0m[94m1[0m shows[94m a[0m typical expos[94mure[0m from[94m each[0m visit[94m,[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m a[0m[94mpert[0mures[94m used[0m[94m.[0m The blue[94m end[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m stellar[94m a[0m[94mpert[0mures is[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m6[0m[94m4[0m[94m n[0mm[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m visit[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m57[94m n[0m[94mm[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m second[0m.[94m The[0m[94m difference[0m[94m is[0m caused[94m by[0m different[94m orient[0m[94mations[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m teles[94mcope[0m[94m around[0m its optical[94m axis[0m[94m,[0m[94m resulting[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m ST[94mIS[0m det[94mector[0m edge cutting[94m the[0m H[94mAT[0m-P-1 spectrum[94m at[0m[94m different[0m[94m positions[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m two[0m vis[94mits[0m[94m.[0m[94m These[0m[94m w[0m[94mavel[0m[94mength[0m values[94m are[0m[94m calculated[0m[94m after[0m[94m ident[0m[94mifying[0m[94m the[0m H[94m and[0m Na I D lines[94m in[0m[94m the[0m stell[94mar[0m spectra[94m.[0m[94m We[0m extract[94m the[0m[94m same[0m spectral range[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m two[0m[94m stars[0m within[94m a[0m[94m visit[0m[94m to[0m[94m fight[0m wavel[94mength[0m-dependent systematics[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m allow[94m for[0m different[94m blue[0m end cut[94ms[0m between vis[94mits[0m[94m,[0m[94m otherwise[0m[94m we[0m[94m would[0m lose[94m too[0m[94m many[0m phot[94mons[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m second[0m visit[94m due[0m[94m to[0m the[94m more[0m[94m restrict[0m[94mive[0m[94m w[0m[94mavel[0m[94mength[0m limit[94m of[0m[94m the[0m first one.[94m We[0m[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m expect[0m[94m the[0m[94m geometric[0m albedo[94m to[0m vary[94m significantly[0m[94m due[0m[94m to[0m[94m this[0m[94m small[0m[94m change[0m[94m in[0m blue end[94m w[0m[94mavel[0m[94mength[0m cut[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m####[94m [0m3.2.2array}{[94m}\[0m[94mtext[0m{(A2)}& {\partial }_{z}w=-\mathrm{\nabla }\cdot \math[94mbit[0m{u},\end{array}$[94m
[0m[94m
[0mand[94m the[0m hydrostatic equation[94m is[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0mbegin[94m{[0marray[94m}{[0m}\text{(A3[94m)}[0m[94m&[0m {\partial }_{z[94m}[0mp=-g[94m\[0mmathit[94m{\[0mrho },\end[94m{[0m[94marray[0m[94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mwhere[0m[94m [0m[94mρ[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m deviation[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m mean[0m density [94mρ[0m0[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mT[0mracer Eqs[94m.[0m[94m [0m([94mA[0m4[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m ([0m[94mA[0m[94m5[0m[94m),[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$\[94mbegin[0m[94m{[0m[94marray[0m[94m}{[0m[94m}\[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{([0m[94mA[0m[94m4[0m[94m)}[0m[94m&[0m[94m &[0m {\[94mpartial[0m[94m }[0m[94m_{[0mt[94m}[0mT+\mathbit[94m{[0mv}\[94mcdot[0m {\mathrm{\nabla[94m }[0m[94m}_{\[0mmathrm[94m{[0m[94m3[0m[94m}}[0m[94mT[0m[94m-\[0m[94mmathrm[0m{\nabla }\[94mcdot[0m[94m {[0mK}_{\[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94mh[0m}}\[94mmathrm[0m[94m{\[0mnabla[94m }[0m[94mT[0m-[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m }[0m_{[94mz[0m[94m}{[0mK[94m}_{\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0mv[94m}}{\[0mpartial[94m }[0m_{z[94m}[0m[94mT[0m[94m=\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94m0[0m[94m}\[0m[94mtext[0m{([94mA[0m[94m5[0m[94m)}[0m&[94m &[0m[94m {\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m }[0m[94m_{[0m[94mt[0m[94m}[0mS[94m+\[0m[94mmath[0m[94mbit[0m[94m{[0m[94mv[0m[94m}\[0m[94mcdot[0m[94m {\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{\[0m[94mnabla[0m[94m }[0m[94m}_{\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94m3[0m[94m}}[0m[94mS[0m[94m-\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{\[0m[94mnabla[0m[94m }\[0m[94mcdot[0m[94m {[0m[94mK[0m[94m}_{\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94mh[0m[94m}}\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{\[0m[94mnabla[0m[94m }[0mS[94m-[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m }[0m[94m_{[0m[94mz[0m[94m}{[0m[94mK[0m[94m}_{\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94mv[0m[94m}}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m }[0m[94m_{[0m[94mz[0m[94m}[0m[94mS[0m[94m=\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94m0[0m},\end[94m{[0m[94marray[0m[94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mare solved[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m potential[0m temperature[94m,[0m[94m T[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m salinity[94m,[0m S[94m,[0m where Kh[94m and[0m[94m K[0mv[94m are[0m[94m the[0m horizontal[94m and[0m[94m vertical[0m eddy diffusivities[94m,[0m[94m respectively[0m[94m.[0m Lap[94mla[0m[94mcian[0m diffusivity[94m is[0m used for[94m the[0m trac[94mer[0m[94m equations[0m[94m.[0m Kh[94m is[0m[94m again[0m scale[94md[0m[94m as[0m[94m Ah[0m but[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m element[0m size with[94m a[0m reference value[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m×[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m3 m2 s−[94m1[0m.[94m These[0m[94m values[0m[94m are[0m[94m set[0m[94m following[0m[94m the[0m[94m convergence[0m study[94m of[0m .[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m ([0m[94mPP[0m[94m)[0m parameterisation scheme[94m is[0m used[94m for[0m vertical mixing[94m,[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m[94m background[0m vertical viscosity[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m−5 m2 [94ms[0m−[94m1[0m for[94m momentum[0m[94m and[0m diffusivity[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m−[0m6 [94mm[0m[94m2[0m [94ms[0m−[94m1[0m for tracers[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m maximum[0m[94m value[0m[94m is[0m set[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m5 [94mm[0m2 [94ms[0m−[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m density anomaly[94m [0m[94mρ[0m[94m is[0m computed[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m full[0m equation[94m of[0m state ([94mEq[0m. A6).
[94m
[0m$\begin[94m{[0marray[94m}{[0m[94m}\[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{([0m[94mA[0m[94m6[0m[94m)}[0m[94m&[0m \mathit{\rho[94m }[0m=\math[94mit[0m{\rho }\left[94m([0m[94mT[0m,S[94m,[0m[94mp[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)\[0m[94mend[0m[94m{[0marray}$
[94m
[0mThe surface[94m and[0m bottom[94m momentum[0m[94m boundary[0m[94m conditions[0m[94m are[0m[94m,[0m[94m respectively[0m Mar [94m2[0m3[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m0[94m0[0m9[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWahoowa[94m
[0m
[94mA[0m[94m sem[0miconduct[94mor[0m diode is[94m simple[0m[94m and[0m elegant, but understanding[94m how[0m it[94m works[0m takes[94m some[0m thought[94m.[0m[94m Let[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m walking[0m through[94m the[0m formation[94m and[0m use of a diode[94m to[0m see exactly[94m why[0m[94m that[0m[94m di[0mode acts[94m as[0m[94m a[0m one[94m-[0mway device[94m for[0m electric[94m current[0m[94m.[0m The first[94m step[0m in building[94m a[0m[94m di[0m[94mode[0m[94m is[0m[94m to[0m[94m obtain[0m[94m the[0m basic material[94m from[0m which[94m it[0m[94m will[0m be[94m made[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m most[94m cases[0m[94m,[0m[94m that[0m material[94m is[0m the element sil[94micon[0m. When[94m you[0m order[94m sil[0m[94micon[0m from a chemical supply[94m company[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m can[0m purchase sil[94micon[0m[94m that[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m9[94m8[0m.[94m4[0m[94m%[0m[94m pure[0m[94m for[0m[94m $[0m[94m4[0m0[94m/[0mkg or[94m [0m[94m9[0m9[94m.[0m9999[94m%[0m[94m pure[0m[94m for[0m[94m$[0m8[94m0[0m0[94m/[0m[94mkg[0m[94m.[0m[94m Why[0m should[94m you[0m[94m spend[0m[94m the[0m extra money for[94m the[0m good stuff[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94ma[0m[94m)[0m Because[94m of[0m its[94m imp[0m[94murity[0m atoms,[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m[94m4[0m[94m%[0m[94m pure[0m[94m sil[0m[94micon[0m[94m will[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m much[94m higher[0m elect[94mrical[0m resistance[94m than[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m.[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m%[0m[94m pure[0m[94m sil[0m[94micon[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mb[0m[94m)[0m[94m Because[0m[94m of[0m[94m its[0m imp[94murity[0m atoms[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m[94m4[0m[94m%[0m[94m pure[0m[94m sil[0m[94micon[0m[94m will[0m[94m not[0m conduct electric[94m current[0m well[94m enough[0m to become[94m a[0m[94m di[0m[94mode[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mc[0m[94m)[0m[94m Because[0m[94m of[0m[94m its[0m[94m imp[0m[94murity[0m[94m atoms[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m8.4[94m%[0m[94m pure[0m[94m sil[0m[94micon[0m[94m will[0m[94m have[0m no electrons[94m in[0m its condu[94mction[0m band[94m and[0m no[94m vac[0man[94mcies[0m[94m in[0m its valence band[94m.[0m It[94m will[0m[94m therefore[0m not[94m be[0m[94m a[0m true sem[94micon[0mduct[94mor[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0md[94m)[0m[94m Because[0m[94m of[0m[94m its[0m[94m imp[0m[94murity[0m atoms[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m8[94m.[0m[94m4[0m[94m%[0m[94m pure[0m[94m sil[0m[94micon[0m[94m will[0m[94m have[0m too many electrons[94m in[0m[94m its[0m condu[94mction[0m[94m band[0m or[94m too[0m many[94m vac[0m[94man[0m[94mcies[0m[94m in[0m[94m its[0m valence[94m band[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m true[94m sem[0miconduct[94mor[0m[94m.[0m Produ[94mcing[0m[94m both[0m[94m p[0m-type[94m and[0m n[94m-[0m[94mtype[0m semiconduct[94mors[0m from it[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m almost[0m[94m impossible[0m.[94m
[0m----------------[94m----------------[0m----------------[94m------------[0m[94m
[0mSupp[94mose[0m you start[94m with[0m the[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m.[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m%[94m pure[0m[94m sil[0m[94micon[0m[94m and[0m add[94m a[0m small fraction[94m of[0m aluminum atoms[94m.[0m The new material has[94m the[0m same band structure[94m as[0m[94m before[0m[94m but[0m each[94m al[0mumin[94mum[0m atom[94m has[0m one fewer electron[94m than[0m[94m the[0m silicon atom it replaces[94m.[0m[94m The[0m alumin[94mum[0m atom[94m also[0m[94m has[0m one fewer positive charge in its nucleus,[94m so[0m[94m the[0m material[94m is[0m still elect[94mr[0mically neutral[94m.[0m[94m Because[0m[94m of[0m[94m its[0m al[94mumin[0m[94mum[0m[94m content[0m[94m,[0m this new[94m material[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mA)[94m has[0m some empty levels in[94m its[0m[94m val[0mence[94m band[0m[94m and[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m n-type semiconduct[94mor[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mB[0m[94m)[0m has some filled levels[94m in[0m[94m its[0m condu[94mction[0m[94m band[0m[94m and[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m n[0m[94m-[0m[94mtype[0m[94m sem[0m[94m describes[0m[94m a[0m[94m programming[0m[94m language[0m extension[94m of[0m C++, called[94m C[0m[94mES[0m[94m,[0m specifically targeted[94m towards[0m mobile robot control[94m.[0m C[94mES[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m design[0m[94m is[0m motiv[94mated[0m[94m by[0m[94m a[0m recent[94m series[0m[94m of[0m successful[94m {\[0mem probabil[94mistic[0m[94m}[0m methods[94m for[0m[94m mobile[0m robot[94m control[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m goal[0m[94m of[0m[94m facil[0m[94mit[0m[94mating[0m[94m the[0m[94m development[0m[94m of[0m[94m such[0m probabil[94mistic[0m software[94m in[0m[94m future[0m robot[94m applications[0m[94m.[0m C[94mES[0m[94m extends[0m[94m C[0m[94m++[0m by[94m two[0m ideas[94m:[0m[94m Comput[0m[94ming[0m[94m with[0m[94m probability[0m[94m distributions[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m built[0m-[94min[0m[94m mechan[0m[94misms[0m[94m for[0m[94m learning[0m[94m from[0m[94m examples[0m as[94m a[0m[94m new[0m means[94m of[0m programming[94m.[0m An[94m example[0m program[94m,[0m[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m control[0m[94m a[0m[94m mail[0m[94m-[0m[94mdel[0m[94miver[0m[94ming[0m[94m robot[0m[94m with[0m gesture[94m comm[0mend[94m interface[0m[94m,[0m illustr[94mates[0m[94m that[0m[94m C[0m[94mES[0m[94m may[0m[94m reduce[0m[94m the[0m code development[94m by[0m[94m two[0m orders[94m of[0m magnitude[94m.[0m C[94mES[0m[94m diff[0m[94mers[0m[94m from[0m[94m other[0m[94m special[0m-[94mpur[0m[94mpose[0m[94m programming[0m[94m languages[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m field[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m typically[0m[94m emphas[0m[94mize[0m[94m conc[0m[94murrency[0m[94m and[0m[94m real[0m[94m-[0m[94mtime[0m[94m/[0m[94mevent[0m-dri[94mven[0m[94m processing[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m The[0m[94m full[0m[94m paper[0m[94m is[0m available[94m in[0m[94m g[0mzipped Post[94mscript[0m[94m and[0m[94m PDF[0m[94m

[0m quadratic function[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m#### Worked example[94m
[0m
Find[94m the[0m $x[94m$[0m[94mx[0m[94m-[0m[94minter[0m[94mcept[0ms[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m function[0m $[94my[0m[94m=[0m2x\[94mleft[0m[94m([0mx[94m+[0m6[94m\[0m[94mright[0m)$y[94m=[0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m+[0m[94m6[0m).[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTh[0mink[94m:[0m F[94minding[0m[94m the[0m[94m $[0mx[94m$[0m[94mx[0m[94m-[0m[94minter[0m[94mcept[0m[94ms[0m of[94m this[0m[94m function[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m as[0m[94m finding[0m[94m the[0m roots[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m equation[0m [94m$[0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m\[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m+[0m[94m6[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)=[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m2[94mx[0m([94mx[0m[94m+[0m[94m6[0m[94m)=[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mDo: Set[94m each[0m factor[94m to[0m[94m zero[0m, so[94m either[0m[94m
[0m
[94m $[0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m$2x $=$[94m=[0m[94m $[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m[94m0[0m or[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m+[0m[94m6[0m$x+[94m6[0m $[94m=$[0m[94m=[0m[94m $[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m0[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0mx[94m $[0m[94m=$[0m[94m=[0m[94m $[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m0[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0mx[94m $[0m[94m=$[0m[94m=[0m $-[94m6[0m[94m$[0m−[94m6[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThis[0m[94m curve[0m cross[94mes[0m[94m the[0m[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0mx[94m-[0maxis[94m at[0m[94m $[0m0[94m$[0m0[94m and[0m[94m $-[0m[94m6[0m[94m$[0m[94m6[0m
[94m
[0m##[94m The[0m vertex
[94m
[0mAll[94m par[0m[94mab[0m[94molas[0m ([94mthe[0m shape[94m of[0m a quadratic function[94m)[0m[94m are[0m[94m symmetric[0m [94mfunctions[0m.[94m The[0m[94m axis[0m[94m of[0m[94m symmetry[0m of[94m a[0m[94m par[0m[94mab[0m[94mola[0m passes[94m through[0m[94m its[0m turning[94m point[0m.[94m Since[0m par[94mab[0m[94molas[0m[94m have[0m only[94m one[0m turning[94m point[0m[94m,[0m this[94m point[0m[94m is[0m given a special name[94m:[0m[94m the[0m[94m vertex[0m[94m.[0m This[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m maximum[0m or[94m minimum[0m value[94m of[0m a quadratic[94m function[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m vertex[0m always[94m occurs[0m mid[94mway[0m[94m between[0m[94m the[0m[94m two[0m[94m roots[0m,[94m and[0m lies[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m axis[0m[94m of[0m[94m symmetry[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m the example[94m above[0m where[94m we[0m had $[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94mx[0m[94m-[0m[94minter[0m[94mcept[0m[94ms[0m of[94m $[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m0[94m and[0m[94m $-[0m[94m6[0m$[94m6[0m, the[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94mx[0m-coordinate of[94m the[0m vertex[94m will[0m occur[94m half[0m[94mway[0m[94m between[0m[94m $[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m0 and[94m $-[0m[94m6[0m[94m$[0m[94m6[0m
[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m some[94m cases[0m you can tell by ins[94mpection[0m what[94m the[0m midway[94m point[0m[94m is[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m this[0m[94m case[0m[94m we[0m[94m can[0m[94m see[0m[94m that[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m $-3[94m$[0m3.[94m If[0m[94m we[0m[94m can[0m'[94mt[0m tell[94m by[0m[94m ins[0m[94mpection[0m we[94m can[0m just find[94m the[0m[94m average[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m $\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0mx[94m_[0m[94m1[0m[94m+[0m[94mx[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m}$x1​+[94mx[0m[94m2[0m​[94m2[0m​ $=$=[94m $\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m0[0m+\left(-6\[94mright[0m)}{[94m2[0m}$0+(−[94m6[0m)2​ $=$= $\[94mfrac[0m{-[94m6[0m}{2}$−62​ $=$= $-3[94m$[0m−3
[94mNow[0m[94m remember[0m that[94m this[0m[94m is[0m only[94m the[0m[94m $[0mx[94m$[0m[94mx[0m-coordinate of[94m the[0m[94m vertex[0m[94m.[0m We still need to substitute[94m this[0m value[94m into[0m[94m the[0m quadratic[94m to[0m get[94m the[0m[94m $[0my$y-[94mcoordinate[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m $f[94m([0m[94mx[0m)$f[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m)[0m $=$= $[94m2[0m[94mx[0m\[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m. So[94m we[0m[94m would[0m appreciate help[94m of[0m[94m this[0m blog[94m.[0m[94m

[0m[94m
[0mwhich[94m is[0m[94m equivalent[0m[94m to[0m a particle moving in[94m a[0m one[94m-[0m[94mdimensional[0m effective[94m potential[0m
[94m
[0m[94m:$[0mV\[94mleft[0m(r[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m -[0mfrac\[94mleft[0m\{GMm\[94mright[0m\}\[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94mr[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m\}[0m[94m +[0m f[94mrac[0m[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m\{[94mL[0m^\[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94m2[0m[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94m2[0m[94mm[0m[94m r[0m[94m^\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94m2[0m -[94m f[0m[94mrac[0m[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94mGM[0m[94m L[0m[94m^\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94m2[0m[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94mc[0m[94m^\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94m2[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m\}[0m[94m m[0m[94m r[0m[94m^\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m[94m3[0m$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m first[0m[94m two[0m[94m terms[0m[94m are[0m[94m well[0m[94m-[0mknown classical[94m energ[0m[94mies[0m[94m,[0m the first being the[94m attract[0mive Newtonian gravit[94mational[0m[94m potential[0m[94m energy[0m and[94m the[0m[94m second[0m corresponding to[94m the[0m repulsive "centrifug[94mal[0m[94m"[0m[94m potential[0m[94m energy[0m;[94m however[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m third[0m[94m term[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m attract[94mive[0m energy unique[94m to[0m general relativity[94m.[0m As[94m shown[0m below[94m and[0m elsewhere[94m,[0m[94m this[0m[94m inverse[0m-cub[94mic[0m[94m energy[0m causes elli[94mpt[0m[94mical[0m or[94mbits[0m[94m to[0m precess[94m gradually[0m[94m by[0m an angle δφ per revolution[94m
[0m[94m
[0m:$[94mdelta[0m[94m var[0mphi[94m appro[0m[94mx[0m[94m f[0m[94mrac[0m\[94mleft[0m\{6pi G[94m M[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m\}\[94mleft[0m\{[94mc[0m[94m^\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m\{[0m2[94m\[0mright[94m\}[0m A[94m left[0m[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m([94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m-[0m e^\[94mleft[0m\{2[94m\[0mright[94m\}[0m ight[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)\[0mright\}$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mwhere[0m "A[94m"[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m semi[94m-[0m[94mmajor[0m[94m axis[0m and[94m "[0m[94me[0m[94m"[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m ecc[94ment[0m[94mric[0m[94mity[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe third[94m term[0m[94m is[0m attract[94mive[0m and domin[94mates[0m[94m at[0m small "r" values[94m,[0m[94m giving[0m[94m a[0m[94m critical[0m[94m inner[0m radius[94m "[0m[94mr[0m[94m"[0m[94minner[0m at which a[94m particle[0m[94m is[0m[94m drawn[0m in[94mex[0morably in[94mwards[0m to "r[94m"[0m=0[94m;[0m this[94m inner[0m[94m radius[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m function[94m of[0m[94m the[0m particle[94m'[0m[94ms[0m angular momentum per unit mass or,[94m equival[0m[94mently[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m "a[94m"[0m[94m length[0m[94m-[0mscale defined[94m above[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mCirc[94mular[0m or[94mbits[0m[94m and[0m[94m their[0m stability
[94m
[0mThe effective[94m potential[0m "[94mV[0m"[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m re[0m,[94m which[0m correspond[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m columns[0m sex,[94m weight[0m[94m,[0m height[94m,[0m reported[94m weight[0m[94m rep[0mwt and reported height repht[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m example[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m[94m row[0m in[94m the[0m[94m table[0m spec[94mifies[0m[94m a[0m Male we[94migh[0m[94ming[0m[94m [0m77kg and has[94m a[0m height[94m of[0m[94m [0m18[94m2[0mcm[94m.[0m[94m The[0m reported weights[94m are[0m very[94m close[0m[94m with[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m7[0m[94mkg[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m0[94mcm[0m[94m,[0m[94m respectively[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m rows[94m in[0m a data frame are further identified[94m by[0m row names on[94m the[0m left which[94m are[0m simply[94m the[0m row[94m numbers[0m[94m by[0m default[94m.[0m[94m In[0m the case[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m Davis[0m dataset above the row names[94m range[0m[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m2[94m0[0m0[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mBuild a data[94m frame[0m from vectors[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m How[94m do[0m I[94m fit[0m a par[94mabol[0moid surface to[94m nine[0m[94m points[0m and[94m find[0m[94m the[0m[94m minimum[0m?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mG[0m[94miven[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m values[94m for[0m $[94mf[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m,[0my[94m)$[0m[94m where[0m $([94mx[0m[94m,[0m[94my[0m[94m)[0m[94m \[0m[94min[0m[94m \[0m{-[94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m+[94m1[0m\}^2[94m$[0m I wish[94m to[0m fit[94m a[0m[94m par[0m[94mabol[0m[94moid[0m[94m surface[0m $z[94m =[0m[94m f[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m,[0m[94my[0m[94m)$[0m[94m to[0m[94m these[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m values[94m.[0m Once[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m $[0m[94mf[0m$[94m I[0m want[94m to[0m[94m locate[0m[94m its[0m[94m minimum[0m[94m value[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m center value $[94mf[0m[94m([0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m0[0m[94m)$[0m[94m is[0m known[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m the[0m[94m smallest[0m of[94m the[0m [94m9[0m input[94m values[0m[94m so[0m[94m there[0m exists[94m a[0m minimum[94m value[0m[94m of[0m[94m $[0m[94mf[0m[94m$[0m on[94m the[0m domain $[[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m,[0m+[94m1[0m][94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m.$[0m I wish find $(x^*,[94my[0m[94m^*[0m)[94m =[0m \mathrm[94m{[0marg[94mmin[0m}\ f[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m,[0m[94my[0m).[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mI could[94m find[0m [94m6[0m[94m the[0m[94m coefficients[0m[94m for[0m $$[94mf[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m,[0m[94my[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m ax^[94m2[0m +[94m by[0m^[94m2[0m + cxy + dx[94m +[0m[94m e[0my[94m +[0m g[94m$$[0m using[94m a[0m least[94m squ[0m[94mared[0m error fit[94m.[0m[94m To[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m[94m minimum[0m I[94m simply[0m solve[94m $[0m[94mf[0m_[94mx[0m[94m =[0m [94m0[0m[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $[0m[94mf[0m[94m_[0m[94my[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m[94m which[0m[94m leads[0m[94m to[0m a simple linear system which[94m has[0m a[94m unique[0m[94m solution[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mCon[0m[94mvers[0mely I[94m could[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m [94m9[0m coefficients[94m for[0m $$[94mf[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m,[0m[94my[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m ax[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94my[0m^[94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m b[0m[94mx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94my[0m[94m +[0m[94m c[0m[94mxy[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m dx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m e[0my[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m +[0m gxy[94m +[0m[94m h[0mx +[94m i[0m[94my[0m +[94m j[0m$$[94m and[0m[94m get[0m an[94m exact[0m fit ([94m9[0m linear equations[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m unknown[94ms[0m). F[94minding[0m[94m the[0m[94m minimum[0m[94m of[0m[94m this[0m function[94m would[0m[94m require[0m[94m something[0m akin to gradient descent.
[94m
[0mThe problem I am[94m a[0m trying[94m to[0m solve comes from[94m this[0m paper where it cryptically says "[94mThis[0m produces values[94m that[0m[94m are[0m[94m integers[0m;[94m to[0m get[94m a[0m[94m sub[0mpixel estimate[94m,[0m[94m we[0m fit a par[94mab[0m[94mola[0m to the[94m [0m3×3 pixels centered are[94m $$[0mz=[94m3[0m$$ and[94m $$[0mz[94m=[0m[94m7[0m$$.
[94m
[0m### Pole-Zero Plot

About finding[94m the[0m[94m P[0m[94mole[0m[94m zero[0m[94m plot[0m, you draw[94m a[0m[94m complex[0m[94m plane[0m[94m.[0m Then you put the values[94m of[0m pol[94mes[0m as 'X[94m'[0m marks and zeros as 'O[94m'[0m marks[94m.[0m Here I took[94m the[0m liberty[94m of[0m[94m drawing[0m[94m the[0m[94m pole[0m[94m zero[0m[94m plot[0m of[94m the[0m system[94m .[0m[94m P[0m[94mole[0m[94m zero[0m[94m plot[0m of[94m the[0m above[94m system[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSo[94m,[0m[94m for[0m low pass filter[94m,[0m you find out[94m the[0m[94m transfer[0m function[94m,[0m then the[94m pol[0m[94mes[0m and zeros[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mSupp[94mose[0m[94m you[0m are given a[94m system[0m[94m with[0m transfer[94m function[0m
[94m
[0m$$[94mH[0m[94m([0m[94mz[0m)=\frac[94m{([0m1[94m-[0m3z^{-[94m1[0m[94m})[0m[94m([0m1[94m-[0m[94m7[0m[94mz[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m1[0m[94m})[0m[94m}{([0m1[94m-[0m4[94mz[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m1[0m[94m})[0m[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m-[0m6[94mz[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m1[0m[94m})[0m}$$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m Pol[0mes[94m
[0m[94m
[0mPoles[94m are[0m the[94m values[0m[94m of[0m[94m z[0m[94m for[0m[94m which[0m[94m the[0m entire function will[94m be[0m infinity or undefined[94m.[0m So[94m,[0m[94m they[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m the[0m[94m roots[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m denomin[0m[94mators[0m, right?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mLook[0m here, what values of[94m z[0m[94m will[0m turn[94m the[0m transfer[94m function[0m tend[94m to[0m infinity[94m?[0m Obviously its $$z= 4$$[94mand[0m [94m6[0m[94m,[0m because[94m if[0m you[94m put[0m[94m z[0m equals[94m [0m[94m4[0m or[94m [0m[94m6[0m,[94m the[0m denominator will[94m be[0m[94m zero[0m,[94m which[0m means[94m the[0m transfer[94m function[0m will tend[94m to[0m[94m infinity[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m Zeros[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAg[0main[94m,[0m zeros are the values[94m of[0m[94m z[0m[94m for[0m[94m which[0m[94m the[0m transfer[94m function[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m zero[94m.[0m[94m As[0m you[94m have[0m guess[94med[0m[94m correctly[0m[94m,[0m zeros come from numer[94mator[0m.[94m In[0m[94m this[0m[94m case[0m, zeros[94m are[0m $$[94mz[0m=[94m [0m3$$ and[94m $$[0m[94mz[0m[94m=[0m[94m7[0m$$, cause if[94m you[0m[94m put[0m $$[94mz[0m[94m=[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m$$[0m or[94m $$[0m[94mz[0m[94m=[0m[94m7[0m$[94m$,[0m[94m the[0m numer[94mator[0m will be[94m zero[0m, that means[94m the[0m[94m whole[0m transfer[94m function[0m will[94m be[0m[94m zero[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mSo[94m here[0m pol[94mes[0m[94m are[0m $$[94mz[0m[94m=[0m4[94m$$[0m and[94m $$[0m[94mz[0m[94m=[0m6$$, and zeros are $$[94mz[0m[94m=[0m3[94m$$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $$[0mz[94m=[0m[94m7[0m$$.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m P[0m[94mole[0m-Zero Plot[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAbout[94m finding[0m[94m the[0m P[94mole[0m[94m zero[0m[94m plot[0m,[94m you[0m[94m draw[0m[94m a[0m[94m complex[0m[94m plane[0m.[94m Then[0m[94m you[0m[94m put[0m[94m the[0m[94m values[0m[94m of[0m[94m pol[0m[94mes[0m[94m as[0m[94m '[0m[94mX[0m[94m'[0m[94m marks[0m[94m and[0m[94m zeros[0m[94m as[0m '[94mO[0m[94m'[0m[94m marks[0m[94m.[0m[94m Here[0m I[94m took[0m[94m the[0m liberty[94m of[0m[94m drawing[0m[94m the[0m[94m pole[0m[94m zero[0m[94m plot[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m system[0m .[94m P[0m[94mole[0m[94m zero[0m[94m plot[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m above[94m system[0m
[94m
[0mSo[94m,[0m[94m for[0m[94m low[0m[94m pass[0m[94m filter[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m find[0m[94m out[0m[94m the[0m[94m transfer[0m[94m function[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m the[0m[94m pol[0m[94mes[0m[94m and[0m[94m zeros[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSupp[94mose[0m[94m you[0m[94m are[0m[94m given[0m[94m a[0m[94m system[0m[94m with[0m[94m transfer[0m[94m function[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$$[94mH[0m[94m([0m[94mz[0m)=\[94mfrac[0m[94m{([0m[94m1[0m[94m-[0m[94m3[0mz^{-[94m1[0m[94m})[0m[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m-[0m[94m7[0m[94mz[0m^{-[94m1[0m[94m})[0mbon [0m[94m
[0mExample[94m:[0m[94m text[0m[94mbook[0m example 5[94m-[0m[94m7[0m

[94mWe[0m[94m have[0m pipeline that[94m needs[0m[94m repair[0m[94m.[0m[94m After[0m fix[94m the[0m pipeline needs another repair[94m every[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m years[94m.[0m[94m Each[0m[94m time[0m costs[94m $[0m[94m8[0mM[94m.[0m Interest[94m is[0m [94m7[0m%. First[94m we[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m annu[94mity[0m.[94m This[0m can[94m be[0m done using sinking funds formula[94m ([0m[94mA[0m[94m/[0m[94mF[0m,[94m n[0m[94m,[0m i): $[94mA[0m[94m=[0m8\,[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m\,0[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m([0m[94mA[0m/F[94m,[0m 70[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m.[94m0[0m7[94m)=\[0m[94m4[0m\,9[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m Now[94m we[0m[94m can[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m[94m capital[0m[94mized[0m[94m cost[0m[94m:[0m[94m $[0m[94mP[0m[94m=\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94m}{[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m}=\[0m[94m7[0m[94m1[0m\,[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m Note[94m that[0m[94m we[0m also[94m have[0m[94m the[0m initial[94m repair[0m[94m of[0m$[94m8[0mM[94m so[0m[94m the[0m[94m actual[0m[94m total[0m capital[94mized[0m[94m cost[0m[94m is[0m[94m $[0m[94m8[0m.[94m0[0m[94m7[0m1[94mM[0m[94m.[0m ###[94m Multiple[0m Altern[94matives[0m For[94m more[0m than[94m two[0m alternatives[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m are[0m[94m various[0m[94m ways[0m of[94m approach[0m.[94m Common[0m[94m approaches[0m[94m include[0m[94m computing[0m the[94m present[0m[94m worth[0m[94m of[0m[94m cost[0m[94m of[0m each alternatives[94m.[0m Note[94m that[0m[94m the[0m evaluation[94m of[0m each alternative[94m must[0m[94m have[0m a[94m common[0m[94m analysis[0m period[94m.[0m[94m Same[0m[94m as[0m une[94mqual[0m[94m useful[0m lives[94m as[0m out[94mlined[0m before,[94m we[0m[94m can[0m L[94mCM[0m or[94m explicit[0m period[94m as[0m analysis[94m period[0m[94m and[0m[94m assume[0m[94m that[0m alternatives can[94m be[0m[94m repeated[0m purchased. Example[94m:[0m text[94mbook[0m[94m example[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m-[0m8[94m W[0mant[94m to[0m build some[94m pip[0m[94mes[0m[94m to[0m carry some[94m d[0m[94mank[0m liquid. Expected operating[94m period[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m years[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m0 hours operation per[94m year[0m[94m.[0m Low[94mest[0m interest rate at[94m which[0m[94m the[0m[94m contract[0mor[94m is[0m willing[94m to[0m invest[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m%[0m ([94m7[0m%[94m is[0m[94m the[0m MAR[94mR[0m[94m).[0m[94m Rec[0mall[94m minimum[0m attractive rate[94m of[0m return[94m ([0mMA[94mR[0mR[94m)[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m minimum required rate[94m for[0m[94m inv[0m[94mested[0m money[94m.[0m[94m There[0m[94m are[0m four[94m pipe[0m[94m size[0m options[94m;[0m costs[94m are[0m[94m as[0m[94m follows[0m[94m:[0m[94m Pi[0m[94mpe[0m size[94m [0m2 in.[94m [0m3 in. 4[94m in[0m.[94m [0m6 in. [94mFrom[0m here[94m we[0m[94m can[0m compute[94m the[0m present[94m worth[0m cost[94m for[0m[94m each[0m[94m option[0m[94m for[0m[94m its[0m operation[94m in[0m entire[94mty[0m[94m ([0m[94m5[0m[94m years[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m
[94mThe[0m[94m cost[0m[94m for[0m any options[94m is[0m[94m given[0m[94m as[0m[94m $[0mx\[94mtimes[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m0[94m\[0m[94mtimes[0m (P[94m/[0mA[94m,[0m[94m7[0m\%, [94m5[0m[94m)+[0m[94my[0m$,[94m where[0m $[94mx[0m$[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m cost[0m per hour[94m,[0m[94m and[0m $[94my[0m$[94m is[0m[94m the[0m installation[94m cost[0m.[94m
[0m

[0m[94md[0mmap ::[94m Dec[0m[94moration[0m[94m t[0m => ([94ma[0m[94m ->[0m[94m b[0m[94m)[0m[94m ->[0m[94m t[0m[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m t[94m b[0m Source[94m #[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAny[0m[94m decor[0m[94mation[0m[94m is[0m[94m travers[0mable[94m with[0m traverse[94m =[0m traverseF[94m.[0m Just like[94m any[0m Tra[94mvers[0mable[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m fun[0m[94mctor[0m[94m,[0m so is any[94m decor[0m[94mation[0m,[94m given[0m[94m by[0m just[94m traverse[0mF[94m,[0m a[94m fun[0m[94mctor[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94md[0mget ::[94m Dec[0m[94moration[0m[94m t[0m[94m =>[0m[94m t[0m[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m[94m a[0m Source[94m #[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAny[0m[94m decor[0m[94mation[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m lens. set is[94m a[0m special[94m case[0m[94m of[0m d[94mmap[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0m<$>) :: Fun[94mctor[0m f[94m =>[0m[94m ([0m[94ma[0m[94m ->[0m[94m b[0m[94m)[0m[94m ->[0m[94m f[0m[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m[94m f[0m[94m b[0m[94m inf[0mixl 4 #[94m An[0m[94m inf[0m[94mix[0m synonym for[94m f[0mmap[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m name[0m[94m of[0m[94m this[0m operator[94m is[0m[94m an[0m allusion to[94m $.[0m[94m Note[0m[94m the[0m[94m similar[0mities between[94m their[0m[94m types[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m ($)[94m ::[0m ([94ma[0m ->[94m b[0m[94m)[0m[94m ->[0m[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m[94m b[0m[94m ([0m<[94m$[0m[94m>)[0m :: Fun[94mctor[0m[94m f[0m =>[94m ([0m[94ma[0m[94m ->[0m[94m b[0m[94m)[0m[94m ->[0m[94m f[0m a[94m ->[0m[94m f[0m[94m b[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWhere[0mas[94m $[0m[94m is[0m function application,[94m <[0m[94m$[0m>[94m is[0m[94m function[0m application lifted[94m over[0m a Fun[94mctor[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### Ex[94mamples[0m[94m
[0m
[94mExpand[0m[94m
[0m
[94mConvert[0m[94m from[0m a Maybe Int to a Maybe String[94m using[0m show:[94m
[0m
>>[94m>[0m show <$[94m>[0m Nothing Nothing[94m >>>[0m show <$> Just [94m3[0m
Just "3[94m"[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mConvert[0m[94m from[0m[94m an[0m Either Int Int to an Either[94m Int[0m String[94m using[0m[94m show[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m>>[0m[94m>[0m[94m show[0m[94m <[0m[94m$[0m[94m>[0m Left [94m1[0m[94m7[0m[94m Left[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m7[0m >>> show <[94m$[0m[94m>[0m Right[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m7[0m
Right "[94m1[0m[94m7[0m[94m"[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mDouble[94m each[0m element[94m of[0m a list[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m>>[94m>[0m (*2[94m)[0m <$> [[94m1[0m,[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m3[0m[94m][0m[94m [[0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m4,[94m6[0m[94m][0m[94m [0m[94m App[0m[94mly[0m[94m even[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m second[0m[94m element[0m[94m of[0m a pair[94m:[0m >>> even <[94m$[0m> ([94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m2[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94m2[0m,True[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
[94m($[0m[94m>)[0m :: Fun[94mctor[0m f[94m =>[0m f[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m[94m b[0m[94m ->[0m[94m f[0m b[94m inf[0m[94mix[0m for[94m force[0m can[94m be[0m derived[94m the[0m dimension[94m of[0m force[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m Notations Ask[94med[0m by[94m sw[0m[94mar[0maj[94mto[0mpper [94m3[0m[94m0[0m[94mth[0m July[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0mancy, generally[94m,[0m depends[94m on[0m[94m the[0m fluid being incompress[94mible[0m (liqu[94mid[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m force[94m of[0m buoyancy[94m is[0m[94m the[0m main[94m idea[0m[94m for[0m[94m this[0m[94m subject[0m which[94m is[0m[94m dependent[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m dens[94mities[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m fluid[0m[94m the[0m[94m object[0m[94m is[0m[94m partially[0m sub[94mmer[0m[94mged[0m[94m in[0m and[94m the[0m[94m fluid[0m[94m the[0m[94m object[0m[94m is[0m[94m pro[0mtr[94mud[0ming into[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m force[0m[94m equation[0m[94m we[0m would[94m be[0m interested[94m in[0m[94m is[0m[94m1[0m $$F[94m =[0m m[94mg[0m =[94m \[0mrho V g =[94m g[0m \rho[94m V[0m$$[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m context[0m[94m of[0m[94m disp[0m[94mlacement[0m[94m.[0m Let us say[94m we[0m[94m have[0m an[94m object[0m of volume, V[94m,[0m[94m that[0m[94m is[0m[94m "[0m[94mf[0mloating[94m"[0m[94m in[0m a[94m fluid[0m[94m with[0m[94m density[0m $$\[94mrho[0m_[94m1[0m$$ in an[94m "[0mat[94mmos[0mphere[94m"[0m[94m of[0m $$\[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m$$.[94m We[0m would[94m first[0m[94m split[0m[94m the[0m object[94m into[0m[94m two[0m[94m parts[0m with volume $$[94mV[0m[94m_[0m2[94m$$[0m representing[94m the[0m volume[94m of[0m[94m the[0m sub[94mmer[0m[94mged[0m portion[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m object[0m[94m and[0m[94m $$[0m[94mV[0m[94m_[0m[94m1[0m[94m$$[0m being[94m the[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m object[0m in[94m the[0m[94m "[0m[94mat[0m[94mmos[0m[94mphere[0m[94m."[0m[94m Then[0m from there we[94m can[0m assert the force[94m of[0m[94m bu[0m[94moy[0m[94mancy[0m[94m as[0m $$[94mF[0m_[94mb[0m[94m =[0m g[94m \[0m[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94m1[0m[94m V[0m[94m_[0m1[94m +[0m[94m g[0m[94m \[0m[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m[94m V[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m$[94m$,[0m however[94m we[0m will assume[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m "[0mat[94mmos[0m[94mphere[0m[94m"[0m[94m is[0m a gas giving us[94m the[0m[94m final[0m form for[94m the[0m[94m force[0m[94m of[0m[94m bu[0m[94moy[0m[94mancy[0m as[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$[0m[94mF[0m[94m_[0m[94mb[0m[94m =[0m[94m g[0m[94m \[0m[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m[94m V[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m This[94m is[0m[94m a[0m cartoon[94m of[0m an[94m object[0m[94m ([0ma boat[94m,[0m say[94m)[0m floating[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m fluid[0m[94m of[0m[94m density[0m $$\[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m2[94m$$[0m[94m and[0m in[94m a[0m[94m fluid[0m[94m of[0m gas of[94m density[0m $$\[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m1[94m$[0m$.[94m The[0m[94m force[0m[94m of[0m[94m bu[0m[94moy[0m[94mancy[0m would[94m be[0m[94m based[0m off[94m the[0m disp[94mla[0m[94mced[0m weights[94m of[0m each[94m fluid[0m.[94m The[0m disp[94mla[0m[94mced[0m weight idea[94m forms[0m the basis of Arch[94mim[0medes' principle[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m[94m we[0m[94m assume[0m[94m the[0m density[94m of[0m our object[94m is[0m $$\[94mrho[0m[94m_[0mo[94m$$[0m we[94m can[0m determine from[94m this[0m[94m idea[0m[94m if[0m our[94m object[0m will float[94m ($[0m$\[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m > \[94mrho[0m[94m_[0mo$$), sink ($$\[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94mo[0m > \[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m2$$),[94m or[0m[94m be[0m suspending[94m in[0m[94m the[0m liquid ($$\[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m =[94m \[0m[94mrho[0m[94m_[0m[94mo[0m$$). You can also[94m use[0m[94m these[0m ideas[94m to[0m measure[94m the[0m density[94m of[0m[94m objects[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThere[0m[94m are[0m many[94m other[0m[94m concepts[0m[94m in[0m hydrostat[94mics[0m but[94m for[0m this introduction[94m we[0m will[94m leave[0m it here and move onto hydrod[94mynam[0m[94mics[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94m1[0mTe[94mchn[0m[94mically[0m[94m we[0m[94m should[0m[94m start[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m stress tensor known[94m as[0m[94m a[0m Cauchy stress[94m tensor[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m force expressed[94m as[0m $$\[94mvec[0m[94m{[0m[94mF[0m[94m}[0m[94m =[0m -\[94mvec[0m{\nabla[94m}[0m[94m \[0mcdot[94m \[0m[94mover[0mleftrightarrow{\sigma}$$[94m ([0mthis form[94m of[0m force is[94m typically[0m used[94m in[0m simulations[94m were[0m we use
[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m addition[94m to[0m torchvision[94m,[0m packages such[94m as[0m[94m E[0mfficientNet-[94mP[0mytorch and Pretrained models for[94m P[0myt[94morch[0m[94m made[0m this task effort[94mless[0m[94m.[0m I tried[94m variants[0m[94m of[0m ResNet, ResNext[94m,[0m SE-[94mRes[0mNext[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m E[0mfficient[94mNet[0m early in[94m the[0m[94m competition[0m[94m;[0m[94m however[0m[94m,[0m[94m Matt[0m and I[94m eventually[0m focused our efforts[94m using[0m[94m E[0m[94mfficient[0m[94mNet[0m[94m-[0mb5 prior to[94m the[0m[94m team[0m[94m merge[0m[94m.[0m[94m After[0m[94mwards[0m[94m,[0m we trained models[94m using[0m[94m E[0m[94mfficient[0m[94mNet[0m[94m-[0m[94mb[0m7[94m after[0m[94m it[0m[94m was[0m made available[94m for[0m PyT[94morch[0m[94m about[0m[94m a[0m month or so into[94m the[0m[94m competition[0m[94m.[0m In[94m the[0m[94m last[0m couple[94m of[0m weeks[94m,[0m[94m both[0m Philipp[94m and[0m[94m I[0m[94m trained[0m[94m models[0m[94m using[0m[94m SE[0m[94m-[0m[94mRes[0m[94mNext[0m[94m [0m50 and SE[94m-[0m[94mRes[0m[94mNext[0m[94m [0m1[94m0[0m1[94m.[0m[94m Con[0m[94msequently[0m[94m,[0m we[94m dropped[0m SE[94m-[0m[94mRes[0m[94mNext[0m[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m Our[0m[94m solution[0m,[94m therefore[0m[94m,[0m consisted[94m of[0m predictions from both[94m E[0m[94mfficient[0m[94mNet[0m[94m-[0m[94mb[0m[94m7[0m[94m and[0m SE[94m-[0m[94mRes[0m[94mNext[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m regards[94m to[0m pretrained[94m models[0m[94m and[0m image size[94m,[0m[94m our[0m team[94m was[0m[94m unable[0m[94m to[0m[94m reach[0m[94m a[0m consensus[94m on[0m[94m image[0m[94m size[0m[94m and[0m[94m models[0m; some[94m of[0m us[94m saw[0m performance increase with larger[94m image[0m[94m size[0m while[94m others[0m[94m did[0m[94m not[0m[94m.[0m[94m After[0m[94m the[0m[94m competition[0m[94m,[0m[94m Q[0mishen[94m Ha[0m[94m explained[0m in[94m his[0m[94m solution[0m details[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m relationship[0m[94m between[0m[94m image[0m[94m size[0m[94m,[0m data[94m size[0m[94m and[0m performance[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m Pre[0mprocessing[94m
[0m
Fig[94mure[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m applying local average[94m color[0m[94m with[0m [[94mleft[0m[94m][0m[94m and[0m without[94m [[0m[94mright[0m[94m][0m[94m scaling[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m
Initial[94m pre[0m[94mprocessing[0m was motiv[94mated[0m[94m by[0m[94m a[0m[94m method[0m outlined in Ben Graham’[94ms[0m[94m [0m2[94m0[0m[94m1[0m5[94m winning[0m solution[94m.[0m[94m Local[0m average[94m color[0m[94m removal[0m[94m resulted[0m[94m in[0m[94m an[0m emboss[94ming[0m[94m that[0m can[94m be[0m seen[94m at[0m the edges[94m of[0m[94m the[0m retina[94m.[0m Graham performed[94m both[0m scaling[94m the[0m image and applying[94m a[0m[94m circle[0m[94m c[0mrop[94m to[0m[94m remove[0m[94m the[0m emb[94moss[0med edge[94m.[0m In[94m figure[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m,[0m we can[94m see[0m[94m the[0m[94m emb[0m[94moss[0m[94med[0m edge bleeding into[94m the[0m[94m ret[0m[94mina[0m on[94m a[0m[94m small[0m image where scaling[94m was[0m[94m not[0m applied[94m.[0m[94m After[0m scaling[94m,[0m however[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m emb[0m[94moss[0med[94m edge[0m[94m is[0m “control[94mled[0m[94m”.[0m Pre[94mprocessing[0m[94m code[0m used in our earlier models is[94m shown[0m[94m below[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSome[0m[94m additional[0m modifications[94m were[0m needed[94m including[0m[94m a[0m[94m negative[0m[94m space[0m c[94mrop[0m[94m that[0m[94m could[0m[94m pass[0m[94m through[0m asynchronous kernel submission[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m padding[0m to non[94m-[0msqu[94mared[0m images (figure[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m).[0m Matt’[94ms[0m[94m padding[0m modification boost[94med[0m[94m our[0m[94m public[0m L[94mB[0m score significantly[94m into[0m[94m the[0m “[94mdes[0mirable to[94m team[0m[94m merge[0m[94m early[0m” range[94m.[0m[94m Our[0m[94m final[0m solution[94m more[0m or less stuck[94m to[0m[94m this[0m pre[94mprocessing[0m[94m scheme[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m final[0m submissions[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFig[94mure[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m:[0m[94m pre[0mprocessed examples.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWin[0m[94mning[0m solutions util[94mized[0m minimal[94m pre[0m[94mprocessing[0m[94m and[0m[94m more[0m[94m work[0m[94m on[0m augmentation[94m.[0m[94m Our[0m solution[94m was[0m[94m clearly[0m[94m the[0mre welcome[94m.[0m And yes[94m,[0m your[94m formula[0m[94m looks[0m[94m correct[0m[94m.[0m –[94m [0mL[94mith[0m[94mo[0m Jan [94m2[0m2 at [94m1[0m[94m0[0m:1[94m0[0m

[0mI wnt[94m to[0m[94m do[0m sex with[94m u[0m are[94m u[0m ready​...[94m[0m[94m[0m F[94m.[0m Independent Set

[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m model[0m users[94m,[0m[94m interpret[0mability[94m is[0m[94m important[0m because chemical re[94mactions[0m[94m are[0m[94m highly[0m context[94mual[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m important[94m anth[0mropomorphic metadata that the[94m model[0m over[94mlook[0m[94ms[0m[94m.[0m For[94m example[0m[94m,[0m react[94mants[0m[94m,[0m reagents and products[94m are[0m only[94m a[0m[94m part[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m reaction[94m.[0m[94m The[0m reaction conditions[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m scale[0m[94m of[0m a[94m particular[0m[94m reaction[0m ([94me[0m[94m.[0m[94mg[0m.[94m discovery[0m[94m chem[0m[94mistry[0m[94m or[0m scale up[94m),[0m[94m and[0m[94m scientific[0m focus of[94m the[0m[94m project[0m ([94me[0m[94m.[0m[94mg[0m[94m.[0m total synthesis[94m,[0m medicinal chem[94mistry[0m[94m or[0m[94m methods[0m development[94m)[0m[94m are[0m some[94m of[0m[94m the[0m context[94m that[0m[94m a[0m sk[94milled[0m chemist[94m can[0m employ[94m to[0m interpret[94m and[0m understand[94m the[0m reaction[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFor[94m model[0m[94m developers[0m[94m,[0m[94m physical[0m organic chem[94mistry[0m[94m principles[0m explain chemical[94m react[0m[94mivity[0m[94m and[0m selectivity[94m.[0m[94m As[0m such[94m,[0m[94m prob[0ming[94m whether[0m rationales output[94mted[0m by the M[94mole[0m[94mcular[0m Transformer are con[94mgru[0m[94ment[0m with physics[94m allows[0m developers[94m to[0m[94m inter[0mrog[94mate[0m[94m whether[0m[94m the[0m[94m M[0mole[94mcular[0m[94m Trans[0mformer[94m is[0m[94m getting[0m[94m the[0m[94m correct[0m prediction[94m for[0m[94m the[0m right reasons[94m,[0m[94m and[0m design model improvements[94m based[0m[94m on[0m[94m those[0m ins[94mights[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m this paper[94m,[0m[94m we[0m develop[94m a[0m suite[94m of[0m methods[94m that[0m[94m quant[0mit[94matively[0m[94m interpre[0m[94mts[0m[94m the[0m[94m M[0m[94mole[0m[94mcular[0m[94m Trans[0mformer by[94m att[0mrib[94muting[0m predictions[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m input[0m[94m chemical[0m structure[94m and[0m[94m the[0m training[94m data[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m illustrate our two-prong approach via[94m a[0m[94m series[0m[94m of[0m[94m sent[0minel examples[94m,[0m[94m showing[0m[94m how[0m[94m we[0m un[94mcover[0m[94med[0m[94m what[0m[94m the[0m model is learning[94m,[0m what[94m it[0m finds difficult[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m explains[0m[94m its[0m[94m failure[0m modes[94m.[0m Our method disco[94mvers[0m hidden biases[94m in[0m[94m the[0m training[94m data[0m[94m that[0m hinder generalization performance and[94m mask[0m[94ms[0m[94m model[0m[94m short[0m[94mcom[0mings[94m,[0m[94m which[0m we resolved by introdu[94mcing[0m[94m a[0m[94m new[0m[94m un[0m[94mbi[0m[94mased[0m train/test split[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Results[94m
[0m
### Quant[94mitative[0m[94m interpretation[0m[94m
[0m
[94mThere[0m[94m are[0m three[94m key[0m factors[94m determ[0m[94mining[0m[94m the[0m prediction[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m machine[0m learning[94m model[0m[94m:[0m[94m the[0m architecture[94m,[0m[94m the[0m training[94m data[0m and[94m the[0m input[94m.[0m[94m Ne[0mural network[94m models[0m[94m are[0m[94m often[0m[94m considered[0m[94m as[0m black[94m-[0m[94mbox[0m[94mes[0m because of[94m the[0m complex[94m ways[0m these[94m three[0m[94m factors[0m interact to yield[94m a[0m prediction[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mTo[94m interpret[0m[94m model[0m prediction[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m first[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m define[0m[94m what[0m[94m interpret[0mability[94m means[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m suggest[0m[94m interpret[0m[94mability[0m is[94m the[0m ability[94m to[0m discover associations[94m and[0m counterfactuals[94m between[0m input[94m and[0m[94m output[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m ability[0m[94m to[0m query evidence[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m data[0m supporting[94m a[0m certain[94m outcome[0m[94m.[0m[94m Our[0m[94m approach[0m[94m follows[0m[94m the[0m[94m accepted[0m[94m scientific[0m process:[94m a[0m scientific[94m theory[0m usually ident[94mifies[0m[94m factors[0m that[94m are[0m[94m related[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m certain[94m outcome[0m[94m and[0m[94m convers[0m[94mely[0m[94m how[0m[94m the[0m[94m absence[0m[94m of[0m[94m those[0m[94m factors[0m[94m is[0m[94m related[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m absence[0m[94m of[0m[94m outcome[0m[94m.[0m Furthermore[94m,[0m[94m the[0m investigator needs[94m to[0m[94m show[0m[94m pieces[0m[94m of[0m[94m evidence[0m[94m that[0m support[94m the[0m[94m theory[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWe employ[94m integrated[0m gradients16[94m as[0m a rig[94morous[0m[94m method[0m[94m for[0m attrib[94muting[0m[94m the[0m predicted probability[94m difference[0m[94m of[0m[94m two[0m plausible country;[94m however[0m[94m,[0m according[94m to[0m Ch[94miu[0m and Sun [[94m8[0m[94m],[0m[94m the[0m[94m P[0mRC[94m will[0m[94m use[0m military[94m forces[0m if Taiwan decl[94mares[0m independence officially[94m.[0m It[94m is[0m unlikely[94m that[0m Taiwan[94m’[0m[94ms[0m economy[94m is[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m isolated [[94m4[0m[94m1[0m];[94m however[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m extent[94m of[0m Taiwan[94m’[0m[94ms[0m global political isol[94mation[0m[94m is[0m a result[94m of[0m its[94m own[0m policy[94m choices[0m[94m and[0m closure[94m towards[0m China[94m,[0m[94m not[0m[94m only[0m[94m from[0m[94m Chinese[0m[94m blocking[0m [[94m4[0m[94m1[0m[94m].[0m[94m The[0m[94m difficult[0m relationship[94m between[0m China[94m and[0m Taiwan [[94m4[0m[94m2[0m[94m][0m[94m developed[0m[94m into[0m[94m an[0m ‘[94mas[0mymmetric interdep[94mend[0mence[94m’[0m [[94m7[0m[94m].[0m[94m The[0m[94m question[0m of ‘[94mhow[0m to manage[94m the[0m[94m increasing[0m[94mly[0m[94m inter[0mtwined economic[94m relationship[0m[94m between[0m[94m China[0m[94m and[0m Taiwan[94m’[0m[94m [[0m2[94m7[0m[94m][0m[94m developed[0m[94m into[0m[94m the[0m[94m main[0m issue[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m RO[0mC politics[94m.[0m[94m Since[0m ‘[94mthe[0m[94m opening[0m up[94m of[0m[94m China[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m economy[0m to[94m market[0m forces in[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m8[0m[94m0[0m[94ms[0m [[94mand[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m9[0m[94m][0m Taiwan[94mese[0m[94m business[0m[94mes[0m have inv[94mested[0m around[94m$[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m billion[94m in[0m [Mainland[94m][0m China’ [27[94m].[0m[94m As[0m[94m in[0m[94m about[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m9[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m economic[0m[94m connections[0m[94m between[0m Taiwan[94m and[0m Main[94mland[0m[94m China[0m[94m became[0m[94m closer[0m[94m,[0m media world[94mwide[0m even referred the two[94m countries[0m[94m as[0m one ‘Chaiwan[94m’[0m[94m [[0m[94m3[0m[94m7[0m,[94m [0m[94m4[0m3[94m].[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m USA[0m[94m and[0m Japan on[94m the[0m National[94m People[0m’[94ms[0m Congress ‘[94mren[0megotiated[94m their[0m security al[94mliance[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m first[94m time[0m since[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m’ [[94m2[0m7[94m][0m[94m as[0m China[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m threat[0m to Taiwan[94m is[0m[94m a[0m threat[94m to[0m[94m their[0m[94m own[0m[94m and[0m international[94m security[0m.
[94m
[0m[94mT[0mai[94mwan[0m’[94ms[0m[94m financial[0m industry[94m is[0m growing stead[94mily[0m; even[94m though[0m[94m it[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m[94m have[0m ‘world-[94mrank[0m[94med[0m[94m national[0m champions[94m among[0m[94m its[0m [fin[94man[0mcial[94m][0m institutions[94m,[0m[94m some[0m[94m are[0m large[94m enough[0m[94m to[0m cause[94m system[0m[94matic[0m stress should they fail’ [[94m4[0m[94m4[0m]. Currently[94m,[0m Taiwan[94m still[0m[94m has[0m government-control[94mled[0m banks[94m,[0m[94m even[0m[94m though[0m[94m the[0m number[94m is[0m decl[94mining[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m country[0m[94m has[0m privatised[94m and[0m[94m int[0mends[94m to[0m continue[94m to[0m priv[94mat[0m[94mising[0m[94m its[0m banks [[94m4[0m5[94m].[0m Taiwan[94m further[0m intended[94m to[0m[94m become[0m ‘[94ma[0m regional[94m hub[0m[94m for[0m fund[94mra[0mising[94m and[0m asset[94m management[0m’[94m [[0m4[94m4[0m[94m].[0m[94m These[0m[94m intent[0m[94mions[0m[94m paid[0m[94m off[0m[94m with[0m[94m an[0m increase[94m of[0m foreign[94m stock[0m ownership[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m.[94m8[0m% in[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m1[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m2[0m.[94m9[0m[94m%[0m[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m7[94m.[0m However[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m sales[0m behaviour[94m in[0m[94m the[0m Taiwan[94mese[0m[94m bank[0ming industry[94m is[0m[94m short[0msighted[94m,[0m[94m as[0m short[94ms[0might[94med[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m one[94m that[0m caused[94m the[0m[94m US[0m[94m financial[0m[94m crisis[0m[94m.[0m Sales agents[94m paid[0m their commission[94m at[0m[94m the[0m time[94m of[0m sale[94m which[0m[94m results[0m[94m in[0m them not[94m knowing[0m[94m the[0m product and s[94melling[0m[94m in[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m ear[94mn[0m[94m the[0m commission no matter how this might affect[94m the[0m client[94m [[0m[94mBA[0m,[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m magn[0m[94mitudes[0m[94m and[0m tenors[94m of[0m[94m the[0m term deposits determined[94m by[0m[94m the[0m AOFM[94m.[0m[94m M[0matur[94mity[0m dates[94m of[0m term[94m depos[0m[94mits[0m[94m were[0m selected to most[94m efficiently[0m fin[94mance[0m net out[94mflow[0ms[94m.[0m Interest[94m rates[0m[94m for[0m term[94m depos[0m[94mits[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m RBA reflect[94m the[0m[94m rates[0m earned[94m by[0m[94m the[0m R[94mBA[0m in[94m its[0m open market operations[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mTreas[94mury[0m Notes[94m are[0m[94m issued[0m to assist[94m with[0m management[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m within[0m[94m-[0myear funding requirement[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m Treas[94mury[0m Notes[94m on[0m issue ranged[94m from[0m $[94m2[0m.[94m5[0m billion[94m to[0m[94m$[0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m [94mb[0m[94mill[0m[94mion[0m during 2[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m–1[94m9[0m.
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m size[0m and vol[94mat[0m[94mility[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m within[0m[94m-[0m[94myear[0m[94m fund[0m[94ming[0m[94m requirement[0m[94m are[0m reflected[94m in[0m changes[94m in[0m[94m the[0m short[94m-[0m[94mterm[0m[94m financial[0m asset hold[94mings[0m managed[94m by[0m[94m the[0m A[94mOF[0m[94mM[0m[94m,[0m after ded[94muct[0m[94ming[0m Treas[94mury[0m Notes on[94m issue[0m[94m.[0m Chart [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m shows[0m movement[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m fund[0m[94ming[0m[94m requirement[0m[94m over[0m[94m the[0m[94m year[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Outcomes[94m
[0m
[94mThe[0m[94m task[0m[94m of[0m meeting[94m the[0m government’[94ms[0m financial oblig[94mations[0m[94m as[0m and when they fall[94m due[0m was fully met.[94m The[0m overdraft facility[94m was[0m[94m not[0m[94m util[0mised[94m in[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m–[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mD[0muring[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m–[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m A[0m[94mOF[0m[94mM[0m[94m placed[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m9[94m0[0m term[94m depos[0m[94mits[0m with[94m the[0m R[94mBA[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m stock[0m[94m of[0m term depos[94mits[0m[94m fl[0m[94muct[0muated[94m according[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m range[94m of[0m factors influen[94mcing[0m[94m the[0m[94m A[0m[94mOF[0m[94mM[0m’[94ms[0m c[94mash[0m port[94mfolio[0m management needs[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m balance[0m[94m of[0m term[94m depos[0m[94mits[0m[94m r[0m[94manged[0m from a[94m maximum[0m[94m of[0m $46[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m billion[0m in July [94m2[0m[94m0[0m1[94m8[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m minimum[0m[94m of[0m$[94m1[0m1[94m.[0m3 [94mb[0m[94mill[0m[94mion[0m[94m in[0m[94m January[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m average[0m yield[94m obtained[0m[94m on[0m term[94m depos[0m[94mits[0m during [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m8[94m–[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m was[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m85 per[94m [0mcent, compared with [94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0mper [94mcent[0m in[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m7–[94m1[0m8[94m.[0m[94m The[0m increase[94m in[0m[94m average[0m yield reflect[94ms[0m[94m the[0m higher average level[94m of[0m short[94m-[0mdated interest[94m rates[0m[94m that[0m[94m pre[0mvailed during [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94m–[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m Market[0m eng[94magement[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Aims[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mCons[0mistent and regular market eng[94magement[0m assists[94m the[0m[94m A[0m[94mOF[0m[94mM[0m to maintain a compreh[94mensive[0m understanding[94m of[0m market related[94m issues[0m[94m including[0m[94m major[0m announ[94mc[0m[94mements[0m[94m and[0m events[94m,[0m impact[94ms[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m global[0m[94m flow[0m[94m of[0m[94m capital[0m[94m,[0m changing[94m invest[0mor[94m prefer[0m[94mences[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m performance[94m of[0m[94m banks[0m[94m that[0m[94m play[0m[94m the[0m[94m role[0m of inter[94mmedi[0m[94maries[0m[94m —[0m particularly[94m in[0m[94m the[0m AGS[94m market[0m[94m.[0m[94m While[0m[94m this[0m latter[94m aim[0m[94m can[0m in part be served[94mThe[0m contents[94m of[0m[94m the[0m .csproj[94m/.[0mvb[94mproj[0m[94m are[0m properties[94m/[0mitems[94m along[0m with[94m an[0m import[94m to[0m Microsoft[94m.[0m[94mc[0msharp.target[94ms[0m[94m ([0mMicrosoft[94m.[0mVisualBasic[94m.[0mtarget[94ms[0m for[94m .[0mvb[94mproj[0m[94m)[0m[94m which[0m[94m then[0m imports Microsoft[94m.[0mCommon[94m.[0mtarget[94ms[0m. If[94m you[0m[94m look[0m in Microsoft[94m.[0m[94mcommon[0m[94m.[0m[94mtarget[0m[94ms[0m[94m you[0m[94m will[0m[94m see[0m many[94m different[0m[94m properties[0m[94m which[0m[94m are[0m declared[94m using[0m $(Configuration). So[94m this[0m[94m means[0m[94m that[0m[94m you[0m[94m must[0m[94m treat[0m[94m the[0m Configuration property[94m with[0m care[94m and[0m[94m ab[0mide by[94m the[0m[94m rule[0m[94m that[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m out[0m[94mlined[0m[94m above[0m[94m.[0m[94m F[0mYI If[94m you[0m want[94m more[0m[94m details[0m[94m on[0m[94m this[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m explained[0m this[94m entire[0m[94m process[0m[94m in[0m[94m great[0m[94m detail[0m[94m in[0m[94m my[0m[94m book[0m Inside[94m M[0mSBuild[94m and[0m Team Build. Configuration[94m for[0m[94m web[0m publishing If[94m you[0m[94m have[0m[94m used[0m[94m the[0m[94m new[0m[94m web[0m publish experience in Visual Studio [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m ([0m[94malso[0m available for VS[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m0 from[94m the[0m[94m Azure[0m SDK[94m)[0m[94m you[0m[94m may[0m[94m have[0m noticed[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m web[0m publish profiles[94m are[0m[94m M[0m[94mSB[0m[94mu[0m[94mild[0m files[94m.[0m[94m They[0m[94m are[0m stored[94m under[0m Properties[94m\[0mPub[94mlish[0mPro[94mfiles[0m[94m ([0m[94mMy[0m Project[94m\[0mPub[94mlish[0mPro[94mfiles[0m for VB[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m have[0m extensions[94m of[0m .pubxml[94m.[0m In[94m that[0m file[94m ([0mor[94m in[0m[94m a[0m .[94mpub[0m[94mxml[0m[94m.[0muser[94m file[0m[94m associated[0m[94m with[0m[94m it[0m[94m)[0m[94m you[0m[94m will[0m[94m find[0m[94m a[0m[94m property[0m[94m defined[0m[94m as[0m the[0m value for[94m the[0m Configuration[94m drop[0m down in[94m the[0m[94m VS[0m web publish dialog[94m.[0m When[94m you[0m[94m kick[0m[94m off[0m a publish[94m in[0m[94m You[94m can[0m view video lessons[94m to[0m[94m learn[0m Lewis Dot Str[94mucture[0m[94m.[0m Each element[94m of[0m[94m the[0m comp[94mound[0m[94m is[0m[94m represented[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m Lewis[0m[94m structure[0m by[94m its[0m[94m chemical[0m symbol[94m,[0m[94m so[0m H[94m for[0m hydro[94mgen[0m[94m,[0m[94m C[0m[94m for[0m[94m carbon[0m[94m,[0m O[94m for[0m o[94mxygen[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m so[0m[94m on[0m[94m.[0m[94m Eth[0mene[94m is[0m[94m the[0m formal[94m I[0mUPAC name[94m for[0m[94m H[0m[94m2[0mC=CH[94m2[0m,[94m but[0m[94m it[0m[94m also[0m goes by a[94m common[0m[94m name[0m:[94m Eth[0mylene[94m.[0m N - [94m5[0m valence electrons[94m.[0m Still have questions[94m?[0m Password[94m must[0m contain at[94m least[0m[94m one[0m uppercase[94m letter[0m[94m,[0m[94m a[0m number and[94m a[0m special character[94m.[0m[94m A[0m comp[94mound[0m with[94m a[0m[94m mol[0mar mass[94m of[0m about[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m8[0m g[94m/[0m[94mm[0mol[94m contains[0m[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m% carbon and[94m [0m[94m1[0m4[94m.[0m3[94m%[0m hydro[94mgen[0m by mass[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m years[0m[94m ago[0m.[94m A[0m[94m comp[0m[94mound[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m[94m mol[0m[94mar[0m[94m mass[0m[94m of[0m about[94m [0m[94m2[0m8[94m g[0m[94m/[0m[94mm[0mol[94m contains[0m[94m [0m85[94m.[0m[94m7[0m[94m%[0m[94m carbon[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m4[94m.[0m[94m3[0m[94m%[0m[94m hydro[0m[94mgen[0m[94m by[0m[94m mass[0m[94m.[0m Best Answer .[94m You[0m can also practice Chem[94mistry[0m[94m -[0m OpenStax[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m5[94mth[0m Edition practice[94m problems[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m([0m[94mi[0m[94m)[0m Award[94m [[0m1[94m][0m[94m for[0m each[94m correct[0m Lewis[94m structure[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m. Write Lewis[94m structures[0m[94m that[0m obey[94m the[0m octet rule[94m for[0m each[94m of[0m[94m the[0m following.[94m /[0m[94mZ[0m)[94m t[0m N[94m S[0m[94m ([0m[94mn[0m[94m A[0m[94m "[0m[94mO[0m[94m /[0m=[94mh[0m[94mj[0m[94mL[0m[94mG[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mm[0m[94m /[0m[94mz[0m[94m [0m�[94m�[0m[94mE[0m[94mO[0m[94m Q[0m "[94m![0m~[94m [0m��[94m …[0m[94m Q[0m[94mU[0m[94mX[0m: What[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m Lewis[0m[94m structure[0m[94m for[0m methyl[94mene[0m[94mim[0mine[94m H[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m CN[94mH[0m[94m?[0m Get[94m a[0m[94m better[0m grade[94m with[0m hundreds of[94m hours[0m of expert t[94mutor[0m[94ming[0m videos[94m for[0m[94m your[0m text[94mbook[0m[94m.[0m[94m You[0m[94m know[0m[94m that[0m[94m anyone[0m[94m who[0m knows the[94m fund[0m[94mament[0mals of[94m chem[0m[94mistry[0m can[94m easily[0m predict[94m a[0m lot about[94m the[0m chemical re[94mactions[0m of[94m atoms[0m[94m or[0m[94m particles[0m[94m and[0m some[94m other[0m components just by[94m knowing[0m about[94m the[0m Lewis[94m structure[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m field measurement since[94m the[0m laser spot[94m on[0m[94m the[0m structure[94m,[0m[94m resulting[0m from[94m the[0m las[94mer[0m beam[94m,[0m can[94m stay[0m[94m at[0m[94m one[0m point[94m long[0m enough[94m to[0m acquire sufficient[94m v[0mibration data of[94m that[0m[94m point[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m move[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m next[0m one by controlling rotation angles of[94m the[0m scan mirrors[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m point[0m-by[94m-[0m[94mpoint[0m measurement method using[94m a[0m sc[94manning[0m las[94mer[0m Doppler vibrom[94meter[0m[94m system[0m usually[94m takes[0m[94m a[0m long ac[94mquisition[0m[94m time[0m in order[94m to[0m get[94m a[0m[94m full[0m[94m-[0mfield measurement[94m of[0m[94m a[0m structure, especially[94m when[0m[94m the[0m measurement[94m grid[0m[94m is[0m[94m large[0m[94m and[0m[94m dense[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m early[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m9[94m0[0m[94ms[0m[94m,[0m Sri[94mram[0m et[94m al[0m[94m.[0m [[94m1[0m2[94m,[0m1[94m3[0m[94m][0m proposed[94m a[0m[94m new[0m[94m sc[0m[94manning[0m[94m las[0m[94mer[0m[94m Do[0m[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m[94m v[0m[94mib[0m[94mrom[0m[94meter[0m measurement[94m method[0m[94m where[0m[94m the[0m las[94mer[0m spot was continu[94mously[0m swe[94mpt[0m[94m over[0m[94m a[0m surface[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m structure[0m under[94m sin[0m[94mus[0m[94moid[0m[94mal[0m exc[94mitation[0m;[94m they[0m also built[94m a[0m prototype of[94m a[0m[94m CS[0mLDV[94m system[0m[94m.[0m Since[94m the[0m[94m las[0m[94mer[0m[94m spot[0m continu[94mously[0m moves[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m CS[0m[94mLD[0m[94mV[0m velocity output[94m is[0m mod[94mulated[0m[94m by[0m[94m an[0m ODS and[94m can[0m[94m be[0m processed[94m in[0m[94m the[0m frequency[94m domain[0m[94m to[0m directly[94m obtain[0m[94m the[0m O[94mDS[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m form[94m of[0m[94m a[0m Chebyshev series[94m.[0m Later[94m,[0m Stanbridge[94m and[0m[94m E[0m[94mw[0mins[94m [[0m[94m1[0m4[94m,[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m][0m developed[94m two[0m CS[94mLD[0m[94mV[0m measurement[94m methods[0m[94m to[0m[94m obtain[0m O[94mDS[0m[94ms[0m[94m of[0m a structure under[94m sin[0m[94mus[0m[94moid[0m[94mal[0m[94m exc[0m[94mitation[0m[94m,[0m and[94m the[0m[94m methods[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m applied[0m[94m to[0m[94m different[0m[94m scan[0m patterns,[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m line[0m sc[94mans[0m[94m,[0m[94m circular[0m sc[94mans[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m area[0m[94m sc[0m[94mans[0m[94m.[0m One measurement[94m method[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m dem[0modulation method[94m,[0m[94m where[0m[94m the[0m CS[94mLD[0m[94mV[0m output[94m is[0m multip[94mlied[0m[94m by[0m[94m sin[0m[94mus[0m[94moid[0m[94mal[0m signals[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m exc[0m[94mitation[0m[94m frequency[0m and[94m a[0m low[94m-[0m[94mpass[0m filter[94m is[0m[94m applied[0m[94m to[0m[94m obtain[0m[94m an[0m[94m O[0m[94mDS[0m[94m.[0m The[94m other[0m[94m one[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m polynomial[94m method[0m[94m,[0m[94m where[0m[94m an[0m[94m O[0m[94mDS[0m[94m is[0m[94m represented[0m[94m by[0m[94m a[0m[94m polynomial[0m[94m and[0m[94m its[0m coefficients[94m are[0m obtained[94m by[0m processing[94m the[0m[94m discrete[0m[94m Fourier[0m[94m transform[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m CS[94mLD[0m[94mV[0m[94m output[0m[94m.[0m These two[94m methods[0m were also[94m applied[0m[94m to[0m[94m structures[0m[94m under[0m impact [[94m1[0m6][94m and[0m mult[94mis[0mine[94m [[0m[94m1[0m7[94m][0m excitation[94m.[0m Allen and S[94mrac[0mic [[94m1[0m8[94m][0m[94m proposed[0m[94m a[0m “[94ml[0m[94mifting[0m”[94m method[0m to treat[94m the[0m CS[94mLD[0m[94mV[0m output[94m of[0m[94m a[0m structure[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m free[0m[94m response[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m linear time[94m-[0m[94mperiod[0m[94mic[0m system and de[94mcompose[0m[94m it[0m[94m into[0m[94m a[0m[94m set[0m[94m of[0m frequency[94m response[0m functions,[94m from[0m[94m which[0m[94m mode[0m shapes[94m and[0m modal d[94mamp[0ming r[94mati[0m[94mos[0m of[94m the[0m structure can[94m be[0m[94m obtained[0m[94m using[0m conventional curve fitting[94m methods[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m method[0m was extended[94m to[0m[94m output[0m-only modal analysis[94m to[0m identify modal[94m characteristics[0m[94m of[0m a[94m structure[0m[94m under[0m unme[94mas[0murable broadband random exc[94mitation[0m [[94m1[0m9].
