addN[94mc[0mDim[94m out[0mlatdim #[94m add[0m[94mN[0mcDim[94m out[0m[94ml[0mond[94mim[0m[94m #[0m[94m add[0m[94mN[0m[94mc[0mDim[94m out[0mtim[94med[0m[94mim[0m[94m #[0m[94m add[0m[94mN[0m[94mc[0m[94mVar[0m[94m out[0mlatvar # add[94mN[0m[94mc[0m[94mVar[0m[94m out[0mlonvar[94m #[0m[94m add[0m[94mN[0m[94mc[0mVar[94m out[0mtimevar[94m #[0m[94m add[0m[94mN[0m[94mc[0mVar[94m out[0mz[94m5[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94mvar[0m[94m Although[0m[94m we[0m[94m can[0m[94m mostly[0m[94m just[0m copy[94m the[0m coordinate variable attributes[94m from[0m one[94m of[0m[94m the[0m input files[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m do[0m need[94m to[0m[94m do[0m[94m a[0m little[94m bit[0m[94m of[0m editing of[94m the[0m attributes[94m to[0m[94m remove[0m[94m some[0m things[94m that[0m[94m aren[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m appropriate[94m for[0m[94m the[0m output file[94m.[0m[94m Some[0m[94m of[0m[94m these[0m[94m things[0m[94m are[0m[94m just[0m convent[94mions[0m[94m,[0m but there[94m are[0m[94m some[0m tools[94m that[0m[94m may[0m[94m look[0m at these attributes[94m ([0m[94mactual[0m_[94mrange[0m[94m,[0m for[94m example[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m may[0m complain if[94m the[0m data[94m doesn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m match[0m the attribute[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m easier[0m just[94m to[0m remove[94m the[0m[94m suspect[0m ones here[94m.[0m[94m This[0m isn[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m pretty[0m[94m H[0maskell[94m by[0m any means,[94m and[0m[94m the[0m hnetcdf library could definitely do with[94m having[0m some higher[94m-[0mlevel capabilities[94m to[0m help[94m with[0m[94m this[0m kind[94m of[0m[94m file[0m processing[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m$[0m[94m{\[0m[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m \[0mint _{A}\[94mleft[0m|[94mf[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m)\[0m[94mright[0m[94m|\[0m[94m,[0mdx<\[94minfty[0m .[94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m ${\[94mdisplaystyle[0m a_{[94mn[0m[94m}}$[0m[94m is[0m a[94m complex[0m[94m number[0m[94m,[0m[94m this[0m theorem[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m imag[0mined[94m as[0m[94m follows[0m[94m:[0m the[94m sum[0m[94m of[0m[94m all[0m ${\[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m a[0m[94m_{[0mk[94m}}$[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m vector[94m addition[0m[94m path[0m[94m through[0m[94m the[0m[94m complex[0m[94m plane[0m[94m.[0m If[94m the[0m[94m length[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m path, that[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m sum[0m[94m of[0m[94m all[0m[94m the[0m lengths[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m parts[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mdisplaystyle[0m |[94ma[0m[94m_{[0m[94mk[0m[94m}|[0m[94m}$,[0m[94m is[0m finite[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m end[0m point has[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m finite distance[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m origin[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAb[0m[94msolute[0m convergence[94m ent[0m[94mails[0m[94m that[0m re[94marr[0m[94mang[0m[94mement[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m series[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$[0m[94m{\[0m[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m \[0m[94msum[0m _{[94mn[0m[94m=[0m[94m1[0m[94m}^{\[0m[94minfty[0m[94m }[0ma[94m_{\[0msigma ([94mn[0m[94m)[0m[94m}}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mwhere[0m [94mσ[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m permut[94mation[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m natural[94m numbers[0m[94m,[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m alter[94m the[0m sum to which[94m the[0m series[94m converges[0m[94m.[0m[94m Similar[0m results[94m apply[0m[94m to[0m integr[94mals[0m. See C[94mauch[0m[94my[0m principal value[94m and[0m[94m an[0m elegant[94m re[0m[94marr[0m[94mang[0m[94mement[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m condition[0mally[94m conver[0m[94mgent[0m[94m iter[0mated integral[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m the[0m[94m light[0m of Lebes[94mgue[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m theory of integration[94m,[0m sums[94m may[0m[94m be[0m treated[94m as[0m[94m special[0m[94m cases[0m[94m of[0m[94m integr[0m[94mals[0m[94m,[0m[94m rather[0m[94m than[0m[94m as[0m a[94m separate[0m[94m case[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mSeries or integr[94mals[0m that[94m conver[0m[94mge[0m but[94m do[0m[94m not[0m conver[94mge[0m absolutely[94m are[0m said[94m to[0m[94m conver[0m[94mge[0m condition[94mally[0m[94m.[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m ## L[94mp[0m-wavelet regression[94m with[0m correl[94mated[0m errors[94m and[0m[94m inverse[0m problems[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Raf[94mal[0m Kuł[94mik[0m[94m and[0m Marc[94m Ra[0m[94mim[0mondo[94m
[0m
#### Abstract
[94m
[0mWe investigate global performances of non[94m-[0m[94mlinear[0m wavelet[94m estimation[0m[94m in[0m regression[94m models[0m with correl[94mated[0m[94m errors[0m[94m.[0m[94m Con[0m[94mver[0m[94mgence[0m properties[94m are[0m studied[94m over[0m[94m a[0m[94m wide[0m[94m range[0m[94m of[0m Besov classes $$\mathcal[94m{[0m[94mB[0m}^s[94m_{\[0m[94mpi[0m,[94mr[0m[94m}$$[0m[94m and[0m for[94m a[0m variety[94m of[0m $$[94mL[0m^[94mp[0m$$ error[94m measures[0m[94m.[0m We consider[94m error[0m[94m distributions[0m with[94m Long[0m-Range-Dependence parameter $$\[94malpha[0m[94m$[0m$,[94m $$[0m0 <[94m \[0m[94malpha[0m[94m \[0m[94mle[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m$[94m$.[0m In[94m this[0m setting[94m we[0m present[94m a[0m[94m single[0m adapt[94mive[0m wavelet thresholding estim[94mator[0m which ach[94mieves[0m near[94m-[0mopt[94mimal[0m properties simultaneously over[94m a[0m class[94m of[0m spaces[94m and[0m[94m error[0m measures[94m.[0m Our method[94m reve[0m[94mals[0m an el[94mbow[0m feature in[94m the[0m rate[94m of[0m convergence[94m at[0m $$s=[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94malpha[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m}(\[94mfrac[0m{[94mp[0m[94m}{\[0mpi}-[94m1[0m[94m)$$[0m when $$[94mp[0m <[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m2}{\[94malpha[0m[94m}+\[0m[94mpi[0m$[94m$.[0m[94m Using[0m[94m a[0m vague[94mlette[0m decomposition[94m of[0m[94m fraction[0mal[94m Gaussian[0m noise we[94m draw[0m[94m a[0m parallel with[94m certain[0m inverse problems where similar rate results[94m occur[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mKeywords[94m:[0m Adapt[94mation[0m,[94m correl[0m[94mated[0m data[94m,[0m deconvolution[94m,[0m[94m degree[0m[94m of[0m[94m ill[0m posedness[94m,[0m fraction[94mal[0m Brown[94mian[0m Mot[94mion[0m[94m,[0m fraction[94mal[0m[94mFor[0m some modes[94m of[0m operation[94m you[0m[94m can[0m[94m easily[0m[94m show[0m[94m that[0m[94m an[0m in[94mvolution[0m[94m would[0m[94m be[0m[94m in[0msecure[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m OF[0mB[94m would[0m[94m be[0m most clearly insecure[94m,[0m since[94m the[0m keystream[94m just[0m repe[94mats[0m[94m the[0m nonce[94m/[0mIV and[94m its[0m corresponding encrypted block.
[94m•[0m CFB[94m would[0m[94m like[0mwise[94m be[0m[94m in[0msecure[94m,[0m[94m since[0m zero blocks encrypt[94m just[0m like[94m with[0m OF[94mB[0m[94m.[0m This[94m is[0m of[94m more[0m limited[94m advantage[0m[94m to[0m an attack[94mer[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m far from[94m secure[0m.[94m
[0m• CBC mode[94m again[0m[94m has[0m problems[94m with[0m zero[94m blocks[0m[94m,[0m since[94m the[0m[94m following[0m[94m block[0m'[94ms[0m[94m ci[0m[94mpher[0mtext[94m can[0m[94m be[0m dec[94mrypted[0m simply by[94m X[0m[94mOR[0m[94ming[0m[94m it[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m ci[94mpher[0m[94mtext[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m block[94m two[0m[94m back[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSim[0m[94milar[0m[94mly[0m[94m,[0m CBC-MAC[94m,[0m including[94m some[0m[94m of[0m its variants[94m,[0m[94m would[0m[94m be[0m broken[94m,[0m because[94m adding[0m[94m two[0m[94m blocks[0m[94m of[0m zeros[94m anywhere[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m message[94m would[0m[94m not[0m alter[94m its[0m authentication tag[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mNow[0m for the handwavy part.
[94m
[0m[94mWith[0m[94m C[0mTR mode you[94m are[0m[94m going[0m[94m to[0m[94m have[0m worse[94m bounds[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m amount[94m of[0m ci[94mpher[0m[94mtext[0m[94m you[0m can encrypt[94m.[0m[94m Norm[0m[94mally[0m[94m C[0m[94mTR[0m[94m mode[0m[94m is[0m[94m secure[0m up[94m to[0m[94m roughly[0m $[94m2[0m^{b[94m/[0m[94m2[0m[94m}$[0m blocks[94m,[0m because at that[94m point[0m[94m you[0m[94m would[0m expect outputs to col[94mlide[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m PRF[94m but[0m not[94m with[0m[94m a[0m[94m PR[0mP[94m.[0m Equ[94mival[0m[94mently[0m[94m,[0m at that[94m point[0m[94m you[0m expect ci[94mpher[0m[94mtext[0m[94m blocks[0m[94m to[0m col[94mlide[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m tells[0m[94m you[0m[94m that[0m the message blocks[94m differ[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWith an[94m in[0m[94mvolution[0m you[94m have[0m[94m the[0m additional case[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m output[0m[94m may[0m[94m col[0m[94mlide[0m with[94m another[0m[94m input[0m[94m block[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m tells[94m you[0m[94m the[0m corresponding output[94m.[0m[94m That[0m[94m has[0m[94m an[0m[94m equal[0m chance[94m of[0m happening[94m,[0m dou[94mbling[0m[94m the[0m chance that[94m one[0m[94m of[0m[94m these[0m[94m cases[0m[94m happens[0m[94m and[0m[94m thus[0m[94m about[0m hal[94mving[0m[94m the[0m amount[94m of[0m[94m data[0m you[94m can[0m encrypt[94m.[0m[94m ([0mOr reducing it by a factor[94m of[0m[94m $\[0m[94msqrt[0m[94m{[0m[94m2[0m}$,[94m but[0m[94m close[0m[94m enough[0m.)[94m
[0m[94m
[0mHowever[94m,[0m[94m beyond[0m[94m that[0m I[94m think[0m[94m C[0mTR[94m mode[0m[94m would[0m remain[94m secure[0m[94m,[0m[94m as[0m long[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m attack[0m[94mer[0m cannot control[94m the[0m nonce.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAE[0mAD modes[94m are[0m[94m more[0m complicated[94m to[0m[94m analyze[0m[94m,[0m[94m especially[0m when[94m they[0m use[94m the[0m[94m same[0m key for[94m encryption[0m and authentication[94m.[0m GC[94mM[0m[94m is[0m probably secure[94m,[0m[94m since[0m[94m its[0m[94m security[0m comes down[94m to[0m[94m that[0m of CTR[94m both[0m for encryption[94m and[0m authentication[94m.[0m[94m O[0mthers[94m like[0m CCM[94m might[0m not[94m be[0m,[94m due[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m use[94m of[0m[94m C[0mBC[94m-[0m[94mMA[0m[94mC[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m GC[0m[94mM[0m[94m is[0m[94m roughly[0m[94m C[0m[94mTR[0m[94m mode[0m integrated[94m with[0m a[94m reason[0m[94mably[0m[94m independent[0m MAC[94m,[0m[94m so[0m it may[94m very[0m[94m well[0m[94m be[0m[94m secure[0m[94m.[0m[94m –[0m K[94m.[0mG. Jul [94m2[0m3 '[94m1[0m[94m6[0m at[94m [0m[94m9[0m:[94m0[0m[94m2[0m
[94m•[0m[94m @[0mK.G. true,[94m it[0m[94m seems[0m[94m likely[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m secure[0m[94m.[0m[94m –[0m otus Jul[94m [0m2[94m8[0m[94m '[0m[94m1[0m6[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m given[94m by[0m[94m scalar[0m[94m
[0m[94m*[0m Math[94m.[0mcos[94m([0mazimut[94m -[0m bottomAz[94mim[0m[94mut[0m_rad);[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mif[0m ([94mscal[0m[94mar[0m[94m >[0m Math[94m.[0m[94msin[0m[94m([0mangleMin_[94mrad[0m[94m))[0m //...[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m####[0m Direct ray[94ms[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m computation process diff[94mers[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m format[0m[94m use[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m settings[94m to[0m define[94m the[0m[94m radi[0m[94mations[0m[94m ([0mhour[94mly[0m[94m or[0m[94m month[0m[94mly[0m format, see[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m setting[0m[94m section[0m[94m).[0m Next[94m,[0m[94m similarly[0m to diffuse radiation[94m,[0m only direct[94m be[0m[94mams[0m with height angle greater[94m than[0m[94m the[0m minimum height angle (height[94m_[0m[94mangle[0m[94m_[0m[94mmin[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m that[0m do[94m not[0m[94m intercept[0m[94m the[0m ground[94m ([0mwith[94m s[0mloping[94m plot[0m) are[94m trac[0m[94med[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m hour[94mly[0m[94m radiation[0m procedure[94m has[0m[94m the[0m advantage to[94m avoid[0m calculating[94m how[0m direct[94m energy[0m[94m is[0m[94m shared[0m[94m between[0m[94m ray[0m[94ms[0m[94m.[0m Nevertheless[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m procedure[0m to compute[94m the[0m sun[94m'[0m[94ms[0m position[94m is[0m[94m l[0mitle[94m more[0m[94m complicated[0m[94m and[0m[94m less[0m precise[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m each month[94m with[0m[94m direct[0m energy above[94m [0m0 MJ[94m/[0mm2[94m,[0m be[94mams[0m[94m are[0m[94m created[0m[94m at[0m[94m regular[0m[94m intervals[0m[94m of[0m[94m hour[0m[94m angle[0m[94m according[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m direct[0m_[94mangle[0m[94m_[0mstep[94m ([0m[94msay[0m[94m B[0mAS,[94m Be[0mam angle step[94m).[0m[94m Their[0m hour angle vary[94m from[0m[94m B[0m[94mAS[0m/[94m2[0m[94m to[0m[94m P[0mI[94m/[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m each[0m[94m month[0m[94m,[0m simulation[94m is[0m therefore[94m perf[0momed only[94m for[0m[94m one[0m day[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m total[0m direct[94m energy[0m[94m is[0m[94m shared[0m[94m between[0m[94m direct[0m[94m ray[0m[94ms[0m according[94m to[0m[94m the[0m sin[94mus[0m of[94m their[0m hour[94m height[0m angle[94m and[0m day[94m height[0m[94m angle[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mheight[0mAngle[94m_[0mrad = Math[94m.[0m[94mas[0m[94min[0m[94m([0mMath[94m.[0m[94msin[0m[94m([0mlatitude[94m_[0m[94mrad[0m) * Math[94m.[0m[94msin[0m[94m([0mdeclination[94m_[0mrad[94m[[0mi[94m])[0m[94m
[0m- Math[94m.[0m[94msin[0m[94m([0m[94mhour[0mAngle[94m -[0m[94m angle[0mStep_[94mrad[0m /[94m [0m[94m2[0m));[94m
[0m// in[94m M[0m[94mJ[0m[94m/[0m[94mm[0m2 on a horizontal plane[94m
[0menergy[94m =[0m directE[94mner[0mgy[i[94m][0m[94m *[0m[94m hour[0mS[94min[0m[94mHeight[0m[94mAng[0m[94m/[0m dayS[94min[0mHeightAng; 
[94m
[0mDirect ray[94ms[0m are[94m created[0m[94m at[0m[94m regular[0m[94m intervals[0m[94m of[0m[94m one[0m[94m hour[0m angle[94m from[0m [94m0[0m0:[94m3[0m[94m0[0m to[94m [0m23:3[94m0[0m.[94m It[0m corresponds[94m to[0m hour[94mly[0m meteorological records[94m.[0m For[94m each[0m[94m month[0m[94m,[0m[94m only[0m[94m one[0m[94m representative[0m day is[94m sim[0m[94mulated[0m[94m ([0msee SL[94mBe[0m[94mam[0mFactory[94m.[0mmeanDoyPerMonth()).[94m And[0m hour[94mly[0m[94m energy[0m[94m are[0m computed[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m sum[0m per[94m hour[0m[94m of[0m[94m every[0m[94m month[0m[94m record[0m[94m ([0m[94mE[0m[94m_[0m[94mh[0m[94m_[0m[94mm[0m[94m =[0m sum_d[94m E[0m[94m_[0md[94m_[0m[94mh[0m[94m_[0m[94mm[0m[94m,[0m with[94m d[0m[94m,[0m h and m the[94m indices[0m[94m of[0m hour, day[94m and[0m[94m month[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTo[0m[94m direct[0m beam,[94m the[0m[94m sun[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m position[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m computed.[94m It[0m[94m depends[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m plot[94m location[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m local hour[94m system[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m take into[94m account[0m[94m the[0m difference[94m between[0m[94m the[0m mean solar time[94m and[0m[94m the[0m apparent solar time[94m,[0m[94m a[0m correction[94m is[0m implemented[94m using[0m diagnosis[94m.[0m Journal of[94m He[0m[94mpat[0mology[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m8[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m: [94m8[0m[94m2[0m1[94m–[0m[94m8[0m[94m2[0m8[94m,[0m[94m May[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m PMID[94m:[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m83[94m2[0m[94m9[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m[94m.[0m[94m [[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m] L[94mack[0mner[94m,[0m[94m A[0m[94m.[0m[94m Lex[0m[94m,[0m[94m M[0m[94m.[0m Stre[94mit[0m[94m,[0m[94m E[0m[94m.[0m Kruijff[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m D[0m[94m.[0m[94m in[0m[94m its[0m[94m bi[0m[94mological[0m[94m context[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m IEEE Pacific Visualization Sym[94mpos[0m[94mium[0m ([94mPa[0m[94mci[0m[94m-[0mficVis[94m)),[0m pages [94m5[0m[94m7[0m–[94m6[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m Taipei, Taiwan[94m,[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m [[0m2[94m0[0m[94m][0m T.[94m V[0m[94m Long[0m[94m and[0m[94m L[0m[94m.[0m Linsen[94m,[0m Multi[94mCl[0m[94muster[0mTree: interactive visual expl[94moration[0m[94m of[0m Munzner[94m,[0m and[94m H[0m[94m.[0m Pf[94mister[0m[94m,[0m[94m M[0m[94miz[0mBe[94me[0m: a[94m mult[0miscale[94m s[0mynteny browser[94m.[0m IE[94mEE[0m Trans[94mactions[0m on [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m9[94m.[0m[94m [[0m[94m2[0m[94m2[0m[94m][0m[94m T[0m[94m.[0m Mun[94mz[0mner[94m,[0m[94m F[0m[94m.[0m[94m [[94m2[0m3[94m][0m[94m J[0m[94m.[0m[94m C[0m[94m.[0m Roberts[94m,[0m[94m State[0m[94m of[0m the art[94m:[0m[94m Co[0mordin[94mated[0m[94m &[0m multiple views in expl[94mor[0matory visual[94mization[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m International Conference[94m on[0m[94m Co[0mordin[94mated[0m[94m and[0m[94m Multiple[0m Views in[94m Ex[0m[94mpl[0moratory[94m Visual[0m[94mization[0m[94m,[0m volume[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m pages[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m1[0m–[94m7[0m[94m1[0m, Los Alamitos[94m,[0m CA[94m,[0m USA[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m.[0m IE[94mEE[0m Computer Society.[94m [[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m][0m[94m M[0m[94m.[0m[94m S[0markar[94m,[0m[94m S[0m[94m.[0m[94m S[0m.[94m Sn[0m[94mib[0mbe[94m,[0m[94m O[0m[94m.[0m[94m J[0m[94m.[0m[94m T[0mversky[94m,[0m and[94m S[0m[94m.[0m[94m P[0m[94m.[0m[94m Re[0miss[94m,[0m[94m St[0mretching[94m the[0m rubber sheet:[94m a[0m metap[94mhor[0m for view[94ming[0m large layout[94ms[0m[94m on[0m small[94m screens[0m[94m.[0m In Pro[94mc[0m. of[94m the[0m [94m6[0mth[94m annual[0m AC[94mM[0m sym[94mpos[0m, mon[94mop[0molar[94m,[0m biphasic pulse [94m2[0m00 μs[94m/[0mphase, [94m1[0m[94m0[0m dB over threshold current[94m,[0m repet[94mition[0m rate [94m2[0m Hz). Investigated cortical region[94m is[0m shown[94m in[0m[94m the[0m bottom[94m right[0m inset.[94m P[0mES, posterior ectosylvian sulcus; A[94mES[0m, anterior[94m e[0m[94mct[0m[94mos[0myl[94mv[0m[94mian[0m sulcus[94m;[0m[94m S[0mSS[94m,[0m superior[94m e[0m[94mct[0m[94mos[0m[94myl[0m[94mv[0m[94mian[0m[94m sul[0mcus[94m.[0m Dorsal[94m end[0m of[94m the[0m[94m P[0mES[94m is[0m marked by[94m an[0m asterisk. ([94ma[0m–[94mc[0m) Naive CD[94mC[0ms show reproducible activ[94mated[0m areas[94m.[0m Two sp[94mots[0m[94m of[0m higher[94m activity[0m with a[94m less[0m active[94m region[0m in between. (d[94m)[0m[94m cs[0mCDC[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m ([94me[0m[94m)[0m csCD[94mC[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m ([0m[94mf[0m[94m)[0m cs[94mCD[0m[94mC[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m The chron[94mically[0m stim[94mulated[0m CD[94mC[0m[94ms[0m show larger[94m amplitude[0m responses and larger activ[94mated[0m[94m regions[0m[94m.[0m[94m ([0m[94mg[0m[94m)[0m cs[94mCD[0m[94mC[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m (late-implanted[94m animal[0m[94m)[0m shows no[94m expansion[0m of[94m the[0m activ[94mated[0m area[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFig[94mure[0m[94m [0m5.[94m
[0m
Color-coded middle-latency[94m amplit[0m[94mudes[0m at[94m the[0m auditory cortex of[94m the[0m na[94mive[0m[94m CD[0m[94mC[0m[94ms[0m and chron[94mically[0m[94m stim[0m[94mulated[0m[94m CD[0m[94mC[0m[94ms[0m (st[94mim[0mulation: ipsilater[94mal[0m ear, mon[94mop[0molar[94m,[0m[94m bi[0m[94mphas[0m[94mic[0m pul[94mse[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m [94mμ[0m[94ms[0m/phase[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m d[0m[94mB[0m[94m over[0m[94m threshold[0m[94m current[0m,[94m repet[0m[94mition[0m[94m rate[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m H[0m[94mz[0m). [0mAbstract

This paper[94m is[0m[94m the[0m fifth part[94m of[0m[94m the[0m publication Selected chap[94mters[0m[94m from[0m[94m algebra[0m'', the[94m first[0m[94m four[0m[94m having[0m[94m been[0m[94m published[0m[94m in[0m[94m previous[0m[94m issues[0m of[94m the[0m Teaching[94m of[0m Mathemat[94mics[0m[94m,[0m Vol\.[94m I[0m (19[94m9[0m[94m8[0m), [94m1[0m[94m--[0m[94m2[0m2, Vol\.[94m II[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m ([94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m),[0m [94m1[0m--[94m3[0m0[94m,[0m Vol\. [94m
[0mAbstract

The imp[94mlication[0m fragment[94m of[0m Heyting'[94ms[0m logic[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m minimal[0m[94m logical[0m system for which[94m dedu[0m[94mction[0m theorem[94m holds[0m[94m.[0m This[94m is[0m[94m known[0m, but not emphas[94mized[0m enough[94m.[0m[94m In[0m this note we present[94m an[0m elementary proof[94m of[0m this fact[94m and[0m propose how to[94m use[0m[94m it[0m[94m in[0m order[94m to[0m promote[94m the[0m[94m concept[0m[94m of[0m many-valued[94m log[0m[94mics[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m natural way,[94m by[0m[94m giving[0m[94m a[0m concept[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m lecture on this[94m subject[0m[94m.[0m[94m

[0m##[94m#[0m Example Question[94m #[0m[94m2[0m2 :[94m Ex[0m[94mpon[0m[94mential[0m[94m Function[0m[94ms[0m[94m

[0m##[94m#[0m Example Question #[94m2[0m[94m1[0m[94m :[0m[94m Ex[0m[94mpon[0m[94mential[0m[94m Function[0m[94ms[0m[94m

[0mFind[94m one[0m possible[94m value[0m of , given[94m the[0m following equation:[94m
[0m[94m
[0mCannot[94m be[0m[94m determined[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m information[94m given[0m.[94m

[0m[94m
[0mWe begin[94m with[0m[94m the[0m following[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis can[94m be[0m re[94mwritten[0m[94m as[0m

Rec[94mall[0m that if[94m you[0m have two ex[94mponents[0m with equal bases, you[94m can[0m simply[94m set[0m[94m the[0m[94m ex[0m[94mponents[0m[94m equal[0m[94m to[0m[94m each[0mother. Do so to get[94m the[0m following[94m:[0m

Sol[94m follows[0m[94m that[0m [94m1[0m[94m1[0m,[94m [0m7[94m,[0m[94m [0m3[94m,[0m -[94m1[0m[94m are[0m four arithmetic means between[94m [0m[94m1[0m5[94m and[0m -5[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mInsertion[94m of[0m[94m n[0m Ar[94mithmetic[0m Me[94mans[0m[94m between[0m a[94m and[0m[94m b[0m[94m:[0m Let[94m A[0m[94m₁[0m[94m,[0m[94m A[0m[94m₂[0m … An be[94m n[0m arithmetic means between[94m a[0m[94m and[0m[94m b[0m[94m.[0m Then[94m a[0m[94m,[0m A₁[94m,[0m[94m A[0m[94m₂[0m …[94m An[0m[94m,[0m[94m b[0m is[94m an[0m[94m A[0m[94m.[0m[94mP[0m[94m.[0m[94m Let[0m[94m d[0m[94m be[0m[94m the[0m[94m common[0m[94m difference[0m[94m of[0m[94m this[0m[94m A[0m[94m.[0m[94mP[0m[94m.[0m[94m Clear[0m[94mly[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m contains[0m ([94mn[0m[94m+[0m[94m2[0m[94m)[0m[94m terms[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m�[0m[94m�[0m[94m�[0m[94m b[0m[94m =[0m[94m ([0mn +[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m)[0m[94mth[0m[94m term[0m[94m

[0m[94mEs[0m[94m s[0mencillo[94m cre[0mar[94m h[0moj[94mas[0m[94m gu[0mía[94m de[0m[94m ac[0m[94mord[0m[94mes[0m[94m ([0m[94mle[0m[94mads[0m[94mhe[0m[94mets[0m[94m)[0m[94m en[0m[94m c[0m[94mif[0mrado[94m amer[0micano para[94m música[0m[94m pop[0m[94m con[0m[94m mel[0m[94mod[0mía[94m,[0m[94m let[0mra[94m,[0m[94m nom[0mbres[94m de[0m[94m ac[0m[94mord[0m[94mes[0m[94m y[0m[94m diagram[0m[94mas[0m[94m de[0m[94m pos[0miciones[94m de[0m[94m ac[0morde.[94m En[0m este ejemplo vemos algunos[94m de[0m los diagram[94mas[0m[94m de[0m[94m pos[0miciones[94m pre[0mdefinidas[94m,[0m pero[94m se[0m pueden[94m personal[0mizar[94m prof[0m[94mund[0mamente[94m para[0m[94m cum[0mplir[94m con[0m casi cualquier[94m situ[0mación[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m([94mp[0m[94mulse[0m[94m para[0m[94m ver[0m una[94m im[0m[94magen[0m más grande[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m Ap[0m[94mlic[0maciones para[94m la[0m[94m ed[0m[94muca[0mción[94m
[0m[94m
[0mL[94mily[0m[94mP[0m[94mond[0m está muy[94m indic[0m[94mado[0m también para aplicaciones educativas[94m.[0m[94m He[0m aquí un ejemplo[94m de[0m un[94m s[0m[94menc[0millo ej[94merc[0micio[94m de[0m contrapunto[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94mp[0m[94mulse[0m[94m para[0m[94m ver[0m[94m una[0m[94m im[0m[94magen[0m más grande[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m Pro[0myect[94mos[0m grandes[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mL[0m[94mily[0m[94mP[0m[94mond[0m es excel[94mente[0m[94m para[0m proyect[94mos[0m grandes como ó[94mper[0m[94mas[0m[94m u[0m obras[94m para[0m orquesta[94m sin[0m[94mf[0mónica[94m,[0m también[94m.[0m Además[94m,[0m la[94m entr[0m[94mada[0m[94m bas[0m[94mada[0m en text[94mo[0m proporcion[94ma[0m una[94m mayor[0m[94m acc[0mesibilidad[94m ([0m[94meste[0m ejemplo[94m ha[0m sido[94m a[0m[94mport[0mado por[94m Hu[0m[94m Ha[0m[94mip[0meng[94m,[0m[94m un[0m[94m compos[0m[94mitor[0m[94m c[0m[94miego[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94mp[0m[94mulse[0m[94m para[0m[94m ver[0m[94m una[0m imagen más grande[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mUn[0m pequeño fragment[94mo[0m[94m de[0m[94m la[0m[94m K[0m[94mlav[0mierstück II de[94m Stock[0mhausen[94m,[0m[94m para[0m[94m dem[0mostrar[94m la[0m[94m capac[0midad[94m de[0m[94m L[0m[94mily[0m[94mP[0m[94mond[0m de[94m of[0mrecer una[94m sal[0mida[94m personal[0mizada[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94mp[0m[94mulse[0m[94m para[0m[94m ver[0m[94m una[0m[94m im[0m[94magen[0m más grande[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m Gr[0máficos[94m de[0m[94m Sch[0menker0:[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m0:4[94m5[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m AS[94mK[0m/[94mPS[0m[94mK[0m-[94mcor[0m[94mrespond[0m[94mence[0m and[94m the[0m[94m r[0m[94m-[0m[94mmap[0m [94m3[0m0m[94m
[0m[94mWe[0m[94m form[0m[94mulate[0m a[94m correspond[0m[94mence[0m between[94m aff[0m[94mine[0m[94m and[0m project[94mive[0m special Käh[94mler[0m manif[94molds[0m of[94m the[0m[94m same[0m dimension[94m.[0m As[94m an[0m application,[94m we[0m show[94m that[0m,[94m under[0m[94m this[0m[94m correspond[0m[94mence[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m aff[94mine[0m[94m special[0m[94m K[0m[94mäh[0m[94mler[0m[94m manif[0m[94molds[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m image[94m of[0m[94m the[0m rig[94mid[0m[94m r[0m[94m-[0m[94mmap[0m[94m are[0m[94m mapped[0m[94m to[0m[94m one[0m[94m-[0mparameter de[94mform[0m[94mations[0m[94m of[0m project[94mive[0m[94m special[0m[94m K[0m[94mäh[0m[94mler[0m[94m manif[0m[94molds[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m image[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m super[94mgravity[0m[94m r[0m[94m-[0m[94mmap[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m above one[94m-[0m[94mparameter[0m[94m de[0m[94mform[0m[94mations[0m are[94m interpreted[0m[94m as[0m perturbative[94m $\[0malpha'$-corre[94mctions[0m[94m in[0m heterotic and type[94m-[0mII[94m string[0m compactifications with $N[94m=[0m[94m2[0m[94m$[0m supersym[94mmet[0mry[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m show[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m comple[0m[94mten[0m[94mess[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m deformed super[94mgravity[0m[94m r[0m[94m-[0m[94mmap[0m metric depends[94m sole[0m[94mly[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m (well[94m-[0munderstood[94m)[0m comple[94mten[0m[94mess[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m unde[94mformed[0m[94m metric[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m sign[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m de[94mformation[0m parameter[94m.[0m[94m
[0mSpeaker[94m:[0m Mr Peter[94m-[0mSim[94mon[0m Dieterich (Universität Hamburg[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m:[0m[94m4[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m1[94m:[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m
[0mBre[94mak[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m[94mR[0m[94mig[0m[94mid[0mity of[94m [0m[94m2[0m-[94mstep[0m Carnot[94m al[0mgebras [94m4[0m[94m5[0mm[94m
[0mWe study[94m the[0m[94m rig[0m[94mid[0mity[94m of[0m [94m2[0m[94m-[0m[94mstep[0m[94m Car[0mnot groups[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m equival[0m[94mently[0m[94m,[0m of grad[94med[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m-step nil[94mpot[0m[94ment[0m Lie algebras[94m.[0m[94m We[0m prove[94m the[0m[94m alternative[0m[94m that[0m[94m depending[0m[94m on[0m[94m bi[0m[94m-[0m[94mdim[0m[94mensions[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m algebra[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m Lie[0m[94m algebra[0m[94m structure[0m[94m makes[0m[94m it[0m either[94m always[0m[94m of[0m[94m infinite[0m type[94m or[0m gener[94mically[0m rig[94mid[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m we[0m[94m specify[0m[94m the[0m bi[94m-[0m[94mdim[0mensions[94m for[0m[94m each[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m choices[0m[94m.[0m[94m Exp[0mlicit criteria[94m for[0m rig[94mid[0mity[94m of[0m[94m pseudo[0m $[94mH[0m[94m$-[0m and[94m $[0m[94mJ[0m[94m$-[0mtype algebras are[94m given[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m particular[94m,[0m[94m we[0m establish[94m the[0m[94m relation[0m of[94m the[0m so[94m-[0mcalled[94m $[0mJ[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$-[0mcondition to rig[94mid[0mity[94m,[0m and[94m we[0m[94m explore[0m[94m these[0m[94m conditions[0m[94m in[0m relation[94m to[0m[94m pseudo[0m $[94mH[0m$-type[94m al[0m[94mgebras[0m[94m.[0m[94m Based[0m[94m on[0m work[94m [([0marXiv:160[94m3[0m.0[94m0[0m[94m3[0m[94m7[0m[94m3[0m [math[94m.[0mRT])[94m][[0m[94m1[0m[94m][0m[94m with[0m Mauricio God[94moy[0m[94m-[0m[94mM[0molina[94m,[0m[94m Ir[0mina Markina and[94m Alexander[0m Vasil'ev. [1]: https[94m://[0marxiv[94m.[0m[94morg[0m[94m/[0mabs[94m/[0m1603.00373
Spe[94maker[0m[94m:[0m Prof. Boris Kruglikov (Univers[94mity[0m[94m of[0m[94m T[0mromsø)[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m:[94m5[0m0 but it shouldn't be difficult to do it[94m.[0m

[0m[94mif[0m __name[94m__[0m ==[94m "[0m[94m__[0mmain[94m__[0m":[94m

[0m[94mproj[0m[94m =[0m[94m pro[0m[94mj[0m[94m.[0m[94mreplace[0m('"','')[94m
[0mi[94m =[0m[94m i[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m
[0melif[94m arg[0m[94m ==[0m '-[94mout[0m[94msize[0m[94m':[0m[94m

[0m[94my[0mSize[94m =[0m int[94m([0m[94my[0m[94mSize[0m.[94mreplace[0m[94m('[0m"','[94m'))[0m[94m
[0mi[94m =[0m[94m i[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m2[94m
[0melif[94m arg[0m[94m ==[0m[94m '-[0m[94mtx[0m[94me[0m':[94m

[0m[94m
[0m[94mNext[0m[94m are[0m[94m some[0m styles for[94m the[0m[94m basic[0m settings when[94m the[0m menu[94m items[0m[94m are[0m[94m displayed[0m[94m,[0m[94m rot[0mating[94m them[0m[94m into[0m[94m their[0m correct[94m orientation[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m```[94m input[0m[94m:[0mchecked ~ .menu[94m-[0mitem[94m:[0mnot(.menu[94m-[0mlabel[94m)[0m { -webkit[94m-[0mtransform[94m:[0m rotateZ([94m3[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0mdeg);[94m -[0mms[94m-[0m[94mtransform[0m[94m:[0m rotate[94mZ[0m[94m([0m[94m3[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94mdeg[0m[94m);[0m[94m -[0mo[94m-[0mtransform[94m:[0m[94m rotate[0m[94mZ[0m[94m([0m[94m3[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94mdeg[0m[94m);[0m[94m -[0mmoz[94m-[0mtransform[94m:[0m[94m rotate[0m[94mZ[0m[94m([0m[94m3[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94mdeg[0m[94m);[0m transform[94m:[0m rotate[94mZ[0m[94m([0m[94m3[0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94mdeg[0m[94m);[0m[94m }[0m input[94m:[0m[94mchecked[0m[94m ~[0m[94m .[0mmenu[94m-[0mlabel.menu[94m-[0m[94mitem[0m { border[94m:[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0mpx solid #[94mccc[0m[94m;[0m color[94m:[0m[94m #[0m[94m0[0m00[94m;[0m[94m }[0m ```[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThat[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m all[0m[94m the[0m[94m basic[0m[94m stuff[0m done[94m,[0m[94m now[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m mix[0m[94min[0m that[94m does[0m[94m the[0m[94m hard[0m[94m work[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m accepts[0m[94m a[0m[94m single[0m argument[94m,[0m[94m the[0m number[94m of[0m items[94m that[0m[94m you[0m[94m have[0m[94m in[0m[94m your[0m menu[94m.[0m[94m At[0m[94m the[0m[94m top[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m mix[0m[94min[0m[94m are[0m some basic[94m settings[0m[94m that[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m changed[0m[94m,[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m initial[0m colours[94m to[0m[94m use[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m initial[0m offset[94m base[0m[94m ([0m[94mso[0m[94m they[0m[94m'[0m[94mre[0m[94m not[0m[94m always[0m perfectly[94m stack[0m[94med[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m start[0m[94m),[0m[94m the[0m[94m distance[0m[94m each[0m item[94m moves[0m[94m when[0m[94m the[0m menu exp[94mands[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m angle[0m[94m range[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m menu[94m opens[0m[94m up[0m into[94m ([0m[94m0[0m[94m°[0m[94m is[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m O'[94mclock[0m position[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m``` @mix[94min[0m menu-items[94m(\[0m$item[94m-[0mcount[94m)[0m[94m {[0m[94m //[0m[94m change[0m[94m as[0m[94m appropriate[0m[94m \$[0m[94malpha[0m[94m:[0m .[94m7[0m[94m;[0m[94m \$[0m[94mcol[0m[94mours[0m[94m:[0m rgba[94m([0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m5[0m,[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m [94m0[0m[94m,[0m \$alpha[94m),[0m rgba[94m([0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mS[0m[94mmt[0mp::[94mS[0mmt[94mp[0m[94m([0m const QString[94m &[0muser[94m,[0m const[94m Q[0mString[94m &[0mpass[94m,[0m const[94m Q[0mString[94m &[0mhost[94m,[0m int port[94m,[0m[94m int[0m timeout[94m )[0m[94m
[0m{[94m
[0m[94msocket[0m[94m =[0m new[94m Q[0mSslSocket[94m([0mthis[94m);[0m[94m

[0mconnect[94m([0msocket[94m,[0m SIGNAL[94m([0mconnected()), this[94m,[0m SLOT[94m([0mconnected() ) );[94m

[0m[94m
[0mthis[94m->[0muser = user[94m;[0m[94m

[0m[94m}[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mvoid Smtp[94m::[0msendMail[94m([0mconst[94m Q[0mString[94m &[0mfrom[94m,[0m[94m const[0m[94m Q[0mString[94m &[0m[94mto[0m[94m,[0m[94m const[0m[94m Q[0mString[94m &[0msubject[94m,[0m const[94m Q[0mString[94m &[0mbody[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m{[0m[94m

[0m[94mstate[0m[94m =[0m Init[94m;[0m[94m
[0msocket->connectToHost[94mEnc[0m[94mrypted[0m[94m([0mhost[94m,[0m port[94m);[0m[94m //[0m"smtp.gmail[94m.[0m[94mcom[0m[94m"[0m[94m and[0m 465 for gmail TLS
[94mif[0m[94m (![0msocket[94m->[0mwaitForConne[94mcted[0m[94m([0mtimeout))[94m {[0m[94m
[0m[94mq[0mDebug() << socket[94m->[0merrorString();[94m
[0m[94m}[0m[94m

[0m
[94mS[0mmt[94mp[0m[94m::[0m~[94mS[0m[94mmt[0m[94mp[0m()[94m
[0m[94m{[0m[94m

[0mvoid[94m Sm[0mtp[94m::[0m[94mdis[0mconnected[94m()[0m[94m
[0m[94m{[0m[94m
[0m
[94mq[0mDebug()[94m <<[0m[94m"[0m[94mdis[0mconneted";[94m
[0m[94mq[0mDebug() <<ct[94mom[0meters[94m.[0m
•[94m It[0m[94m is[0m used[94m to[0m[94m design[0m hyd[94mrom[0m[94meters[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mLactometer[94m:-[0m It[94m is[0m[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m determine[0m[94m pur[0mity[94m of[0m milk[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mH[0myd[94mrom[0m[94meter[0m[94m:-[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m determine[0m density[94m of[0m liquid[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mRelative[0m[94m D[0m[94mens[0m[94mity[0m[94m:-[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m ratio[0m[94m of[0m density[94m of[0m substance to[94m the[0m density[94m of[0m[94m water[0m[94m is[0m known[94m as[0m[94m the[0m relative[94m density[0m[94m of[0m[94m subst[0m[94mance[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Rel[0m[94mative[0m[94m density[0m[94m =[0m[94m D[0m[94mens[0m[94mity[0m[94m of[0m[94m subst[0m[94mance[0m/ D[94mens[0m[94mity[0m[94m of[0m[94m water[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Rel[0m[94mative[0m[94m density[0m has no unit.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFor[94m the[0m important questions[94m of[0m[94m grav[0m[94mitation[0m[94m,[0m click https[94m://[0mbra[94min[0m[94mign[0miter[94m.[0min/class[94m-[0m9/physics[94m-[0m[94mgra[0m[94mv[0mitation[94m-[0mimportant[94m-[0m[94mquestions[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m •[0m ### NGC [94m1[0m[94m0[0m52-DF2 And[94m Mod[0mified[94m Gra[0mvity[94m ([0m[94mMO[0m[94mG[0m[94m)[0m[94m Without[0m Dark Matter[94m([0m[94m1[0m805.[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m7[0m)[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mMay[0m [94m3[0m,[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94m gr[0m-qc, astro[94m-[0mph.GA[94m
[0mWe model[94m the[0m[94m velocity[0m disp[94mersion[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m ult[0m[94mra[0m[94m-[0mdiffuse galax[94my[0m NGC[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m2[0m-[94mDF[0m[94m2[0m[94m using[0m[94m Newton[0mian gravity[94m and[0m modified gravity[94m ([0mMO[94mG[0m[94m).[0m[94m The[0m velocity[94m disp[0m[94mersion[0m predicted[94m by[0m MO[94mG[0m[94m is[0m higher[94m than[0m[94m the[0m[94m Newton[0m[94mian[0m[94m gravity[0m prediction[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m fully consistent[94m with[0m[94m the[0m observed[94m velocity[0m[94m disp[0m[94mersion[0m that[94m is[0m obtained from[94m the[0m motion[94m of[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m globular clusters[94m.[0m[94m
[0m• ###[94m App[0m[94mlying[0m[94m MO[0m[94mG[0m[94m to[0m lensing[94m:[0m Ein[94mstein[0m rings[94m,[0m[94m Ab[0mell [94m5[0m2[94m0[0m and the Bullet Cl[94muster[0m(1[94m2[0m04[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m9[0m[94m8[0m[94m5[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mApril[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m8[94m gr[0m[94m-[0m[94mq[0m[94mc[0m[94m,[0m[94m ast[0m[94mro[0m[94m-[0m[94mph[0m[94m.[0mCO
We investigate gravit[94mational[0m l[94mens[0ming[94m in[0m[94m the[0m context[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m MO[0m[94mG[0m modified theory of gravity[94m.[0m[94m Using[0m a[94m form[0m[94mulation[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m theory[94m with[0m no[94m adjust[0mable[94m or[0m fitted parameters[94m,[0m[94m we[0m present[94m the[0m MO[94mG[0m[94m equations[0m of[94m motion[0m for[94m slow[0m[94m,[0m[94m non[0mrelativ[94mistic[0m test particles and for[94m ult[0m[94mra[0mrelativistic test[94m particles[0m[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m as[0m rays of light[94m.[0m We demonstrate[94m how[0m[94m the[0m[94m MO[0m[94mG[0m prediction for[94m the[0m[94m b[0mending of light[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m applied[0m[94m to[0m astronomical[94m observations[0m[94m.[0m Our investigation[94m first[0m focuses[94m on[0m[94m a[0m[94m small[0m[94m set[0m[94m of[0m strong l[94mens[0m[94ming[0m[94m observations[0m[94m where[0m[94m the[0m properties[94m of[0m[94m the[0m l[94mens[0m[94ming[0m objects[94m are[0m[94m found[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m consistent[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m predictions[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m theory[0m[94m.[0m We also present[94m an[0m[94m analysis[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m coll[0miding clusters [94m1[0mE0657-5[94m5[0m8 (known also as[94m the[0m Bul[94mlet[0m Cl[94muster[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m Abell[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m;[0m in both[94m cases[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m predictions[94m of[0m[94m the[0m0[94m7[0m5[94m8[0m[94m8[0m9[94m2[0m22[94mi[0m-[94m5[0m.1[94m1[0m5[94m6[0m4[94m8[0m2[94m8[0m390[94m5[0m5[94m2[0m7,-7[94m.[0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m5889222i-5[94m.[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m5[94m6[0m[94m4[0m[94m8[0m[94m2[0m[94m8[0m[94m3[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m5[0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m][94m
[0m[[94m2[0m[94m.[0m60[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m6[0m6[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m6[0m9[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m2[0m1[94m7[0mi-[94m7[0m[94m.[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m7[0m[94m6[0m[94m4[0m,-2[94m.[0m6[94m0[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m6[0m[94m6[0m[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m6[0m[94m9[0m[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m2[0m[94m1[0m[94m7[0m[94mi[0m[94m-[0m7[94m.[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m7[0m[94m6[0m[94m4[0m,0[94m.[0m[94m8[0m[94m6[0m7[94m6[0m[94m9[0m[94m3[0m[94m5[0m[94m7[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0m[94m7[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m7i[94m-[0m8[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m4[0m[94m2[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m8[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m,-0[94m.[0m8[94m6[0m[94m7[0m[94m6[0m[94m9[0m[94m3[0m[94m5[0m[94m7[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0m[94m7[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m7[0m[94mi[0m[94m-[0m8[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m4[0m[94m2[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m8[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m,[94m6[0m.[94m1[0m[94m7[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m2[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m2[0m[94m6[0mi[94m-[0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m61[94m1[0m00[94m4[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m4[0m[94m8[0m[94m8[0m[94m1[0m,-6[94m.[0m171534992991226[94mi[0m[94m-[0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m6[94m1[0m100424994881,[94m8[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m2[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m6[0m[94m8[0m[94m6[0m[94m4[0m[94m2[0m[94m6[0m[94m7[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0mi[94m-[0m5[94m.[0m3[94m2[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m[94m5[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m[94m8[0m[94m6[0m [0m[94mWeight[0m known[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m mod[0m[94mulus[0m[94m function[0m[94m will[0m[94m have[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m values[0m[94m,[0m[94m one[0m[94m positive[0m[94m and[0m[94m one[0m[94m negative[0m[94m,[0m but[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m important[0m[94m to[0m find out[94m where[0m[94m the[0m values[94m or[0m[94m the[0m[94m function[0m as[94m a[0m[94m whole[0m starts to change[94m,[0m[94m

[0m[94mThe[0m lower[94m limit[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m if[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m is[0m put,[94m the[0m[94m value[0m obtained[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m which[94m is[0m[94m positive[0m[94m,[0m now put[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m,[0m value[94m obtained[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m if[94m any[0m[94m value[0m above[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m is[0m[94m put[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m value[0m if[94m negative[0m,[94m hence[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m break[0m[94m point[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAtt[0mention reader[94m![0m Don[94m’[0m[94mt[0m stop[94m learning[0m[94m now[0m.[94m Jo[0m[94min[0m[94m the[0m First-[94mStep[0m-to[94m-[0mDSA Cour[94mse[0m for Class 9 to [94m1[0m2 students[94m ,[0m[94m specifically[0m designed[94m to[0m[94m introduce[0m data structures[94m and[0m algorithms[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m class[0m [94m9[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m students[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mMy[0m Personal Notes arrow_drop[94m_[0m[94mup[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m ###[94m E[0m[94mvalu[0m[94mating[0m[94m a[0m[94m f[0mission track age[94m
[0m[94m
[0m####[94m The[0m[94m f[0m[94mission[0m[94m track[0m[94m age[0m equation
[94m
[0mThe[94m f[0m[94mission[0m[94m track[0m[94m age[0m[94m equation[0m[94m is[0m a[94m special[0mised[94m form[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m general age[94m equation[0m used[94m in[0m all[94m other[0m forms[94m of[0m radiometric dating[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m this[0m[94m case[0m the ratio[94m of[0m atoms which have under[94mg[0m[94mone[0m radio[94mactive[0m[94m decay[0m to the number[94m of[0m parent[94m atoms[0m[94m remaining[0m[94m is[0m expressed by[94m the[0m ratio[94m of[0m spontaneous to induced track dens[94mities[0m ([94mPrice[0m[94m and[0m Walker [94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m3[0m, Naeser [94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m7[0m):[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$$[94m\[0m[94mlarge[0m[94m t[0m = {[94m [0m[94m1[0m \over[94m \[0mlambda_D[94m }[0m \ln \[94mleft[0m[94m ([0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m +[0m {\[94mlambda[0m[94m_[0m[94mD[0m \[94mphi[0m[94m \[0m[94msigma[0m[94m I[0m \over \[94mlambda[0m[94m_[0m[94mf[0m[94m}[0m[94m {\[0mrho[94m_[0m[94ms[0m \over \rho[94m_[0m[94mi[0m }[94m \[0m[94mright[0m[94m )[0m[94m \[0mqquad[94m \[0mqquad[94m \[0mlarge[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m$$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mwhere[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
• $$\[94mlambda[0m[94m_[0m[94mD[0m$$[94m =[0m[94m total[0m decay[94m constant[0m for $$^{238}U[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m.[94m5[0m[94m5[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m \[0mtimes[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m1[0m0[94m}[0myr^{-[94m1[0m}$$[94m

[0m[94m•[0m[94m $$[0m[94mI[0m$$[94m =[0m is[94mot[0mopic ratio[94m $$[0m^{235[94m}[0m[94mU[0m$$/$$^{[94m2[0m38[94m}[0m[94mU[0m$$,[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m[94mx[0m[94m1[0m0$$^{-[94m3[0m}$$[94m

[94mE[0mur[94m

[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m6[0m[94m5[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m assume[94m I[0m[94mH[0m[94m2[0m[94m:[0m[94m "[0m[94mof[0m[94m_[0m[94mnat[0m[94m ([0m[94mf[0m[94mib[0m (Suc n))[94m =[0m[94m (\<[0m[94mphi[0m[94m>[0m[94m ^[0m Suc n[94m -[0m \<[94mpsi[0m[94m>[0m[94m ^[0m[94m S[0m[94muc[0m n[94m)[0m[94m /[0m[94m sq[0m[94mrt[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m"[0m[94m

[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m6[0m[94m8[0m[94m +[0m    by (simp add: I[94mH[0m[94m1[0m I[94mH[0m[94m2[0m field_[94msim[0mps[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m6[0m[94m9[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m also[94m have[0m "\<[94mphi[0m[94m>[0m +[94m [0m[94m1[0m = \<[94mphi[0m>\<^sup>2"[94m by[0m (simp[94m add[0m[94m:[0m \<[94mphi[0m[94m>[0m_def[94m field[0m[94m_[0m[94msim[0m[94mps[0m power[94m2[0m_eq_square[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m +[94m [0m[94m also[0m[94m have[0m "\<psi[94m>[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m =[0m \<[94mpsi[0m>\<^sup>[94m2[0m[94m"[0m[94m by[0m (simp[94m add[0m[94m:[0m \<[94mpsi[0m[94m>[0m_def field[94m_[0m[94msim[0m[94mps[0m[94m power[0m2[94m_[0meq[94m_[0m[94msquare[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m1[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m also[0m[94m have[0m "\<[94mphi[0m[94m>[0m^[94mn[0m[94m *[0m \<[94mphi[0m>\<^sup>2 - \<[94mpsi[0m[94m>[0m^[94mn[0m[94m *[0m \<[94mpsi[0m>\<^sup>[94m2[0m = \<[94mphi[0m[94m>[0m[94m ^[0m Suc ([94mS[0m[94muc[0m[94m n[0m[94m)[0m - \<[94mpsi[0m[94m>[0m[94m ^[0m S[94muc[0m ([94mS[0m[94muc[0m[94m n[0m)"
[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m2[94m +[0m   [94m by[0m[94m ([0msimp[94m add[0m[94m:[0m power2_eq_[94msquare[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m3[94m +[0m  finally show "[94mof[0m[94m_[0mnat[94m ([0m[94mf[0m[94mib[0m ([94mS[0m[94muc[0m ([94mS[0m[94muc[0m n)))[94m =[0m (\<[94mphi[0m[94m>[0m[94m ^[0m S[94muc[0m[94m ([0m[94mS[0m[94muc[0m[94m n[0m[94m)[0m - \<[94mpsi[0m[94m>[0m[94m ^[0m[94m S[0m[94muc[0m ([94mS[0m[94muc[0m n))[94m /[0m[94m sq[0m[94mrt[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m"[0m .[94m
[0m[94m1[0m.74[94m +[0mqed[94m ([0m[94msimp[0m_all add[94m:[0m \<[94mphi[0m[94m>[0m_def \<[94mpsi[0m>_[94mdef[0m field[94m_[0m[94msim[0m[94mps[0m)[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m5[94m +[0m
[94m1[0m[94m.[0m76 +lemma fib_closed[94m_[0m[94mform[0m':[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m7 is the[94m value[0m[94m,[0m[94m if[0m so fill[94m in[0m[94m your[0m default[94m ones[0m[94m.[0m
[94mThe[0m I[94m have[0m above will[94m have[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m affect as yours[94m,[0m there[94m are[0m always[94m three[0m[94m variables[0m[94m ([0m[94meven[0m[94m in[0m[94m your[0m code[94m,[0m Javascript variables[94m are[0m function scope, all[94m of[0m[94m the[0m var declarations[94m are[0m[94m pulled[0m to the top[94m.).[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m variables[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94mcb[0m -[94m un[0m[94mchanged[0m[94m
[0mlimit[94m -[0m[94m set[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m if[0m[94m not[0m supplied[94m pattern[0m[94m -[0m un[94mchanged[0m[94m ([0m[94mundefined[0m[94m if[0m[94m not[0m supplied[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mEDIT[94m:[0m[94m I[0m[94m just[0m saw your[94m comment[0m[94m on[0m[94m re[0m[94morder[0m[94ming[0m you[94m can[0m do[94m the[0m[94m following[0m
[94m
[0m  function foo[94m([0m[94mcb[0m[94m,[0m[94mlimit[0m[94m,[0mpattern[94m)[0m[94m {[0m[94m
[0m[94mif[0m([94mlimit[0m instanceof RegExp[94m)[0m[94m {[0m[94m
[0m[94mpattern[0m[94m =[0m[94m limit[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0mlimit[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0m[94m}[0m[94m
[0m[94melse[0m[94m {[0m[94m
[0m[94mlimit[0m[94m =[0m typeof[94m([0m[94mlimit[0m[94m)[0m ===[94m "[0mundefined[94m"[0m ? [94m1[0m : limit;[94m
[0m[94m}[0m[94m
[0m//do stuff[94m
[0m}[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
[94mOne[0m[94m thing[0m[94m I[0m[94m did[0m notice in[94m your[0m[94m code[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m you[0m'[94mre[0m testing[94m if[0m arguments[94m >[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m I[0m assume you[94m mean[0m arguments.length[94m >[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAny[0m[94mway[0m[94m,[0m[94m for[0m simple stuff[94m like[0m[94m this[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m don[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m really[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m use arguments[94m.[0m[94mlength[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m JavaScript[94m,[0m[94m if[0m[94m you[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m function[0m[94m that[0m[94m takes[0m, say three[94m arguments[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0mfunction doSomething[94m([0mcallback[94m,[0m[94m limit[0m[94m,[0m[94m pattern[0m[94m)[0m[94m {[0m[94m
[0m//[94m do[0m[94m something[0m[94m
[0m}[94m
[0m
[94m
[0mYou[94m can[0m[94m still[0m call it passing one[94m argument[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0mdoSomething[94m([0m[94mfoo[0m);[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWhat[0m will happen[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m inside[0m[94m the[0m[94m function[0m body[94m,[0m the first parameter[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m set[0m[94m and[0m[94m other[0m parameters[94m will[0m[94m be[0m undefined[94m.[0m[94m The[0m easiest/shortest[94m way[0m[94m to[0m[94m implement[0m what[94m you[0m[94m want[0m[94m is[0m simply[94m to[0m[94m check[0m[94m if[0m limit and[94m pattern[0m[94m are[0m[94m not[0m undefined:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mif[0m (typeof[94m([0m[94mlimit[0m[94m)[0m[94m !=[0m '[94mundefined[0m[94m')[0m[94m {[0m ... }
[94m
[0m[94m
[0marguments is better su[94mited[0m[94m for[0m more[94m complicated[0m variadic functions[94m ([0mth[94mink[0m of printf[94m in[0m C, for example[94m,[0m or console.log in JavaScript[94m)[0m[94m that[0m[94m may[0m take[94m arbitrary[0m[94m numbers[0m of[94m arguments[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m•[94m You[0m[94m are[0m correct[94m,[0m[94m I[0m did forget length.[94m I[0m[94m see[0m[94m what[0m you are[94m saying[0m[94m in[0m[94m your[0m[94m example[0m[94m,[0m but[94m what[0m if[94m only[0m[94m the[0m first and[94m third[0m arg[94m were[0m passed?[94m Is[0m it a[94m better[0m practice[94m to[0m[94m leave[0m[94m the[0m[94m argument[0m names ambigu[94mous[0m[94m so[0m pattern[94m isn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m defined[0m as limit[94m?[0m – devnill Mar[94m [0m[94m1[0m3 '13 at [94m1[0m[94m8[0m:4[94m8[0m
[94m
[0mI think[94m that[0m[94m you[0m shouldn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m be[0m[94m testing[0m[94m for[0m undefined[94m arguments[0m[94m in[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m change[94m your[0m function[94m behavior[0m, you should[94m be[0m[94m aware[0m[94m that[0m someone can call[94m the[0m function with[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m arguments[0m[94m from[0m[94m previous[0m[94m processing[0m, but[94m the[0m content[94m of[0m one of[94m them[0m could[94m be[0m undefined[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m that[0m case[94m the[0m[94m best[0m would[94m be[0m[94m testing[0m net[94m to[0m capture small shrim[94mp[0m[94m to[0m feed other fish[94m.[0m [94m One[0m[94m day[0m[94m there[0m[94m was[0m[94m a[0m[94m se[0m[94mah[0mor[94mse[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m ro[0m[94mpe[0m[94m,[0m then another[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m another[0m.  Actually keep[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m in[0m a[94m [0m[94m1[0m0 gall[94mon[0m tank[94m for[0m about[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m years[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m let them[94m go[0m[94m back[0m into[94m the[0m[94m inter[0mcoastal[94m.[0m  [94m got[0m tired of[94m collect[0m[94ming[0m live sh[94mimp[0m[94m.[0m  [94m Now[0m I[94m am[0m[94m totally[0m[94m into[0m[94m a[0m planted[94m tank[0m[94m with[0m Tetra[94m'[0m[94ms[0m and[94m Bar[0mbs[94m.[0m [94m Back[0m[94m then[0m I[94m did[0m salt[94m and[0m fresh[94m,[0m what ever I could catch[94m since[0m[94m "[0mMom[94m and[0m[94m D[0m[94mad[0m[94m"[0m thought[94m it[0m[94m was[0m[94m a[0m waste[94m of[0m[94m time[0m[94m,[0m[94m so[0m[94m no[0m[94m money[0m[94m for[0m[94m these[0m types[94m of[0m[94m things[0m.... [0m[94mI[0m agree[94m,[0m most people I talk too think[94m that[0m[94m the[0m mul[94mm[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m source[94m of[0m[94m nit[0m[94mr[0mates[94m.[0m[94m With[0m no[94m scientific[0m testing[94m to[0m back it up[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m find[0m[94m that[0m mul[94mm[0m[94m has[0m no relev[94mance[0m[94m to[0m[94m nit[0m[94mr[0m[94mates[0m.[94m so[0m[94m if[0m[94m I[0m have [94m3[0m inches[94m of[0m mul[94mm[0m[94m and[0m no fish[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m tank[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m i test[94m it[0m[94m a[0m month later[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m no[0m nitr[94mates[0m in[94m the[0m water[94m,[0m because[94m I[0m[94m wasn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m feed[94ming[0m[94m the[0m[94m tank[0m[94m etc[0m[94m.[0m[94m

[0m[94mWhen[0m[94m you[0m[94m get[0m[94m a[0m[94m under[0mgravel filter[94m for[0m your planted[94m tank[0m make[94m sure[0m[94m the[0m holes[94m are[0m small[94m enough[0m[94m.[0m My[94m d[0mwarf hairgrass got[94m into[0m my[94m under[0m[94mgra[0m[94mvel[0m filter[94m and[0m completely[94m c[0mlog[94mged[0m it[94m.[0m[94m However[0m when it worked[94m it[0m[94m was[0m amaz[94ming[0m and[94m making[0m[94m my[0m plants[94m grow[0m[94m like[0m[94m never[0m[94m before[0m[94m ([0m[94mand[0m[94m that[0m[94m caused[0m[94m the[0m problem :P[94m).[0m[94m

[0m[94mA[0mqu[94marium[0m[94m Co[0m[94m-[0mOp[94m -[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m years[0m[94m ago[0m Word A[94m set[0m of[94m ([0musually[94m)[0m three conson[94mants[0m[94m #### Example [94m3[0m[94m
[0m
[94m3[0m[94m [0m9[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m can[94m be[0m reduced[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m 3[94m [0m1[94m [0m[94m3[0m .   Process[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
[94m3[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m3·[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m·[0m[94m3[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m 9 =[94m [0m[94m3[0m·[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m·[0m[94m3[0m

Remove[94m the[0m factor[94m of[0m[94m [0m1[94m;[0m [94m3[0m 3[94m [0m3[94m [0m3 .
[94m
[0m[94m3[0m[94m ·[0m1[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m ·[0m[94m3[0m =[94m [0m1[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m [0m3[94m ·[0m1[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m ·[0m[94m3[0m =[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m
[94m
[0m[94mNot[0m[94mice[0m[94m that[0m in [94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m no[0m[94m factor[0m[94m common[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m numer[0m[94mator[0m[94m and[0m[94m denomin[0m[94mator[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### Example[94m [0m4[94m
[0m[94m
[0m5[94m [0m7[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m cannot[94m be[0m[94m reduced[0m[94m since[0m[94m there[0m are[94m no[0m factors[94m common[0m to[94m the[0m[94m numer[0m[94mator[0m[94m and[0m[94m denomin[0m[94mator[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mProblem[0ms [94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m shown[0m above could all[94m be[0m reduced[94m.[0m The process in[94m each[0m[94m reduction[0m included the following steps[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m Both[94m the[0m[94m numer[0m[94mator[0m[94m and[0m[94m denomin[0m[94mator[0m were[94m fact[0m[94mored[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m Factors[94m that[0m[94m were[0m[94m common[0m[94m to[0m[94m both[0m[94m the[0m[94m numer[0m[94mator[0m[94m and[0m[94m denomin[0m[94mator[0m were noted[94m and[0m[94m removed[0m[94m by[0m div[94miding[0m[94m them[0m out[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWe know[94m that[0m[94m we[0m can divide both sides of an[94m equation[0m[94m by[0m the[94m same[0m nonzero number, but why[94m should[0m[94m we[0m be[94m able[0m[94m to[0m[94m divide[0m[94m both[0m[94m the[0m numer[94mator[0m[94m and[0m[94m denomin[0m[94mator[0m of[94m a[0m[94m fraction[0m[94m by[0m the same[94m non[0m[94mzero[0m[94m number[0m[94m?[0m The[94m reason[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m any[0m[94m non[0m[94mzero[0m[94m number[0m[94m divided[0m[94m by[0m[94m itself[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m1[94m,[0m and[94m that[0m[94m if[0m a number is[94m multip[0m[94mlied[0m[94m by[0m[94m [0m1,[94m it[0m[94m is[0m left[94m un[0m[94mchanged[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mCons[0m[94mider[0m the fraction 6 2[94m4[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m 24 . Mult[94mip[0m[94mly[0m[94m this[0m fraction[94m by[0m[94m [0m1.[94m This[0m is written 6 24 ·[94m1[0m 6 24[94m ·[0m[94m1[0m .[94m But[0m 1[94m can[0m be[94m re[0m[94mwritten[0m[94m as[0m[94m [0m1 [94m6[0m [94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m [94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m [94m1[0m 6[94m .[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m6 24[94m [0m1[94m [0m6 1 6 = 6 1[94m [0m6[94m [0m24[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m6 =[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m [0m6[94m [0m[94m2[0m4[94m [0m1[94m [0m6[94m [0m[94m1[0m [94m6[0m[94m =[0m [94m6[0m 1[94m [0m6 [94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m [94m6[0m[94m =[0m [94m1[0m[94m [0m4

The[94m answer[0m,[94m [0m1 4[94m [0m1[94m [0m[94m4[0m ,[94m is[0m the[94m reduced[0m form. Notice that[94m in[0m [94m1[0m [94m4[0m 1 4 there[94m is[0m[94m no[0m1[94m The[0m text[94m.[0mtxt doesn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m exist[94m.[0m On [94m1[0m[94m1[0m/[94m1[0m/[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m5 [94m1[0m[94m1[0m:4[94m8[0m PM[94m,[0m Tung[94mg[0mul[94m S[0m[94mag[0mala wrote: >[94m i[0m[94m am[0m[94m a[0m beginner[94m in[0m Matlab guys[94m,[0m[94m so[0m[94m i[0m[94m can[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m figure[94m out[0m[94m what[0m'[94ms[0m[94m wrong[0m[94m with[0m[94m my[0m[94m code[0m[94m.[0m >[94mi[0m need[94m to[0m open a text[94m file[0m[94m and[0m write data[94m to[0m it[94m,[0m[94m but[0m i got[94m an[0m[94m error[0m[94m.[0m here[94m my[0m[94m si[0m...[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m'[0mdata[94mread[0m[94m'[0m[94m and[0m[94m '[0mtextscan[94m'[0m[94m Lar[0m[94mge[0m Text Files
Hi fol[94mks[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m have[94m a[0m working Simulink model[94m in[0m Sim[94mEvents[0m which reads data[94m from[0m[94m a[0m[94m text[0m[94m file[0m[94m.[0m Each row[94m includes[0m[94m ent[0miti[94my[0m attributes which[94m I[0m assign[94m to[0m an entity generated[94m by[0m[94m an[0m Entity Gener[94mator[0m block[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m por[0mblem I[94m'[0m[94mm[0m[94m experien[0m[94mcing[0m now[94m is[0m[94m the[0m long[94m time[0m[94m it[0m[94m takes[0m[94m to[0m finish[94m reading[0m[94m/[0mextract[94ming[0m all[94m of[0m[94m the[0m rows each clock[94m time[0m[94m.[0m[94m You[0m[94m see[0m,[94m when[0m[94m I[0m[94m did[0m my[94m coding[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m beginning[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m was[0m working[94m on[0m small files[94m,[0m say[94m [0m[94m1[0m5[94m0[0m-[94mish[0m rows[94m each[0m[94m.[0m Now[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m'[0m[94mm[0m dealing[94m with[0m > [94m4[0m[94m0[0mk[94m rows[0m[94m.[0m[94m Here[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m brief[0m[94m on[0m my coding[94m/[0mfunctions I[94m'[0m[94mve[0m[94m implemented[0m[94m:[0m First[94m,[0m[94m I[0m have an Entity[94m Gener[0m[94mator[0m[94m.[0m The[94m number[0m[94m of[0m entites[94m leaving[0m[94m the[0m[94m block[0m[94m is[0m label[94mled[0m[94m '[0m[94md[0m[94m'.[0m[94m I[0m[94m'[0m[94mm[0m using[94m '[0m[94md[0m[94m'[0m as[94m an[0m[94m input[0m[94m to[0m[94m an[0m[94m Em[0m[94mbed[0mded Mat[94mlab[0m Function[94m that[0m reads[94m the[0m[94m number[0m[94m of[0m rows[94m of[0m[94m the[0m text[94m file[0m[94m.[0m Basically[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m '[0m[94md[0m[94m'[0m[94m works[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m index[0m[94m in[0m[94m reading[0m the[94m "[0m[94mcurrent[0m[94m"[0m row. The reason[94m for[0m[94m this[0m function[94m is[0m[94m it[0m[94m comput[0m[94mes[0m[94m the[0m[94m '[0m[94minter[0m-gener[94mation[0m[94m time[0m[94m'[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m Entity[94m Gener[0m[94mator[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m might[0m sound[94m a[0m[94m bit[0m[94m we[0mired,[94m but[0m basically[94m the[0m '[94minter[0m[94mgener[0m[94mation[0m[94m time[0m[94m'[0m[94m of[0m entities[94m are[0m computed via[94m an[0m Em[94mbed[0mded[94m Mat[0mlab[94m Function[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m it[0m[94m uses[0m[94m the[0m[94m '[0m[94md[0m[94m'[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m index[94m.[0m[94m Now[0m[94m,[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m Em[94mbed[0m[94mded[0m[94m Mat[0m[94mlab[0m[94m Function[0m[94m,[0m I[94m have[0m[94m the[0m[94m following[0m code[94m:[0m[94m _[0m[94m________________[0m________________[94m________[0m[94m____[0m[94m_[0m function inter[94mgen[0m[94m_[0mtime = fcn[94m([0m[94md[0m[94m)[0m[94m e[0m[94mml[0m.[94mext[0mrinsic('data[94mread[0m[94m')[0m rows =[94m [0m[94m0[0m; rows[94m =[0m length[94m([0mdata[94mread[0m('file[94m',[0m '[94mMy[0mTextFile.txt[94m',[0m '%s',[94m '[0mdelimiter[94m',[0m '\n')); if d[94m <=[0m rows[94m inter[0m[94mgen[0m_[94mtime[0m[94m =[0m[94m d[0m *[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94me[0m-[94m1[0m[94m0[0m;[94m else[0m intergen[94m_[0m[94mtime[0m[94m...[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mL[94mate[0mx[94mmk[0m: Could[94mn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m find[0m aux file 'Chapters/[94mch[0m[94map[0m1.aux'[94m
[0m[94mHi[0m[94m there[0m[94m,[0m On a LaTeX document[94m that[0m[94m is[0m split[94m into[0m many files[94m,[0m if only part[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m files[0m0[94m1[0m[94m3[0m[94mC[0m[94m\[0mu[94m2[0m013R[94m |[0m [94m2[0m[94m a[0m[94m hydro[0mphilic end[94m which[0m[94m is[0m polar[94m and[0m water soluble[94m.[0m This reaction[94m can[0m[94m be[0m used[94m to[0m[94m identify[0m[94m what[0m[94m transition[0m metal ion exists[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m solution[0m[94m,[0m[94m identified[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m colour[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m final[0m precipitate[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m resulting[0m[94m solution[0m[94m is[0m[94m basic[0m because of[94m the[0m dissolved hydrox[94mide[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m white[0m[94m solid[0m[94m ion[0mic comp[94mound[0m[94m consisting[0m[94m of[0m sod[94mium[0m cations Na+[94m and[0m hydroxide anions O[94mH[0m− . I[94m know[0m[94m that[0m[94m C[0m[94m0[0m2 is[94m an[0m acid[94mic[0m ox[94mide[0m[94m because[0m[94m it[0m react[94ms[0m[94m with[0m[94m water[0m[94m to[0m[94m form[0m[94m an[0m[94m acid[0m[94m ([0mcar[94mbon[0mic[94m).[0m S[94mod[0m[94mium[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m important constitu[94ment[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m number[94m of[0m[94m sil[0micate[94m materials[0m[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m â[0m[94m¦[0m This was[94m a[0m[94m common[0m[94m method[0m[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m fill[0m air[94mships[0m[94m and[0m air bal[94mlo[0m[94mons[0m[94m because[0m of[94m the[0m rapid evolution[94m of[0m hydrogen[94m gas[0m[94m it[0m[94m produces[0m[94m.[0m[94m S[0m[94mod[0m[94mium[0m metal react[94ms[0m[94m with[0m[94m water[0m[94m to[0m[94m form[0m[94m a[0m[94mque[0m[94mous[0m sod[94mium[0m hydro[94mx[0m[94mide[0m[94m and[0m hydro[94mgen[0m[94m gas[0m[94m.[0m An[94m al[0mkaline solution[94m contains[0m[94m hydro[0m[94mx[0m[94mide[0m ions[94m.[0m[94m But[0m why[94m is[0m[94m it[0m that carbon[94m dio[0m[94mx[0mide[94m in[0m gaseous state can react[94m with[0m[94m a[0mque[94mous[0m[94m S[0mod[94mium[0m hydro[94mx[0m[94mide[0m[94m â[0m[94m¦[0m L.[94m E[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0mBefore proceed[94ming[0m[94m further[0m I[94m would[0m[94m like[0m[94m to[0m make[94m a[0m remark concerning Will[94mough[0m[94mby[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m analysis[94m,[0m a [0m[94m

\[0m[94mend[0m {center}. Click[94m to[0m copy[94m —[0m press[94m down[0m alt for multiple[94m Clear[0m[94m As[0m HTML.[94m Since[0m[94m a[0m[94m map[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m reduced[0m representation[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m real[0m world[94m,[0m[94m map[0m symbols[94m are[0m[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m represent[0m[94m real[0m objects[94m.[0m[94m Circle[0m[94m with[0m line[94m through[0m[94m it[0m -[94m Me[0m[94mans[0m[94m mod[0mifier[94m -[0m[94m5[0m[94m1[0m[94m is[0m not[94m assigned[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m code[0m and[94m are[0m[94m not[0m[94m add[0m[94m-[0mon procedures[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m list[94m of[0m[94m letters[0m[94m of[0m the Latin script[94m.[0m trig[94mon[0m[94mometric[0m[94m functions[0m ([94msin[0m[94m,[0m[94m cos[0m[94m,[0m[94m tan[0m[94m),[0m logarith[94mms[0m[94m and[0m expon[94mentials[0m[94m ([0mlog[94m,[0m exp), limits[94m ([0mlim[94m),[0m[94m as[0m well[94m as[0m[94m trace[0m[94m and[0m[94m determin[0m[94mant[0m[94m ([0mtr, det[94m).[0m[94m Sp[0macing between[94m section[0m lines[94m should[0m[94m be[0m. Catholic Charities USA (CCUSA[94m)[0m[94m received[0m[94m a[0m [94m1[0m[94m.[0m horizontal[94m line[0m[94m mode[0m[94m "[0m[94m3[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m You[94m can[0m add attributes[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m horizontal[0m[94m line[0m[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m length[0m[94m,[0m[94m width[0m[94m,[0m[94m color[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m alignment[94m.[0m[94m See[0m Hor[94mizontal[0m[94m line[0m[94m ([0mcoordinate geometry).[94m The[0m[94m line[0m[94m of[0m symmetry[94m can[0m[94m be[0m either[94m horizontal[0m[94m,[0m[94m vertical[0m[94m or[0m[94m diagonal[0m[94m.[0m[94m actual[0m height[94m of[0m[94m the[0m p[94mict[0m[94mogram[0m[94m,[0m but[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m-[0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m[94m V[0m[94mT[0m[94m ([0m[94mvertical[0m tab). Import[94m I[0mcons[94m.[0m[94m Ada[0mfruit invests time and resources[94m.[0m[94m Co[0m[94mordinate[0m geometry A current[94m cycles[0m has[94m to[0m[94m be[0m maintained[94m at[0m all times[94m.[0m Therefore[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m pointers[94m to[0m[94m the[0m next and previous[94m current[0m[94m cycles[0m on[94m this[0m list[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mstruct Cycle
{[94m
[0mstruct Cy[94mcle[0m *next[2]; //[94m it[0m[94m may[0m split
int[94m Dim[0m;[94m //[0m dimension[94m
[0m[94m//[0m[94m cycles[0m on[94m the[0m[94m list[0m[94m,[0m forward[94m and[0m[94m back[0m
[94m}[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
[94mTh[0m[94mus[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m data structure[94m for[0m[94m the[0m image[94m is[0m an[94m a[0m[94mcyc[0m[94mlic[0m binary directed[94m graph[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m regions[0m[94m and[0m holes[94m are[0m represented[94m as[0m nodes of[94m this[0m[94m graph[0m[94m.[0m Each[94m node[0m[94m representing[0m[94m a[0m region[94m or[0m[94m hole[0m is[94m connected[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m nodes[0m[94m representing[0m[94m regions[0m[94m and[0m[94m holes[0m that existed[94m previously[0m (its parents[94m)[0m or[94m appear[0m later[94m ([0m[94mits[0m children[94m)[0m[94m by[0m directed[94m edges[0m[94m,[0m or ar[94mrows[0m[94m,[0m of[94m the[0m[94m graph[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m ar[94mrows[0m[94m ([0mone or[94m two[0m[94m from[0m[94m each[0m[94m node[0m[94m)[0m[94m indicate[0m mer[94mging[0m[94m and[0m splitting of[94m the[0m[94m regions[0m[94m as[0m[94m we[0m[94m add[0m vertices[94m,[0m[94m edges[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m pixels[94m,[0m[94m Adding[0m Pix[94mels[0m.[94m There[0m[94m are[0m[94m no[0m[94m circular[0m[94m sequences[0m[94m of[0m ar[94mrows[0m[94m.[0m Each node of[94m the[0m[94m graph[0m[94m contains[0m[94m a[0m[94m pair[0m[94m of[0m links[94m ([0mpointer[94ms[0m[94m)[0m[94m to[0m[94m next[0m[94m nodes[0m[94m.[0m If[94m the[0m[94m cycle[0m[94m is[0m merged with[94m another[0m[94m,[0m[94m one[0m[94m link[0m used[94m,[0m if[94m it[0m[94m spl[0m[94mits[0m,[94m two[0m.[94m This[0m information[94m is[0m[94m used[0m even after[94m the[0m[94m cycle[0m ceases[94m to[0m be current[94m,[0m i[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m[94m after[0m a merge[94m or[0m a split[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWe[94m also[0m[94m connect[0m each edge[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m image[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m cycle[0m[94m it[0m created when the[94m edge[0m[94m is[0m added[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m allows[0m[94m one[0m[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m[94m current[0m[94m cycle[0m corresponding[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m given[0m[94m edge[0m[94m.[0m This[94m is[0m accomplished[94m by[0m[94m following[0m[94m the[0m pointer from[94m the[0m edge[94m to[0m[94m its[0m[94m original[0m[94m node[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m following the links of[94m the[0m graph[94m to[0m find[94m the[0m[94m current[0m[94m node[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m approach[94m allows[0m[94m one[0m[94m to[0m[94m avoid[0m re[94massign[0m[94ming[0m these[94m cycles[0m[94m to[0m[94m each[0m edge of[94m the[0m new[94m cycle[0m[94m ([0mlike[94m rel[0m[94mabel[0m[94ming[0m of[94m components[0m[94m)[0m[94m after[0m every merge[94m.[0m[94m In[0m addition[94m,[0m[94m only[0m[94m one[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m two[94m cycles[0m[94m emer[0mging[94m after[0m a split[94m has[0m to[94m be[0m re[94massign[0m[94ming[0m .[94m This[0m[94m is[0m implemented[94m later[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe following command creates[94m a[0m node[94m for[0m[94m the[0m given[94m edge[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mstruct[94m Cy[0m[94mcle[0m *CreateC[94mycle[0m( int *edge )[94m
[0m{[94m
[0mstruct[94m Cy[0m[94mcle[0m[94m *[0mCycle0 = new struct[94m Cy[0m[94mcle[0m;[94m
[0m[94m
[0mC[94mycle[0m[94m0[0m->next[94m[[0m[94m0[0m[94m][0m[94m =[0m NULL[94m;[0m[94m [0m[94m Cy[0m[94mcle[0m[94m0[0m[94m->[0mnext[94m[[0m[94m1[0m[94m][0m[94m =[0m NULL[94m [0m[94m;[0m // no kids so far[94m
[0mC[94mycle[0m[94m0[0m[94m->[0mDim =[94m [0m0;[94m//[0m to be[94m determined[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mC[94mycle[0m[94m0[0m[94m->[0mlink[94mF[0m = NULL[94m Cy[0m[94mcle[0m[94m0[0m[94m->[0mlinkB = NULL[94m;[0m[94m//[0m disconnected[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m the[0m list[94m of[0m current[94m cycles[0m[94m so[0m far[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mG[0m[94mive[0m[94mC[0mycle( edge, Cy[94mcle[0m[94m0[0m );[94m//[0m assign the edge[94m to[0m[94m the[0m cycle, below
[94mAtt[0m[94mach[0m[94mC[0murrC[94mycle[0m to[94m estimate[0m[94m the[0m[94m average[0m cost[94m of[0m[94m the[0m voyage from[94m the[0m[94m mean[0m[94m family[0m size? Why or[94m why[0m[94m not[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### Related chap[94mters[0m[94m
[0m

[0m[94m

[94mMin[0mimal[94m complete[0m definition[94m
