[0m[94mco[0m[94mho[0m[94mist[0m
[94m
[0mMethods[94m
[0m[94m
[0mcoho[94mist[0m :: (Comonad w,[94m Com[0mon[94mad[0m[94m v[0m[94m)[0m => (forall[94m x[0m. w x -> v x) -> t w a -> t v[94m a[0m[94m #[0m
[94m
[0m[94mG[0miven[94m any[0m comon[94mad[0m-homomorphism from[94m w[0m[94m to[0m[94m v[0m this yields[94m a[0m com[94mon[0m[94mad[0m hom[94momorphism[0m[94m from[0m t w[94m to[0m t[94m v[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mInstances
[94m
[0m #[94m Method[0m[94ms[0m[94mco[0mho[94mist[0m ::[94m ([0mCom[94mon[0m[94mad[0m[94m w[0m[94m,[0m[94m Com[0m[94mon[0m[94mad[0m[94m v[0m[94m)[0m =>[94m ([0m[94mforall[0m[94m x[0m[94m.[0m[94m w[0m[94m x[0m[94m ->[0m[94m v[0m[94m x[0m[94m)[0m[94m ->[0m IdentityT[94m *[0m[94m w[0m a[94m ->[0m Identity[94mT[0m[94m *[0m[94m v[0m[94m a[0m # #[94m Method[0m[94ms[0m[94mco[0m[94mho[0m[94mist[0m ::[94m ([0mCom[94mon[0m[94mad[0m[94m w[0m[94m,[0m[94m Com[0m[94mon[0m[94mad[0m[94m v[0m[94m)[0m[94m =>[0m[94m ([0m[94mforall[0m[94m x[0m[94m.[0m[94m w[0m[94m x[0m[94m ->[0m[94m v[0m[94m x[0m[94m)[0m[94m ->[0m[94m En[0mvT e w[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m[94m En[0m[94mv[0mT e v[94m a[0m[94m #[0m #[94m Method[0m[94ms[0mco[94mho[0m[94mist[0m[94m ::[0m[94m ([0m[94mCom[0m[94mon[0mad[94m w[0m[94m,[0m[94m Com[0m[94mon[0m[94mad[0m[94m v[0m[94m)[0m[94m =>[0m[94m ([0m[94mforall[0m[94m x[0m[94m.[0m[94m w[0m[94m x[0m[94m ->[0m[94m v[0m x[94m)[0m[94m ->[0m StoreT s w[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m[94m Store[0m[94mT[0m s v[94m a[0m[94m #[0m #[94m Method[0m[94ms[0m[94mco[0m[94mho[0m[94mist[0m[94m ::[0m[94m ([0mCom[94mon[0m[94mad[0m[94m w[0m[94m,[0m[94m Com[0m[94mon[0m[94mad[0m[94m v[0m[94m)[0m[94m =>[0m[94m ([0m[94mforall[0m[94m x[0m[94m.[0m[94m w[0m[94m x[0m[94m ->[0m[94m v[0m[94m x[0m)[94m ->[0m Traced[94mT[0m m w[94m a[0m[94m ->[0m[94m T[0mrac[94med[0m[94mT[0m m v[94m a[0m[94m #[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m Representation[94m of[0m[94m integers[0m by F[94mib[0m[94mon[0m[94macci[0m numbers[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mDen[0mote by $[94mF[0m[94m$[0m the[94m set[0m[94m of[0m all F[94mib[0m[94mon[0m[94macci[0m[94m numbers[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m our conject[94mure[0m[94m that[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0ma)[94m For[0m[94m every[0m[94m integer[0m $[94mn[0m$ there[94m exist[0m a number[94m $[0mk[94m=[0m[94m2[0m^q$[94m ([0mfor[94m some[0m[94m positive[0m[94m integer[0m[94m $[0m[94mq[0m[94m$)[0m and[94m numbers[0m[94m $[0ma_[94m1[0m,\cdots[94m,[0m[94ma[0m[94m_[0mk\in F[94m$[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m $$[94mn[0m[94m=[0m[94ma[0m[94m_[0m[94m1[0m+\[94mcdots[0m[94m+[0m[94ma[0m[94m_{\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mk[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m}}-([94ma[0m_{\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mk[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}+[0m[94m1[0m}+\cdots[94m+[0m[94ma[0m[94m_[0m[94mk[0m).[94m$$[0m[94m Now[0m[94m,[0m denote[94m by[0m[94m $[0mk(n[94m)$[0m[94m the[0m[94m least[0m[94m $[0m[94mk[0m$[94m obtained[0m[94m from[0m (a).[94m
[0m[94m
[0m([94mb[0m[94m)[0m The[94m set[0m[94m of[0m[94m all[0m $k[94m([0m[94mn[0m work in progress but looking very pol[94mished[0m[94m.[0m There[94m are[0m[94m no[0m less[94m than[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m4[0m[94m6[0m[94m pages[0m together[94m with[0m[94m another[0m[94m almost[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m pages[0m of[94m answers[0m to exer[94mcis[0m[94mes[0m[94m.[0m It[94m goes[0m from an introduction[94m to[0m sentential logic[94m,[0m[94m through[0m[94m the[0m usual topics[94m in[0m first order[94m logic[0m[94m ([0m[94mpresent[0m[94med[0m both axiomatically[94m and[0m in a[94m natural[0m dedu[94mction[0m[94m system[0m[94m)[0m[94m getting[0m as[94m far[0m[94m as[0m[94m e[0m[94m.[0m[94mg[0m[94m.[0m[94m a[0m discussion[94m of[0m compact[94mness[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m down[0m[94mward[0m L[94m-[0m[94mS[0m theorem[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m moving[0m[94m on[0m[94m to[0m some [94mqu[0mite detailed[94m work[0m[94m on[0m Gö[94mdel[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m in[0m[94mcomple[0m[94mten[0m[94mess[0m[94m the[0m[94mor[0m[94mems[0m[94m.[0m[94m And[0m Tony[94m writes[0m[94m that[0m “it[94m’[0m[94ms[0m aimed especially[94m at[0m access[94mibility[0m and[94m so[0m[94m builds[0m in[94m a[0m level[94m of[0m explanation[94m and[0m detail[94m that[0m may[94m be[0m[94m missing[0m[94m from[0m[94m other[0m[94m sources[0m.”[94m So[0m[94m I[0m’[94mll[0m certainly[94m be[0m taking[94m a[0m[94m look[0m[94m at[0m this[94m for[0m[94m T[0m[94mY[0mL[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m,[0m and probably comment[94ming[0m there. [94mIn[0m[94m the[0m[94m meant[0mime you can[94m take[0m[94m a[0m[94m look[0m yourself [94mon[0m[94m the[0m[94m book[0m’[94ms[0m website here[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## One future[94m for[0m[94m journal[0m publishing[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mOn[0m[94m his[0m blog[94m,[0m Tim Gow[94mers[0m[94m has[0m announced[94m a[0m[94m new[0m[94m journal[0m[94m,[0m[94m Dis[0mcrete[94m Analysis[0m [94mfor[0m which[94m he[0m[94m is[0m[94m to[0m be the[94m man[0m[94maging[0m editor[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m content[0m [94mof[0m[94m the[0m[94m journal[0m probably[94m won[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m be[0m of much inter[94mest[0m[94m to[0m most[94m readers[0m of Log[94mic[0m Mat[94mters[0m.[94m It[0m[94m will[0m cover[94m topics[0m[94m in[0m add[94mitive[0m combin[94mator[0m[94mics[0m[94m [0m[94mand[0m[94m other[0m[94m [0m[94mtop[0m[94mics[0m which[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m suitable[0m[94m family[0m relationship. But[94m the[0m form[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m journal[0m[94m is[0m fasc[94min[0m[94mating[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m will[0m[94m surely[0m come[94m to[0m be emulated[94m by[0m other editor[94mial[0m groups[94m for[0m[94m other[0m areas[94m of[0m[94m mathematics[0m[94m.[0m [94mIt[0m[94m is[0m to[94m be[0m[94m an[0m[94m [0m[94mar[0mXiv overlay journal.[94m What[0m this[94m means[0m[94m,[0m[94m in[0m Tim[94m G[0m[94mow[0m[94mers[0m’[94ms[0m words,[94m is[0m that
[94m
[0m[94mr[0mather[94m than[0m publishing[94m,[0m or even electron[94mically[0m hosting[94m,[0m papers[94m,[0m[94m it[0m will[94m consist[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m list[94m of[0m[94m links[0m[94m to[0m arXiv preprint[94ms[0m[94m.[0m[94m Other[0m[94m than[0m[94m that[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m journal[94m will[0m[94m be[0m entirely conventional[94m:[0m authors will submit[94m links[0m[94m to[0m ar[94mX[0m[94miv[0m preprint[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m the[0m[94m edit[0m[94mors[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m journal[94m will[0m[94m find[0m[94m ref[0merees,[94m using[0m[94m their[0m quick opinions[94m and[0m[94m more[0m detailed[94m reports[0m in[94m the[0m usual way[94m in[0m order to[94m decide[0m[94m which[0m papers will[94m be[0m accepted[94m.[0m … [So] [94mThe[0m articles will[94m be[0m peer[94m-[0m[94mreview[0m[94med[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m traditional[0m[94m way[0m[94m.[0m[94m There[0m will[94m also[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m number[94ming[0m system for[94m the[0m articles[94m,[0m[94m so[0m[94m that[0m when they[94m are[0m[94m c[0mited[94m,[0m[94m they[0m look[94m like[0m journal articles[94m rather[0m[94m than[0m “[94mm[0m[94mere[0m” arX[94miv[0m preprint[94ms[0m.[94m They[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m exclusive[0m[94m to[0m Dis[94mcrete[0m[94m Analysis[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThere[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m much[0m[94m more[0m in [94mthe[0m[94m very[0m[94m luc[0m[94mid[0m[94m and[0m persu[94mas[0mivepi}{2}\ \bigr)$$[94m Using[0m[94m the[0m notation[94m ‘[0m[94m$\[0m[94m,\[0msin[94m^{-[0m1[94m}\[0m,$’ for[94m the[0m ar[94mcs[0mine function: $$y[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94msin[0m^{-[94m1[0m[94m}[0m x\ \[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0mtext[94m{[0m[94mif[0m[94m and[0m only if}\[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0mbigl(\[94m \[0msin y = x[94m\[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0mtext[94m{[0m[94mAND[0m}\[94m \[0m -\[94mfrac[0m{\pi[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}[0m[94m \[0m[94mle[0m[94m y[0m[94m\[0mle[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m}\[94m \[0mbigr)$$

[0m## Notes on[94m the[0m Definition[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m Ar[0m[94mcs[0mine Function[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• U[94mND[0mER[94mST[0mANDING[94m THE[0m DE[94mF[0m[94mIN[0mITION[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m definition[0m[94m precisely[0m answers[94m the[0m[94m question[0m[94m:[0m ‘[94mWhat[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m number[0m $\,\ar[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m\,$?’[94m
[0m[94mHere[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m how[94m:[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Rec[0m[94mall[0m[94m that[0m ‘[94m if[0m and[94m only[0m[94m if[0m ’ means[94m the[0m same[94m thing[0m as is equivalent[94m to[0m[94m.[0m
Equivalent sentences have identical[94m truth[0m[94m values[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94mif[0m one[94m is[0m[94m true[0m[94m,[0m so is the[94m other[0m[94m;[0m   if[94m one[0m[94m is[0m[94m false[0m[94m,[0m[94m so[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m• Thus[94m,[0m if[94m the[0m[94m sentence[0m ‘$\[94m,[0my[94m =[0m[94m \[0mar[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m\,[94m$[0m[94m’[0m[94m is[0m[94m true[0m[94m,[0m
[94mthen[0m[94m the[0m[94m comp[0mound[94m sentence[0m   ‘[94m$\[0m,\[94msin[0m[94m y[0m[94m =[0m[94m x[0m\ \[94m \[0mtext[94m{[0mAND[94m}\[0m[94m \[0m[94m -\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}[0m[94m \[0m[94mle[0m[94m y[0m[94m\[0m[94mle[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m,$’  [94m must[0m also[94m be[0m[94m true[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m•[94m If[0m   ‘[94m$\[0m[94m,[0my[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mar[0m[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m[94m\,[0m[94m$[0m[94m’[0m   is[94m true[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m ‘[94m$\[0m[94m,[0my\,$’[94m is[0m just another name for ‘[94m$\[0m[94m,\[0m[94mar[0m[94mcs[0min[94m x[0m[94m\,[0m[94m$[0m[94m’[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m•[94m If[0m   ‘[94m$\[0m[94m,[0m[94my[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mar[0m[94mcs[0min[94m x[0m\,$[94m’[0m   is[94m true[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m two things[94m must[0m be true about[94m $\[0m[94m,\[0m[94mar[0m[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m[94m\,[0m[94m$[0m[94m ([0mi[94m.[0m[94me[0m., $\,y\,[94m$[0m):[94m
[0m•[94m $\[0m[94m,\[0m[94msin[0m[94m \[0m[94mover[0mbrace[94m{[0m[94my[0m}^{\ar[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m[94m}[0m[94m =[0m x\,$:   its[94m s[0m[94mine[0m[94m must[0m[94m be[0m[94m $\[0m,x\,[94m$[0m
[94m•[0m[94m $\[0m,-\[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}[0m[94m \[0m[94mle[0m[94m \[0m[94mover[0mbrace[94m{[0m[94my[0m}^{\ar[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m[94m}\[0m[94mle[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m}\[94m,$[0m:   it[94m must[0m[94m be[0m in[94m the[0m interval $\,[[94m-\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m},\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}][0m\,$
• Com[94mbin[0m[94ming[0m[94m these[0m ideas: $$\over[94mbrace[0m[94m{\[0m[94mstr[0mut y[94m =[0m \[94mar[0m[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m}^{\[94mtext[0m[94m{[0mHow does a number get[94m to[0m be[94m called[0m[94m \[0m[94m,\[0m[94mar[0m[94mcs[0m[94min[0m[94m x[0m[94m\,[0m[94m?[0m[94m}}\[0m[94m \[0m \ \ \[94m \[0mover[94mbrace[0m[94m{\[0mstr[94mut[0m \text{if and only if}}[94m}$[0m and point $P[94m =[0m[94m ([0m[94m9[0m[94m,[0m[94m8[0m[94m)$.[0m I[94m need[0m[94m to[0m compute[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m coordinate[94m of[0m[94m $[0m[94m3[0m[94mP[0m[94m$[0m[94m using[0m[94m ...[0m[94m

[0m###[94m Why[0m[94m reve[0m[94mal[0m MAC[94m-[0mkeys after[94m using[0m them?[94m

[0mAs far[94m as[0m my[94m understanding[0m goes MACs are[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m determine[0m whether[94m the[0m received message comes[94m from[0m[94m a[0m source that[94m has[0m access[94m to[0m[94m a[0m MAC-[94mkey[0m which[94m is[0m[94m known[0m by both[94m parties[0m[94m.[0m Some[94m c[0m[94mrypto[0m protocols[94m reve[0m[94mal[0m ...[94m

[0mDoes there exist[94m any[0m sorts[94m of[0m[94m algebraic[0m[94m relationship[0m[94m between[0m[94m Original[0m[94m and[0m[94m Sub[0m Key of[94m DES[0m[94m?[0m[94m I[0m[94m understand[0m[94m that[0m by[94m solving[0m K the[94m percentage[0m[94m of[0m images[94m,[0m[94m these[0m[94m numbers[0m tend[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m quite[0m large,[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m image[0m frequency[94m is[0m usually much higher when strong blowing snow occurs[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m the[0m[94m occurrence[0m[94m is[0m[94m more[0m bal[94manced[0m[94m in[0m terms[94m of[0m[94m time[0m[94m.[0m

[0m[94mAs[0m[94m the[0m method was developed[94m and[0m tested on[94m fund[0m[94mament[0m[94mally[0m[94m different[0m campaign[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m may[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m general[0m applic[94mability[0m[94m to[0m any[94m other[0m M[94mASC[0m images[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m should[94m be[0m[94m noted[0m[94m that[0m[94m some[0m descriptors depend[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m particular[0m[94m settings[0m ([94me[0m[94m.[0m[94mg[0m[94m.,[0m[94m image[0m size[94m and[0m[94m pixel[0m[94m resolution[0m[94m)[0m[94m used[0m during[94m the[0m a[94mfor[0m[94mement[0m[94mioned[0m[94m campaign[0ms,[94m and[0m[94m a[0m new[94m G[0mMM[94m should[0m[94m be[0m fitted if different[94m settings[0m apply[94m.[0m Further work[94m should[0m[94m be[0m[94m conducted[0m[94m to[0m evaluate if[94m the[0m[94m method[0m[94m can[0m[94m give[0m[94m satisf[0m[94mactory[0m[94m results[0m on images[94m that[0m do[94m not[0m include[94m a[0m timestamp,[94m as[0m[94m the[0m image[94m frequency[0m[94m des[0mcriptor[94m could[0m[94m not[0m[94m be[0m[94m util[0m[94mized[0m. In[94m this[0m[94m case[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m could[0m[94m be[0m replaced[94m by[0m[94m one[0m[94m or[0m[94m a[0m[94m couple[0m[94m of[0m other descript[94mors[0m listed[94m in[0m Table [94mA[0m1[94m of[0m Append[94mix[0m[94m [0mA[94m to[0m[94m strength[0m[94men[0m[94m the[0m model[94m.[0m The[94m method[0m[94m could[0m also[94m be[0m[94m adjust[0m[94med[0m[94m to[0m train[94m a[0m model[94m with[0m[94m a[0m[94m super[0mvised[94m learning[0m algorithm[94m that[0m[94m provides[0m posterior[94m prob[0m[94mabilities[0m such as[94m Bay[0mesian classifiers[94m or[0m[94m log[0mistic regression[94m.[0m However[94m,[0m[94m this[0m[94m would[0m imply[94m some[0m[94m effort[0m[94m to[0m increase[94m the[0m training set. An intercom[94mparison[0m[94m between[0m[94m different[0m[94m machine[0m-learning[94m algorithms[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m creation[0m[94m of[0m[94m different[0m validation[94m sets[0m[94m could[0m help[94m gain[0m[94m confidence[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m results[0m[94m.[0m The[94m main[0m limitations[94m of[0m[94m the[0m present method are the assumption of normally[94m distributed[0m[94m features[0m[94m through[0m[94m the[0m use[94m of[0m the[94m G[0m[94mMM[0m[94m,[0m the too-coarse resolution[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m M[0m[94mASC[0m to[94m properly[0m capture the small end of[94m the[0m distribution[94m of[0m blow[94ming[0m[94m snow[0m particle size[94m and[0m the dependency[94m of[0m[94m the[0m method[94m on[0m[94m the[0m defined[94m training[0m[94m set[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m latter[94m illustr[0m[94mates[0m[94m the[0m problem of[94m general[0m[94mization[0m[94m.[0m Some[94m extremely[0m[94m high[0m[94m intensity[0m snow[94mfall[0m events,[94m higher[0m than[94m the[0m ones[94m observed[0m[94m during[0m[94m the[0m[94m Dav[0mos[94m and[0m Antarctica campaign[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m could[0m[94m be[0m[94m err[0moneously class[94mified[0m as blow[94ming[0m[94m snow[0m[94m with[0m the current model due[94m to[0m the[94m nature[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m descript[94mors[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m this[0m[94m case[0m[94m,[0m higher[94m-[0mintens[94mity[0m pure snow[94mfall[0m[94m events[0m should[94m be[0m included[94m in[0m[94m the[0m training[94m set[0m. Another[94m example[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m size[0m[94m of[0m the blow[94ming[0m[94m snow[0m particles.[94m During[0m[94m the[0m[94m campaign[0m[94ms[0m in Ant[94marct[0m[94mica[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m M[94mASC[0m[94m was[0m set[94m up[0m[94m on[0m a[94m ro[0moftop at[94m [0m[94m3[0m m a.g.l. Several studies have demonstrated[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m size[0m[94m of[0m[94m blow[0m[94ming[0m[94m snow[0m[94m particles[0m tends[94m to[0m decrease with height[94m [0m[94m.[0m Con[94msequently[0m[94m,[0m blow[94ming[0m[94m snow[0m[94m particles[0m[94m on[0m[94m images[0m from[94m a[0m[94m M[0m[94mASC[0m that would[94m [0m
[94mocc[0multing light

[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m first[0m[94m thing[0m[94m to[0m[94m notice[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m one[0m has[94m functional[0m integral[94m around[0m[94m a[0m[94m maximum[0m of vacu[94mum[0m functional[94m and[0m[94m the[0m disapp[94mearance[0m[94m of[0m[94m loops[0m is[94m assumed[0m[94m to[0m follow from[94m quantum[0m[94m critical[0mity[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m would[0m[94m produce[0m exponential since[94m Gaussian[0m[94m and[0m[94m metric[0m[94m determin[0m[94mants[0m[94m cancel[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m expon[94mentials[0m would[94m cancel[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m proposal[0m[94m inspired[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m interpretation[94m of[0m[94m diag[0m[94mrams[0m as computations[94m.[0m[94m One[0m[94m could[0m in[94m fact[0m define[94m the[0m functional[94m integral[0m in[94m this[0m[94m manner[0m[94m so[0m[94m that[0m[94m a[0m[94m dis[0mcret[94mization[0m[94m making[0m possible[94m N[0m[94mT[0m[94mU[0m would[94m result[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mF[0mermionic scatter[94ming[0m amplit[94mudes[0m should depend[94m on[0m[94m space[0m-time surface somehow[94m to[0m[94m reve[0m[94mal[0m that[94m space[0m[94m-[0m[94mtime[0m[94m dynamics[0m matters[94m.[0m[94m In[0m fact[94m,[0m[94m Q[0m[94mCC[0m[94m stating[0m[94m that[0m classical[94m No[0m[94mether[0m charges[94m for[0m bos[94monic[0m action[94m are[0m[94m equal[0m to the eigenvalues[94m of[0m quant[94mal[0m charges[94m for[0m fermionic[94m action[0m[94m in[0m[94m Cart[0m[94man[0m algebra would[94m bring[0m in[94m the[0m dependence[94m of[0m scatter[94ming[0m[94m amplit[0m[94mudes[0m[94m on[0m[94m space[0m[94m-[0m[94mtime[0m surface[94m via[0m[94m the[0m values[94m of[0m No[94mether[0m charges[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m four[0m-moment[94mum[0m this dependence[94m is[0m obvious[94m.[0m The[94m identification[0m[94m of[0m[94m he[0mff/[94mh[0m=[94mn[0m as[94m order[0m[94m of[0m[94m Gal[0m[94mois[0m group[94m would[0m mean[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m basic[0m unit for discrete charges depends[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m extension[0m[94m character[0mizing the[94m space[0m[94m-[0m[94mtime[0m surface[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAlso the[94m cogn[0m[94mitive[0m[94m representations[0m defined[94m by[0m[94m the[0m set[94m of[0m[94m points[0m[94m for[0m which[94m preferred[0m imbedding space coordinates[94m are[0m in[94m this[0m extension[94m.[0m Could[94m the[0m[94m cogn[0m[94mitive[0m[94m representations[0m carry[94m maximum[0m amount of information[94m for[0m[94m maxim[0m[94ma[0m[94m?[0m For[94m instance[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m number[94m of[0m the points[94m in[0m extension[94m be[0m maximal. [0m
[94mTh[0mese ideas[94m suggest[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m usual[0m quant[94mitative[0m criter[94mion[0m[94m for[0m the importance[94m of[0m[94m configurations[0m could[94m be[0m[94m equivalent[0m with[94m a[0m[94m purely[0m number theoretical criter[94mion[0m[94m.[0m p[94m-[0m[94mAd[0mic physics describing cognition[94m and[0m[94m real[0m[94m physics[0m describing matter would[94m lead[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m result[0m[94m.[0m[94m Maxim[0mization[94m for[0m action[94m would[0m correspond[94m to[0m maxim[94mization[0m[94m for[0m[94m information[0m[94m.[0m

[0m[94mUse[0m[94m the[0m[94m gen[0metic[94m algorithm[0m[94m to[0m minim[94mize[0m[94m the[0m `[94mps[0m_example[94m`[0m[94m function[0m[94m const[0m[94mrained[0m to have[94m `[0m[94mx[0m([94m1[0m[94m)`[0m[94m integer[0m-[94mvalu[0m[94med[0m. Ob[94mtain[0m all outputs,[94m including[0m[94m the[0m[94m final[0m population[94m and[0m[94m vector[0m of[94m scores[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m```[94mInt[0mCon[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m;[94m r[0mng[94m default[0m %[94m For[0m reprodu[94mci[0m[94mb[0m[94mility[0m[94m fun[0m = @ps_[94mexample[0m[94m;[0m[94m A[0m[94m =[0m []; b[94m =[0m []; Aeq[94m =[0m []; beq[94m =[0m [];[94m lb[0m[94m =[0m []; ub[94m =[0m []; nonlcon[94m =[0m [];[94m [[0mx,fval,exitflag,output[94m,[0mpop[94mulation[0m[94m,[0msc[94mores[0m] = ga(fun[94m,[0m2[94m,[0mA[94m,[0mb[94m,[0mA[94meq[0m[94m,[0mbe[94mq[0m,lb,ub[94m,[0m[94mnon[0m[94ml[0m[94mcon[0m[94m,[0mInt[94mCon[0m);```[94m
[0m[94m```[0mOpt[94mim[0m[94mization[0m terminated[94m:[0m[94m average[0m[94m change[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m penalty[0m[94m fit[0m[94mness[0m[94m value[0m[94m less[0m[94m than[0m[94m options[0m[94m.[0m[94mFunction[0m[94mT[0m[94mol[0m[94mer[0m[94mance[0m[94m and[0m[94m constraint[0m viol[94mation[0m[94m is[0m[94m less[0m[94m than[0m[94m options[0m[94m.[0m[94mConstraint[0mT[94mol[0m[94mer[0m[94mance[0m[94m.[0m[94m ```[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mEx[0mamine the first [94m1[0m0 members[94m of[0m[94m the[0m final[94m population[0m[94m and[0m their[94m corresponding[0m scores[94m.[0m Notice[94m that[0m `x[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m)`[0m[94m is[0m integer[94m-[0m[94mvalu[0m[94med[0m[94m for[0m[94m all[0m[94m these[0m population members[94m.[0m[94m The[0m integer[94m `[0m[94mga[0m[94m`[0m[94m algorithm[0m[94m generates[0m[94m only[0m[94m integer[0m[94m-[0m[94mfe[0m[94mas[0mible populations[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94m`[0m[94mdis[0mp(pop[94mulation[0m(1:10[94m,[0m:))`
[94m```[0m -5[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m -[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m -5[94m.[0m[94m0[0m0[94m0[0m0 -[94m0[0m.[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m -[0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m [94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m4 -[94m6[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m0[94m0[0m[94m0[0m 0[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m[94m -[0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m -[94m0[0m.[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m -[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m [94m0[0m.[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m -[94m4[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m0[94m0[0m[94m0[0m -0[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m0[94m [0m0[94m.[0m[94m0[0m0[94m7[0m[94m2[0m[94m ce[0m[94mil[0m(...)

Signature:

public static double ce[94mil[0m[94m([0mdouble a[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mReturn[94ms[0m the "ce[94miling[0m[94m"[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m; that[94m is[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m least[94m integer[0m[94m greater[0m[94m than[0m[94m or[0m[94m equal[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m.[0m For[94m the[0m mathemat[94mically[0m incl[94mined[0m, returns[94m an[0m[94m integer[0m $[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m[94m $[0mx[94m \[0mge a[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m there[0m[94m exists[0m no[94m integer[0m[94m $[0m[94my[0m[94m$[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m[94m $[0mx >[94m y[0m \[94mge[0m[94m a[0m[94m$.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m example[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mMath.ceil[94m([0m[94m5[0m.[94m5[0m[94m)[0m returns [94m6[0m
[94mMath[0m[94m.[0m[94mceil[0m[94m([0m3)[94m returns[0m[94m [0m3[94m
[0m[94mMath[0m[94m.[0m[94mceil[0m(-[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m5[0m7[94m3[0m[94m)[0m[94m returns[0m[94m -[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m
#### floor(...)[94m
[0m
Sign[94mature[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mpublic static[94m double[0m floor[94m([0m[94mdouble[0m[94m a[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mReturn[0m[94ms[0m[94m the[0m[94m "[0m[94mfloor[0m[94m"[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m;[0m[94m that[0m[94m is[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m greatest[94m integer[0m[94m less[0m[94m than[0m[94m or[0m[94m equal[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m the[0m[94m mathemat[0m[94mically[0m[94m incl[0m[94mined[0m[94m,[0m[94m returns[0m[94m an[0m[94m integer[0m[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m \[0mle[94m a[0m[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m there[0m[94m exists[0m[94m no[0m[94m integer[0m[94m $[0m[94my[0m[94m$[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m[94m $[0m[94mx[0m <[94m y[0m[94m \[0m[94mle[0m[94m a[0m[94m$.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m example[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mMath[94m.[0m[94mfloor[0m[94m([0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m[94m5[0m[94m)[0m[94m returns[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m0[94m
[0m[94mMath[0m[94m.[0m[94mfloor[0m[94m([0m[94m3[0m[94m)[0m[94m returns[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m
[94mMath[0m[94m.[0m[94mfloor[0m[94m(-[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m5[0m[94m7[0m[94m3[0m[94m)[0m[94m returns[0m[94m -[0m3[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Tr[94mig[0monometric Functions[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### sin(...), cos(...[94m),[0m tan(...)[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSignatures[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
public static double[94m cos[0m[94m([0m[94mdouble[0m a[94m)[0m[94m
[0mpublic static double sin[94m([0m[94mdouble[0m[94m a[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0mpublic static double[94m tan[0m[94m([0mdouble[94m a[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mReturn[94ms[0m the cos[94mine[0m[94m/[0m[94ms[0mine/tang[94ment[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m. a[94m is[0m measured in[94m rad[0m[94mians[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### Deg[94mree[0m/[94mRad[0m[94mian[0m Con[94mversion[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSign[0m[94matures[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mpublic static double toD[94meg[0mrees[94m([0m[94mdouble[0m an[94mgrad[0m)[94m
[0m[94mpublic[0m static double toRad[94mians[0m[94m([0mdouble angdeg)[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mConvert between degrees and[94m rad[0m[94mians[0m.[94m to[0mD[94meg[0mrees accepts a radian measurement[94m and[0m returns[94m the[0m equivalent[94m degree[0m measurement; toRadians works the other[94m way[0m around.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Ex[94mponents[0m[94m,[0m Ro[94mots[0m[94m,[0m and Logarith[94mms[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m####[94m Ex[0mponentiation[94m
[0m
Signature[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mpublic static double pow[94m([0mdouble[94m a[0m, double b)
[94mpublic[0m static double exp([94mdouble[0m[94m a[0m)
[94m
[0m
pow[94m([0m[94mdouble[0m[94m,[0m double) returns a raised[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m power[0m[94m of[0m b[94m:[0m $a^b$.[94m
[0m
exp[94m([0m[94mdouble[0m) returns $e[94m$[0m raised[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m power[0m[94m of[0m a[94m:[0m[94m $[0m[94me[0m^[94ma[0m[94m$.[0m This[94m is[0m[94m equivalent[0m[94m to[0m the[94m call[0m Math[94m.[0m[94mpow[0m( many zeros does[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m00[94m![0m[94m ([0mie [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m ×[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m9[94m ×[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m8[94m ×[0m[94m ...[0m ×[94m [0m[94m1[0m) end with?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m [0m[94m1[0m7 December

[94mIn[0m[94m March[0m[94m,[0m I posted[94m the[0m puzz[94mle[0m One H[94mundred[0m[94m F[0m[94mactor[0m[94mial[0m,[94m which[0m asked[94m how[0m[94m many[0m zeros[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m![0m ends[94m with[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0mWhat[94m is[0m[94m the[0m smallest[94m number[0m[94m,[0m n[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m[94m n[0m[94m![0m ends[94m with[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0m zeros[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m One[0m[94m hundred[0m[94m factor[0m[94mial[0m

[94mHow[0m[94m many[0m[94m zeros[0m[94m does[0m $$[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m![0m[94m$$[0m[94m end[0m[94m with[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Archive[94m
[0m[94m
[0mShow[94m me[0m a random puzz[94mle[0m
▼ show ▼[94m[0m[94m[0m View[94m Single[0m[94m Post[0m[94m
[0m P[94m:[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m Actually, after[94m a[0m[94m few[0m[94m minutes[0m pondering[94m,[0m I'[94md[0m[94m like[0m[94m to[0m attempt an[94m answer[0m myself[94m,[0m based[94m on[0m[94m symmetry[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m L[0magr[94mang[0m[94mian[0m cannot depend[94m on[0m[94m individual[0m velocity components[94m ([0m[94mbut[0m it[94m can[0m[94m depend[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m overall magnitude[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m velocity[0m[94m)[0m[94m because[0m of[94m rot[0m[94mational[0m[94m symmetry[0m -[94m with[0m no external forces[94m acting[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m particle, how could[94m the[0m direction[94m of[0m it'[94ms[0m[94m velocity[0m[94m have[0m any[94m impact[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m physics[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m situation[94m?[0m[94m As[0m for[94m the[0m[94m position[0mal[94m coordinates[0m[94m,[0m I[94m pres[0m[94mume[0m these[94m can[0m'[94mt[0m[94m affect[0m[94m the[0m[94m L[0m[94magr[0m[94mang[0m[94mian[0m because[94m of[0m transl[94mational[0m[94m symmetry[0m[94m.[0m ([94mAg[0m[94main[0m[94m,[0m with no[94m external[0m[94m forces[0m[94m acting[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m particle[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m location[0m has[94m no[0m[94m bearing[0m[94m on[0m its energy[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m after[0m[94m all[0m is[94m what[0m the L[94magr[0m[94mang[0m[94mian[0m describes) Have I got[94m the[0m[94m right[0m idea here, or[94m am[0m[94m I[0m making[94m false[0m assumptions[94m?[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m # [94m1[0m[94m.[0m7[94m8[0m[94m:[0m[94m C[0m[94moh[0merent Superpositions[94m for[0m[94m the[0m Harm[94monic[0m Oscillator[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
[94mThe[0m quantum mechanical harm[94monic[0m oscill[94mator[0m eigenstates[94m are[0m station[94mary[0m states[94m and[0m[94m therefore[0m[94m cannot[0m be used[94m individually[0m to[94m represent[0m classical oscill[94matory[0m motion[94m.[0m[94m ([0mAtomic units are used in this tutorial[94m.)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0mPsi[94m([0m[94mv[0m[94m,[0m[94m x[0m[94m,[0m t[94m)[0m :=\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m}{\[94msqrt[0m[94m{[0m[94m2[0m^{[94mv[0m} \[94mcdot[0m[94m v[0m ! \cdot[94m \[0m[94msqrt[0m[94m{\[0mpi[94m}}}[0m[94m \[0m[94mcdot[0m[94m \[0m[94moperatorname[0m[94m{[0mHer}([94mv[0m[94m,[0m[94m x[0m)[94m \[0m[94mcdot[0m[94m \[0mexp \[94mleft[0m[94m(\[0m[94mfrac[0m{-x^{[94m2[0m[94m}}{[0m[94m2[0m}\[94mright[0m[94m)[0m \[94mcdot[0m[94m \[0mexp \[94mleft[0m[94m[-[0mi \cdot[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94mv[0m+\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0mright[94m)[0m[94m \[0m[94mcdot[0m t[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m][0m \nonumber$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m example[94m,[0m[94m suppose[0m[94m we[0m[94m choose[0m to[94m represent[0m[94m the[0m[94m ground[0m[94m v[0mibrational state of[94m a[0m homonuclear diatomic mole[94m as[0m[94m a[0m[94m simple[0m[94m harm[0m[94monic[0m[94m oscill[0m[94mator[0m[94m with[0m vibr[94mational[0m quantum number v =[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m see[0m[94m that[0m[94m probability[0m[94m distrib[0mutio $$[94m|\[0m[94mPsi[0m([94m0[0m[94mxp[0mansive mappings with[94m n[0monsummable errors[94m.[0m Zbl 07[94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94m8[0m959
Re[94mich[0m,[94m S[0mimeon;[94m Z[0maslav[94mski[0m[94m,[0m Alexander J.
[94m2[0m0[94m2[0m0[94m
[0m[94mOut[0mer approximation methods for[94m solving[0m vari[94mational[0m in[94mequal[0m[94mities[0m defined[94m over[0m[94m the[0m[94m solution[0m[94m set[0m of[94m a[0m split convex[94m feas[0mibility[94m problem[0m. Z[94mbl[0m 14[94m4[0m[94m6[0m.[94m4[0m[94m7[0m0[94m6[0m[94m2[0m
C[94meg[0mielski[94m,[0m Andrzej; Gibali[94m,[0m[94m Av[0m[94miv[0m; Reich[94m,[0m Sime[94mon[0m; Z[94mal[0m[94mas[0m[94m,[0m Rafał[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0mA fixed point result for[94m mean[0m[94m none[0mxpansive mappings[94m.[0m [94mZ[0m[94mbl[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m2[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m8[0m[94m8[0m[94m5[0m
Re[94mich[0m[94m,[0m[94m S[0m[94mime[0m[94mon[0m[94m;[0m[94m Z[0m[94mas[0m[94mlav[0m[94mski[0m[94m,[0m[94m Alexander[0m[94m J[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0mDescent[94m methods[0m with[94m computational[0m errors[94m in[0m Banach spaces[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94mZ[0m[94mbl[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m5[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m9[0m0[94m3[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m
[94mRe[0m[94mich[0m[94m,[0m[94m S[0m[94mime[0m[94mon[0m[94m;[0m[94m Z[0m[94mas[0m[94mlav[0m[94mski[0m[94m,[0m[94m Alexander[0m[94m J[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m[94mMe[0m[94mans[0m and convergence of semigroup[94m or[0m[94mbits[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94mZ[0m[94mbl[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m2[0m85[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m1[0m[94m
[0mGr[94mzes[0mik[94m,[0m Aleksandra[94m;[0m Kaczor[94m,[0m Wiesław[94ma[0m[94m;[0m[94m K[0muc[94mz[0m[94mum[0mow[94m,[0m[94m T[0madeusz[94m;[0m Reich[94m,[0m[94m S[0m[94mime[0mon[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m2[94m0[0m[94m

[0m[94mQu[0mote:[94m
[0m[94mOriginal[0m post by[94m Tim[0m[94mkin[0m[94m
[0m[94mQu[0m[94mote[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m If[94m I[0m[94m took[0m[94m half[0m[94m of[0m kernerl3[94m2[0m[94m.[0mdll and[94m mixed[0m[94m it[0m[94m with[0m[94m half[0m[94m of[0m netapi3[94m2[0m[94m.[0mdll[94m,[0m[94m I[0m'[94md[0m[94m get[0m a crashing computer[94m.[0m :)[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTh[0mats not[94m a[0m[94m valid[0m example[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m I[0m[94m took[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m dll[94ms[0m[94m each[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m same code[94m length[0m[94m and[0m[94m broke[0m them[94m up[0m[94m into[0m[94m n[0m segments of[94m code[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m jumbled those[94m segments[0m[94m to[0m[94m make[0m[94m m[0m 'randomised[94m'[0m dll[94ms[0m, I could[94m still[0m[94m recover[0m my[94m original[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m dll[94ms[0m[94m using[0m[94m c[0mros[94mso[0m[94mver[0m[94m alone[0m[94m.[0m I[94m could[0m do[94m it[0m faster[94m if[0m[94m I[0m[94m permitted[0m selection[94m and[0m[94m mut[0m[94mation[0m[94m as[0m[94m well[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mI[94m think[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m a[0m valid[94m example[0m[94m:[0m[94m Two[0m members[94m of[0m[94m a[0m population[94m at[0m opposite[94m ends[0m of[94m an[0m extreme;[94m granted[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m would[94m try[0m[94m to[0m prevent[94m this[0m[94m from[0m actually occ[94muring[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mPart[94m of[0m[94m the[0m requirement[94m for[0m Cross[94m-[0mover is divers[94mity[0m[94m,[0m yet[94m divers[0m[94mity[0m _can[94m_[0m be the[94m very[0m[94m thing[0m[94m that[0m keeps it[94m from[0m working[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m '[0m[94morth[0magonal[94m'[0m[94m parts[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m encoding[0m scheme[94m is[0m just[94m one[0m[94m way[0m[94m to[0m restricting[94m divers[0m[94mity[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m[94m you[0m[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m like[94m the[0m[94m word[0m[94m restrict[0m,[94m then[0m[94m we[0m[94m could[0m say[94m that[0m '[94mthe[0m orthangonal[94m encoding[0m[94m limits[0m[94m the[0m area[94m of[0m solution[94m space[0m[94m along[0m[94m an[0m axis'.[94m Do[0m you agree[94m with[0m[94m that[0m statement[94m?[0m
[94m
[0mQuote[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94mOriginal[0m[94m post[0m[94m by[0m[94m Tim[0m[94mkin[0m[94m
[0m[94mQu[0m[94mote[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m just[94m because[0m a pattern works well[94m in[0m one[94m member[0m, it[94m is[0m no g[94maur[0mante[94me[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m same pattern[94m will[0m work well[94m in[0m a different member[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mTrue. But[94m then[0m[94m that[0m is what selection is for.[94m Even[0m in nature[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m no[0m[94m guarantee[0m[94m that[0m an off[94mspring[0m[94m is[0m fit for its environment[94m.[0m[94m Selection[0m[94m pressure[0m ens[94mures[0m[94m that[0m[94m,[0m[94m on[0m[94m average[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m strong survive[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m no[0m[94m weak[0mlings surv[94mived[0m to produce[94m off[0m[94mspring[0m[94m,[0m then[94m the[0m population[94m would[0m[94m loose[0m[94m its[0m genetic divers[94mity[0m[94m and[0m[94m would[0m fail[94m if[0m[94m the[0m[94m optimal[0m solution[94m were[0m changed[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m a[0m[94m G[0mA[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m typically[0m change[94m the[0m optimal[94m solution[0m[94m,[0m so[94m we[0m[94m can[0m afford[94m to[0m[94m be[0m more brutal with regards[94m to[0m culling off weak[94mlings[0m via[94m strong[0m selection[94m pressure[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mI[0m[94m agree[0m[94m.[0m[94m I[0m dont think[94m there[0m[94m was[0m ever a disag[94mre[0m[94mement[0m[94m in[0m this regard. Your[94m last[0m sentence speak[94ms[0m[94m the[0m truth[94m.[0m :[94mD[0m
[94m

[0m[94mOriginal[0m[94m post[0m by[94m Tim[0m[94mkin[0m[94m

[0m Can you think[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m way[0m[94m where[0m[94m you[0m[94m could[0m[94m get[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m ([0m[94mor[0m similar[94m)[0m results[94m using[0m only mut[94mation[0m?[94m
[0m algorithm on it[94m tom[0morrow to see[94m if[0m[94m the[0m[94m computer[0m finds anything better[94m.[0m[94m --[0mLu[94mke[0m

[0m[94mI[0m[94m got[0m[94m a[0m result[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m3[0m bananas[94m.[0m[94m I[0m'[94mm[0m pretty[94m sure[0m[94m this[0m[94m is[0m optimal[94m tri[94mps[0m[94m to[0m move all of[94m them[0m[94m:[0m move a full load[94m,[0m go[94m back[0m[94m,[0m[94m move[0m another full[94m load[0m[94m,[0m[94m go[0m[94m back[0m[94m,[0m[94m move[0m the[94m rest[0m.[94m That[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m ban[94manas[0m[94m per[0m mile[94m,[0m[94m therefore[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m0 miles[94m consume[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m thousand[94m ban[0m[94manas[0m[94m.[0m It[94m doesn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m matter[0m if[94m this[0m[94m is[0m done[94m in[0m steps[94m of[0m one[94m mile[0m, one ban[94mana[0m[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m/[0m[94m5[0m mi[94m),[0m[94m or[0m[94m all[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m miles[0m at[94m [0m[94m3[0m3[94m3[0m miles[94m ([0mand one[94m third[0m[94m)[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m next[0m thousand[94m ban[0m[94manas[0m and is[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m3[0m[94m miles[0m with[94m [0m[94m1[0m 00[94m0[0m[94m ban[0m[94manas[0m[94m left[0m[94m.[0m The[94m rest[0m goes[94m with[0m[94m one[0m trip[94m [0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m far[0m[94mmer[0m is also[94m left[0m[94m with[0m[94m one[0m[94m hun[0m[94mgry[0m cam[94mel[0m[94m with[0m[94m no[0m food[94m for[0m[94m the[0m trip back home[94m.[0m If[94m he[0m would[94m also[0m[94m like[0m[94m to[0m get[94m the[0m[94m cam[0m[94mel[0m back home[94m,[0m[94m I[0m think[94m he[0m[94m'[0m[94md[0m[94m need[0m about[94m [0m[94m3[0m [94m6[0m67[94m ban[0m[94manas[0m[94m to[0m[94m start[0m[94m with[0m[94m ([0mleaving[94m nothing[0m[94m to[0m[94m sell[0m)[94m or[0m more[94m.[0m This[94m is[0m with leaving ban[94manas[0m along[94m the[0m way[94m for[0m[94m the[0m return[94m trip[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m is[94m obviously[0m che[94maper[0m[94m than[0m[94m going[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m [94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m miles straight[94m ([0mwhich[94m would[0m[94m take[0m[94m [0m7 6[94m7[0m3 ban[94manas[0m). --Nix[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWhat[0m are[94m you[0m all talking[94m about[0m[94m?[0m The puzz[94mle[0m says[94m that[0m the market[94m is[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m miles away[94m.[0m The cam[94mel[0m[94m can[0m carry[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m0[94m0[0m[94m ban[0m[94manas[0m[94m at[0m once[94m and[0m it[94m e[0m[94mats[0m one ban[94mana[0m for each[94m mile[0m it wal[94mks[0m. So[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m end[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m 10[94m0[0m0 miles[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m wouldn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m be a[94m single[0m[94m ban[0m[94mana[0m[94m left[0m[94m,[0m[94m because[0m[94m the[0m[94m cam[0m[94mel[0m would[94m have[0m[94m e[0m[94maten[0m them[94m all[0m[94m.[0m Therefore[94m the[0m[94m answer[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m0. --Brusko

[94mYou[0m[94m'[0m[94mre[0m depos[94miting[0m ban[94manas[0m out in the desert, Brusko.[94m Via[0m[94m N[0mix'[94ms[0m[94m solution[0m[94m,[0m which[94m I[0m agree is best, you[94m take[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m ban[94manas[0m out[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m0[94m miles[0m[94m,[0m drop off[94m [0m[94m6[0m00 of them, head
header[94m or[0m[94m vice[0m[94m vers[0m[94ma[0m). Perhaps[94m others[0m[94m have[0m some experience / examples that
indici[94mate[0m otherwise?[94m
[0m
[94many[0m[94mway[0m[94m,[0m[94m starting[0m[94m from[0m[94m a[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m be[94m able[0m[94m to[0m specify[94m that[0m[94m on[0m document-level[94m,[0m[94m
[0m[94mthat[0m[94m then[0m needs[94m to[0m[94m be[0m convey[94med[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m template[94m and[0m[94m without[0m[94m some[0m[94m explicit[0m flags[94m
[0m[94mthat[0m isn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m there[0m[94m.[0m[94m Unless[0m[94m you[0m[94m start[0m overloading[94m the[0m arguments[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m way[0m[94m that[0m[94m
[0m[94m\[0m[94mNo[0mValue[94m for[0m[94m a[0m[94m TO[0mC[94m title[0m means[94m use[0m[94m the[0m main title[94m for[0m TO[94mC[0m[94m while[0m[94m an[0m[94m empty[0m TO[94mC[0m[94m
[0mtitle mean do not[94m use[0m one, or something like[94m that[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m>[94m >[0m what else[94m is[0m[94m missing[0m[94m or[0m[94m which[0m of[94m the[0m[94m above[0m[94m aren[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m sensible in[94m the[0m[94m first[0m[94m place[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m>
[94m>[0m One[94m might[0m consider[94m making[0m[94m one[0m argument[94m a[0m[94m key[0mval dictionary[94m and[0m collect[94m
[0m>[94m many[0m of[94m the[0m above[94m in[0m that instead[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mthat[94m would[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m[94m document[0m level syntax[94m decision[0m[94m,[0m ie how to[94m write[0m[94m a[0m[94m heading[0m[94m
[0mcommand[94m in[0m your[94m document[0m[94m.[0m[94m That[0m[94m is[0m[94m and[0m should[94m be[0m transparent[94m to[0m[94m the[0m templates[94m
[0m[94mwhich[0m deal[94m with[0m presentation[94m.[0m[94m Tem[0mplates[94m are[0m deliber[94mately[0m simple[94m:[0m[94m they[0m[94m only[0m
[94mhave[0m[94m mad[0m[94matory[0m arguments[94m ([0m[94mof[0m[94m which[0m some[94m could[0m[94m receive[0m[94m \[0m[94mNo[0mValue[94m and[0m such[94m
[0mthings[94m).[0m
[94m
[0m>[94m This[0m[94m would[0m[94m provide[0m for[94m instances[0m[94m
[0m> behaving[94m as[0m[94m follows[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m>
[94m>[0m   [94m When[0m[94m need[0m[94ming[0m[94m a[0m title[94m for[0m the TO[94mC[0m:[94m
[0m[94m>[0m[94m
[0m[94m>[0m    [94m1[0m[94m.[0m If[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m key[0m "toctitle[94m",[0m[94m then[0m[94m use[0m[94m that[0m value[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m>[0m    [94m2[0m[94m.[0m Otherwise[94m,[0m if[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m key "shorttitle[94m",[0m then[94m use[0m that value[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m>[0m    3[94m.[0m Otherwise[94m,[0m[94m use[0m[94m the[0m[94m full[0m title[94m.[0m[94m
[0m>[94m
[0m>   [94m When[0m[94m need[0m[94ming[0m[94m a[0m title[94m for[0m[94m the[0m running head:[94m
[0m[94m>[0m
[94m>[0m    [94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m key "headtitle",[94m then[0m[94m use[0m[94m that[0m[94m value[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m>[0m    [94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m Otherwise[0m[94m,[0m[94m if[0m[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m key "shorttitle[94m",[0m[94m then[0m[94m use[0m[94m that[0m[94m value[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m>[0m    [94m3[0m[94m.[0m[94m Otherwise[0m[94m,[0m[94m use[0m[94m the[0m[94m full[0m title[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mthat[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m kind[0m[94m of[0m semantics that is defined by an object type (aka template
type[94m)[0m only[94m that[0m it oper[94mates[0m[94m on[0m[94m a[0m[94m bunch[0m[94m of[0m mandatory[94m arguments[0m[94m and[0m \[94mNo[0mValue
ind[94mic[0mating that something is not[94m there[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mbut[94m it[0m[94m doesn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m tell[94m the[0m template when to[94m go[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m[94m TO[0m[94mC[0m[94m or[0m[94m generate[0m[94m a[0m running[94m
[0mheader[94m.[0m[94m For[0m that[94m I[0m think there[94m are[0m[94m only[0m[94m two[0m[94m possibilities[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m- either only do this[94m implicitly[0m[94m,[0m ie[94m TO[0m[94mC[0m entries[94m are[0m[94m always[0m produced[94m by[0m[94m some[0m[94m
[0mlogic in[94m the[0m[94m background[0m based[94m on[0m[94m heading[0m level and[94m the[0m[94m like[0m,[94m but[0m[94m without[0m[94m
[0muser intervention[94m from[0m[94m the[0m document[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m-[0m[94m some[0m support for user intervention through some flag[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mfor compon[94mendo[0m[94m divid[0m[94mendo[0m[94m method[0m[94m if[0m some[94m is[0m[94m un[0m[94mfamil[0m[94miar[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mwe[0m[94m have[0m if[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94ma[0m[94m}{[0m[94mb[0m[94m}[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mc[0m[94m }{[0m[94md[0m[94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mthen[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94ma[0m[94m+[0mb[94m}{[0ma[94m-[0m[94mb[0m[94m}[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mc[0m[94m +[0m[94md[0m }{[94mc[0m[94m-[0m[94m d[0m[94m}$[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m[94mRes[0mearch Papers[94m

[0m## Abstract

[94mThe[0m performance[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m mechan[0m[94mically[0m[94m re[0mcharge[94mable[0m[94m al[0m[94mumin[0m[94mum[0m[94m ([0mAl[94m)[0m–air cell[94m,[0m fabricated[94m with[0m[94m low[0m[94m-[0m[94mcost[0m[94m materials[0m including[94m low[0m[94m-[0mgrade[94m al[0m[94mumin[0m[94mum[0m fo[94mil[0m[94m and[0m carbon paper electrodes[94m,[0m was[94m evaluated[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m design[0m adopted a free[94m gravity[0m flow[94m for[0m[94m the[0m electrolyte[94m to[0m eliminate[94m the[0m use[94m of[0m an external pump[94m.[0m A tank[94m for[0m storing[94m waste[0m electrolyte was[94m designed[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m dedicated channel[94m for[0m[94m the[0m collection[94m of[0m[94m hydro[0m[94mgen[0m gas generated during[94m the[0m cell dis[94mcharge[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m cell achieved[94m a[0m[94m high[0m[94m util[0m[94mization[0m[94m efficiency[0m[94m of[0m[94m al[0m[94mumin[0m[94mum[0m[94m.[0m[94m Consider[0m[94ming[0m[94m both[0m[94m the[0m[94m electric[0m[94mity[0m[94m and[0m hydrogen[94m generated[0m[94m,[0m an[94m overall[0m utilization efficiency[94m of[0m[94m around[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m%[0m[94m or[0m even[94m higher[0m could[94m be[0m[94m achieved[0m under[94m different[0m modern drama[94m has[0m[94m over[0mturn[94med[0m[94m the[0m[94m st[0male[94m Sh[0makesperian paradigm that re[94migned[0m[94m un[0mquestion[94med[0m for centuries.”[94m Now[0m[94m imagine[0m[94m that[0m this[94m person[0m[94m has[0m never read[94m a[0m single play by Shakespeare or anyone[94m else[0m[94m.[0m That[94m should[0m give you some idea[94m of[0m[94m how[0m[94m a[0m physicist[94m ([0mor computer[94m scient[0m[94mist[0m!) feels[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m presence[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m Dan[94mcing[0m Wu Li Master[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0m. Greg[94m K[0muperberg[94m S[0m[94mays[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAct[0m[94mually[0m[94m,[0m I disag[94mree[0m[94m with[0m Scott[94m:[0m I[94m don[0m’[94mt[0m[94m think[0m[94m that[0m[94m our[0m[94m difference[0m[94m in[0m[94m taste[0m in[94m quantum[0m[94m theory[0m[94m is[0m[94m significant[0m[94m.[0m[94m But[0m[94m there[0m[94m may[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m[94m difference[0m[94m in[0m motiv[94mation[0m[94m,[0m[94m even[0m when[94m we[0m like the[94m exact[0m same[94m questions[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m my[94m case[0m[94m,[0m “why[94m”[0m[94m or[0m[94m “[0m[94mwh[0mether[94m”[0m[94m quantum[0m mechan[94mics[0m[94m is[0m true[94m does[0m nothing to motiv[94mate[0m[94m me[0m[94m.[0m Or more[94m precisely[0m[94m,[0m quantum[94m information[0m theory[94m.[0m[94m Quant[0mum[94m information[0m theory[94m is[0m[94m true[0m,[94m there[0m[94m doesn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m need[94m to[0m[94m be[0m a reason[94m why[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m no[0m one[94m has[0m[94m thought[0m of[94m any[0m[94m log[0mically consistent modification[94m.[0m My[94m instinct[0m[94m is[0m not[94m to[0m wonder[94m whether[0m[94m such[0m[94m a[0m modification[94m exists[0m.[94m C[0m[94mertain[0m[94mly[0m some[94m things[0m that[94m we[0m believe will[94m have[0m to[94m be[0m[94m modified[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m it[0m is wish[94mful[0m thinking to[94m expect[0m[94m a[0m modification of[94m any[0m[94m specific[0m surprising truth[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m quantum[0m[94m information[0m[94m theory[0m[94m did[0m need[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m modified[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m would[0m[94m probably[0m[94m be[0m[94m replaced[0m[94m by[0m something even[94m harder[0m[94m to[0m[94m believe[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mBut[94m still[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m del[0m[94micious[0m[94m to[0m[94m map[0m[94m out[0m[94m the[0m[94m logical[0m[94m world[0m[94m of[0m[94m quantum[0m[94m information[0m[94m theory[0m[94m,[0m[94m exactly[0m[94m as[0m[94m I[0m[94m would[0m[94m if[0m[94m I[0m[94m did[0m care[94m about[0m “why[94m”[0m[94m and[0m “[94mwh[0m[94mether[0m”. My[94m mot[0m[94mivi[0mation[94m is[0m[94m to[0m[94m keep[0m[94m repair[0m[94ming[0m my intu[94mition[0m so[94m that[0m quantum[94m information[0m[94m theory[0m[94m becomes[0m as[94m un[0msur[94mpr[0mising[94m as[0m[94m possible[0m.[94m Every[0m[94mone[0m lik[94mes[0m[94m to[0m philosoph[94mize[0m[94m about[0m counter[94mint[0m[94muit[0mive things;[94m it[0m[94m is[0m del[94micious[0m[94m to[0m rescue[94m a[0m[94m topic[0m from[94m that[0m mor[94mib[0mund state.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m5[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m Kent[0m[94m By[0me S[94mays[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mG[0m[94mreg[0m says[94m:[0m[94m I[0m[94m just[0m don[94m’[0m[94mt[0m see[94m how[0m[94m I[0m[94m could[0m place[94m any[0m trust whatsoever[94m in[0m[94m a[0m system of[94m medicine[0m[94m without[0m[94m properties[0m[94m ([0m[94ma[0m[94m)[0m[94m [[0mthe scientific method] and[94m ([0m[94mb[0m[94m)[0m [legal accountability].[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIn[94m a[0m lot[94m of[0m ways[94m,[0m[94m the[0m search[94m for[0m[94m trust[0mworth[94my[0m information[94m and[0m[94m account[0mability on[94m the[0m Internet[94m provides[0m some[94m ins[0m[94mights[0m[94m to[0m these two issues[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFirst[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m emer[0mging economic concept[94m of[0m “[94mThe[0m Long T[94mail[0m,” which basically[94m means[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m Internet[94m has[0m made[94m n[0miche mark[94mets[0m viable[94m business[0m vent[94mures[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m explos[94mion[0m[94m of[0m products and[94m information[0m[94m to[0m chose[94m from[0m.[94m
[0m
[94mThere[0m[94m are[0m no more[94m local[0m[94mized[0m limits of “shelf space[94m”[0m with Internet stores[94m like[0m[94m Amazon[0m[94m,[0m[94m e[0mBay[94m and[0m iTunes[94m —[0m[94m which[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94m

[0m[94mI[0m[94m studied[0m math education at[94m Jackson[0m[94mville[0m[94m University[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m University[94m of[0m[94m Florida[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m became[0m[94m clear[0m[94m to[0m[94m me[0m during my[94m studies[0m why we’[94mre[0m[94m failing[0m[94m at[0m teaching[94m k[0m[94mids[0m[94m math[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m'[94mre[0m teaching[94m it[0m[94m all[0m[94m wrong[0m[94m![0m[94m Bill[0m[94m N[0m[94mye[0m[94m taught[0m[94m k[0m[94mids[0m[94m that[0m science is[94m F[0mUN.[94m He[0m[94m showed[0m them[94m the[0m[94m EX[0m[94mPL[0mOSIONS[94m first[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m the[0m[94m k[0m[94mids[0m[94m went[0m[94m to[0m school to learn[94m WH[0m[94mY[0m things expl[94moded[0m[94m.[0m[94m K[0mids[94m learn[0m about[94m din[0mosa[94murs[0m[94m and[0m amoeb[94ma[0m and weird ocean life[94m to[0m make them[94m go[0m “[94mw[0mow[94m”.[0m But[94m what[0m[94m about[0m[94m math[0m[94m?[0m[94m You[0m[94m probably[0m[94m remember[0m[94m the[0m dread[94med[0m worksheets[94m.[0m[94m U[0mgh[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mI’[94mm[0m[94m sure[0m you know math[94m is[0m[94m much[0m[94m more[0m exciting[94m than[0m[94m people[0m think.[94m F[0mractal Ge[94mometry[0m[94m was[0m used[94m to[0m create “Star[94m Wars[0m[94m”[0m backdro[94mps[0m[94m,[0m binary code was invent[94med[0m[94m in[0m Africa[94m,[0m[94m The[0m Great Py[94mram[0mids[94m and[0m[94m The[0m Mona Lisa[94m,[0m[94m wouldn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m exist without geometry[94m.[0m[94m

[0m[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m[94m you[0m[94m could[0m[94m consider[0m posting about[94m the[0m project[94m on[0m your blog[94m,[0m[94m I[0m’[94md[0m very[94m much[0m appreciate it[94m.[0m[94m Also[0m[94m,[0m[94m if[0m[94m you[0m'[94md[0m be[94m interested[0m[94m in[0m[94m link[0m exch[94manging[0m ([94me[0mither on[94m The[0m[94m Number[0m[94m Hunter[0m site,[94m which[0m[94m is[0m in development[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m on[0m[94m Statistics[0m[94mHow[0mTo.[94mcom[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m well[0m[94m-[0m[94mest[0m[94mab[0mlished[94m site[0m[94m with[0m [94m3[0m[94m0[0m0[94m,[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m page[94m views[0m of the[94m result[0m[94m vector[0m[94m would[0m[94m be[0m much[94m smaller[0m[94m than[0m[94m the[0m observed samples vector[94m,[0m[94m the[0m transform matrix wouldn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m be a[94m square[0m[94m full[0m-rank[94m base[0m transform[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m a[0m[94m matrix[0m[94m that[0m[94m would[0m[94m have[0m $N[94m$[0m rows[94m,[0m[94m but[0m fewer[94m columns[0m[94m.[0m

[0m[94mThe[0m[94m point[0m here[94m is[0m[94m that[0m most[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m values[0m[94m in[0m $\[94mmathbf[0m T[94m$[0m[94m would[0m[94m be[0m pretty[94m small[0m --[94m setting[0m those[94m to[0m[94m zero[0m[94m will[0m in[94mcur[0m[94m an[0m error[94m,[0m[94m that[0m "feels[94m"[0m[94m like[0m noise[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m given[0m[94m a[0m non[94mzero[0m[94m upper[0m[94m limit[0m[94m for[0m allow[94mable[0m[94m dist[0m[94mort[0m[94mion[0m[94m,[0m you[94m can[0m find[94m a[0m[94m sparse[0m matrix[94m that[0m[94m still[0m can[94m allow[0m[94m for[0m[94m reliable[0m[94m conclus[0m[94mions[0m about $\[94mmathbf[0m Y[94m$.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• My[94m belief[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m compressive sensing[94m is[0m[94m a[0m bit out[94m of[0m topic here[94m.[0m We are in[94m a[0m case[94m where[0m[94m data[0m[94m is[0m acquired[94m without[0m[94m sampling[0m[94m consideration[0m[94m.[0m[94m So[0m it[94m is[0m "to[94mo[0m late[94m".[0m[94m –[0m [94mLa[0murent Du[94mval[0m Sep[94m [0m[94m1[0m2 '[94m1[0m5 at[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m:[0m[94m0[0m5[94m

[0mA[94m*[0mx
 (5[94m,[0m [94m1[0m5[94m,[0m[94m [0m0[94m,[0m 1[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m10[94m,[0m[94m [0m20,[94m [0m30) (5, 15[94m,[0m[94m [0m0[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m0[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m10, 20[94m,[0m[94m [0m30[94m)[0m[94m

 =0[94m.[0m05[94m$.[0m Deg[94mrees[0m of freedom $df=[94mk[0m[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m=[0m4[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m =[0m[94m3[0m[94m$.[0m

[0m[94mThe[0m critical[94m value[0m[94m of[0m[94m $\[0mchi^[94m2[0m[94m$[0m for[94m $[0mdf[94m=[0m[94m3[0m[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $\[0malpha=0.05[94m$[0m level of significance[94m is[0m[94m $\[0mchi[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m =[0m7[94m.[0m[94m8[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m7[0m[94m$.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##### Step[94m [0m5[94m Test[0m Statistic[94m
[0m
The[94m expected[0m[94m frequencies[0m can[94m be[0m[94m calculated[0m[94m as[0m

[0m $$\begin[94m{[0mequation*}[94m E[0m[94m_{[0m[94mi[0m[94m}[0m[94m =[0mN*[94mp[0m[94m_[0m[94mi[0m \end[94m{[0m[94mequation[0m*[94m}$$[0m[94m

[0m $$\[94mbegin[0m[94m{[0meqnarray*}[94m E[0m[94m_{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}[0m &[94m =[0m &[94mN[0m[94m*[0m[94mp[0m[94m_[0m[94m1[0m[94m\\[0m &=&[94m [0m[94m1[0m6[94m0[0m*[94m0[0m[94m.[0m1[94m8[0m[94m\\[0m[94m &=[0m[94m&[0m2[94m8[0m[94m.[0m[94m8[0m.[94m \[0m[94mend[0m[94m{[0m[94meqnarray[0m*[94m}$$[0m[94m

[0mUnder [94m2[0m6 [94m6[0m6 0[94m.[0m[94m1[0m8[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m[94m8[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m8[0m.[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m

[0m[94m
[0m####[94m#[0m[94m Step[0m[94m [0m6 Dec[94mision[0m ([94mTr[0m[94mad[0m[94mitional[0m[94m approach[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m test[0m[94m stat[0m[94mistic[0m[94m is[0m[94m $\[0m[94mchi[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m =[0m75[94m.[0m1[94m0[0m1$[94m which[0m[94m falls[0m $[94minside[0m$[94m the[0m[94m critical[0m region[94m bounded[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m critical[0m value[94m $[0m[94m7[0m[94m.[0m[94m8[0m[94m1[0m47[94m$,[0m[94m we[0m[94m $\[0mtextit{re[94mject[0m}$[94m the[0m[94m null[0m[94m hypothesis[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mOR[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#####[94m Step[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m Dec[94mision[0m[94m ($[0mp$-value approach[94m)[0m[94m

[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m<[0m[94mbr[0m />un[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m[94m:[0m[94m [0m12[94m1[0m[94m2[0m4","date[94m:[0m[94m [0m2[94m0[0m12[94m-[0m11-01<[94mbr[0m />un[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m: 12[94m0[0m[94m0[0m5","date[94m:[0m 2[94m0[0m12-12-01<[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m:[94m [0m12[94m2[0m98","date[94m:[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m13[94m-[0m01-01[94m<[0m[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m: [94m1[0m24[94m7[0m[94m1[0m","date[94m:[0m 2[94m0[0m13[94m-[0m02-01[94m<[0m[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m:[94m [0m1[94m1[0m9[94m5[0m[94m0[0m","date[94m:[0m [94m2[0m013[94m-[0m03-01<[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m:[94m [0m[94m1[0m16[94m8[0m[94m9[0m","date[94m:[0m 2[94m0[0m[94m1[0m3-04-01<[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m: 117[94m6[0m0","[94mdate[0m[94m:[0m 2[94m0[0m[94m1[0m3-05-0[94m1[0m<[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m:[94m [0m116[94m5[0m[94m4[0m","date[94m:[0m [94m2[0m013[94m-[0m06[94m-[0m0[94m1[0m<[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m:[94m [0m11[94m7[0m[94m5[0m[94m1[0m","date[94m:[0m [94m2[0m013[94m-[0m07-01<[94mbr[0m />[94mun[0m[94memp[0m[94mloy[0m:[94m [0m[94m1[0m1) are covered[94m in[0m membranes that[94m are[0m fairly permeable[94m to[0m water and[94m to[0m small molecules such[94m as[0m am[94mmon[0mia[94m.[0m So water can diffuse[94m in[0m[94m either[0m direction[94m as[0m[94m required[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m am[94mmon[0m[94mia[0m[94m can[0m diff[94muse[0m out[94m as[0m[94m quickly[0m[94m as[0m it[94m forms[0m[94m.[0m Nothing special here.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0mverte[94mbr[0mates[94m that[0m live[94m in[0m[94m fresh[0m[94m water[0m[94m do[0m have[94m problem[0m[94m:[0m the salt concentr[94mations[0m within[94m their[0m[94m bodies[0m[94m are[0m[94m around[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m%,[0m much greater[94m than[0m[94m in[0m[94m fresh[0m[94m water[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m this reason they[94m have[0m evol[94mved[0m[94m surrounding[0m memb[94mran[0m[94mes[0m[94m that[0m[94m are[0m largely imperme[94mable[0m to sal[94mts[0m ([94mto[0m prevent their[94m diffusion[0m[94m out[0m of[94m the[0m[94m body[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m to[0m water[94m ([0m[94mto[0m[94m prevent[0m osm[94motic[0m flow[94m in[0m.) But these[94m organ[0m[94misms[0m[94m must[0m[94m also[0m[94m be[0m[94m able[0m[94m to[0m exchange[94m o[0m[94mxygen[0m[94m and[0m carbon dio[94mx[0mide[94m with[0m their[94m environment[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m special[0m resp[94mir[0matory organs[94m ([0mgills[94m)[0m[94m that[0m medi[94mate[0m this[94m process[0m[94m,[0m[94m as[0m[94m a[0m consequence of[94m being[0m per[94mme[0m[94mable[0m[94m to[0m these two gases[94m,[0m[94m will[0m also[94m allow[0m water mole[94mcules[0m[94m ([0m[94mwh[0m[94mose[0m[94m sizes[0m[94m are[0m compar[94mable[0m[94m to[0m[94m those[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m resp[94mir[0matory gases[94m)[0m[94m to[0m[94m pass[0m[94m through[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m protect[94m fresh[0m-[94mwater[0m inverte[94mbr[0m[94mates[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m dis[0mastr[94mous[0m[94m effects[0m[94m of[0m unlimited[94m water[0m[94m in[0mflow through[94m the[0m[94m g[0m[94mill[0m memb[94mran[0m[94mes[0m[94m,[0m[94m these[0m[94m animals[0m possess special excretory org[94mans[0m[94m that[0m expel excess[94m water[0m back[94m into[0m[94m the[0m environment[94m.[0m[94m Thus[0m in[94m such[0m animals[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m constant[0m flow[94m of[0m[94m water[0m[94m passing[0m[94m through[0m[94m the[0m[94m body[0m[94m.[0m[94m Am[0m[94mmon[0m[94mia[0m[94m and[0m other subst[94mances[0m[94m that[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m excreted are taken[94m up[0m[94m by[0m[94m this[0m[94m stream[0m[94m which[0m[94m constit[0m[94mutes[0m[94m a[0m contin[94mual[0m[94m flow[0m[94m of[0m dilute urine.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFishes[94m fall[0m[94m into[0m[94m two[0m general classes[94m:[0m most[94m fish[0m have bony ske[94mlet[0mons[94m and[0m are known as teleosts[94m.[0m[94m Sh[0marks[94m and[0m ray[94ms[0m[94m have[0m cartilage instead[94m of[0m[94m b[0mones[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m are[0m[94m called[0m elasmobranch[94ms[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m the[0m[94m tele[0m[94most[0m[94ms[0m[94m that[0m live[94m in[0m[94m fresh[0m[94m water[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m situation[94m is[0m[94m very[0m[94m much[0m the[94m same[0m[94m as[0m[94m with[0m[94m fresh[0m[94m-[0m[94mwater[0m inverte[94mbr[0mates;[94m they[0m[94m take[0m[94m in[0m[94m and[0m excrete water continu[94mously[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m fact[0m[94m that[0m[94m an[0m[94m animal[0m lives[94m in[0m the[94m water[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m mean[94m that[0m[94m it[0m enjo[94mys[0m[94m an[0m un[94mlimited[0m[94m supply[0m[94m of[0m[94m water[0m[94m.[0m Marine tele[94most[0m[94ms[0m have[94m a[0m[94m more[0m[94m difficult[0m problem.[94m Their[0m g[94mills[0m[94m are[0m[94m per[0m[94mme[0m[94mable[0m[94m to[0m[94m water[0m[94m,[0m[94m as[0m are those[94m of[0m marine inverte[94mbr[0mates[94m.[0m[94m But[0m[94m the[0m salt content[94m of[0m se[94maw[0m[94mater[0m[94m ([0mabout[94m [0m3[94m%[0m[94m),[0m[94m being[0m higher[94m than[0m[94m the[0m[94m about[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m%[0m[94m in[0m the[94m fish[0m’[94ms[0m[94m blood[0m[94m,[0m[94m would[0m draw water out[94m of[0m[94m the[0m fish[94m.[0m[94m Thus[0m[94m these[0m[94m animals[0m[94m are[0m constantly[94m losing[0m[94m water[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m would[94m be[0m li[94mable[0m[94m to[0m desiccation if[94m water[0m[94m could[0m freely[94m pass[0m out[94m of[0m[94m their[0m Cont[94ments[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#[94m Hand[0m[94mling[0m[94m con[0mg[94mestion[0m[94m in[0m crowd[94m motion[0m modeling[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m We[0m address here[94m the[0m issue[94m of[0m con[94mg[0m[94mestion[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m model[94ming[0m[94m of[0m[94m crowd[0m[94m motion[0m[94m,[0m in[94m the[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0msm[94mooth[0m framework[94m:[0m contacts[94m between[0m[94m people[0m[94m are[0m[94m not[0m[94m anticip[0m[94mated[0m[94m and[0m avoided[94m,[0m they[94m actually[0m[94m occur[0m,[94m and[0m[94m they[0m[94m are[0m explicitly taken[94m into[0m[94m account[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m model[0m[94m.[0m We limit[94m our[0m[94m approach[0m[94m to[0m[94m very[0m basic[94m principles[0m[94m in[0m terms[94m of[0m[94m behavior[0m[94m,[0m[94m to[0m[94m focus[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m particular[94m problems[0m raised[94m by[0m[94m the[0m non[94m-[0m[94msm[0m[94mooth[0m character[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m models[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m consider[0m[94m that[0m[94m individuals[0m tend[94m to[0m move[94m according[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m desired[0m[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m sp[0mont[94maneous[0m[94m,[0m[94m velocity[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m account[0m[94m for[0m con[94mg[0m[94mestion[0m[94m by[0m assuming[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m evolution[0m[94m real[0m[94mizes[0m[94m at[0m[94m each[0m time[94m an[0m instantaneous balance[94m between[0m[94m individual[0m[94m t[0mendencies and[94m global[0m constraints ([94mover[0m[94mla[0m[94mpping[0m is forb[94midden[0m):[94m the[0m[94m actual[0m[94m velocity[0m[94m is[0m defined[94m as[0m[94m the[0m closest[94m to[0m[94m the[0m desired[94m velocity[0m[94m among[0m[94m all[0m adm[94miss[0m[94mible[0m ones[94m,[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m least square sense[94m.[0m We develop[94m those[0m[94m principles[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m microscop[94mic[0m[94m and[0m macro[94mscop[0m[94mic[0m settings[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m we[0m present how[94m the[0m[94m framework[0m[94m of[0m Wasser[94mstein[0m distance[94m between[0m measures allows to[94m recover[0m[94m the[0m[94m swe[0meping[94m process[0m nature[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m problem[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m macroscop[94mic[0m[94m level[0m,[94m which[0m[94m makes[0m[94m it[0m possible[94m to[0m[94m obtain[0m existence results[94m in[0m spite[94m of[0m[94m the[0m non[94m-[0m[94msm[0m[94mooth[0m character[94m of[0m[94m the[0m evolution[94m process[0m[94m.[0m Micro[94m and[0m macro[94m approaches[0m[94m are[0m compared,[94m and[0m[94m we[0m[94m investigate[0m[94m the[0m[94m similar[0m[94mities[0m[94m together[0m with[94m deep[0m differences of[94m those[0m two[94m levels[0m of description[94m.[0m[94m

just[0m[94m average[0m[94m the[0m[94m x[0m[94m -[0mvalues[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m y[0m[94m -[0m[94mvalues[0m[94m.[0m Linear disp[94mlacement[0m[94m is[0m how far an[94m given indirectly[94m as[0m disp[94mlacement[0m dL[94m from[0m[94m the[0m formula below:[94m [0mε[94m =[0m[94m d[0m[94mL[0m[94m/[0m[94mL[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m formula[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m cyl[0m[94minder[0m:[94m V[0m[94m =[0m h r 2[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m variables[0m[94m in[0m[94m m[0mtcars[94m are[0m[94m as[0m follows[94m:[0m[94m [[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m][94m m[0mpg[94m Mil[0mes[94m/([0mUS[94m)[0m gallon[94m.[0m Each DISPLACE value[94m is[0m[94m computed[0m[94m as[0m[94m though[0m all other[94m parameter[0m estimates[94m are[0m exact[94m.[0m[94m The[0m most commonly[94m used[0m[94m supp[0mository base is[94m C[0moca Butter[94m or[0m[94m The[0mobrom[94ma[0m[94m oil[0m[94m.[0m[94m Calcul[0mate Force Calculate[94m Spring[0m Constant Calcul[94mate[0m[94m Dist[0mance[94m from[0m Equilib[94mrium[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m degrees C[94m.[0m The significance[94m of[0m[94m this[0m[94m in[0made[94mqu[0m[94mate[0m[94m so[0m-called law[94m is[0m[94m that[0m it[94m provides[0m[94m an[0m asymptotic[94m condition[0m which[94m other[0m proposed formulas[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m Plan[0m[94mck[0m'[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m satisfy[94m.[0m Step[94m [0m4[94m:[0m[94m Now[0m substitute[94m the[0m displacement[94m from[0m[94m Ste[0m[94mps[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m into[0m[94m the[0m compatibility[94m equation[0m[94m.[0m[94m Re[0mpeat this set of[94m data[0m lines[94m as[0m often as necessary[94m to[0m[94m define[0m[94m the[0m[94m force[0m[94m per[0m unit length[94m as[0m a function[94m of[0m relative disp[94mlacement[0m[94m,[0m[94m temperature[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m other[0m[94m pre[0mdefined field variables[94m.[0m Rel[94mation[0m[94m between[0m momentum[94m and[0m[94m Up[0m[94m:[0m[94m M[0momentum Previous: Definition[94m of[0m Moment[94mum[0m[94m.[0m The[94m differential[0m of disp[94mlacement[0m[94m formula[0m[94m will[0m[94m give[0m us[94m the[0m instantaneous velocity v[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m notation of[94m the[0m[94m velocity[0m formula[94m,[0m[94m V[0m[94m([0m[94mav[0m[94mg[0m[94m)[0m is[94m the[0m[94m object[0m’s average[94m velocity[0m while[94m [0mΔx[94m is[0m[94m the[0m amount[94m of[0m[94m change[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m object[0m’[94ms[0m[94m position[0m[94m,[0m referred[94m to[0m as disp[94mlacement[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m3[94m equation[0m[94m c[0mash flows shown in the table are[94m paid[0m all at once at the[94m given[0m point in time.
[94m
[0mWhat[94m is[0m[94m the[0m Profitability Index[94m ([0m[94mPI[0m[94m)[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m project[94m?[0m[94m
[0m
[94m Project[0m Cash Flows[94m Time[0m[94m ([0myrs[94m)[0m Cash flow ($) [94m0[0m -1[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m [94m0[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m1[0m[94m A[0m project[94m has[0m[94m an[0m internal rate[94m of[0m return (IRR[94m)[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m[94m greater[0m[94m than[0m[94m its[0m[94m required[0m[94m return[0m. Select[94m the[0m most correct statement[94m.[0m A[94m project[0m[94m has[0m the following c[94mash[0m[94m flows[0m[94m:[0m  Project[94m C[0m[94mash[0m[94m Flow[0m[94ms[0m[94m Time[0m[94m ([0m[94my[0m[94mrs[0m[94m)[0m[94m C[0m[94mash[0m[94m flow[0m[94m ($[0m[94m)[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m -[0m[94m4[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m5[94m0[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWhat[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m Prof[0m[94mit[0m[94mability[0m[94m Index[0m[94m ([0m[94mPI[0m[94m)[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m project[0m[94m?[0m Assume[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m c[0m[94mash[0m[94m flows[0m shown[94m in[0m[94m the[0m table[94m are[0m paid all at once at[94m the[0m given point in time[94m.[0m[94m The[0m required[94m return[0m[94m is[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m% pa, given[94m as[0m an effective annual[94m rate[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0m project'[94ms[0m Prof[94mit[0m[94mability[0m[94m Index[0m[94m ([0m[94mPI[0m[94m)[0m is less[94m than[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m. Select[94m the[0m[94m most[0m[94m correct[0m[94m statement[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mQuestion[0m [94m2[0m1[94m8[0m  NPV, IR[94mR[0m[94m,[0m profitability[94m index[0m, average account[94ming[0m return[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWh[94mich[0m of[94m the[0m[94m following[0m statements[94m is[0m NOT[94m correct[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mA[94m project[0m[94m has[0m[94m the[0m following[94m c[0m[94mash[0m[94m flows[0m[94m:[0m
[94m
[0m Project[94m C[0m[94mash[0m[94m Flow[0m[94ms[0m[94m Time[0m[94m ([0m[94my[0m[94mrs[0m[94m)[0m[94m C[0m[94mash[0m flow[94m (\[0m$)[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m -[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m [94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m2 [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m
[94m
[0mThe[94m required[0m[94m return[0m[94m of[0m a[94m project[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m%,[94m given[0m as[94m an[0m[94m effective[0m[94m annual[0m[94m rate[0m[94m.[0m Assume that[94m the[0m[94m c[0m[94mash[0m[94m flows[0m[94m shown[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m table[0m[94m are[0m[94m paid[0m[94m all[0m[94m at[0m[94m once[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m given[0m[94m point[0m[94m in[0m[94m time[0m[94m.[0m[94m
