p[0m[94mst[0m_mono[94m_[0m[94mto[0m[94m_[0m[94mstring[0m[94m([0m[94mm[0mono[94m,[0mLa[94mTeX[0m[94m=[0m[94mFalse[0m[94m,[0m[94mp[0m[94m=[0m[94m2[0m[94m):[0m[94m r[0m""[94m"[0m String representation[94m of[0m element[94m of[0m a $P[94m^[0m[94ms[0m[94m_[0mt$-bas[94mis[0m. This[94m is[0m[94m used[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m _[0m[94mre[0m[94mpr[0m[94m_[0m[94m and[0m[94m _[0m[94mlatex[0m[94m_[0m methods[94m.[0m INPUT[94m:[0m[94m mon[0m[94mo[0m[94m --[0m[94m tuple[0m[94m of[0m[94m pairs[0m[94m of[0m integers[94m ([0ms[94m,[0m[94mt[0m[94m)[0m[94m with[0m $[94ms[0m Higgs boson also generates the mass of a second[94m-[0mgeneration fermion[94m.[0m With[94m the[0m[94m full[0m H[94mL[0m-LHC[94m dataset[0m[94m,[0m corresponding[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m fb–1[94m for[0m[94m each[0m[94m of[0m ATLAS and CMS,[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m expected[0m[94m that[0m di-Higgs production[94m will[0m[94m be[0m established with[94m a[0m significance[94m of[0m[94m four[0m standard[94m devi[0m[94mations[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m will[94m allow[0m[94m a[0m determ[94mination[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m H[0miggs[94m-[0mboson’[94ms[0m coupling to itself[94m with[0m[94m a[0m precision[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0m%.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAbout[94m a[0m quarter[94m of[0m[94m a[0m million[94m H[0mig[94mgs[0m bos[94mons[0m[94m could[0m[94m be[0m[94m produced[0m per inverse[94m at[0mtobarn[94m of[0m[94m data[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m L[94mHC[0m[94m has[0m also made enorm[94mous[0m[94m progress[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m direct searches[94m for[0m new particles[94m at[0m[94m high[0m[94m energ[0m[94mies[0m[94m.[0m[94m With[0m[94m more[0m than[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m papers[94m published[0m[94m on[0m[94m this[0m topic[94m,[0m[94m hunting[0m down[94m particles[0m predicted[94m by[0m[94m do[0m[94mz[0m[94mens[0m[94m of[0m theoretical ideas[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m no[0m firm sign[94m of[0m[94m a[0m new particle anywhere[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m clear[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m new[0m physics[94m is[0m either[94m heav[0m[94mier[0m,[94m or[0m[94m more[0m[94m weak[0m[94mly[0m couple[94md[0m or[94m has[0m other features[94m that[0m[94m h[0m[94mides[0m[94m it[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m L[0m[94mHC[0m data[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m L[0m[94mHC[0m[94m is[0m[94m also[0m[94m a[0m precision[94m machine[0m[94m for[0m electroweak physics[94m,[0m[94m having[0m measured[94m the[0m W[94m-[0mbos[94mon[0m mass[94m and[0m[94m the[0m top[94m-[0mquark mass[94m with[0m un[94mcert[0m[94maint[0m[94mies[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m%[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m3[0m%,[94m respectively[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m addition[94m,[0m[94m a[0m large[94m number[0m[94m of[0m[94m relevant[0m[94m cross[0m[94m-[0msection measurements[94m of[0m multi[94m-[0mboson production[94m have[0m[94m been[0m[94m made[0m[94m,[0m[94m prob[0ming[94m the[0m trilinear and quart[94mic[0m interactions[94m of[0m the gauge bos[94mons[0m[94m with[0m each[94m other[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mHig[94mgs[0m[94m-[0mfactory impact

[94mIn[0m[94m terms[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m measurement[0m precision on[94m the[0m[94m H[0m[94mig[0mgs[94m-[0m[94mbos[0m[94mon[0m cou[94mpl[0mings[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m proposed[0m H[94mig[0m[94mgs[0m factories[94m are[0m[94m expected[0m[94m to[0m[94m bring[0m[94m a[0m major[94m improvement[0m[94m with[0m[94m respect[0m[94m to[0m[94m H[0mL[94m-[0m[94mL[0m[94mHC[0m in[94m most[0m[94m cases[0m[94m ([0msee “Relative precision[94m”[0m[94m figure[0m[94m).[0m[94m Only[0m for[94m the[0m rare decays[94m to[0m muons[94m,[0m photons[94m and[0m Z[94mγ[0m[94m,[0m and for[94m the[0m[94m very[0m[94m massive[0m top qu[94mark[0m,[94m is[0m[94m this[0m not the[94m case[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m highest[0m[94m precision[0m[94m ([0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m%[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m case[94m of[0m[94m F[0mCC-ee[94m)[0m[94m is[0m[94m achieved[0m[94m on[0m[94m [0mκ[94mZ[0m since[94m the[0m main[94m H[0m[94mig[0m[94mgs[0m production mode[94m,[0m ZH[94m,[0m depends directly[94m on[0m it[94m,[0m[94m regardless[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m decay mode[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m other[0m Standard Model particles[94m,[0m[94m improvement[0m factors of[94m two[0m to[94m four[0m are typical[94m.[0m For[94m the[0m invisible[94m and[0m[94m un[0mtagged dec[94mays[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m constraints[0m[94m are[0m improved[94m to[0m[94m around[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m%[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m%,[0m[94m respectively[0m[94m,[0m[94m for[0m some[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m H[0m[94mig[0m[94mgs[0m fact[94mories[0m[94m.[0m[94m A[0m[94m new[0m[94m measurement[0m[94m,[0m[94m not[0m possible at[94m the[0m[94m L[0m[94mHC[0m,[94m is[0m[94m that[0m of the charm–qu[94mark[0m[94m $[0m[94ma[0m\otimes[94m b[0m\circ[94m\[0m[94mDelta[0m$. As[94m $[0m[94mab[0m$[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m element[0m[94m of[0m[94m $[0mH^*[94m$,[0m[94m to[0m[94m compute[0m it[94m explicit[0mely it[94m is[0m enough[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m its[0m values on[94m the[0m elements[94m of[0m[94m our[0m basis[94m of[0m[94m $[0m[94mH[0m[94m$.[0m[94m If[0m[94m $[0mi[94m\[0min\{0,\dots[94m,[0mn[94m-\[0m[94m}$[0m we[94m have[0m[94m $$[0m[94m([0mab[94m)([0m[94mg[0m[94m^[0m[94mi[0m[94m))[0m[94m=([0m[94ma[0m[94m\[0m[94motimes[0m[94m b[0m[94m)[0m[94m(\[0m[94mDelta[0m([94mg[0m[94m^[0m[94mi[0m[94m))[0m[94m=([0m[94ma[0m[94m\[0m[94motimes[0m[94m b[0m[94m)([0m[94mg[0m[94m^[0m[94mi[0m\otimes[94m g[0m[94m^[0m[94mi[0m[94m)=[0ma[94m([0m[94mg[0m[94m^[0m[94mi[0m[94m)[0mb[94m([0m[94mg[0m[94m^[0m[94mi[0m).[94m$$[0m Using[94m this[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m find[0m immediately that if[94m $[0m[94mi[0m,[94mj[0m[94m\[0m[94min[0m[94m\{[0m[94m0[0m[94m,\[0m[94mdots[0m[94m,[0m[94mn[0m-[94m1[0m[94m\}$[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m[94m $$[0mv_iv[94m_[0mj[94m=\[0mdelta[94m_{[0m[94mi[0m,[94mj[0m[94m}[0m[94mv[0m[94m_[0m[94mi[0m.$$[94m This[0m[94m de[0m[94mcri[0m[94mbes[0m[94m the[0m algebra structure on[94m $[0m[94mH[0m^*[94m$.[0m[94m Can[0m you[94m find[0m[94m its[0m comult[94mp[0m[94mlication[0m[94m?[0m
[94m
[0m•[94m I[0m[94m was[0m computing[94m the[0m multiplication right now[94m and[0m I got[94m that[0m $[94ma[0m[94m \[0m[94motimes[0m[94m b[0m[94m \[0m[94mcirc[0m[94m \[0m[94mDelta[0m$[94m is[0m[94m the[0m multiplication[94m.[0m[94m Now[0m[94m I[0m am computing[94m the[0m com[94mult[0m[94mip[0m[94mlication[0m.[94m Is[0m[94m it[0m[94m enough[0m[94m to[0m show[94m that[0m if[94m the[0m com[94mult[0m[94mip[0m[94mlication[0m and[94m multiplication[0m[94m are[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m then[0m[94m the[0m Hopf algebra[94m are[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m?[0m[94m Or[0m am[94m I[0m[94m to[0m compute also inverse[94m,[0m coinverse[94m,[0m unit[94m and[0m counit[94m?[0m[94m –[0m [94mA[0mle[94m Sep[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m8 '[94m1[0m[94m7[0m at[94m [0m[94m5[0m:[94m3[0m[94m0[0m
•[94m Also[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m really don[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m get[0m[94m what[0m[94m what[0m[94m I[0m can[94m infer[0m[94m from[0m what[94m you[0m wrote[94m,[0m[94m the[0m multiplication[94m in[0m $\mu[94m_[0mn[94m$[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m[94m satisfy[0m[94m $[0m[94me[0m_ie[94m_[0mj=\delta[94m_{[0m[94mi[0m[94m,[0m[94mj[0m}[94me[0m[94m_[0mi[94m$[0m[94m if[0m[94m I[0m am[94m not[0m mistaken[94m.[0m It should[94m just[0m be:[94m $[0m[94mm[0m(X[94m^[0m[94mi[0m[94m \[0motimes X[94m_[0m[94mj[0m)=[94mX[0m^{[94mi[0m+[94mj[0m[94m}$.[0m – [94mA[0m[94mle[0m Sep[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m8[0m '[94m1[0m7[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m:[0m[94m5[0m1
[94m•[0m Well[94m,[0m[94m my[0m[94m computation[0m is[94m correct[0m[94m.[0m Jo[94mppy[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m an[0m[94msw[0mre[94m,[0m which is exactly[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m as[0m mine[94m,[0m[94m gets[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m multiplication[94m.[0m – Mariano Suárez-Álvarez Sep[94m [0m[94m2[0m8 '[94m1[0m[94m7[0m at[94m [0m[94m1[0m4:[94m4[0m[94m6[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m is[0m[94mWell[0mDefined([94mNormal[0m[94mT[0m[94mor[0m[94mic[0mVariety[94m)[0m -- whether a toric variety[94m is[0m well[94m-[0m[94mdefined[0m
[94m
[0mSynopsis

• Function: isWellDefined[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Usage:[94m
[0misWell[94mDef[0m[94mined[0m X[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Input[94ms[0m:[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m X[0m[94m,[0m[94m ,[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Output[94ms[0m[94m:[0m
[94m•[0m[94m ,[0m that is true if[94m the[0m[94m lists[0m[94m of[0m ray[94ms[0m and maximal con[94mes[0m associated[94m to[0m[94m X[0m determine a strongly convex[94m rational[0m poly[94mhed[0m[94mral[0m fan[94m
[0m
Description on the characteristics[94m of[0m[94m the[0m particles[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m volume[0m fraction[94m,[0m mean diameter[94m,[0m mass density[94m,[0m or[94m car[0mrier phase[94m flow[0m properties[94m.[0m In[94m this[0m brief review[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m main[0m physical[94m concepts[0m related[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m most[0m[94m important[0m[94m physical[0m[94m aspects[0m[94m of[0m tur[94mbul[0mence mod[94mulation[0m[94m are[0m summar[94mized[0m[94m.[0m Different criteria used[94m to[0m[94m distinguish[0m[94m the[0m enhancement[94m or[0m the[94m at[0m[94mten[0m[94mu[0m[94mation[0m effects[94m of[0m the particles on the[94m car[0mrier[94m phase[0m flows[94m are[0m[94m re[0mcalled[94m.[0m[94m For[0m the[94m interest[0m[94m of[0m[94m large[0m-[94mscale[0m industrial[94m applications[0m[94m,[0m several theoretical,[94m experimental[0m and[94m empir[0m[94mical[0m[94m approaches[0m[94m are[0m discussed[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m provides[0m[94m an[0m[94m interesting[0m[94m framework[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m study[0m[94m of[0m the effect[94m of[0m particles[94m on[0m[94m tur[0m[94mbul[0m[94mence[0m[94m behavior[0m modification[94m.[0m[94m
[0m20[94m2[0m0[94m,[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m(4): [94m2[0m[94m4[0m9[94m -[0m25[94m2[0m[94m.[0m   doi[94m:[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m.[94m1[0m016/j.[94mt[0maml[94m.[0m2[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m.0[94m1[0m.[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m9[0m

[0mAbstract[94m:[0m[94m
[0mA[94m data[0m[94m driven[0m computational[94m model[0m[94m that[0m[94m accounts[0m[94m for[0m more than[94m two[0m material states has[94m been[0m[94m presented[0m[94m in[0m this work[94m.[0m Presented model can account[94m for[0m multiple state[94m variables[0m[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m str[0m[94messes[0m[94m,[0m[94m stra[0m[94mins[0m[94m,[0m[94m stra[0min[94m rates[0m and[94m failure[0m stress[94m,[0m[94m as[0m compared[94m to[0m previously[94m reported[0m[94m models[0m[94m with[0m[94m two[0m[94m states[0m[94m.[0m Model[94m is[0m used[94m to[0m[94m perform[0m de[94mformation[0m and failure simulations of carbon nanot[94mub[0mes[94m and[0m[94m carbon[0m nanotube/epox[94my[0m nanocomposites[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m model[0m cap[94mability[0m[94m of[0m capt[94muring[0m[94m the[0m[94m stra[0m[94min[0m[94m rate[0m dependent de[94mformation[0m and failure[94m has[0m[94m been[0m demonstrated[94m through[0m predictions[94m against[0m uniaxial test data taken[94m from[0m literature[94m.[0m[94m The[0m predicted[94m results[0m[94m show[0m[94m a[0m good agreement[94m between[0m[94m data[0m set[94m taken[0m[94m from[0m literature[94m and[0m simulations[94m.[0m[94m
[0m2[94m0[0m[94m2[0m0[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m([0m[94m4[0m[94m):[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m53[94m -[0m[94m2[0m6[94m1[0m[94m.[0m   doi[94m:[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m1[94m6[0m[94m/[0m[94mj[0m[94m.[0m[94mt[0maml[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m3[94m2[0m[94m

[0mAbstract[94m:[0m[94m
[0mIm[94mplement[0m[94ming[0m resonators[94m with[0m geomet[94mrical[0m non[94mlinear[0mities[94m in[0m v[94mibr[0mational[94m energy[0m harvesting systems[94m leads[0m[94m to[0m considerable enhancement of their oper[94mational[0m band[94mwidth[0m[94ms[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m advantage[0m[94m of[0m non[94mlinear[0m devices[94m in[0m[94m comparison[0m[94m to[0m[94m their[0m[94m linear[0m counter[94mparts[0m[94m is[0m[94m much[0m[94m more[0m[94m obvious[0m especially[94m at[0m[94m small[0m[94m-[0m[94mscale[0m where[94m transition[0m[94m to[0m non[94mlinear[0m regime[94m of[0m vibration[94m occurs[0m at[94m moder[0m[94mately[0m[94m small[0m amplit[94mudes[0m of[94m the[0m base excitation[94m.[0m In this paper[94m the[0m[94m non[0m[94mlinear[0m[94m behavior[0m[94m of[0m a[94m disc[0m-[94m##[0m[94m if[0m[94m we[0m[94m integrate[0m probability ##[94m|\[0mPsi[94m|^[0m[94m2[0m## over some volume[94m and[0m[94m equ[0m[94mate[0m[94m it[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m".[94m Hence[0m:[94m $\[0mint[94m\[0mlimits_{V[94m}[0m |\[94mPsi[0m[94m|^[0m[94m2[0m[94m \,[0m \textrm[94m{[0md[94m}[0m[94mV[0m=[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m$[0m[94m Now[0m how exactly[94m do[0m[94m we[0m integrate this? Please be specific, because[94m in[0m[94m the[0m post i linked to i got[94m an[0m anwser that[94m the[0m result[94m of[0m[94m integration[0m[94m is[0m $\int[94m\[0m[94mlimits[0m[94m_{[0m[94mV[0m[94m}[0m[94m |\[0m[94mPsi[0m[94m|^[0m[94m2[0m[94m \,[0m[94m \[0m[94mtextrm[0m[94m{[0m[94md[0m[94m}[0m[94mV[0m[94m =[0m [0m[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m >[94m
[0m[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m[94m That[0m last line[94m may[0m[94m wrap[0m in[94m your[0m email[94m...[0m [94m g[0m[94mim[0m[94mme[0m[94m=[0m should[94m be[0m
[94m>[0m[94m followed[0m[94m by[0m
[94m>[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94m>[0m >[94m >[0m[94m >[0m lines.[94m [0m[94m The[0m file'[94ms[0m contents look OK[94m,[0m[94m so[0m I[94m look[0m[94m up[0m where[94m St[0m[94md[0mDIS.hs[94m is[0m[94m
[0m[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m located[94m
[0m[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m under my[94m Green[0m Card directory,[94m stuff[0m[94m that[0m onto[94m G[0mHC'[94ms[0m command[94m
[0m[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m line,[94m and[0m try
[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m > to[94m wh[0mip out an executable[94m of[0m some sort[94m ([0musing[94m the[0m[94m static[0m flag
[94m>[0m[94m >[0m >[94m because[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m
[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m > necessary[94m under[0m[94m this[0m version[94m of[0m GHC[94m for[0m[94m Win[0m32). [94m Okay[0m[94m,[0m[94m so[0m[94m here[0m comes[94m
[0m[94m>[0m the
[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m > part where I[94m bl[0m[94mame[0m it on[94m G[0mHC instead[94m of[0m[94m Green[0m Card:[94m
[0m[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m
[94m>[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m[94m >[0m I run:[94m
[0m[94m>[0m[94m >[0m as of 02:[94m2[0m8[94m,[0m 2[94m7[0m May [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m7 (view source)[94mR[0mocky (Talk | contribs) (→[94mReturn[0m[94m-[0mto[94m-[0mis[94mot[0mropy models[94m)[0m← Older edit[94m Re[0mvision as of 0[94m1[0m[94m:[0m4[94m3[0m,[94m [0m2[94m4[0m February[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m9[0m ([94mview[0m source[94m)[0m (Change[94m p[0m[94m into[0m[94m p[0m' in[94m the[0m[94m transport[0m[94m and[0m pressure strain terms[94m)[0mNe[94mwer[0m edit → Line[94m [0m[94m1[0m2[94m:[0m Line[94m [0m[94m1[0m2[94m:[0m[94m
[0m$[94m[[0m[94mite[0m[94mx[0m[94m][0m[94m -[0m \[94mfrac[0m{\partial[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m t[94m}\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m(\[0mrho[94m \[0m[94moverline[0m[94m{[0m[94mu[0m'_[94miu[0m'_ju'_k[94m}[0m[94m +[0m[94m \[0moverline[94m{[0mp[94m\[0mleft[94m(\[0mdelta_{[94mk[0mj[94m}[0m[94mu[0m'_[94mi[0m[94m +[0m[94m \[0m[94mdelta[0m[94m_{[0mik[94m}[0m[94mu[0m'_[94mj[0m\[94mright[0m)}\[94mright[0m]$[94m +[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m t[94m}\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m(\[0m[94mrho[0m[94m \[0m[94moverline[0m[94m{[0m[94mu[0m'_[94miu[0m[94m'_[0m[94mj[0m[94m}\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m +[94m \[0m[94moverline[0m[94m{[0m[94mu[0m[94m'_[0miu'_[94mj[0m[94m}\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m -[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m x[0m[94m_[0m[94mk[0m[94m}\[0m[94mleft[0m[\[94mrho[0m[94m \[0m[94moverline[0m[94m{[0m[94mu[0m'_[94miu[0m'_ju'_[94mk[0m[94m}[0m[94m +[0m[94m \[0m[94moverline[0m[94m{[0mp[94m'\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m(\[0m[94mdelta[0m[94m_{[0m[94mk[0m[94mj[0m}[94mu[0m'_[94mi[0m[94m +[0m[94m \[0m[94mdelta[0m[94m_{[0mik[94m}[0m[94mu[0m'_[94mj[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m)}\[94mright[0m][94m [[0m/ite[94mx[0m[94m][0m Line[94m [0m22: Line[94m [0m22:[94m $[[0mite[94mx[0m[94m][0m[94m -[0m + \overline{p[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m(\[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m u[0m'_[94mi[0m[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m x[94m_[0m[94mj[0m} +[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m u[0m'_j[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m x[94m_[0m[94mi[0m}\[94mright[0m)}[94m -[0m[94m [0m2[94m\[0mmu\overline[94m{\[0mfrac{\[94mpartial[0m[94m u[0m'_[94mi[0m[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m x[0m_[94mk[0m[94m}[0m \frac[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m u[0m'_j[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m x[0m[94m_[0m[94mk[0m}}[94m +[0m +[94m \[0moverline[94m{[0m[94mp[0m'\[94mleft[0m[94m(\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m [94m2[0m[94m\[0m[94mmu[0m\[94moverline[0m[94m{\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m u[0m'_i[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m x[0m_k[94m}[0m[94m \[0mfrac[94m{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m u[0m'_[94mj[0m[94m}{\[0m[94mpartial[0m[94m x[0m_[94mk[0m}}$[94m [[0m/ite[94mx[0m[94m][0m[94m
[0m
## Introduction

The Reynold'[94ms[0m stress model[94m ([0m[94mRS[0mM[94m)[0m[94m is[0m a[94m higher[0m level, elaborate tur[94mbul[0mence[94m assumed[0m[94m that[0m I could do everything I need with[94m pay[0mments,[94m but[0m[94m I[0m[94m actually[0m needed[94m both[0m invoices and[94m pay[0m[94mments[0m[94m.[0m The[94m other[0m[94m had[0m[94m to[0m do[94m with[0m a lack[94m of[0m familiar[94mity[0m of[94m how[0m[94m the[0m database[94m was[0m organized[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m fact[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m bet[94m that[0m I spent at[94m least[0m[94m one[0m week[94m of[0m[94m this[0m past month just expl[94moring[0m[94m the[0m[94m database[0m[94m.[0m I[94m would[0m[94m perform[0m mini experiments—[94mif[0m[94m I[0m saw $[94mx[0m[94m$[0m in[94m the[0m[94m user[0m[94m interface[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m made a[94m guess[0m[94m where[0m[94m I[0m[94m could[0m find[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94m in[0m Access[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m I[0m was correct[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m would[0m move[94m on[0m.[94m If[0m[94m not[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m would[0m[94m make[0m another[94m guess[0m[94m.[0m I also spent[94m at[0m[94m least[0m[94m one[0m[94m week[0m[94m expl[0m[94moring[0m and testing the[94m two[0m other[94m main[0m databases[94m.[0m[94m Thus[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m spent[0m about[94m one[0m month[94m ([0mout[94m of[0m my[94m four[0m months on[94m the[0m job[94m)[0m just[94m expl[0m[94moring[0m[94m and[0m getting[94m to[0m know[94m where[0m (and[94m how[0m[94m)[0m the[94m data[0m lives[94m.[0m I[94m don[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m know[0m if I could[94m have[0m[94m done[0m[94m this[0m[94m more[0m[94m quickly[0m[94m,[0m and[94m I[0m[94m don[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m know[0m[94m if[0m[94m it[0m[94m would[0m[94m have[0m[94m been[0m des[94mirable[0m[94m to[0m do[94m so[0m—I[94m am[0m confident[94m that[0m[94m this[0m will[94m be[0m useful knowledge[94m for[0m my other s[94mabb[0matical projects[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSo[0m[94m my[0m[94m recommendation[0m for[94m a[0m[94m Data[0m Science[94m major[0m[94m is[0m this[94m:[0m students[94m should[0m be exposed[94m to[0m[94m increasing[0m[94m mess[0m[94my[0m[94m databases[0m.[94m In[0m[94m this[0m first couple[94m of[0m courses[94m,[0m it probably makes[94m sense[0m for[94m them[0m[94m to[0m exclus[94mively[0m work[94m with[0m databases that[94m are[0m well[94m-[0m[94mdes[0m[94migned[0m[94m and[0m contain[94m exactly[0m[94m the[0m data[94m they[0m[94m need[0m (likely in just[94m one[0m or two[94m different[0m sources[94m).[0m[94m By[0m the[94m end[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m program[94m,[0m students[94m should[0m gain experience working[94m with[0m[94m more[0m[94m complex[0m[94m and[0m mess[94my[0m[94m databases[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mI[94m didn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m know[94m this[0m,[94m so[0m perhaps[94m it[0m[94m is[0m worth saying.[94m In[0m many (most?) companies[94m,[0m databases seem[94m to[0m grow[94m according[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m principles[0m[94m of[0m evolution[94m,[0m[94m rather[0m[94m than[0m[94m the[0m principles[94m of[0m intellig[94ment[0m design ([94mthe[0m latter of[94m which[0m[94m would[0m[94m require[0m[94m a[0m lot of[94m time[0m and[94m money[0m[94m).[0m[94m So[0m data[94m is[0m[94m often[0m[94m in[0m multiple places[94m,[0m[94m and[0m there[94m are[0m[94m often[0m places[94m that[0m seem[94m like[0m they should[94m have[0m data—[94mbut[0m don[94m’[0m[94mt[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAs[94m such[0m[94m,[0m[94m here[0m are some[94m qual[0m[94mities[0m[94m of[0m[94m databases[0m I think sen[94miors[0m[94m should[0m work[94m with[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m•[94m There[0m should[94m be[0m[94m many[0m irrelevant tables[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Within most[94m tables[0m[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m should[0m[94m be[0m[94m many[0m columns[94m of[0m irrelevant data[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Within most[94m tables[0m[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m should[0m[94m be[0m[94m many[0m columns[94m without[0m[94m any[0m[94m data[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m For[0m some[94m data[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m required data[94m should[0m[94m be[0m[94m stored[0m[94m in[0m[94m multiple[0m[94m tables[0m[94m ([0mideally with[94m different[0m formats).[94m
[0m[94m•[0m The naming convent[94mions[0m[94m for[0m tables and columns[94m should[0m[94m not[0m[94m be[0m terribly clear[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m When[0m[94m using[0m[94m these[0m databases[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m should[0m[94m not[0m[94m be[0m explicit instructions[94m on[0m[94m what[0m data[94m they[0m need[94m.[0m They[94m should[0m[94m be[0m[94m given[0m[94m a[0m[94m outcome[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m expectationitted. Training error[94m [0m0[94m.[0m[94m0[0m0[94m means[0m the classifier has[94m m[0mim[94micked[0m[94m the[0m training data patterns to an[94m extent[0m[94m,[0m that[94m they[0m are[94m not[0m available[94m in[0m[94m the[0m unseen[94m data[0m[94m.[0m[94m Hence[0m[94m,[0m when this[94m class[0mifier[94m was[0m run on[94m an[0m[94m un[0mseen sample[94m,[0m it[94m couldn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m find[0m[94m those[0m[94m patterns[0m and returned predictions with higher error[94m.[0m[94m In[0m a random forest,[94m it[0m happens when we use[94m a[0m larger number[94m of[0m trees[94m than[0m necessary[94m.[0m[94m Hence[0m[94m,[0m[94m to[0m avoid this[94m situation[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m should[0m tune[94m the[0m number[94m of[0m[94m trees[0m using cross[94m-[0mvalidation[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m What[0m[94m is[0m a convex hull?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m the[0m[94m case[0m[94m of[0m linear[94mly[0m separ[94mable[0m data[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m convex[0m[94m h[0m[94mull[0m[94m represents[0m[94m the[0m outer boundaries[94m of[0m[94m the[0m two[94m groups[0m[94m of[0m[94m data[0m[94m points[0m[94m.[0m Once[94m the[0m convex[94m h[0m[94mull[0m[94m is[0m created[94m,[0m we get maximum margin hyperplane[94m ([0m[94mMM[0m[94mH[0m[94m)[0m as[94m a[0m perpend[94micular[0m[94m bis[0m[94mector[0m between two convex h[94mull[0m[94ms[0m[94m.[0m MM[94mH[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m line which[94m attempts[0m[94m to[0m create[94m the[0m greatest separation[94m between[0m[94m two[0m[94m groups[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## What do[94m you[0m understand by Type I vs[94m Type[0m[94m II[0m error[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mType[0m[94m I[0m[94m error[0m[94m is[0m committed[94m when[0m[94m the[0m null[94m hypothesis[0m[94m is[0m[94m true[0m[94m and[0m[94m we[0m reject it[94m,[0m[94m also[0m[94m known[0m[94m as[0m[94m a[0m ‘[94mFalse[0m Pos[94mitive[0m[94m’[0m.[94m Type[0m[94m II[0m[94m error[0m[94m is[0m[94m committed[0m[94m when[0m[94m the[0m[94m null[0m[94m hypothesis[0m[94m is[0m[94m false[0m[94m and[0m[94m we[0m accept[94m it[0m[94m,[0m[94m also[0m[94m known[0m[94m as[0m ‘[94mFalse[0m[94m Neg[0m[94mative[0m[94m’[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0mIn[94m the[0m context[94m of[0m the confusion matrix[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m can[0m[94m say[0m[94m Type[0m[94m I[0m[94m error[0m occurs[94m when[0m[94m we[0m class[94mify[0m[94m a[0m[94m value[0m[94m as[0m positive[94m ([0m1[94m)[0m when[94m it[0m[94m is[0m actually[94m negative[0m[94m ([0m[94m0[0m). Type[94m II[0m[94m error[0m[94m occurs[0m[94m when[0m[94m we[0m[94m class[0m[94mify[0m[94m a[0m[94m value[0m[94m as[0m[94m negative[0m[94m ([0m[94m0[0m[94m)[0m[94m when[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m actually[0m[94m positive[0m([94m1[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m In[0m k-[94mme[0m[94mans[0m[94m or[0m[94m k[0mNN[94m,[0m[94m we[0m use euclidean distance[94m to[0m[94m calculate[0m[94m the[0m distance[94m between[0m nearest neighb[94mors[0m[94m.[0m Why[94m not[0m manhattan distance[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWe[94m don[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m use[0m manh[94mattan[0m[94m distance[0m[94m because[0m[94m it[0m calcul[94mates[0m distance[94m hor[0m[94mizont[0m[94mally[0m[94m or[0m[94m vert[0m[94mically[0m only[94m.[0m It has[94m dimension[0m restrictions[94m.[0m On[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m hand[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m e[94muclidean[0m metric[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m used[0m in any[94m space[0m[94m to[0m[94m calculate[0m distance[94m.[0m[94m Since[0m[94m the[0m data[94m points[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m present in any[94m dimension[0m[94m,[0m e[94muclidean[0m[94m distance[0m[94m is[0m a[94m more[0m[94m vi[0m[94mable[0m option[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mExample[0m[94m:[0m Think of[94m a[0m chess[94mboard[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m movement made[94m by[0m a bishop[94m or[0m a rook is[94m calculated[0m[94m by[0m[94m man[0mhattan distance because of their[94m respective[0m vertical &[94m horizontal[0m[94m movements[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Do[94m you[0m suggest[94m that[0m[94m tre[0mating[94m a[0m categor[94mical[0m variable as[94m a[0m continuous[94m variable[0m[94m would[0m[94m result[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m better predictive model[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mFor[94m better[0m predictions[94m,[0m the categor[94mical[0m[94m variable[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m considered[0m[94m as[0m[94m a[0m continuous[94m variable[0m only[94m when[0m[94m the[0m variable[94m is[0m[94m ord[0minal in nature[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m##[94m O[0mLS[94m is[0m aware[94m doesn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m turn[0m off access[94m to[0m[94m com[0m[94mic[0m stri[94mps[0m[94m after[0m[94m a[0m[94m couple[0m[94m of[0m weeks[94m.[0m So I[94m don[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m quite[0m[94m feel[0m justified[94m including[0m[94m the[0m images[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m com[0mics when[94m you[0m[94m can[0m just click[94m links[0m[94m to[0m them instead[94m.[0m[94m

So this[94m is[0m negative[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m And[94m then[0m negative[94m [0m[94m1[0m times negative[94m [0m1[94m8[0m[94mi[0m-- well,[94m that[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m just going[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m positive[0m [94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94mi[0m[94m.[0m Neg[94mative[0m[94m times[0m a[94m negative[0m[94m is[0m a[94m positive[0m. And now[94m we[0m[94m want[0m[94m to[0m[94m add[0m[94m the[0m real parts[94m,[0m and[94m we[0m want[94m to[0m[94m add[0m[94m the[0m[94m imag[0m[94minary[0m[94m parts[0m[94m.[0m So here'[94ms[0m[94m a[0m[94m real[0m[94m part[0m here[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m And[0m then we[94m have[0m[94m a[0m minus[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m[94m So[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m [94m2[0m[94m minus[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m And[94m we[0m want to add[94m the[0m imag[94minary[0m[94m parts[0m.[94m We[0m[94m have[0m a[94m negative[0m.[94m Let[0m me[94m do[0m that in a[94m different[0m color[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m have[0m a[94m negative[0m 3[94mi[0m right[94m over[0m here[94m.[0m So negative[94m [0m3[94mi[0m,[94m or[0m minus[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mi[0m right[94m over[0m[94m there[0m[94m.[0m And[94m then[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m a plus[94m [0m1[94m8[0m[94mi[0m or positive[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94m If[0m you[94m add[0m[94m the[0m[94m real[0m[94m parts[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m minus[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m is[0m[94m negative[0m [94m4[0m[94m.[0m And[94m you[0m add[94m the[0m[94m imag[0m[94minary[0m[94m parts[0m. If I[94m have[0m[94m negative[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m of[0m[94m something[0m[94m and[0m[94m to[0m[94m that[0m I[94m add[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m of something, well, that[94m'[0m[94ms[0m just[94m going[0m[94m to[0m leave me[94m with[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m5 of[94m that[0m[94m something[0m[94m.[0m Or[94m another[0m[94m way[0m you[94m could[0m think[94m about[0m[94m it[0m[94m,[0m[94m if[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m of[94m something[0m[94m and[0m I subtract [94m3[0m[94m of[0m[94m that[0m[94m something[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m'[0m[94mll[0m[94m have[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m of[0m[94m that[0m[94m something[0m[94m.[0m And[94m in[0m this case[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m something[0m is i[94m,[0m is[94m the[0m[94m imag[0m[94minary[0m unit. So[94m this[0m[94m is[0m[94m going[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m plus[94m [0m[94m1[0m5i[94m.[0m And[94m we[0m[94m are[0m done.[94m[0m[94m #[0m[94m The[0m Noise Gain[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mMay[0m [94m1[0m6, 2012

[94mThe[0m feedback properties[94m of[0m an op-amp circuit determine[94m the[0m circuit stability[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m simplest scenario[94m,[0m a[94m fraction[0m[94m [0mβ of[94m the[0m output signal[94m is[0m passed back[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m in[0mver[94mting[0m[94m ([0mINV[94m)[0m input[94m using[0m[94m a[0m voltage[94m div[0m[94mider[0m network as[94m shown[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m two[94m circ[0muits below,[94m the[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0m[94min[0mver[94mting[0m[94m N[0mI[94m voltage[0m ampl[94mifier[0m circuit, and the[94m current[0m[94m-[0m[94mto[0m[94m-[0mvol[94mt[0mage[94m trans[0mimp two different measures of solubility might give different results[94m.[0m For instance freezing point depression[94m is[0m more[94m related[0m[94m to[0m molar[94m concentr[0m[94mations[0m rather[94m than[0m[94m gram[0m concentr[94mations[0m[94m.[0m – MaxW Feb 1[94m9[0m '16 at [94m1[0m[94m9[0m:4[94m0[0m
[94m
[0m[94mLet[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m think[0m in terms[94m of[0m units[94m.[0m Dens[94mity[0m[94m is[0m[94m mass[0m per[94m unit[0m[94m volume[0m[94m.[0m Not[94m only[0m[94m will[0m different solutes have[94m different[0m masses dissolved into a[94m unit[0m[94m volume[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m the[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m resulting solution[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m different[0m for different solutes[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWhen[0m people say[94m they[0m[94m can[0m dissol[94mve[0m[94m a[0m[94m unit[0m[94m of[0m[94m mass[0m[94m into[0m[94m a[0m[94m unit[0m[94m of[0m[94m volume[0m[94m ([0m[94ma[0m common measure[94m of[0m solub[94mility[0m[94m)[0m they[94m are[0m not[94m keeping[0m track[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m final[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m the resulting solution[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mHere[0m[94m are[0m[94m the[0m expressions[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m density[0m of[94m the[0m two saturated solutions[94m ([0mwe[94m should[0m[94m assume[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m temperature[94m and[0m pressure[94m are[0m constant[94m so[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m density[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m sol[0mvent itself is constant[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0mm[94m_{[0mA[94m,[0msat[94m}}{[0mV[94m_{[0m[94mA[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m[94m}}[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0mrho_{A[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m[94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mm[0m[94m_{[0m[94mB[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m[94m}}{[0m[94mV[0m[94m_{[0m[94mB[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m[94m}}[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mrho[0m[94m_{[0m[94mB[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m[94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mwhere[0m[94m $[0m[94mm[0m$[94m and[0m[94m $[0m[94mV[0m[94m$[0m[94m are[0m masses[94m and[0m volumes[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m $\[0m[94mrho[0m[94m$[0m is[94m the[0m[94m density[0m. $A[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $[0m[94mB[0m[94m$[0m[94m are[0m[94m the[0m two solutes.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSo if[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
[94m$\[0m[94mrho[0m[94m_{[0m[94mA[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m[94m}{[0m[94m}\[0mgt{} \[94mrho[0m[94m_{[0mB[94m,[0ms[94mat[0m}$[94m
[0m
that could mean[94m,[0m in[94m one[0m[94m limit[0m where[94m
[0m
$[94mV[0m[94m_{[0m[94mA[0m[94m,[0ms[94mat[0m}[94m =[0m[94m V[0m[94m_{[0m[94mB[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m}$,[94m
[0m
[94mthat[0m[94m
[0m
$m[94m_{[0m[94mA[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m}{}[94m \[0mgt[94m {}[0m[94mm[0m[94m_{[0mB,s[94mat[0m}$.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWh[94mich[0m[94m is[0m[94m how[0m I'[94mm[0m guessing you'[94mre[0m[94m thinking[0m[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m the[0m volume change[94m of[0m[94m sol[0mvation[94m was[0m similar for[94m two[0m[94m sol[0m[94mutes[0m[94m,[0m[94m one[0m[94m could[0m[94m trust[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m density[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m s[94matur[0m[94mated[0m solution with the[94m ([0m[94mmass[0m) sol[94mub[0mility[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mBut[94m there[0m'[94ms[0m another limit where there[94m is[0m a large difference[94m in[0m the volume change[94m of[0m[94m sol[0mv[94mation[0m[94m,[0m between[94m the[0m two solutes[94m.[0m Then[94m if[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
[94m$\[0m[94mrho[0m[94m_{[0m[94mA[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m}{}\[94mgt[0m{} \[94mrho[0m[94m_{[0m[94mB[0m[94m,[0ms[94mat[0m[94m}$,[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mas before, and
[94m
[0m$V[94m_{[0m[94mA[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m}{[94m}[0m[94m \[0mlt{}[94m V[0m[94m_{[0m[94mB[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m}$,[94m
[0m[94m
[0mthen it'[94ms[0m possible[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m unit[0m mass dissol[94mved[0m in[94m the[0m two[94m cases[0m[94m was[0m[94m equal[0m,[94m
[0m
$[94mm[0m[94m_{[0m[94mA[0m[94m,[0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0m be hard to detect because[94m of[0m its[94m interaction[0m with[94m the[0m positioning[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m arms[0m[94m.[0m The[94m spring[0m[94m-[0m[94mdash[0mpot model[94m shows[0m[94m a[0m[94m spect[0mac[94mular[0m[94m effect[0m[94m of[0m[94m arm[0m angle[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m course[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m landing[94m phase[0m (Fig[94m.[0m[94m [0m5[94m).[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m simulation[94m that[0m[94m was[0m based[94m on[0m a[94m real[0m[94m sequence[0m[94m,[0m landing[94m with[0m[94m an[0m arm angle[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m5[94m°[0m caused[94m a[0m rotation[94m of[0m the[94m arm[0m[94m during[0m landing[94m to[0m a vertical posture[94m at[0m body contact[94m,[0m[94m purely[0m[94m due[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m spring[0m[94m-[0m[94mdash[0m[94mpot[0m action[94m.[0m Position[94ming[0m[94m the[0m[94m arms[0m[94m at[0m an[94m angle[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m1[94m0[0m[94m°[0m[94m or[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m0[0m[94m°[0m at touchdown[94m results[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m higher[0m[94m impact[0m and[94m a[0m body post[94mure[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m arms fla[94mpped[0m[94m backwards[0m[94m and[0m for[94mwards[0m[94m respectively[0m[94m,[0m[94m thus[0m ham[94mper[0m[94ming[0m recovery[94m.[0m Fro[94mgs[0m increase[94m the[0m arm angle[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m height[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m jump[94m.[0m When[94m we[0m[94m define[0m[94m the[0m optimal angle[94m as[0m[94m that[0m for[94m which[0m[94m the[0m kin[94metic[0m[94m energy[0m at[94m the[0m[94m moment[0m of body[94m contact[0m[94m is[0m[94m minimal[0m[94m in[0m horizontal[94m and[0m[94m vertical[0m[94m directions[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m optimal[0m arm[94m angle[0m[94m is[0m found to[94m increase[0m with[94m horizontal[0m velocity[94m and[0m to[94m decrease[0m[94m with[0m height[94m.[0m[94m The[0m measured[94m arm[0m[94m angle[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m landing[0m fro[94mgs[0m[94m follow[0m[94m the[0m predictions[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m optimal[0m[94m arm[0m[94m angle[0m[94m calculated[0m from[94m the[0m horizontal[94m velocity[0m[94m.[0m Avoiding[94m remain[0m[94mders[0m[94m of[0m[94m horizontal[0m kin[94metic[0m[94m energy[0m[94m at[0m body[94m contact[0m[94m,[0m that[94m would[0m[94m have[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m cancel[0m[94mled[0m[94m by[0m[94m fr[0mict[94mional[0m[94m forces[0m, seems[94m to[0m[94m be[0m of major[94m importance[0m[94m.[0m
[94m

• GRF[94m aver[0m[94maged[0m over[94m all[0m[94m sequences[0m[94m [[0m[94mplus[0m all combinations[94m of[0m subscripts[94m:[0m[94mphase[0m[94m ([0m[94mp[0m[94m,[0m[94m prop[0mulsion/l[94m,[0m landing[94m),[0m direction (h[94m,[0m horizontal[94m/[0mv[94m,[0m vertical[94m/[0m[94mr[0m[94m,[0m[94mresult[0m[94m for[0m example[94m,[0m in order to conduct observations under[94m time[0m constraints that require a specific flight path or that require a single flight leg in excess of ~[94m [0m[94m4[0m hours. Such proposals would[94m be[0m[94m equivalent[0m[94m to[0m a deployment[94m and[0m[94m due[0m[94m to[0m[94m resource[0m requirements[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m impact[0m[94m that[0m this[94m would[0m[94m have[0m[94m on[0m flight planning[94m,[0m[94m the[0m scientific[94m just[0m[94mification[0m[94m must[0m[94m be[0m strong[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m final[0m[94m decision[0m on[94m whether[0m[94m to[0m allow programs[94m with[0m such a[94m high[0m[94m impact[0m[94m on[0m scheduling[94m and[0m[94m flight[0m[94m planning[0m will[94m be[0m made at[94m the[0m Director'[94ms[0m dis[94mcret[0m[94mion[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mPro[94mpos[0mers are encourag[94med[0m[94m to[0m review[94m the[0m Fl[94might[0m[94m Pl[0m[94manning[0m presentation delivered[94m by[0m Dr[94m.[0m[94m Rand[0m[94molf[0m Klein at[94m the[0m SOFIA User'[94ms[0m Workshop[94m in[0m[94m November[0m[94m,[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m full[94m list[0m[94m of[0m[94m present[0m[94mations[0m can[94m be[0m[94m found[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m SO[0m[94mFI[0m[94mA[0m[94m web[0m[94m site[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m addition[0m[94m,[0m[94m a[0m[94m much[0m[94m more[0m[94m detailed[0m discussion[94m of[0m[94m target[0m sched[94muling[0m[94m and[0m[94m flight[0m[94m planning[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m found[94m in[0m[94m the[0m Observ[94mation[0m Scheduling[94m and[0m[94m Fl[0m[94might[0m[94m Pl[0m[94manning[0m[94m White[0m[94m P[0m[94maper[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## [94m1[0m[94m.[0m2[94m.[0m2  [94m Ac[0mquisition[94m and[0m Guiding[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSO[94mFI[0m[94mA[0m[94m has[0m three optical cam[94meras[0m[94m for[0m ac[94mquisition[0m[94m,[0m gu[94miding[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m tracking[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m Wide Field[94m Im[0mager[94m ([0m[94mW[0m[94mFI[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m Fine[0m[94m Field[0m[94m Im[0m[94mager[0m[94m ([0m[94mF[0m[94mFI[0m[94m)[0m are mounted[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m teles[0m[94mcope[0m head[94m ring[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m upgrad[0m[94med[0m Focal Plane Imager[94m ([0m[94mF[0m[94mPI[0m[94m+)[0m[94m images[0m[94m the[0m foc[94mal[0m plane[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m teles[0m[94mcope[0m via[94m a[0m dichroic[94m and[0m a[94m t[0mertiary mirror[94m.[0m All[94m three[0m imagers use[94m [0m[94m1[0m024x[94m1[0m[94m0[0m24[94m pixel[0m[94m,[0m frame-trans[94mfer[0m CCD cam[94meras[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m W[94mFI[0m[94m has[0m[94m a[0m [94m6[0m°[94mx[0m[94m6[0m° field[94m of[0m view[94m,[0m[94m and[0m is expected[94m to[0m[94m achieve[0m[94m a[0m cent[94mroid[0m precision[94m of[0m ~[94m8[0m''[94m for[0m stars brighter[94m than[0m R =[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m.[0m The field[94m of[0m[94m view[0m[94m of[0m the[94m F[0m[94mFI[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m x[94m [0m[94m7[0m0 arcmin2. It[94m is[0m[94m expected[0m[94m to[0m[94m achieve[0m[94m a[0m cent[94mroid[0m[94m precision[0m[94m of[0m[94m ~[0m[94m1[0m arcsec for[94m R[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m or br[94mighter[0m[94m stars[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m FPI+ has[94m an[0m ~[94m8[0m arc[94mmin[0m diameter field[94m of[0m[94m view[0m[94m and[0m[94m is[0m[94m expected[0m[94m to[0m provide[94m a[0m[94m cent[0m[94mroid[0m[94m precision[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m arc[94msec[0m[94m for[0m[94m R[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m6[94m ([0mno chopping[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m R[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m ([94mcho[0m[94mpping[0m[94m)[0m[94m or[0m br[94mighter[0m[94m stars[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mMost obser[94mvers[0m do[94m not[0m need[94m to[0m select guide stars[94m as[0m[94m they[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m chosen[0m by the[94m S[0mMO[94m staff[0m[94m.[0m However[94m propos[0mers[94m should[0m be aware that[94m the[0m[94m gu[0m[94miding[0m[94m cannot[0m[94m be[0m[94m done[0m on IR sources[94m unless[0m[94m they[0m[94m are[0m[94m opt[0m[94mically[0m bright[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m3[0m   of one sodium ion (Na[94m +[0m ) to two sulfide ions ([94mS[0m [94m2[0m- ). Write[94m the[0m chemical[94m formula[0m for this comp[94mound[0m.
3. A[94m mole[0mc[94mule[0m of sulfur dio[94mx[0m[94mide[0m[94m consists[0m[94m of[0m one sulfur atom (S[94m)[0m[94m and[0m two o[94mxygen[0m[94m atoms[0m[94m ([0m[94mO[0m[94m).[0m What[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m chemical[0m[94m formula[0m[94m for[0m[94m this[0m[94m comp[0m[94mound[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m Ident[94mify[0m[94m the[0m[94m ratio[0m[94m of[0m atoms[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m comp[0m[94mound[0m represented[94m by[0m[94m the[0m following chemical[94m formula[0m[94m:[0m N [94m2[0m O[94m [0m5 .[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Vocabul[94mary[0m Language[94m:[0m[94m English[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mchem[94mical[0m[94m formula[0m

chem[94mical[0m[94m formula[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSymbol[0m of[94m a[0m[94m chemical[0m comp[94mound[0m[94m using[0m element symbols[94m and[0m sub[94mscripts[0m to represent[94m the[0m ratio[94m of[0m[94m atoms[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m comp[0m[94mound[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m7[0m ,[94m [0m8
[94m
[0m[94mOct[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m1,[94m [0m[94m2[0m0[94m1[0m[94m2[0m
[94m
[0m[94mJan[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m3[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m5[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m ([0mJeff[94mrey[0m C. Lagarias[94m)[0m Assume[94m The[0m following is[94m equivalent[0m[94m to[0m RH[94m.[0m Let $[94mH[0m[94m_[0mn[94m =[0m[94m \[0msum\limits[94m_{[0mj[94m=[0m[94m1[0m[94m}^[0m[94mn[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94mj[0m}$ be[94m the[0m $[94mn[0m$-[94mth[0m[94m harm[0m[94monic[0m number[94m.[0m For[94m each[0m[94m $[0m[94mn[0m \[94mge[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m$[94m $$\[0msum[94m\[0m[94mlimits[0m[94m_{[0md|n[94m}[0m[94m d[0m \[94mle[0m[94m H[0m[94m_[0m[94mn[0m +[94m \[0mexp (H[94m_[0m[94mn[0m[94m)[0m \log ([94mH[0m[94m_[0m[94mn[0m[94m),[0m[94m$$[0m[94m with[0m[94m equality[0m only for[94m $[0m[94mn[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.$[0m[94m ([0m[94mAn[0m Elementary Problem[94m Equ[0mivalent to[94m the[0m Riemann Hyp[94moth[0mesis[94m.[0m[94m See[0m also OEIS A0576[94m4[0m[94m1[0m.)[94m
[0m(Jeff[94mrey[0m[94m C[0m[94m.[0m[94m Lag[0marias[94m)[0m Assume R[94mH[0m[94m.[0m Let[94m $[0m[94mH[0m[94m_[0m[94mn[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94msum[0m[94m\[0m[94mlimits[0m[94m_{[0m[94mj[0m[94m=[0m[94m1[0m[94m}^[0m[94mn[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94mj[0m[94m}$[0m[94m be[0m[94m the[0m[94m $[0m[94mn[0m[94m$-[0m[94mth[0m[94m harm[0m[94monic[0m[94m number[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m each[0m[94m $[0m[94mn[0m[94m \[0m[94mge[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m$[94m $$\[0m[94msum[0m[94m\[0m[94mlimits[0m[94m_{[0m[94md[0m[94m|[0m[94mn[0m}[94m d[0m[94m \[0m[94mle[0m H[94m_[0m[94mn[0m[94m +[0m[94m \[0m[94mexp[0m ([94mH[0m[94m_[0m[94mn[0m) \[94mlog[0m[94m ([0m[94mH[0m[94m_[0m[94mn[0m[94m),[0m[94m$$[0m[94m with[0m[94m equality[0m[94m only[0m[94m for[0m[94m $[0m[94mn[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m.$[94m ([0mAn Element[94mary[0m Problem Equivalent[94m to[0m the[94m Riemann[0m Hyp[94moth[0m[94mesis[0m[94m.[0m[94m See[0m[94m also[0m[94m O[0mEIS[94m A[0m[94m0[0m5[94m7[0m[94m6[0m[94m4[0m[94m1[0m.)[94m[0m[94m[0m # E[94muler[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m identity[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWarning[94m:[0m this[94m question[0m requires[94m knowledge[0m[94m of[0m[94m complex[0m[94m numbers[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mAn[0m E[94muler[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m identity[0m is[94m an[0m[94m identity[0m, in[94m which[0m each[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m following[0m[94m appears[0m[94m once[0m and only[94m once[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• the[94m constant[0m $$0$$: neutral element for addition[94m;[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m the[0m constant $$1$$[94m:[0m neutral element for multiplication[94m;[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m the[0m[94m constant[0m $$e$$[94m:[0m base of natural log of virial[94m for[0m[94m the[0m selection[94m.[0m If List, should[94m be[0m set for each index[94m in[0m sys_[94mconfig[0ms[94m,[0m[94m respectively[0m[94m.[0m[94m Should[0m be used with Dee[94mP[0mMD-kit v[94m2[0m.x.[94m
[0mmodel[94m_[0m[94mde[0mvi[94m_[0m[94mv[0m_tr[94must[0m[94m_[0mhi Float or List of[94m float[0m or Dict[str, float[94m][0m [94m1[0m[94me[0m10 Upper bound of virial for the selection. If List,[94m should[0m[94m be[0m set[94m for[0m[94m each[0m[94m index[0m[94m in[0m sys[94m_[0m[94mconfig[0m[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m respectively[0m[94m.[0m[94m Should[0m[94m be[0m[94m used[0m[94m with[0m De[94me[0m[94mP[0m[94mMD[0m[94m-[0m[94mkit[0m[94m v[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94mx[0m[94m.[0m
model[94m_[0m[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m[94m_[0madapt[94m_[0mtr[94must[0m[94m_[0mlo Boolean[94m False[0m Adaptively determ[94mines[0m[94m the[0m lower trust levels of force[94m and[0m model[94m_[0m[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m[94m_[0mnum[94mb[0m[94m_[0m[94mc[0m[94mand[0m[94mi[0m[94m_[0mv and optionally[94m with[0m[94m model[0m[94m_[0m[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m[94m_[0mper[94mc[0m[94m_[0m[94mc[0m[94mand[0m[94mi[0m[94m_[0mf[94m and[0m[94m [94m1[0m[94m.[0m From[94m the[0m[94m frames[0m with force model deviation lower[94m than[0m model_[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m[94m_[0mf_tr[94must[0m[94m_[0m[94mhi[0m[94m,[0m select max[94m([0mmodel[94m_[0m[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m[94m_[0mnum[94mb[0m[94m_[0m[94mc[0m[94mand[0m[94mi[0m[94m_[0m[94mf[0m[94m,[0m[94m deviation.[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m From[0m[94m the[0m[94m frames[0m[94m with[0m virial model deviation[94m lower[0m[94m than[0m[94m [0mmodel[94m_[0m[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m[94m_[0mnum[94mb[0m[94m_[0m[94mc[0m[94mand[0mi[94m_[0mf Int [94m1[0m0[94m See[0m model[94m_[0m[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m[94m_[0mada[94mpt[0m[94m_[0m[94mtr[0m[94must[0m[94m_[0m[94mlo[0m.[94m
