[0mmodel[94m_[0m[94mde[0m[94mvi[0m_f[94m_[0mav[94mg[0m[94m_[0mrelative Boolean[94m False[0m Normal[94mized[0m[94m the[0m force model devi[94mations[0m by the[94m R[0m three continents: Asia, Europe[94m or[0m Africa[94m.[0m In[94m how[0m[94m many[0m[94m different[0m[94m ways[0m can[94m the[0m[94m work[0m[94m be[0m organized[94m?[0m
[94m
[0mB) In[94m a[0m[94m group[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m people[0m[94m,[0m 6 women and[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m men[0m[94m.[0m If[94m a[0m com[94mission[0m[94m of[0m three[94m people[0m has[94m to[0m[94m be[0m formed with[94m at[0m[94m least[0m[94m one[0m[94m man[0m[94m,[0m how[94m many[0m[94m groups[0m[94m can[0m we form[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mHi[0m[94m,[0m and welcome to[94m the[0m[94m G[0m[94mmat[0m Club[94m.[0m Below[94m are[0m[94m the[0m solutions[94m for[0m your problems. Hope it[94m helps[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mA.[94m [0m[94m6[0m people[94m form[0m groups[94m of[0m[94m [0m2 for[94m a[0m practical[94m work[0m[94m.[0m Each[94m group[0m[94m is[0m assigned[94m one[0m[94m of[0m three continents: Asia[94m,[0m[94m Europe[0m or Africa[94m.[0m In how[94m many[0m different[94m ways[0m[94m can[0m the[94m work[0m[94m be[0m[94m organized[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#[94m of[0m[94m ways[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m people[0m[94m can[0m be divided[94m into[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m groups[0m[94m when[0m[94m order[0m[94m matters[0m[94m is[0m[94m:[0m $$[94mC[0m^2[94m_[0m[94m6[0m[94m*[0m[94mC[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m_[0m[94m4[0m*[94mC[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m[94m=[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m$[94m$.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mB[0m[94mun[0m[94muel[0m[94m,[0m why does order[94m matter[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m question[94m above[0m[94m?[0m
[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m the[0m question below[94m,[0m[94m the[0m answer[94m would[0m[94m be[0m[94m [0m2[94m5[0m[94m2[0m0[94m if[0m order[94m matters[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m the[0m answer is[94m [0m1[94m0[0m[94m5[0m. Are these two questions[94m not[0m[94m essentially[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m how[94m many[0m[94m different[0m[94m ways[0m[94m can[0m a[94m group[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m8[94m people[0m be divided[94m into[0m[94m [0m4 teams[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m people[94m each[0m[94m?[0m
[94m
[0m[94m([0mA[94m)[0m[94m [0m9[94m0[0m
(B) [94m1[0m[94m0[0m5[94m
[0m(C[94m)[0m [94m1[0m[94m6[0m8
([94mD[0m[94m)[0m [94m4[0m[94m2[0m0[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94mE[0m[94m)[0m [94m2[0m520[94m
[0m
But[94m again[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAssignment[94m:[0m[94m Asia[0m[94m -[0m[94m group[0m[94m#[0m[94m1[0m, Europe -[94m group[0m#[94m2[0m[94m,[0m Africa -[94m group[0m#[94m3[0m is different[94m from[0m[94m Asia[0m -[94m group[0m#[94m3[0m, Europe[94m -[0m[94m group[0m[94m#[0m1[94m,[0m Africa -[94m group[0m[94m#[0m[94m2[0m. That[94m'[0m[94ms[0m why[94m the[0m order[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m groups[0m matters[94m here[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSecond[0m problem[94m discussed[0m here[94m:[0m[94m combination[0m-groups-and[94m-[0m[94mthat[0m-stuff-[94m8[0m5[94m7[0m07[94m.[0mhtml#p6[94m4[0m[94m2[0m[94m6[0m[94m3[0m[94m4[0m
[94m
[0mIn[94m this[0m problem there is no[94m group[0m#1, group#[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m group[0m#[94m3[0m[94m,[0m[94m group[0m[94m#[0m[94m4[0m[94m so[0m[94m [0m2[94m5[0m2[94m0[0m should[94m be[0m[94m divided[0m[94m by[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m!=[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m5 to[94m get[0m[94m rid[0m[94m of[0m[94m dup[0mlications[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m________________[0m[94m_[0m
[94mDirect[0m[94mor[0m[94m
[0mJo[94mined[0m[94m:[0m [94m2[0m[94m4[0m Aug[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m9[94m
[0mPosts[94m:[0m 507[94m
[0m[94mSch[0m[94mools[0m[94m:[0m Harvard[94m,[0m Columbia[94m,[0m Stern, Bo[94moth[0m[94m,[0m L[94mSB[0m[94m,[0m[94m
[0mF[94mollow[0mers[94m:[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m
[94mK[0mudos [?[94m]:[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m7[0m[94m8[0m [[94m0[0m[94m],[0m given[94m:[0m [94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m1[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mRe[0m[94m:[0m That[94m means[0m[94m,[0m if[94m the[0m response variable Y[94m was[0m transformed prior[94m to[0m[94m the[0m modeling,[94m to[0m e.[94mg[0m[94m.[0m linearize[94m the[0m relationship,[94m reduce[0m heterogeneity[94m,[0m etc., the predicted values should[94m be[0m[94m back[0m-transform[94med[0m[94m and[0m compared[94m with[0m[94m the[0m observed[94m raw[0m data when computing[94m the[0m NRMSE[94m.[0m[94m
[0m• Using[94m the[0m[94m mean[0m to normal[94mize[0m[94m the[0m NR[94mM[0m[94mSE[0m[94m is[0m ok[94m as[0m long[94m as[0m you compare models that[94m are[0m based[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m response variable[94m and[0m data treatment[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m Otherwise[0m[94m,[0m use[94m any[0m of[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m [0m3[94m methods[0m:[94m
[0m•[94m While[0m[94m max[0mmin[94m is[0m said[94m to[0m[94m be[0m more sensitive[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m sample[0m size[94m,[0m I[94m did[0m not[94m find[0m[94m a[0m big[94m difference[0m to[94m the[0m other[94m methods[0m[94m,[0m even when using[94m a[0m sample[94m size[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m ([0m[94mwhen[0m splitting[94m the[0m data[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m The[94m inter[0m[94mqu[0m[94mart[0m[94mile[0m[94m range[0m is said[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m less[0m sensitive[94m to[0m[94m extreme[0m[94m values[0m[94m →[0m[94m since[0m[94m I[0m didn[94m’[0m[94mt[0m have extreme[94m values[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m sim[94mulated[0m[94m data[0m I[94m didn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m find[0m[94m a[0m[94m strong[0m[94m difference[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m methods[0m

[94mBut[0m[94m who[0m[94m actually[0m cares[94m about[0m[94m comparing[0m model performances of[94m different[0m response[94m variables[0m[94m?[0m[94m One[0m[94m good[0m example ([94mwhere[0m[94m the[0m package was made for)[94m is[0m[94m the[0m development[94m of[0m ecolog[94mical[0m[94m indic[0m[94mators[0m[94m.[0m[94m One[0m major[94m criter[0m[94mion[0m[94m is[0m the robustness[94m or[0m predict[94mability[0m given certain[94m environmental[0m[94m changes[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m could[0m[94m be[0m quant[94mified[0m[94m from[0m[94m a[0m[94m statistical[0m[94m model[0m[94m,[0m[94m in[0m[94m which[0m[94m the[0m[94m indicator[0m[94m is[0m modelled[94m as[0m[94m a[0m function[94m of[0m[94m specific[0m environmental variable or[94m pressure[0m[94m,[0m by using[94m the[0m[94m R[0mM[94mSE[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m test[0m data[94m.[0m[94m To[0m[94m compare[0m[94m the[0m robust[94mness[0m[94m of[0m different indic[94mators[0m[94m,[0m[94m that[0m[94m are[0m[94m often[0m[94m on[0m[94m different[0m[94m scales[0m[94m and[0m[94m differently[0m[94m treated[0m prior[94m to[0m[94m the[0m model[94ming[0m[94m,[0m[94m normal[0m[94mizing[0m[94m the[0m[94m NR[0m[94mM[0m[94mSE[0m[94m would[0m[94m be[0m[94m needed[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m[94m the[0m NR[94mM[0m[94mSE[0m[94m is[0m[94m further[0m categor[94mized[0m[94m into[0m[94m let[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m say[0m low[94m,[0m[94m medium[0m or[94m high[0m[94m performance[0m[94m,[0m[94m using[0m[94m the[0m standard deviation[94m to[0m[94m normal[0m[94mize[0m could[94m be[0m a[94m good[0m option[94m for[0m the following reason: The sd-[94mbased[0m NR[94mM[0m[94mSE[0m represent[94m the[0m ratio between the variation[94m not[0m explained[94m by[0m[94m the[0m regression[94m vs[0m[94m the[0m[94m overall[0m[94m variation[0m in Y[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m the[0m regression explains[94m all[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m variation[0m[94m in[0m[94m Y[0m[94m,[0m nothing[94m gets[0m[94m un[0m[94mexp[0m[94mla[0m[94mined[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m R[0mM[94mSE[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m consequ[94mently[0m NR[94mM[0m[94mSE[0m[94m is[0m zero[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m the[0m[94m regression[0m explains[94m some[0m[94m part[0m and[94m leaves[0m some[94m other[0m[94m un[0m[94mexp[0m[94mla[0mined[94m,[0m which[94m is[0m[94m at[0m a[94m similar[0m scale than[94m the[0m overall variation[94m,[0m[94m the[0m ratio will[94m be[0m around[94m [0m1[94m.[0m Anyth[94ming[0m[94m beyond[0m[94m will[0m[94m indicate[0m[94m a[0m[94m much[0m[94m greater[0m variation[94m or[0m noise than in[94m the[0m variable[94m itself[0m[94m and[0m consequ[94mently[0m a low predict[94mability[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mStay tun[94med[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m next[94m update[0m of IND[94mperform[0m[94m,[0m where I will[94m rev[0m[94mise[0m[94m the[0m NR[94mM[0m[94mSE[0m calculation[94m ([0mmost likely using the sd method[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m cut[0m-offs for scoring!
[94m ([0m[94m1[0m32[94m),[0m both with[94m disp[0m[94m=[0m4[94m.[0m The first[94m perm[0m[94m and[0m the last 2[94m per[0mms are even; the others[94m are[0m[94m odd[0m[94m.[0m[94m So[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m $e_{3,k[94m}=[0m(1,0,2)$[94m and[0m[94m $[0m[94mo[0m[94m_{[0m[94m3[0m[94m,[0m[94mk[0m[94m}=[0m[94m([0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m2[94m,[0m[94m1[0m)$ for $k[94m=[0m0[94m,[0m[94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m2[0m[94m$.[0m This matches[94m the[0m identity[94m.[0m[94m –[0m  David Be[94mvan[0m Nov 16 '1[94m1[0m at 1[94m2[0m:1[94m1[0m
@DavidBe[94mvan[0m Thanks[94m,[0m I[94m see[0m my error now[94m.[0m –  Dim[94mit[0mri[94mje[0m Kostic[94m Nov[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m '[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m5[94m:[0m43
[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m part[94m,[0m note[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m par[0mity[94m of[0m $|[94mx[0m[94m-[0m[94my[0m[94m|$[0m[94m equals[0m[94m the[0m par[94mity[0m[94m of[0m[94m $[0m[94mx[0m-[94my[0m$, so[94m the[0m[94m par[0m[94mity[0m[94m of[0m disp$(\pi)$ equals[94m the[0m[94m par[0m[94mity[0m[94m of[0m[94m $\[0msum[94m(\[0mpi([94mi[0m)-i)=\[94msum[0m\[94mpi[0m([94mi[0m)-\sum i=0[94m$,[0m[94m and[0m $0[94m$[0m[94m is[0m even[94m.[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m[94m To[0m[94m find[0m Prof[94mit[0m or L[94moss[0m[94m when[0m Cost[94m Price[0m and[94m S[0m[94melling[0m[94m Price[0m[94m are[0m[94m Given[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWe[94m will[0m learn how to find[94m profit[0m[94m or[0m[94m loss[0m[94m when[0m[94m cost[0m[94m price[0m[94m and[0m[94m s[0m[94melling[0m[94m price[0m[94m are[0m[94m given[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mPro[0m[94mfit[0m percent and loss[94m percent[0m are[94m always[0m calculated[94m on[0m[94m cost[0m[94m price[0m[94m ([0m[94mC[0m[94m.[0m[94mP[0m.) only[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mI[0m. Formula[94m to[0m find profit[94m percent[0m[94m when[0m[94m cost[0m[94m price[0m and[94m s[0m[94melling[0m[94m price[0m[94m are[0m[94m given[0m;

[94mPro[0m[94mfit[0m[94m =[0m selling[94m price[0m[94m -[0m cost[94m price[0m[94m
[0m
There[94mfore[0m[94m,[0m profit[94m%[0m[94m =[0m ([94mpro[0m[94mfit[0m[94m/[0m[94mcost[0m[94m price[0m) ×[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m0%[94m
[0m
II.[94m Formula[0m[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m loss[0m[94m percent[0m[94m when[0m[94m cost[0m[94m price[0m[94m and[0m[94m s[0m[94melling[0m[94m price[0m[94m are[0m[94m given[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0m
[94mL[0m[94moss[0m[94m =[0m cost[94m price[0m[94m -[0m[94m s[0m[94melling[0m[94m price[0m[94m
[0m
There[94mfore[0m[94m,[0m[94m loss[0m[94m%[0m[94m =[0m[94m ([0m[94mloss[0m[94m/[0mcost price) ×[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m%[94m
[0m[94m
[0m1.[94m Mike[0m buys a laptop for[94m $[0m[94m8[0m[94m4[0m0[94m and[0m s[94mells[0m it[94m for[0m[94m$[0m9[94m0[0m[94m0[0m. Find his[94m profit[0m or[94m loss[0m percent.[94m
[0m
Sol[94mution[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
Cost[94m price[0m ([94mC[0m[94m.[0m[94mP[0m[94m.)[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m laptop[0m[94m =[0m[94m $[0m[94m8[0m[94m4[0m0[94m S[0melling[94m price[0m (S.P[94m.)[0m of[94m the[0m[94m laptop[0m[94m =[0m$[94m9[0m[94m0[0m0[94m
[0m
[94mSince[0m, S[94m.[0m[94mP[0m[94m.[0m >[94m C[0m[94m.[0m[94mP[0m[94m.,[0m[94m there[0m[94m is[0m a profit

[94mPro[0m[94mfit[0m[94m =[0m[94m s[0m[94melling[0m price[94m -[0m[94m cost[0m[94m price[0m

[94m=[0m $[94m9[0m[94m0[0m0[94m -[0m[94m$[0m[94m8[0m[94m4[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m
[94m=[0m $60[94m Prof[0m[94mit[0m%[94m =[0m[94m ([0m[94mpro[0m[94mfit[0m[94m/[0m[94mcost[0m price[94m)[0m[94m ×[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m% =[94m ([0m[94m6[0m0[94m/[0m[94m8[0m[94m4[0m[94m0[0m)[94m ×[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m0[94m%[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m:[94m R[0m$ [94m9[0m78[94mk[0m (That’[94ms[0m about US[94m$[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m4[0m[94mk[0m[94m).[0m[94m We[0m also[94m have[0m a prediction interval with[94m lower[0m and[94m upper[0m[94m bounds[0m[94m:[0m[94m [[0m[94m7[0m[94m8[0m[94m8[0m[94mk[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m1[94m0[0m[94m6[0m0[94mk[0m[94m].[0m[94m To[0m[94m produce[0m this[94m interval[0m I used something similar[94m to[0m quantile regression[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m lower[0m[94m bound[0m is[94m an[0m[94m estimate[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94mth[0m[94m percent[0m[94mile[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m distribution[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m upper[0m[94m bound[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m estimate[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m5[0m[94mth[0m[94m percent[0m[94mile[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m point estimate is an[94m estimate[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0m[94mth[0m[94m percent[0m[94mile[0m ([94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m[94m the[0m[94m median[0m[94m).[0m As[94m we[0m[94m have[0m three[94m different[0m[94m models[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m lower[0m and[94m upper[0m[94m bounds[0m are[94m not[0m centered around[94m the[0m[94m point[0m[94m estimate[0m[94m ([0mwe[94m actually[0m[94m have[0m[94m three[0m point[94m estimates[0m[94m).[0m[94m More[0m details here[94m.[0m[94m text[0m Here I’[94mm[0m[94m sc[0m[94manning[0m[94m the[0m property descri[94mptions[0m[94m for[0m words[94m like[0m “[94mA[0m/C”, “barbecue”,[94m etc[0m,[94m and[0m featurizing them[94m as[0m[94m d[0mumm[94mies[0m[94m.[0m But[94m you[0m[94m can[0m use[94m the[0m texts themselves[94m in[0m[94m the[0m model[94m.[0m[94m Just[0m insert[94m the[0m following code between[94m the[0m line where you[94m sh[0muffle[94m the[0m samples[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m line[0m[94m where[0m[94m you[0m instantiate[94m the[0m model[94m:[0m[94m The[0m TFIDF matrix[94m is[0m[94m too[0m[94m big[0m[94m -[0m[94m we[0m end[94m up[0m[94m with[0m[94m more[0m[94m columns[0m[94m than[0m samples[94m.[0m[94m So[0m[94m we[0m[94m don[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m use[0m[94m it[0m directly[94m,[0m we[94m use[0m[94m L[0mSA to reduce[94m the[0m T[94mF[0m[94mID[0m[94mF[0m matrix[94m to[0m a[94m documents[0mXtopics matrix[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m00 topics[94m.[0m This impro[94mves[0m[94m the[0m performance[94m of[0m[94m the[0m model a bit[94m.[0m[94m But[0m[94m it[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m ultimately[94m n[0mons[94mens[0mical[94m:[0m when[94m you[0m’[94mre[0m[94m app[0mraising[94m a[0m[94m new[0m property[94m you[0m[94m could[0m[94m keep[0m[94m twe[0m[94making[0m the text until[94m you[0m[94m get[0m[94m the[0m price you want[94m.[0m[94m So[0m I[94m did[0m[94m this[0m just[94m to[0m inspect which topic vectors would[94m be[0m[94m more[0m relevant[94m ([0msee here[94m),[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m which[0m words[94m had[0m[94m more[0m weight[94m in[0m these topics[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m helped[0m[94m me[0m decide which words[94m to[0m[94m look[0m for[94m in[0m the text fields ([94msa[0muna, pool[94m,[0m[94m etc[0m[94m).[0m[94m images[0m[94m I[0m’[94mm[0m[94m still[0m fig[94muring[0m[94m out[0m[94m the[0m best[94m way[0m[94m to[0m[94m use[0m[94m the[0m pictures[94m.[0m[94m I[0m tried using[94m the[0m metadata[94m first[0m: number[94m of[0m pictures,[94m height[0m and width of[94m the[0m[94m pictures[0m[94m,[0m[94m etc[0m[94m.[0m[94m That[0m didn[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m improve[0m[94m the[0m[94m model[0m[94m.[0m[94m ([0mI[94m know[0m, shocking. But[94m I[0m[94m like[0m[94m to[0m try[94m the[0m simple things first[94m.)[0m I also[94m checked[0m whether[94m the[0m[94m dominant[0m colors help[94m us[0m predict[94m the[0m price[94m.[0m[94m To[0m[94m do[0m[94m that[0m I cluster[94med[0m[94m the[0m[94m pixels[0m of every picture[94m of[0m[94m the[0m property[94m.[0m[94m Each[0m[94m pixel[0m is defined[94m by[0m[94m three[0m values[94m:[0m R[94m,[0m G[94m,[0m B[94m,[0m each of which[94m can[0m vary[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m5[94m and[0m represents[94m the[0m intensity[94m of[0m[94m each[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m three primary[94m colors[0m (red[94m,[0m[94m green[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m blue[0m[94m).[0m[94m So[0m[94m the[0m[94m pixels[0m[94m exist[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m tr[0midimensional[94m space[0m[94m and[0m[94m #[0m SimPEG.maps[94m.[0m[94mWeight[0m[94ming[0m[94m.[0m[94mP[0m#
[94m
[0mproperty We[94might[0m[94ming[0m[94m.[0m[94mP[0m[94m#[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m linear mapping operator
[94m
[0m[94mThis[0m property returns[94m the[0m sparse[94m matrix[0m[94m $$\[0mmathbf[94m{[0m[94mP[0m}$$ that car[94mries[0m out[94m the[0m[94m weight[0m[94ming[0m mapping via[94m matrix[0m-vector product[94m,[0m[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m.:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mu}(\[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mm[94m})[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0m[94mP[0mm[94m}[0m[94m \[0m;\;\[94m;\[0m[94m;\[0m;[94m \[0mtextrm[94m{[0m[94mwhere[0m}[94m \[0m;\[94m;\[0m[94m;\[0m[94m;\[0m[94m;[0m[94m \[0m[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mP[94m}[0m[94m =[0m diag(\[94mmathbf[0m[94m{[0mw})$[94m
[0mReturns
scipy[94m.[0m[94ms[0m[94mparse[0m[94m.[0mcs[94mr[0m_matrix
[94m
[0m[94mS[0m[94mparse[0m linear[94m mapping[0m[94m operator[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m Part[94mial[0m Fractions[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m Part[0m[94mial[0m Fra[94mctions[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIn solving algebra[94m related[0m[94m problems[0m and questions[94m,[0m[94m we[0m may sometimes[94m deal[0m[94m with[0m rational[94m functions[0m[94m.[0m A[94m rational[0m[94m function[0m[94m is[0m basically an[94m algebraic[0m[94m polynomial[0m[94m fraction[0m[94m,[0m[94m in[0m[94m which[0m we[94m have[0m[94m polynomials[0m on both[94m the[0m[94m numer[0m[94mator[0m[94m and[0m[94m denomin[0m[94mator[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mPart[94mial[0m fra[94mctions[0m is[94m one[0m of[94m the[0m simplest and[94m most[0m effective method[94m in[0m[94m solving[0m[94m algebra[0m related[94m problems[0m regarding rational[94m functions[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIn partial[94m fra[0m[94mctions[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m separate[94m the[0m polynomials[94m in[0m[94m our[0m rational[94m function[0m[94m into[0m[94m simpler[0m form of[94m polynomials[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mSome[94m of[0m[94m the[0m applications[94m of[0m[94m partial[0m[94m fra[0m[94mctions[0m include[94m the[0m solving[94m of[0m integration[94m problems[0m[94m with[0m rational[94m functions[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m bin[94momial[0m[94m expansion[0m and also[94m the[0m[94m arithmetic[0m[94m series[0m[94m and[0m sequences.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThere are a few[94m basic[0m[94m forms[0m[94m we[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m memor[94mize[0m[94m in[0m partial[94m fra[0m[94mctions[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m.$$\[94mens[0mpace[94m$$[0m The[94m linear[0m[94m form[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m$$[0m[94m\[0m[94mhspace[0m[94m{[0m6em} {\[94msmall[0m ([94max[0m[94m +[0m b)}$$[94m
[0mExample[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$${\large\frac[94m{[0m3x \ + \ [94m5[0m}{([94mx[0m \ + \[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m)([0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m \ + \[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m)}[0m \ \equiv[94m \[0m \[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0mA}{([94mx[0m \ + \[94m [0m[94m1[0m)} +[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mB[0m[94m}{([0m2[94mx[0m[94m \[0m + \ [94m7[0m[94m)}[0m[94m }[0m[94m$$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m2.$$\ens[94mpace[0m$$[94m The[0m quadratic[94m form[0m[94m of[0m a[94m linear[0m factor[94m:[0m[94m
[0m$$[94m\[0mhspace[94m{[0m6em[94m}[0m[94m {\[0msmall ([94mcx[0m \ + \ d[94m)^{[0m2[94m}}[0m$$[94m
[0mExample:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$$[94m\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m3[94mx[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m}{([94mx[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m1){[94m([0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m7[94m)[0m}^{[94m2[0m[94m}}[0m \[94mequiv[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mA[0m[94m}{([0m[94mx[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m)}[0m[94m +[0m[94m {\[0msmall\box[94med[0m[94m{\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mB[0m[94m}{([0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m)}[0m[94m +[0m \frac[94m{[0mC[94m}{[0m[94m{([0m[94m2[0mx[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m)[0m}^{[94m2[0m}}}}[94m$$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m3.$$\ens[94mpace[0m$$ The quadratic[94m form[0m[94m that[0m[94m cannot[0m[94m be[0m factor[94mized[0m:[94m
[0m$$[94m\[0m[94mhspace[0m[94m{[0m[94m6[0mem[94m}[0m[94m {\[0m[94msmall[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m rapidly growing number of major scientific and technological players in[94m the[0m fields of Big Data[94m,[0m high performance computing[94m,[0m energy production and storage[94m,[0m[94m as[0m well as[94m system[0m integration[94m.[0m
• Ast[94mro[0mchem[94mical[0m evolution along star[94m formation[0m[94m:[0m[94m Over[0mview[94m of[0m[94m the[0m IRAM Lar[94mge[0m Program AS[94mAI[0m[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94m0[0m[94m3[0m.[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m9[94m2[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mM[0m[94march[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m7[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m ast[94mro[0m-ph.GA
[94mE[0m[94mv[0midence[94m is[0m[94m mount[0m[94ming[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m small[0m bodies[94m of[0m our Solar[94m System[0m,[94m such[0m[94m as[0m com[94mets[0m[94m and[0m astero[94mids[0m[94m,[0m[94m have[0m[94m at[0m[94m least[0m partially[94m inherited[0m their chemical composition[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m phases[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m Sol[0m[94mar[0m[94m System[0m formation[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m then[0m appears[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m mole[0m[94mcular[0m[94m complexity[0m[94m of[0m[94m these[0m[94m small[0m[94m bodies[0m[94m is[0m most likely related[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m earliest[0m[94m stages[0m[94m of[0m star[94m formation[0m[94m.[0m It[94m is[0m[94m therefore[0m important[94m to[0m character[94mize[0m[94m and[0m to understand[94m how[0m[94m the[0m chemical[94m evolution[0m[94m changes[0m[94m with[0m[94m solar[0m-[94mtype[0m protostell[94mar[0m evolution[94m.[0m We present[94m here[0m[94m the[0m Lar[94mge[0m[94m Program[0m "[94mA[0m[94mst[0m[94mro[0m[94mchem[0m[94mical[0m[94m Sur[0mveys At[94m I[0m[94mRAM[0m[94m"[0m (AS[94mAI[0m[94m).[0m[94m Its[0m goal[94m is[0m[94m to[0m carry[94m out[0m unbi[94mased[0m millimeter line surve[94mys[0m between 8[94m0[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m[94m2[0m GHz of a sample[94m of[0m ten template sources[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m fully[0m cover[94m the[0m[94m first[0m[94m stages[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m formation[94m process[0m[94m of[0m[94m solar[0m[94m-[0m[94mtype[0m stars[94m,[0m from prestellar cores[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m late[0m protostell[94mar[0m phase[94m.[0m In[94m this[0m[94m article[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m present[94m an[0m[94m over[0m[94mview[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m surve[0m[94mys[0m[94m and[0m[94m results[0m obtained[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m analysis[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m [94m3[0m mm band observations[94m.[0m[94m The[0m number[94m of[0m detected main isotop[94mic[0m species bare[94mly[0m var[94mies[0m with[94m the[0m evolutionary stage[94m and[0m[94m is[0m found[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m very[0m similar[94m to[0m[94m that[0m[94m of[0m[94m massive[0m[94m star[0m-[94mform[0m[94ming[0m regions[94m.[0m[94m The[0m mole[94mcular[0m content[94m in[0m O- and C[94m-[0m bearing species[94m allows[0m[94m us[0m[94m to[0m[94m define[0m two chemical[94m classes[0m[94m of[0m[94m en[0mvelopes[94m,[0m[94m whose[0m[94m composition[0m[94m is[0m domin[94mated[0m[94m by[0m either a[94m)[0m[94m a[0m rich content[94m in[0m[94m O[0m[94m-[0mrich complex organ[94mic[0m mole[94mcules[0m[94m,[0m associated[94m with[0m[94m hot[0m corino sources[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m b[0m[94m)[0m[94m a[0m[94m rich[0m[94m content[0m[94m in[0m[94m hydro[0mcarbons[94m,[0m[94m typical[0m[94m of[0m[94m W[0marm[94m Car[0m[94mbon[0m[94m Ch[0m[94main[0m Chem[94mistry[0m sources[94m.[0m Over[94mall[0m[94m,[0m[94m a[0m[94m high[0m chemical[94m rich[0m[94mness[0m[94m is[0m found[94m to[0m[94m be[0m present already[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m initial[0m phases[94m of[0m[94m solar[0m[94m-[0m[94mtype[0m[94m star[0m[94m formation[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m•[94m De[0muterium[94m and[0m $^{[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m}$[0mN fractionation[94m in[0m[94m N[0m$_2[94m$[0mH$^+[94m$[0m during[94m the[0m[94m formation[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m Sun[0m[94m-[0m[94mlike[0m[94m star[0m[94m([0m1[94m8[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m5[0m[94m3[0m[94m9[0m[94m)[0m
[94m
[0m[94mJan[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m3[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m ast[94mro[0m[94m-[0mph[94m.[0m[94mGA[0m[94m,[0m ast[94mro[0m-[94mph[0m[94m.[0mSR[94m
[0mAlthough chemical models predict that[94m the[0m deuter[94mium[0m[94m fraction[0m[94mation[0m too[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m3[0m) There[94m are[0m a few things[94m you[0m[94m can[0m optimize[94m.[0m When initial[94mizing[0m[94m your[0m[94m t[0m[94mape[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m can[0m[94m multiply[0m[94m several[0m values at once[94m,[0m[94m so[0m instead[94m of[0m[94m this[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m>[94m++[0m++[<[94m++[0m++[94m+[0m +++>[94m-[0m] set cell 0[94m to[0m space
+++++[94m +[0m++++[94m        [0m[94m set[0m[94m cell[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m to[0m[94m new[0m line[94m
[0m>++++[94m+[0m[94m +[0m[94m++[0m[94m++[0m ++    [94m set[0m[94m counter[0m to[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
you[94m can[0m do[94m that[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m++++[94m+[0m[94m +[0m[94m++[0m[94m++[0m[94m[[0m[94m->[0m++[94m+[0m[94m>[0m[94m+[0m[94m>[0m[94m+[0m[94m<<[0m[94m<[0m[94m][[0mset[94m values[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m0,[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m0[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m0[94m][0m[94m
[0m>++[94m>>[0m++                [94m  [0m set[94m values[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m3[94m2[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
[94mIt[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m not[0m a[94m problem[0m[94m to[0m have[94m a[0m[94m leading[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m on[0m your[94m t[0m[94mape[0m[94m.[0m[94m Then[0m[94m you[0m[94m can[0m[94m rear[0m[94mrange[0m your[94m variables[0m[94m to[0m[94m make[0m[94m the[0m copy instruction[94m and[0m the jump[94m to[0m[94m the[0m space character shorter[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mYou[0m[94m can[0m[94m use[0m[94m a[0m shorter[94m number[0m printing function[94m that[0m'[94ms[0m available on[94m es[0molangs.org[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis[94m is[0m what[94m I[0m made of your code[94m.[0m There[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m not[0m[94m much[0m[94m change[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m it shrink[94med[0m[94m from[0m [94m3[0m1[94m0[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m3[0m[94m3[0m bytes[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mT[0mape[94m:[0m[94m [[0m[94m0[0m][94m [[0m[94ml[0m[94mf[0m[94m][0m[94m [[0m[94mout[0mCount[94m][0m[94m ["[0m "][94m [[0minCount][94m [[0m[94mout[0m[94mN[0mr[94m][0m[94m [[0minNr[94m][0m[94m [[0mtemp[94m][0m[94m [[0m[94m0[0m[94m][0m[94m [[0m[94mprint[0mNr[94m][0m[94m
[0m0[94m   [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m   [94m1[0m2         [94m3[0m[94m2[0m
[94m
[0m+++++ +++++[94m [[0m->[94m+[0m>[94m+[0m[94m>[0m++[94m+[0m[94m<<[0m[94m<[0m]                          set[94m first[0m cells[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m0[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0m

[0m<[[94m                [0m[94m                [0m[94m                [0m[94m [0m while counter[94m is[0m[94m not[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m
>>[94m>[0m[94m+[0m                [94m                [0m[94m           [0m[94m increment[0m[94m number[0m[94m
[0m[94m<[0m++++[94m+[0m[94m +[0m++++ ++                                 set[94m inner[0m counter[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94m[[0m[94m                [0m[94m                [0m[94m              [0m while[94m inner[0m[94m counter[0m[94m is[0m[94m not[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m>[>[94m+[0m>[94m+[0m[94m<<[0m-][94m>>[0m[94m[[0m[94m<<[0m[94m+[0m>>-][94m                [0m[94m       [0m[94m increment[0m[94m inner[0m number[94m
[0m[94m
[0m<[->[94m+[0m[94m>>[0m+[94m<<[0m[94m<[0m]>[-[94m<[0m[94m+[0m[94m>[0m][94m>[0m                [94m       [0m copy inner[94m number[0m[94m to[0m[94m print[0m number[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94mmust[0m[94m be[0m done[94m for[0m[94m new[0m[94m number[0m[94m printing[0m routine[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m>>[94m+[0m[94m[[[0m[94m-[0m[94m][0m<[94m[[0m->[94m+[0m[94m<[0m[->[94m+[0m[94m<[0m[->[94m+[0m<[->+<[94m[[0m->+<[94m[[0m->+<[94m[[0m[94m
[0m->+<[94m[[0m->0[94m stars[0m for[94m the[0m monument[94mal[0m[94m Henry[0m Draper Catalog of stellar spectra[94m,[0m[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m1[94m8[0m[94m-[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m).[0m[94m*[0m[94mT[0mIS[94m
[0m[94m
[0m2[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m4[0m David Herbert[94m F[0m[94mow[0mler ([94mA[0mpril [94m2[0m[94m8[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m1[94m9[0m3[94m7[0m –[94m April[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m4[0m[94m)[0m was[94m a[0m historian[94m of[0m Greek[94m mathematics[0m[94m who[0m published work[94m on[0m[94m pre[0m[94m-[0m[94mE[0mudox[94mian[0m ratio theory ([94musing[0m[94m the[0m[94m process[0m he[94m called[0m[94m an[0mthyphaeresis[94m).[0m[94m He[0m disput[94med[0m[94m the[0m[94m standard[0m[94m story[0m[94m of[0m[94m Greek[0m mathematical discovery[94m,[0m in[94m which[0m[94m the[0m discovery[94m of[0m[94m the[0m phenomen[94mon[0m of incomm[94mens[0m[94mur[0m[94mability[0m came[94m as[0m[94m a[0m shock[94m.[0m[94m
[0mH[94mis[0m[94m th[0mesis[94m was[0m that[94m,[0m[94m not[0m[94m having[0m the[94m real[0m[94m numbers[0m[94m,[0m[94m nor[0m division[94m,[0m[94m the[0m Gree[94mks[0m faced difficulties[94m in[0m defining rig[94mor[0mously[94m the[0m notion[94m of[0m ratio[94m.[0m They[94m called[0m ratio 'logos[94m'.[0m Eu[94mcl[0m[94mid[0m[94m Book[0m V[94m is[0m[94m an[0m ex[94mposition[0m[94m of[0m[94m E[0m[94mud[0m[94mox[0mus[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m theory[0m[94m of[0m[94m proportion[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m E[94mud[0m[94mox[0m[94mus[0m[94m discovered[0m about[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m5[0m0BC,[94m and[0m[94m which[0m[94m has[0m[94m been[0m described as[94m the[0m[94m j[0mewel in[94m the[0m crown[94m of[0m Greek mathematics[94m.[0m[94m E[0m[94mud[0m[94mox[0m[94mus[0m[94m showed[0m by a form[94m of[0m[94m abstract[0m[94m algebra[0m how[94m to[0m[94m handle[0m[94m rig[0m[94mor[0m[94mously[0m[94m the[0m[94m case[0m when two r[94mati[0m[94mos[0m[94m are[0m equal[94m,[0m[94m without[0m[94m actually[0m[94m having[0m[94m to[0m define[94m them[0m[94m.[0m[94m His[0m theory[94m was[0m so[94m successful[0m[94m that[0m[94m,[0m[94m in[0m[94m effect[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m killed[94m off[0m perfectly[94m good[0m earlier theories of ratio[94m,[0m[94m and[0m F[94mow[0m[94mler[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m aim[94m had[0m been[94m to[0m find[94m the[0m[94m evidence[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m redis[94mcover[0my[94m of[0m these[94m previous[0m[94m theories[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m particular[0m Th[94ma[0metetus (c 4[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m-[0m3[94m6[0m[94m9[0mBC[94m)[0m introduced[94m a[0m definition[94m of[0m[94m ratio[0m[94m using[0m[94m a[0m procedure[94m called[0m[94m an[0mthyphairesis[94m,[0m based[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m E[0m[94muclidean[0m[94m sub[0m[94mtra[0m[94mction[0m[94m algorithm[0m[94m.[0m F[94mow[0m[94mler[0m[94m developed[0m[94m his[0m ideas[94m in[0m[94m a[0m series[94m of[0m[94m papers[0m[94m,[0m cul[94mmin[0mating in[94m the[0m[94m book[0m[94m The[0m Mathemat[94mics[0m[94m of[0m[94m Pl[0mato'[94ms[0m Academy[94m:[0m A[94m New[0m Reconst[94mruction[0m,[94m which[0m[94m was[0m[94m published[0m[94m in[0m [94m1[0m[94m9[0m8[94m7[0m.[94m This[0m[94m book[0m[94m is[0m based[94m on[0m[94m a[0m study[94m of[0m[94m the[0m primary sources[94m and[0m on[94m their[0m assim[94milation[0m[94m and[0m[94m transformation[0m.*Wik

2[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m John[94m Arch[0mibald Wheeler[94m ([0m[94m9[0m[94m Jul[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m11[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m A[94mpr[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m08[94m at[0m age[94m [0m96[94m)[0m[94m was[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m American physicist[94m involved[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m theoretical development[94m of[0m[94m the[0m atomic bomb[94m.[0m[94m He[0m also[94m origin[0m[94mated[0m[94m a[0m novel approach[94m to[0m[94m the[0m unified field[94m theory[0m[94m.[0m Wheeler was[94m awarded[0m[94m the[0m [94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0m Wolf[94m Prize[0m "for[94m his[0m seminal contributions[94m to[0m black hole physics, to quantum gravity[94m,[0m[94m and[0m to[94m the[0m[94m theories[0m[94m of[0m nuclear scatter[94ming[0m[94m and[0m nuclear f[94mission[0m[94m."[0m[94m After[0m[94m recogn[0m[94mizing[0m[94m that[0m any large] was performed[94m to[0m identify classes[94m ([0mgroups[94m)[0m of youth with[94m unique[0m traject[94mories[0m of[94m global[0m perceived QOL[94m as[0m measured[94m by[0m[94m the[0m abbreviated[94m SL[0mSS[94m.[0m While traditional[94m growth[0m curve modeling[94m assumes[0m[94m the[0m existence[94m of[0m[94m a[0m single[94m development[0m[94mal[0m traject[94mory[0m[94m,[0m L[94mCG[0mA[94m tests[0m[94m if[0m[94m the[0m[94m population[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m best[94m represented[0m[94m by[0m[94m two[0m[94m or[0m[94m more[0m groups[94m of[0m[94m individuals[0m sharing[94m unique[0m[94m traject[0m[94mories[0m[94m.[0m Individual variation around[94m the[0m[94m class[0m-specific mean[94m traject[0m[94mories[0m[94m is[0m attributed[94m to[0m random error[94m.[0m[94m As[0m[94m a[0m[94m result[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m var[0m[94mian[0m[94mces[0m of[94m the[0m[94m intercept[0m and slope parameters[94m for[0m each class[94m are[0m const[94mrained[0m to zero[94m,[0m[94m making[0m[94m it[0m[94m a[0m special[94m sub[0m[94mcategory[0m[94m of[0m general growth mixture model[94ming[0m ([94mG[0m[94mMM[0m[94m)[0m [46]. L[94mCG[0m[94mA[0m[94m is[0m[94m often[0m[94m the[0m preferred[94m method[0m[94m for[0m[94m estim[0m[94mating[0m class[94m-[0m[94mspecific[0m traject[94mories[0m[94m when[0m[94m the[0m[94m interest[0m[94m of[0m the investig[94mator[0m lies sole[94mly[0m[94m in[0m[94m exam[0m[94mining[0m[94m predict[0mors[94m of[0m[94m membership[0m[94m in[0m qualit[94matively[0m unique[94m traject[0m[94mories[0m [[94m4[0m[94m7[0m[94m].[0m[94m The[0m models[94m are[0m less[94m complex[0m[94m ([0m[94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m requiring[94m fewer[0m estimated[94m parameters[0m[94m),[0m[94m minim[0m[94mizing[0m[94m the[0m[94m chance[0m[94m of[0m convergence problems[94m and[0m[94m impro[0mper[94m solutions[0m [[94m4[0m6[94m].[0m[94m Moreover[0m[94m,[0m[94m in[0m longitud[94minal[0m cohort studies[94m,[0m[94m L[0m[94mCG[0m[94mA[0m[94m has[0m[94m been[0m[94m found[0m[94m to[0m[94m out[0m[94mperform[0m[94m G[0m[94mMM[0m[94m and[0m[94m other[0m classification[94m techniques[0m[94m in[0m[94m detect[0m[94ming[0m[94m linear[0m[94m traject[0m[94mories[0m[94m [[0m[94m4[0m[94m8[0m[94m].[0m
Since[94m there[0m[94m is[0m[94m not[0m[94m a[0m[94m single[0m best[94m method[0m[94m for[0m[94m ident[0m[94mifying[0m[94m the[0m optimal[94m number[0m[94m of[0m[94m classes[0m[94m in[0m growth mixture[94m models[0m[94m,[0m[94m three[0m widely[94m accepted[0m fit statistics were chosen[94m:[0m[94m ([0m[94m1[0m) Bay[94mesian[0m information criter[94mion[0m ([94mB[0m[94mIC[0m);[94m ([0m[94m2[0m[94m)[0m[94m sample[0m size-ad[94mjust[0m[94med[0m BIC[94m ([0m[94mSS[0mA-[94mB[0mIC[94m);[0m[94m and[0m[94m ([0m[94m3[0m[94m)[0m[94m Lo[0m–[94mM[0mend[94mell[0m–Rub[94min[0m[94m lik[0m[94melihood[0m ratio test[94m ([0m[94mL[0mMR[94m-[0mLRT[94m)[0m[94m [[0m[94m4[0m[94m6[0m[94m].[0m[94m The[0m BIC[94m and[0m SSA-[94mB[0m[94mIC[0m[94m examine[0m[94m the[0m[94m impact[0m[94m of[0m[94m adding[0m an[94m additional[0m[94m of[0m model parameters[94m.[0m[94m Sm[0maller B[94mIC[0m values[94m are[0m[94m generally[0m associated[94m with[0m[94m the[0m better fitting model[94m with[0m differences of [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m or[0m[94m more[0m[94m used[0m to[94m favor[0m one model[94m over[0m[94m another[0m [[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m].[0m[94m The[0m LMR-L[94mRT[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m measure[0m[94m of[0m[94m relative[0m fit comparing[94m the[0m[94m fit[0m of[94m a[0m model[94m having[0m k[94m classes[0m[94m with[0m the fit[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m model[0m having[94m k[0m − 1[94m fewer[0m[94m classes[0m[94m.[0m[94m A[0m statist[94mically[0m significant[94m p[0m value[94m suggests[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m current[94m ([0m[94mk[0m[94m class[0m) model[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m significant[0m improvement[94m over[0m[94m the[0m model[94m with[0m[94m k[0m − [94m1[0m classes[94m.[0m[94m
[0mSelection of[94m the[0m optimal model was also gu[94mided[0m[94m by[0m[94m two[0m[94m indices[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m quality[94m of[0m[94m classification[0m accuracy[94m:[0m ([94m1[0m[94m)[0m entropy[94m,[0m a[94m standard[0mized measure[94m ([0mbounded between zero[94m and[0m one) of[94m an[0m[94m individual[0m’[94ms[0m[94m overall[0m probability[94m of[0m[94m being[0m in[94m the[0m most likely[94m convex[0m[94m Hamiltonian[0m systems with[94m an[0misotrop[94mic[0m[94m growth[0m[94m,[0m Front. [94m1[0m[94m5[0mbd0 [94m2[0m[94m4[0m 6[94m9[0m[94m [0m6e[94m [0m64[94m [0m65[94m [0m78 2[94m0[0m[94m [0m Crab[94m spectrum[0m to[94m increasing[0mly higher energies would be important to ensure that no[94m new[0m component appears[94m.[0m[94m D[0metection[94m of[0m[94m other[0m[94m objects[0m above[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m TeV[94m can[0m[94m be[0m expected although[94m—[0m[94mbecause[0m[94m of[0m[94m absor[0m[94mption[0m[94m by[0m intergalactic[94m radiation[0m fields—[94monly[0m sources[94m in[0m[94m our[0m Gal[94maxy[0m or its neighborhood[94m are[0m[94m visible[0m[94m at[0m[94m these[0m energ[94mies[0m[94m.[0m[94m Non[0m[94meth[0m[94meless[0m[94m,[0m[94m H[0mAWC has[94m shown[0m[94m that[0m[94m there[0m[94m are[0m many Galactic sources[94m in[0m[94m the[0m Te[94mV[0m band [[94m9[0m],[94m and[0m[94m hence[0m future det[94me[0m[94mctions[0m[94m could[0m shed light[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m highest[0m energy acceler[94mators[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m Milky Way[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m so[0m[94m-[0m[94mcalled[0m[94m Pe[0mVatrons[94m that[0m[94m are[0m[94m needed[0m[94m to[0m explain[94m what[0m[94m powers[0m the[94m p[0m[94meta[0m[94m-[0m[94melect[0m[94mron[0mvolt cosmic ray[94ms[0m that[94m get[0m[94m to[0m Earth[94m.[0m[94m Similarly[0m[94m,[0m[94m if[0m phot[94mons[0m[94m at[0m these[94m highest[0m[94m energ[0m[94mies[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m correl[0m[94mated[0m[94m with[0m neut[94mr[0mino events detected[94m by[0m[94m the[0m IceC[94mube[0m experiment[94m at[0m[94m the[0m South P[94mole[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m would[0m[94m provide[0m important[94m cl[0m[94mues[0m[94m about[0m[94m the[0m[94m origin[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m highest[94m energy[0m[94m neut[0m[94mr[0m[94minos[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m many[0m recent[94m discover[0m[94mies[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m field[0m[94m of[0m VHE g[94mamma[0m-ray astronomy[94m have[0m motiv[94mated[0m[94m the[0m[94m development[0m[94m of[0m[94m new[0m,[94m more[0m sensitive instruments[94m to[0m pro[94mbe[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m-[0m[94mTe[0m[94mV[0m[94m front[0m[94mier[0m[94m.[0m[94m One[0m[94m example[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m Lar[0m[94mge[0m High[94m Alt[0m[94mitude[0m Air Shower Observ[94matory[0m[94m ([0m[94mL[0m[94mHA[0m[94mAS[0m[94mO[0m[94m),[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m new[0m air show[94mer[0m experiment[94m that[0m was[94m recently[0m inaugur[94mated[0m[94m in[0m Sichuan[94m,[0m[94m China[0m[94m.[0m[94m Additionally[0m[94m,[0m[94m development[0m continues[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m Ch[0merenkov T[94meles[0mcope Array[94m ([0m[94mCT[0m[94mA[0m[94m),[0m[94m which[0m[94m will[0m[94m compr[0m[94mise[0m[94m two[0m large[94m arrays[0m[94m of[0m[94m atmos[0m[94mpher[0m[94mic[0m Cherenkov teles[94mcop[0m[94mes[0m[94m at[0m sites[94m in[0m Chile[94m and[0m Spain[94m.[0m[94m There[0m also[94m exists[0m significant interest[94m in[0m[94m a[0m[94m southern[0m hem[94mis[0m[94mphere[0m high[94m-[0malt[94mitude[0m air show[94mer[0m[94m experiment[0m [[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m].[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis[94m research[0m[94m is[0m[94m published[0m[94m in[0m Phys[94mical[0m Review Let[94mters[0m and[94m on[0m[94m the[0m ar[94mX[0miv.[94m

[0mTheorem[94m:[0m[94m Let[0m[94m there[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m linear regression[94m model[0m[94m with[0m independent observations

Why[94m would[0m[94m you[0m want[94m anything[0m else[94m?[0m Unless[94m we[0m[94m know[0m[94m for[0m[94m what[0m purpose you'[94mre[0m doing this[94m I[0m doubt we'd be[94m able[0m[94m to[0m improve on[94m your[0m idea[94m.[0m[94m To[0m be honest[94m I[0m don[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m see[0m the need[94m to[0m replace[94m the[0m xkcd'[94ms[0m version'[94ms[0m Lap[94mlace[0m transform with your Taylor[94m series[0m[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m you[0m want[94m something[0m complicated with integr[94mals[0m[94m and[0m such why[94m not[0m use[94m the[0m[94m official[0m version[94m that[0m[94m has[0m[94m integr[0m[94mals[0m and such?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAny[0m[94mway[0m[94m one[0m idea[94m which[0m[94m I[0m have[94m no[0m[94m idea[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m[94m what[0m you[94m'[0mre[94m looking[0m[94m for[0m[94m be[0m[94m tools[0m[94m ax[0m[94miom[0matic set theories)[94m supplied[0m a sensible tool[94m for[0m blocking contradict[94mions[0m[94m.[0m The[94m main[0m[94m ideas[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m ax[94miom[0matization[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m summar[0m[94mized[0m[94m as[0m[94m follows[0m[94m:[0m ([94mi[0m[94m)[0m naïve compreh[94mension[0m[94m is[0m restricted[94m to[0m[94m a[0m separation ax[94miom[0m[94m,[0m[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m to[94m a[0m principle grant[94ming[0m[94m the[0m[94m existence[0m[94m of[0m enough subsets of[94m an[0m already[94m given[0m[94m set[0m of objects (numbers[94m,[0m points[94m,[0m[94m functions[0m on[94m a[0m given[94m space[0m);[94m ‘[0menough[94m subsets[0m’ here[94m refers[0m[94m to[0m[94m all[0m[94m the[0m[94m subsets[0m specifiable[94m by[0m means[94m of[0m[94m definite[0m[94m conditions[0m involving[94m the[0m primitive not[94mions[0m[94m ([0m[94mset[0m equality[94m and[0m membership[94m)[0m[94m and[0m satisfying[94m the[0m laws[94m of[0m[94m classical[0m[94m logic[0m;[94m ([0m[94mii[0m[94m)[0m there[94m are[0m[94m ax[0m[94mi[0m[94moms[0m ens[94muring[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m basic[0m operations[94m of[0m[94m forming[0m singleton[94m,[0m union[94m,[0m[94m pair[0m[94ming[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m power[94m set[0m[94m are[0m[94m well[0m defined[94m and[0m that[94m there[0m[94m exist[0m[94m at[0m[94m least[0m an[94m infinite[0m set and[94m the[0m empty[94m set[0m;[94m ([0m[94miii[0m[94m)[0m ext[94mensional[0mity[94m is[0m[94m assumed[0m: two sets[94m are[0m equal[94m if[0m[94m and[0m[94m only[0m[94m if[0m[94m they[0m[94m have[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m elements;[94m ([0m[94miv[0m[94m)[0m[94m an[0m ax[94miom[0m[94m of[0m choice[94m is[0m post[94mulated[0m,[94m which[0m[94m allows[0m selecting[94m a[0m[94m choice[0m set out[94m of[0m[94m any[0m family[94m of[0m dis[94mjoint[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0m[94mempty[0m sets[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIt[0m[94m is[0m immediate[94m to[0m[94m see[0m[94m that[0m Burali-Forti’[94ms[0m[94m ant[0minomy cannot[94m be[0m[94m derived[0m in Zerm[94melo[0m’[94ms[0m[94m system[0m[94m,[0m[94m since[0m[94m the[0m collection[94m of[0m all order types does[94m not[0m exist as[94m a[0m set[94m,[0m[94m and[0m Russell’[94ms[0m par[94mado[0m[94mx[0m simply becomes[94m the[0m theorem[94m that[0m there does[94m not[0m exist[94m a[0m[94m universal[0m[94m set[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mHowever[0m[94m,[0m one[94m could[0m[94m raise[0m at[94m least[0m two ob[94mjections[0m against[94m the[0m theory[94m on[0m[94m different[0m[94m grounds[0m[94m.[0m First[94m of[0m[94m all[0m[94m,[0m[94m Z[0m[94merm[0m[94melo[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m approach[0m[94m is[0m[94m actually[0m highly imp[94mred[0micative[94m and[0m impred[94mic[0mativity was regarded[94m as[0m indispensable[94m by[0m him[94m ([0melse[94m one[0m[94m would[0m[94m be[0m forced[94m to[0m[94m reject[0m standard[94m mathematics[0m, e[94m.[0m[94mg[0m[94m.,[0m Z[94merm[0m[94melo[0m believed[94m this[0m[94m was[0m the[94m case[0m[94m even[0m with[94m the[0m Cauchy[94m-[0m[94mWe[0mierstr[94mass[0m proof of[94m the[0m[94m fundamental[0m[94m theorem[0m of[94m algebra[0m[94m).[0m[94m But[0m impredic[94mativity[0m makes[94m the[0m construction[94m of[0m[94m a[0m model[94m or[0m of an interpretation more[94m difficult[0m and[94m less[0m[94m evident[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m second[94m point[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m Z[0m[94merm[0m[94melo[0m[94m believed[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m par[0m[94mado[0m[94mx[0m of finite[94m den[0motation[94m ([0mmentioned[94m by[0m Hessenberg[94m)[0m and[94m Richard[0m’[94ms[0m[94m are[0m[94m blocked[0m[94m in[0m[94m set[0m[94m theory[0m[94m,[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m separation[0m[94m ax[0m[94miom[0m ought[94m to[0m yield[94m clear[0m[94m criteria[0m[94m for[0m defining[94m sets[0m[94m.[0m[94m But[0m[94m this[0m[94m is[0m not[94m the[0m[94m case[0m[94m,[0m[94m because[0m[94m Z[0m[94merm[0m[94melo[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m notion[94m of[0m[94m definite[0m property ([94mdefin[0m[94mite[0m E[94mig[0menschaft[94m)[0m[94m is[0m[94m given[0m inform[94mally[0m and is ultimately vague[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m latter[0m[94m issue[0m was taken[94m up[0m in W[94mey[0m[94ml[0m’[94ms[0m “[94mH[0m[94mabil[0mitation[94m”[0m lecture (1[94m9[0m[94m1[0m0[94m),[0m[94m where[0m[94m he[0m addressed[94m the[0m[94m general[0m question[94m:[0m[94m when[0m[94m is[0m a relation[94m explicitly[0m definable was[94m obtained[0m[94m from[0m all individual participants included[94m in[0m[94m the[0m study[94m.[0m Pat[94mients[0m referred for[94m this[0m[94m study[0m underwent un[94mil[0m[94mater[0m[94mal[0m total hip ar[94mth[0mroplasty[94m ([0m[94mUT[0mHA[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m were[0m[94m screen[0m[94med[0m[94m for[0m el[94mig[0m[94mibility[0m according[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m principle[0m[94m of[0m[94m inclusion[0m and[94m ex[0m[94mclusion[0m criteria[94m,[0m[94m as[0m reported[94m in[0m Table[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m American Society[94m of[0m An[94mest[0m[94mh[0mesiolog[94mists[0m[94m ([0m[94mAS[0m[94mA[0m[94m)[0m physical[94m health[0m status classification[94m4[0m[94m1[0m[94m is[0m used[94m as[0m inclusion[94m/[0m[94mex[0m[94mclusion[0m[94m criteria[0m[94m.[0m Specifically[94m,[0m patients[94m with[0m[94m some[0m com[94morb[0mid[94mities[0m[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m di[0mab[94metes[0m[94m,[0m chron[94mic[0m ren[94mal[0m failure[94m,[0m[94m and[0m heart[94m and[0m[94m resp[0m[94mir[0matory[94m dise[0m[94mases[0m[94m are[0m[94m ex[0m[94mcluded[0m[94m ([0m[94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m[94m AS[0m[94mA[0m ≥ [94m3[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0m[94m total[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m samples[0m[94m ([0m[94mtwo[0m per[94m patient[0m[94m)[0m[94m were[0m proc[94mured[0m[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m patients[0m[94m ([0m[94mden[0m[94moted[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m text as[94m bi[0mopsy#[94m1[0m[94m to[0m[94m bi[0m[94mops[0m[94my[0m[94m#[0m[94m5[0m[94m),[0m four men[94m and[0m one[94m woman[0m with[94m a[0m mean age[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m[94m6[0m [94myear[0m[94ms[0m[94m ([0m[94m4[0m[94m5[0m–[94m6[0m[94m7[0m[94m).[0m[94m Specifically[0m[94m,[0m two[94m sections[0m[94m,[0m ranging between[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m cm in thick[94mness[0m[94m and[0m width[94m,[0m[94m were[0m[94m obtained[0m[94m from[0m[94m each[0m[94m patients[0m[94m’[0m femoral head[94m as[0m[94m shown[0m[94m in[0m Fig[94m.[0m [94m7[0m[94m and[0m collected[94m as[0m[94m waste[0m surgical[94m material[0m[94m.[0m One sample was proc[94mured[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m infer[0mo[94m-[0mmedial[94m region[0m[94m ([0m[94mre[0mferred[94m to[0m as[94m the[0m[94m least[0m[94m weight[0m[94m-[0mb[94mear[0m[94ming[0m surface[94m,[0m[94m L[0m[94mW[0mB[94m)[0m[94m and[0m one[94m from[0m[94m the[0m supero[94m-[0m[94ml[0m[94mater[0m[94mal[0m[94m region[0m[94m ([0mre[94mferred[0m[94m as[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m most[0m[94m weight[0m[94m-[0m[94mb[0m[94mear[0m[94ming[0m[94m surface[0m[94m,[0m[94m M[0m[94mW[0mB[94m).[0m[94m Then[0m[94m,[0m[94m each[0m[94m sample[0m[94m was[0m fixed[94m in[0m[94m a[0m solution[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m% paraformaldehyde[94m ([0m[94mP[0mFA; Sigma-Aldrich, Milan[94m,[0m Italy[94m)[0m[94m for[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m h[94m,[0m was[94mhed[0m[94m in[0m distilled water[94m and[0m stored at[94m room[0m[94m temperature[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m solution[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m[94m%[0m ethanol[94m.[0m Before[94m measurement[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m sample[0m[94m was[0m[94m extracted[0m[94m from[0m ethanol and air-dried[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Histological[94m and[0m histomorph[94mometric[0m anal[94mys[0m[94mes[0m

[94mS[0mamples[94m were[0m processed for paraffin embedding after[94m the[0m[94m spect[0m[94mro[0mscop[94mic[0m[94m analysis[0m[94m.[0m[94m Specifically[0m[94m,[0m samples were[94m de[0mcalcified in[94m a[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m%[0m solution[94m of[0m Formic[94m ([0mACE[94mF[0m[94m,[0m[94m F[0miumicino[94m,[0m[94m Rome[0m[94m,[0m
