[0mNo, $\[94mDelta[0m P[94m$[0m does[94m not[0m[94m have[0m to equal zero[94m in[0m a bomb[94m cal[0m[94mor[0m[94mimeter[0m[94m,[0m[94m meaning[0m[94m pressure[0m[94m is[0m not[94m a[0m[94m constant[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m Re[94m:[0m[94m C[0m[94mp[0m &[94m C[0m[94mv[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mPost[0m[94med[0m: Sun Mar[94m [0m18[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m18[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m am
[94mNo[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m pressure[0m in[94m a[0m[94m bomb[0m cal[94mor[0m[94mimeter[0m[94m is[0m[94m subject[0m to change[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Re[94m:[0m[94m C[0m[94mp[0m[94m &[0m[94m C[0m[94mv[0m?[94m
[0m[94m
[0mPost[94med[0m[94m:[0m Sun Mar[94m [0m[94m1[0m8[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m1[94m8[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m4[94m5[0m am[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m above[0m answers,[94m are[0m[94m correct[0m, pressure is able[94m to[0m change while volume stays[94m constant[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m[94m solid[0m mensuration
[94m
[0m[94m3[0m posts[94m /[0m 0 new
Ren[94mzy[0m[94ml[0m Sarmient[94m...[0m[94m
[0m[94msol[0mid mensuration
[94m
[0m[94mf[0mitz[94mmer[0ml[94m dur[0mon[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#[94m1[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTo[0m[94m find[0m the volume[94m,[0m lateral and total surface[94m area[0m of[94m the[0m square pyramid shown[94m below[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
[94mLet[0m'[94ms[0m get[94m the[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m py[0mram[94mid[0m first[94m.[0m[94m
[0m
The[94m volume[0m of[94m the[0m right[94m py[0mram[94mid[0m[94m is[0m:[94m
[0m
$$[94mV[0m =[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m3[0m[94m}[0m[94mB[0m[94mh[0m$$[94m
[0m
[94mwhere[0m $[94mV[0m[94m$[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m volume[0m of[94m the[0m[94m py[0mram[94mid[0m,[94m $[0m[94mB[0m[94m$[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m area[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m base[0m[94m and[0m[94m $[0m[94mh[0m[94m$[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m height[0m of[94m the[0m[94m right[0m[94m py[0m[94mram[0m[94mid[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m
With that in mind[94m,[0m[94m the[0m or `Error[94m:[0m File `appendix[94m.[0msty' not found`[94m thus[0m[94m how[0m can I install[94m all[0m[94m such[0m files[94m in[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m[94m not[0m[94m have[0m[94m any[0m[94m problems[0m again[94m?[0m Thanks[94m.[0m[94m –[0m[94m [0m[94mjack[0maraz May[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0m '[94m1[0m[94m4[0m at[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m:[0m[94m5[0m[94m6[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m now[0m[94m im[0m trying `./install-tl --gui=[94mper[0m[94mlt[0mk`[94m its[0m[94m installing[0m some[94m more[0m[94m files[0m[94m.[0m Is[94m there[0m[94m any[0m[94m think[0m[94m that[0m I should do[94m addition[0mally[94m?[0m – [94mjack[0m[94mar[0m[94maz[0m[94m May[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m0[0m[94m '[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m6[94m:[0m[94m3[0m[94m5[0m
[94m
[0m[94mAs[0m[94m root[0m[94m,[0m[94m take[0m[94m the[0m LaTeX[94m full[0m name[94m:[0m
[94m
[0m``````[94m\[0m$ which latex
/opt[94m/[0mtexbin/latex[94m
[0m``````[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94mLa[0mTeX[94m is[0m[94m Ok[0m[94m!)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mStart[0m TexStudio[94m and[0m[94m select[0m[94m:[0m Options > Configure TexMaker[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mNow[0m modify[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94mnd[0m line[94m including[0m path `/opt[94m/[0m[94mtex[0m[94mbin[0m[94m/[0m`:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m``````[94m([0m[94mP[0m[94mdf[0mLa[94mTex[0m[94m)[0m[94m [0m[94m /[0m[94mopt[0m[94m/[0m[94mtex[0m[94mbin[0m[94m/[0m[94mpd[0m[94mfl[0matex[94m -[0msynctex=[94m1[0m -interaction=nonstopmode %.tex
``````
[94m
[0mDone![94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0mShould work[94m in[0m Te[94mX[0mStudio[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m8[0m.2[94m.)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• Welcome to[94m Te[0m[94mX[0m[94m.[0m[94mS[0mX[94m![0m You[94m can[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m look[94m at[0m our[94m st[0marter guide[94m to[0m familiarize yourself[94m further[0m[94m with[0m[94m our[0m[94m format[0m[94m.[0m[94m –[0m jub[94m0[0m[94mbs[0m Aug[94m [0m[94m9[0m '[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m2[0m[94m:[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m
[94m
[0m[94mAs[0m[94m ad[0mvised[94m above[0m[94m I[0m checked[94m the[0m tex directory which[94m was[0m[94m broken[0m[94m due[0m[94m to[0m some[94m changes[0m I made[94m in[0m[94m my[0m[94m computer[0m[94m.[0m[94m Thus[0m[94m I[0m[94m install[0m[94m it[0m again[94m by[0m using[94m the[0m[94m codes[0m[94m provided[0m[94m in[0m[94m tex[0mlive website which lead[94m me[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m partial[0m installation[94m,[0m[94m so[0m[94m it[0m gave different errors[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m install[0m[94m the[0m[94m full[0m[94m tex[0mlive[94m package[0m by using[94m
[0m[94m
[0m``````[94m  [0m[94m `[0msudo apt[94m-[0mget install texlive[94m-[0mfull[94m`[0m[94m
[0m``````[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIf[94m you[0m[94m are[0m[94m facing[0m[94m with[0m[94m very[0m[94m same[0m problem do[94m not[0m[94m forget[0m[94m to[0m remove[94m the[0m tex[94mlive[0m directory before[94m installation[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m in `/usr/local/texlive/2[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m/`.[94m Thanks[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m those[0m[94m who[0m[94m have[0m the[94m same[0m error[94m ([0m[94mfor[0m[94m example[0m[94m on[0m[94m a[0m[94m different[0m operating[94m system[0m[94m),[0m[94m this[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m the[0m[94m generalized[0m solution[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m problem[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m or[0m[94m why[0m[94m does[0m[94m it[0m[94m happen[0m?[94m
[0m
[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94mb[0m It[94m can[0m happen[94m caused[0m[94m because[0m[94m you[0m[94m installed[0m[94m a[0m[94m La[0m[94mTex[0m Editor[94m[[0m1[94m][0m[94m without[0m[94m having[0m installed[94m a[0m La[94mTex[0m Compiler[94m[[0m[94m2[0m[94m].[0m[94m ([0m[94mThat[0m[94m is[0m[94m how[0m I[94m got[0m[94m the[0m error[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m[94m comment[0m[94m,[0m[94m by[0m[94m @[0mDavid Carlisle[94m,[0m[94m imp[0mlicates[94m something[0m[94m else[0m[94m than[0m[94m just[0m[94m the[0m[94m Late[0m[94mx[0m Editor[94m ([0m[94mfor[0m[94m example[0m[94m slide[0m.
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m only[0m other problems I[94m see[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m class[0m B doesn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m act[94m like[0m[94m a[0m subclass[94m of[0m[94m A[0m at[94m all[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m should[94m use[0m our inheritance[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m-([0mid[94m)[0m initWith[94mA[0m1:(int[94m)[0m[94mx[0m andA[94m2[0m[94m:([0mNSString *)s and[94mA[0m[94m3[0m[94m:([0m[94mint[0m[94m)[0my[94m and[0mB:(NSString *)[94mz[0m {
self = [super init];[94m
[0mif[94m ([0mself[94m)[0m {[94m
[0mself.a[94m1[0m[94m =[0m x[94m;[0m[94m
[0mself[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m2[0m[94m =[0m s[94m;[0m[94m
[0m[94mself[0m[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m3[0m[94m =[0m[94m y[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0mself[94m.[0m[94mb[0m[94m =[0m[94m z[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0m[94m}[0m[94m
[0mreturn self[94m;[0m[94m
[0m}[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
[94mThere[0m'[94ms[0m more available[94m to[0m[94m us[0m then simply [super[94m init[0m];.[94m How[0m about try this[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m-([0m[94mid[0m[94m)[0m initWith[94mA[0m[94m1[0m[94m:([0m[94mint[0m[94m)[0m[94mx[0m[94m and[0m[94mA[0m[94m2[0m[94m:([0mNSString *)[94ms[0m[94m and[0m[94mA[0m[94m3[0m[94m:([0m[94mint[0m[94m)[0m[94my[0m[94m and[0m[94mB[0m[94m:([0mNSString *)[94mz[0m[94m {[0m[94m
[0m[94mself[0m[94m =[0m[94m [[0m[94msuper[0m initWith[94mA[0m[94m1[0m:[94mx[0m and[94mA[0m[94m2[0m[94m:[0m[94ms[0m[94m and[0m[94mA[0m[94m3[0m[94m:[0m[94my[0m];[94m
[0mif[94m ([0m[94mself[0m[94m)[0m[94m {[0m[94m
[0m_b =[94m z[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0m}[94m
[0m[94mreturn[0m[94m self[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0m[94m}[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mLet[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m let[94m A[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m initWith... method[94m take[0m care[94m of[0m[94m the[0m parameters it[94m takes[0m care[94m of[0m and let[94m B[0m just handle[94m the[0m parameters that B adds.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mNow in B[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m description[0m method[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m-(NSString *) description {[94m
[0mreturn [NSString stringWithFormat:@"[94mClass[0m[94mB[0m a[94m1[0m = %d ,[94m a[0m[94m2[0m[94m =[0m %@ ,[94m a[0m[94m3[0m[94m =[0m %d[94m ,[0m[94m b[0m[94m =[0m[94m %[0m@"[94m ,[0m self.a[94m1[0m, self[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m self[0m[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m3[0m[94m,[0m[94m self[0m[94m.[0m[94mb[0m];[94m
[0m}[94m
[0m

[94mAg[0m[94main[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m make use[94m at[0m all of[94m the[0m fact[94m that[0m we'[94mre[0m a subclass.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFirst[0m[94m of[0m[94m,[0m[94m let[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m make[0m[94m a[0m small[94m change[0m[94m to[0m[94m A[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m description[0m method[94m,[0m like so:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m-(NSString[94m *)[0m[94m description[0m[94m {[0m[94m
[0mreturn[94m [[0mNSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ a[94m1[0m[94m =[0m[94m %[0md[94m ,[0m[94m a[0m[94m2[0m[94m =[0m[94m %[0m@ ,[94m a[0m[94m3[0m[94m =[0m %[94md[0m[94m",[0m[94m
[0m[94m[[0mself class], self[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m self[0m[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m self[0m[94m.[0m[94ma[0m[94m3[0m];[94m
[0m[94m}[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mNow[0m rather[94m than[0m[94m assuming[0m[94m this[0m[94m method[0m has[94m been[0m called[94m for[0m ClassA[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m just[0m return[94m the[0m name of[94m the[0m class[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m first[0m part[94m of[0m[94m the[0m string[94m.[0m[94m Now[0m[94m let[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m improve[94m B[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m- (NSString *)description[94m {[0m[94m
[0m[94mreturn[0m [[super description][94m string[0mByAppendingFormat:@", b = %@", self[94m.[0mb];[94m
[0m[94m}[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAnd finally[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m can[0m remove[94m the[0m property declarations[94m of[0m a[94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m a[0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m a[0m[94m3[0m,[94m ”[0m[94mJack[0m[94mson[0m[94m in[0m[94mequal[0m[94mities[0m[94m on[0m a sphere[94m in[0mL[94m [0m[94m2[0m,”[94mI[0mzv. Vyssh. Uchebn. Zaved[94m.[0m Mat.[94m [[0mRuss[94mian[0m Math[94m.[0m[94m ([0m[94mI[0m[94mz[0m.[94m V[0mUZ[94m)[0m[94m],[0m No[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m8[0m([94m3[0m9[94m9[0m),[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0m–[94m2[0m[94m0[0m ([94m1[0m9[94m9[0m[94m5[0m).[94m ·[0m Zbl[94m [0m08[94m6[0m[94m0[0m.4[94m1[0m0[94m1[0m[94m5[0m
[94mThis[0m reference list[94m is[0m based[94m on[0m information[94m provided[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m publish[94mer[0m or from digital mathematics libraries[94m.[0m Its items[94m are[0m heurist[94mically[0m matched to zbMATH identifiers[94m and[0m may[94m contain[0m data conversion[94m errors[0m[94m.[0m It attempts[94m to[0m reflect[94m the[0m references listed[94m in[0m[94m the[0m original paper[94m as[0m accur[94mately[0m[94m as[0m[94m possible[0m without claim[94ming[0m the comple[94mten[0m[94mess[0m or perfect precision[94m of[0m[94m the[0m matching[94m.[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m #[94m \[0m[94msq[0m[94mr[0m[94mts[0mign and[94m \[0m[94msqrt[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m following[0m[94m lines[0m[94m caught[0m my[94m attention[0m while brow[94msing[0m source[94m2[0me while[94m looking[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m definition[94m of[0m another command[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m\[94mDec[0m[94mlare[0mMath[94mRad[0mical[94m{\[0msq[94mr[0m[94mts[0m[94mign[0m}{symbol[94ms[0m[94m}{[0m"[94m7[0m[94m0[0m[94m}{[0mlarg[94mes[0mymbol[94ms[0m[94m}{[0m[94m"[0m[94m7[0m[94m0[0m}[94m
[0m[94m
[0m
[94mand[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m\[0m[94mDec[0m[94mlare[0mRobustCommand\sqrt[94m{\[0m@ifnextchar[\@sqrt\sq[94mr[0m[94mts[0m[94mign[0m}
[94m\[0mdef\@sqrt[94m[[0m#1[94m]{\[0mroot #[94m1[0m\of}[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWhat[0m[94m was[0m[94m \[0m[94msq[0m[94mr[0m[94mts[0m[94mign[0m[94m for[0m?[94m I[0m[94m tried[0m[94m \[0m[94msq[0m[94mr[0m[94mts[0m[94mign[0m{[94mx[0m[94m}[0m[94m and[0m[94m it[0m outputs something similar[94m to[0m[94m \[0m[94msqrt[0m[94m{[0m[94mx[0m[94m}.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m-[0m[94m
[0m
[94mThe[0m definition[94m of[0m LaTeX'[94ms[0m \[94msqrt[0m[94m is[0m[94m
[0m[94m\[0mDec[94mlare[0m[94mRob[0m[94must[0mCommand[94m\[0m[94msqrt[0m[94m{\[0m[94m@[0m[94mif[0m[94mnext[0m[94mchar[0m[94m[\[0m[94m@[0m[94msqrt[0m[94m\[0m[94msq[0m[94mr[0m[94mts[0m[94mign[0m}[94m
[0m
which[94m means[0m[94m that[0m[94m if[0m[94m the[0m optional argument[94m is[0m[94m used[0m[94m ([0m[94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m[94m if[0m[94m the[0m[94m next[0m character[94m after[0m[94m \[0m[94msqrt[0m[94m is[0m[94m [[0m),[94m \[0m[94m@[0msqrt is[94m used[0m[94m ([0m[94mand[0m[94m this[0m in its turn[94m,[0m uses[94m \[0mroot[94m#[0m[94m1[0m[94m\[0m[94mof[0m whose[94m definition[0m can[94m be[0m[94m found[0m[94m on[0m[94m page[0m [94m2[0m10 of[94m source[0m[94m2[0me.pdf[94m)[0m[94m to[0m[94m types[0met[94m the[0m radical index[94m and[0m the subradical[94m expression[0m[94m;[0m if[94m no[0m optional[94m argument[0m[94m is[0m[94m given[0m[94m,\[0msq[94mr[0m[94mts[0m[94mign[0m is[94m used[0m[94m to[0m typeset[94m the[0m[94m sub[0m[94mrad[0m[94mical[0m[94m expression[0m[94m (\[0msq[94mr[0m[94mts[0m[94mign[0m[94m doesn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m allow[0m[94m an[0m optional[94m argument[0m[94m).[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m Inte[94mgra[0m[94mb[0m[94mility[0m and differenti[94mability[0m[94m of[0m convolution[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m fundamental[0m solution[94m and[0m an integrable[94m function[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mDef[0m[94mine[0m[94m a[0m[94m function[0m $\Gamma[94m(\[0mcdot[94m)$[0m[94m as[0m $$\[94mGamma[0m([94mx[0m-y[94m)=\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m\[94mpi[0m[94m}\[0m[94mlog[0m[94m\|[0m[94mx[0m[94m-[0m[94my[0m[94m\|[0m[94m,\[0m[94mquad[0m x[94m\[0mneq[94m y[0m[94m$$[0m[94m where[0m[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m=([0m[94mx[0m_[94m1[0m[94m,[0mx[94m_[0m which case the field id[94m.[0m[94ms[0m or[94m the[0m[94m expression[0m expr[94m.[0m[94ms[0m are evaluated.[94m T[0mogether[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m value[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m field[94m,[0m[94m an[0m additional[94m quantity[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m evaluated[0m:[94m the[0m components[94m of[0m[94m the[0m gradient[94m ([0mG[94mX[0m,GY[94m,[0m[94mG[0m[94mZ[0m[94m),[0m[94m the[0m[94m norm[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m gradient[0m[94m ([0mG[94mMO[0mD[94m),[0m[94m the[0m[94m components[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m H[0mess[94mian[0m ([94mH[0mXX[94m,[0m…[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m Lap[0mlacian[94m of[0m[94m the[0m reference[94m ([0mor[94m the[0m id.s[94m)[0m field[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Plan[94mes[0m and Contour[94m Pl[0mots[94m ([0m[94mPL[0mANE[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mPL[0m[94mAN[0m[94mE[0m[94m x[0m0.r y[94m0[0m[94m.[0mr[94m z[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m x[0m1[94m.[0mr[94m y[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m z[0m[94m1[0m.[94mr[0m[94m x[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m y[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m z[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m n[94mx[0m.i ny[94m.[0mi[94m
[0m[94m[[0m[94mS[0mCALE sx.r sy[94m.[0m[94mr[0m][94m [[0mEXTEND[94mX[0m[94m z[0mx[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m z[94mx[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m][0m[94m [[0mEXT[94mEND[0mY z[94my[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m z[0m[94my[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m][0m
[94m[[0mFILE file.[94ms[0m[94m][0m[94m [[0mFIELD id[94m.[0m[94ms[0m/"expr[94m"][0m
[94m[[0m[94mF[0m[94m,[0m[94mG[0mX[94m,[0m[94mG[0m[94mY[0m[94m,[0m[94mG[0m[94mZ[0m,G[94mMO[0m[94mD[0m[94m,[0m[94mH[0mXX[94m,[0m[94mH[0mXY[94m,[0m[94mH[0mX[94mZ[0m[94m,[0m[94mH[0mYY[94m,[0m[94mH[0mY[94mZ[0m[94m,[0m[94mH[0m[94mZ[0mZ[94m,[0mL[94mAP[0m][94m
[0m[94m[[0mCONTOUR {[94mLOG[0m[94m n[0miso.[94mi[0m[94m [[0m[94mz[0mmin.r zmax.[94mr[0m[94m][0m[94m|[0mAT[94mAN[0m niso.[94mi[0m[94m [[0mzmin[94m.[0mr z[94mmax[0m.r[94m][0m[94m|[0m[94m
[0mB[94mAD[0m[94mER[0m[94m|[0mLIN[94m n[0miso.i [[94mr[0m[94mini[0m[94m.[0mr rend.r[94m][0m[94m|[0m[94mi[0m1[94m.[0m[94mr[0m i2.r ...}][94m [[0mCOLORMAP[94m [[0m[94mLOG[0m[94m|[0mAT[94mAN[0m]][94m
[0m[94m[[0m[94mRE[0mLIEF zmin[94m.[0mr zmax.[94mr[0m[94m][0m[94m [[0mLABEL[94mZ[0m label[94mz[0m.[94mr[0m][94m
[0m[94m
[0mCalcul[94mate[0m[94m the[0m[94m value[0m (or derivatives[94m)[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m reference[0m field on a plane[94m.[0m The[94m results[0m[94m are[0m written to a file,[94m with[0m default name <[94mroot[0m[94m>[0m_plane[94m.[0mdat.[94m The[0m geometry[94m of[0m[94m the[0m plane[94m is[0m specified[94m by[0m three[94m points[0m[94m:[0m the[94m origin[0m[94m ([0mx[94m0[0m.[94mr[0m[94m,[0m[94m y[0m0[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m,[0m[94m z[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m),[0m[94m the[0m[94m end[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m x[0m[94m-[0m[94maxis[0m[94m ([0m[94mx[0m1.[94mr[0m[94m,[0m y1[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m,[0m[94m z[0m1[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m),[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m end[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m y[0m[94m-[0m[94maxis[0m[94m ([0mx2[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m,[0m[94m y[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m,[0m[94m z[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94mr[0m[94m).[0m[94m The[0m number[94m of[0m[94m points[0m[94m calculated[0m[94m on[0m[94m each[0m[94m axis[0m are given[94m by[0m nx.i[94m ([0mx-axis[94m)[0m and[94m ny[0m.[94mi[0m[94m ([0m[94my[0m[94m-[0m[94maxis[0m[94m).[0m[94m The[0m units[94m are[0m[94m cry[0m[94mstal[0mlographic[94m coordinates[0m in[94m a[0m crystal[94m,[0m[94m and[0m mole[94mcular[0m Cart[94m(-[0m1)([94m3[0m[x[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m])[0m" "=" } {\[94mln[0m}^{- 1[94m}[0m \left([94mx[0m\right[94m)$[0m
[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m "3([94mx[0m[94m-[0m[94m1[0m)" "=" }[94m x[0m$
[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m[94m }[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m x[0m[94m -[0m[94m [0m1 = x$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m[94m }[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m x[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m[94m }[0m[94m x[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mApr 5[94m,[0m[94m [0m2[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m7[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSol[0m[94mution[0m to b) $\[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m[94m }[0m[94m x[0m \approx[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m7[94m7[0m3 \[94mldots[0m[94m$[0m[94m to[0m 3 decimal[94m places[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### Ex[94mplan[0m[94mation[0m:

[94mSol[0m[94mution[0m[94m to[0m[94m b[0m[94m)[0m
[94m
[0mUsing an example: note[94m that[0m $\[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m[94m }[0m[94m [0m2[94m \[0mln \left(a[94m\[0m[94mright[0m)[94m \[0mto[94m \[0mln[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[94m({[0m[94ma[0m}^{[94m2[0m}\[94mright[0m)$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSo[0m we[94m have[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0mln[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[{\left([94m5[0m x\[94mright[0m)}^{3}\[94mright[0m] -[94m \[0m[94mln[0m[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[94m({[0mx}^{[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m[94mright[0m)[94m =[0m[94m [0m7[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$\[94mln[0m[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[94m[\[0mfrac[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m {[94mx[0m}^{[94m3[0m[94m}}{[0m[94mx[0m}[94m ^[0m[94m [0m2[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m][0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0mln[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m([94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m x\[94mright[0m[94m)[0m =[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$[0m{\ln}^{- [94m1[0m} \[94mleft[0m([94m1[0m2[94m5[0m[94m x[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m {\[94mln[0m[94m}^{-[0m [94m1[0m[94m}[0m \[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94m7[0m\[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m \[0m[94mleft[0marrow \[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m not convinced this will work![94m}$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mTry[94ming[0m[94m something[0m else[94m![0m[94m
[0m
$\ln[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m([94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m + \ln \[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m\[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m$[94m
[0m
[94m$\[0m[94mln[0m[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m(x[94m\[0m[94mright[0m)[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m -[0m[94m \[0mln[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m5[94m\[0m[94mright[0m)$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$[94mx[0m[94m =[0m {\ln}^{- 1}[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m([94mx[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m {\[0m[94mln[0m}^{- [94m1[0m}[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[\textcolor[94m{[0mw[94m h[0m i t e}{\frac{2}{2[94m}}[0m [94m7[0m -[94m \[0m[94mln[0m[94m \[0m[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m5[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m \[0mtextcolor[94m{[0mw h i t e[94m}{\[0mfrac[94m{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m}}\[94mright[0m[94m]$[0m[94m
[0m
[94m$[0m[94mx[0m[94m \[0m[94mapprox[0m[94m [0m8[94m.[0m7[94m7[0m3[94m \[0m[94mldots[0m[94m$[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m decimal[0m[94m places[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m Question[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#[94m The[0m electric[94m potential[0m at[94m a[0m point $$([94mx[0m[94m,[0m y[94m)$$[0m in an[94m electric[0m[94m field[0m[94m is[0m[94m given[0m[94m by[0m $$V[94m=[0m6 x[94m y[0m+[94my[0m^{[94m2[0m[94m}-[0mx^{[94m2[0m}$$ Calculate[94m the[0m electric field at that[94m ${\[0mOmega[94m}$[0m[94m is[0m separ[94mating[0m since[94m ${[0mK}$[94m is[0m[94m not[0m local[94mized[0m[94m to[0m any sub[94mregion[0m).[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m the[0m last[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m pre[0mliminaries[94m,[0m[94m we[0m note the[94m following[0m useful[94m ident[0m[94mities[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0mdisplaystyle J[94m\[0m[94mDelta[0m^{[94m1[0m/[94m2[0m[94m}=\[0mDelta^{-[94m1[0m/[94m2[0m}J[94m\[0m[94mquad[0m[94m\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94mand[0m[94m}\[0m[94mquad[0m[94m J[0m^[94m2[0m=1\,\iff[94m\,[0m[94mJ[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m1[0m}=[94mJ[0m[94m~[0m.[94m \[0m \[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m (5)$[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTh[0m[94mese[0m essentially follow[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m fact[0m[94m that[0m[94m ${[0mS[94m^[0m2[94m\[0m![94m=\[0m![94m1[0m}$[94m in[0m conj[94munction[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m polar decomposition[94m.[0m Com[94mbin[0m[94ming[0m ([94m5[0m[94m)[0m with the a[94mfor[0m[94mement[0m[94mioned[0m[94m fact[0m that[94m ${[0m[94mS[0m[94m'[0m=S^\dagger}$ leads[94m to[0m[94m ${[0mJ[94m'[0m=[94mJ[0m}$[94m and[0m ${\[94mDelta[0m[94m'[0m=\[94mDelta[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m1[0m}}$.[94m Finally[0m[94m,[0m[94m express[0m[94ming[0m[94m ${[0m[94mJ[0m[94m}$[0m[94m in[0m[94m terms[0m[94m of[0m[94m ${[0mS[94m}$[0m[94m and[0m ${\[94mDelta[0m[94m}$[0m via[94m ([0m[94m2[0m[94m)[0m enables one[94m to[0m show[94m that[0m[94m it[0m[94m like[0mwise[94m leaves[0m[94m the[0m vacu[94mum[0m invariant[94m;[0m i[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m we[94m have[0m
[94m
[0m[94m$\[0m[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m S[0m|\Omega\rangle[94m=[0m[94mJ[0m|\[94mOmega[0m[94m\[0m[94mrangle[0m[94m=\[0mDelta[94m|\[0m[94mOmega[0m[94m\[0m[94mrangle[0m[94m=[0m|\[94mOmega[0m[94m\[0mrangle~.[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m ([94m6[0m[94m)$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mNow[0m[94m,[0m the[94m fundamental[0m[94m result[0m[94m of[0m Tomita-Takesaki theory[94m is[0m compr[94mised[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m following[0m two facts[94m:[0m first[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m mod[0m[94mular[0m operator ${\[94mDelta[0m[94m}$[0m defines[94m a[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m-[0mparameter family[94m of[0m[94m mod[0m[94mular[0m autom[94morph[0m[94misms[0m
[94m
[0m$\[94mdisplaystyle[0m \Delta[94m^{[0mit[94m}\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mA[0m[94m}\[0mDelta^{-it}=\mathcal[94m{[0m[94mA[0m}~[94m,\[0m[94m;\[0m[94m;\[0mforall[94m t[0m\[94min[0m[94m\[0mmathbb[94m{[0m[94mR[0m[94m}[0m~.[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m ([94m7[0m)$[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIn other words[94m,[0m[94m the[0m algebra ${\mathcal[94m{[0m[94mA[0m[94m}}$[0m is[94m invariant[0m[94m under[0m[94m mod[0m[94mular[0m flow[94m.[0m Second[94m,[0m[94m the[0m mod[94mular[0m[94m conjug[0mation indu[94mces[0m[94m an[0m[94m isomorphism[0m[94m between[0m[94m the[0m algebra[94m and[0m[94m its[0m commutant ${\[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mA[0m}'[94m}$,[0m[94m
[0m
$\[94mdisplaystyle[0m[94m J[0m[94m\[0mmathcal[94m{[0m[94mA[0m[94m}[0mJ=\mathcal[94m{[0m[94mA[0m[94m}'[0m~,[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m[94m \[0m ([94m8[0m)$[94m
[0m[94m
[0mi[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m ${\[94mforall[0m[94m\[0mmathcal[94m{[0m[94mO[0m[94m}\[0min\mathcal[94m{[0m[94mA[0m}}$, ${[94mJ[0m[94m}$[0m[94m defines[0m[94m an[0m[94m element[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0mO}'\equiv J[94m\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mO[0m}J}$ such[94m that[0m[94m ${[0m[\[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mO[0m},\[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0mO}']=0[94m}$.[0m The isomorphism (8[94m)[0m[94m is[0m rather remarkable[94m:[0m[94m it[0m allows one[94m to[0m map operators between[94m the[0m[94m left[0m[94m and[0m[94m right[0m[94m R[0mindler wed[94mges[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m features crucially[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m works[0m[94m of[0m Pap[94mad[0modimas[94m and[0m Raj[94mu[0m[94m on[0m[94m re[0mconstruct[94ming[0m black hole[94m inter[0miors [[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m3[0m[94m].[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mTo demonstrate how[94m this[0m[94m works[0m[94m,[0m[94m Origin[0m[94mally[0m Post[94med[0m by[94m pres[0mcott2[94m0[0m0[94m6[0m[94m
[0mwho know[94m how[0m[94m to[0m convert[94m z[0m[94m/([0m[94mz[0m^[94m2[0m[94m+[0m[94m9[0m[94m)[0m to z/([94mz[0m[94m+[0m[94m3[0m[94mi[0m)/[94m([0m[94mz[0m[94m-[0m[94m3[0m[94mi[0m)?[94mi[0m really[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m have[0m[94m any[0m[94m idea[0m[94m how[0m the book convert it[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m[94m you[0m don[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m see[0m[94m it[0m,[94m do[0m[94m it[0m[94m backwards[0m[94m and[0m[94m FO[0m[94mIL[0m[94m it[0m out[94m.[0m Otherwise[94m:[0m[94m
[0m$[94mx[0m^[94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m =[0m[94m x[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m -[0m (-[94m9[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m ([0m[94mx[0m[94m +[0m \[94msqrt[0m[94m{-[0m[94m9[0m[94m})[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m -[0m[94m \[0m[94msqrt[0m[94m{-[0m[94m9[0m[94m})[0m[94m =[0m[94m ([0m[94mx[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mi[0m[94m)([0m[94mx[0m[94m -[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mi[0m[94m)$[0m[94m
[0m
[94m-[0m[94mDan[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m Less[94mon[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mDef[0mining Transl[94mations[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m.1[94m:[0m[94m Notice[0m and Wonder[94m:[0m Two[94m Tri[0m[94mangles[0m[94m and[0m[94m an[0m[94m Ar[0mrow[94m ([0m[94m5[0m[94m minutes[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m W[0marm[94m-[0m[94mup[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m purpose[94m of[0m[94m this[0m[94m warm[0m[94m-[0m[94mup[0m[94m is[0m[94m to[0m elicit[94m the[0m idea[94m that[0m[94m a[0m[94m translation[0m[94m takes[0m[94m each[0m[94m point[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m direction[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m same[94m distance[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m useful[0m[94m when[0m students investigate transl[94mations[0m[94m throughout[0m this less[94mon[0m[94m.[0m While students[94m may[0m[94m notice[0m and wonder many[94m things[0m about[94m these[0m images[94m,[0m[94m the[0m “[94marrow[0m[94m”[0m and its relation[94m to[0m[94m the[0m tri[94mangles[0m is the[94m important[0m discussion point[94m.[0m[94m By[0m[94m eng[0m[94maging[0m in discussion[94m and[0m[94m thinking[0m[94m ab[0mound the mathematics[94m involved[0m with[94m the[0m “[94marrow[0m,” students are making sense[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m problem[0m ([94mMP[0m1).[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m La[0munch[94m
[0m[94m
[0mDisplay the image[94m for[0m[94m all[0m to[94m see[0m[94m.[0m Ask students to[94m think[0m[94m of[0m at least[94m one[0m thing[94m they[0m notice[94m and[0m[94m at[0m least[94m one[0m thing[94m they[0m wonder[94m.[0m Give students [94m1[0m minute[94m of[0m quiet[94m think[0m time[94m,[0m[94m and[0m then[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m minute[0m[94m to[0m discuss[94m the[0m[94m things[0m[94m they[0m[94m notice[0m with their partner[94m,[0m[94m followed[0m[94m by[0m a[94m whole[0m-class discussion[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m Student[0m[94m F[0macing[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWhat do[94m you[0m notice[94m?[0m What do[94m you[0m wonder[94m?[0m

###[94m Student[0m Response[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m access[0m[94m,[0m consult[94m one[0m of our[94m IM[0m Certified[94m Part[0m[94mners[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Activity Synthesis[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0msk students to share[94m the[0m things[94m they[0m[94m noticed[0m[94m and[0m wondered[94m.[0m Record[94m and[0m display[94m their[0m responses[94m for[0m[94m all[0m to see[94m.[0m If possible[94m,[0m[94m record[0m[94m the[0m[94m relevant[0m reasoning[94m on[0m[94m or[0m near the image[94m.[0m[94m After[0m[94m all[0m responses have[94m been[0m[94m recorded[0m[94m without[0m commentary[94m or[0m editing[94m,[0m ask students[94m,[0m “Is there anything[94m on[0m[94m this[0m list you are wondering[94m about[0m[94m now[0m?” Encourage students[94m to[0m[94m respect[0mfully disag[94mree[0m,[94m ask[0m[94m for[0m clar[94mification[0m[94m,[0m or[94m point[0m[94m out[0m contradict[94ming[0m information[94m.[0m If[94m connecting[0m points of[94m one[0m triangle to[94m their[0m corresponding[94m points[0m on[94m the[0m other does[94m not[0m[94m come[0m[94m up[0m during[94m the[0m conversation[94m,[0m[94m ask[0m students to discuss this idea[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## [94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m) Di[94magon[0m[94mals[0m AC and[94m B[0m[94mD[0m of[94m quad[0m[94mril[0m[94mater[0m[94mal[0m[94m ABC[0m[94mD[0m intersect[94ms[0m[94m at[0m O . If[94m AB[0m[94m=[0m[94mCD[0m[94m ,[0m then show that[94m [0m[94m1[0m)[94m ar[0m(DOC[94m)[0m[94m =[0m ar[94m([0m[94mA[0m[94mOB[0m[94m)[0m [94m2[0m[94m)[0m[94m ar[0m[94m ([0mDC[94mB[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m ar[0m[94m([0mAC[94mB[0m[94m)[0m[94m [[0m[94m question[0m from NCERT class 9 textbook[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m triangle[0m[94m AB[0m[94mD[0m[94m ,[0m[94m A[0m[94mO[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m median[0m[94m therefore[0m ar[94m([0m[94mA[0m[94mOB[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m ar[0m[94m([0m[94mA[0mOD[94m)[0m[94m [[0m[94m since[0m median[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m triangle[0m[94m div[0m[94mides[0m[94m it[0m[94m into[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m tri[0m[94mangles[0m[94m with[0m[94m equal[0m[94m areas[0m ]................................[94m...[0m[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m)[0m and also in[94m triangle[0m[94m B[0m[94mCD[0m[94m ,[0m CO[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m median[0m[94m and[0m[94m ar[0m[94m([0m[94mCO[0m[94mB[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m ar[0m ( CO[94mD[0m[94m)[0m ................................[94m...[0m[94m([0m[94m2[0m[94m)[0m .[94m Adding[0m[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m ([0m[94m2[0m[94m)[0m[94m we[0m[94m get[0m ar[94m([0m[94mAB[0m[94mD[0m)=[94m ar[0m[94m([0mBC[94mD[0m[94m)[0m . Thus[94m diagonal[0m[94m div[0m[94mides[0m it[94m into[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m con[0m[94mgru[0m[94ment[0m[94m tri[0m[94mangles[0m[94m.[0m[94m Now[0m[94m we[0m consider equal[94m lines[0m[94m AB[0m[94m and[0m[94m CD[0m after joining their[94m end[0m points we[94m would[0m either[94m get[0m[94m an[0m[94m is[0m[94mos[0m[94mcel[0m[94mes[0m[94m tra[0mpez[94mium[0m if[94m the[0m[94m lines[0m[94m are[0m not[94m parallel[0m[94m or[0m a par[94malle[0m[94mlo[0m[94mgram[0m[94m if[0m the[94m lines[0m[94m are[0m[94m parallel[0m[94m .[0m[94m But[0m[94m the[0m diagonal of[94m a[0m[94m is[0m[94mos[0m[94m.[0m tra[94mpez[0m[94mium[0m does[94m not[0m divide it[94m into[0m [94m2[0m tri[94mangles[0m with[94m equal[0m[94m areas[0m[94m ,[0m[94m therefore[0m[94m it[0m[94m must[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m[94m par[0m[94malle[0m[94mlo[0m[94mgram[0m[94m .[0m[94m Now[0m tri[94mangles[0m AC[94mB[0m[94m and[0m[94m B[0mCD[94m are[0m on[94m the[0m[94m same[0m base[94m BC[0m and between same par[94malle[0mls AD[94m and[0m BC[94m .[0m[94m therefore[0m ar[94m([0m[94mDC[0mB)=[94mar[0m[94m([0m[94mAC[0mB)[94m [[0m proof[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m][0m[94m and[0m[94m subtract[0m[94ming[0m ar[94m([0mBOC[94m)[0m[94m from[0m[94m both[0m[94m sides[0m[94m we[0m[94m get[0m[94m ar[0m[94m([0mDOC[94m)=[0m[94mar[0m[94m([0m[94mA[0m[94mOB[0m] [ proof[94m [0m1 ] . Hence[94m proved[0m . [ The question can easily be done[94m by[0m drawing[94m per[0m[94mpend[0m[94micular[0ms from B[94m and[0m[94m D[0m on[94m AC[0m[94m.][0m[94m

[0m[94mNote[0m by Karandeep Singh Lud[94mhar[0m

[94m[[0m[94mAdd[0m[94ming[0m[94m ([0m1)[94m and[0m[94m ([0m2) we[94m get[0m ar[94m([0mABD)=[94m ar[0m[94m([0m[94mBC[0m[94mD[0m[94m)[0m[94m ][0m................................[94m....[0m this[94m part[0m[94m of[0m your answer goes wrong because[94m this[0m part can be[94m only[0m[94m be[0m[94m pro[0moved[94m if[0m[94m bo[0m would be[94m the[0m median[94m if[0m BO[94m would[0m[94m be[0m the[94m median[0m than[94m T[0mRIANGLE[94m BO[0mC AND BOA would[94m have[0m equal area[94m.[0m and[94m then[0m ar[94m[[0mcob]=ar[boa].[94m Then[0m area[94m of[0m all the[94m four[0m[94m tri[0m[94mangles[0m[94m would[0m[94m be[0m[94m equal[0m[94m.[0m then you[94m can[0m prove your first part.[94m so[0m[94m,[0m this[94m prove[0m is wrong.[94m ·[0m [94m2[0m [94myear[0m[94ms[0m, [94m4[0m [94mmonth[0m[94ms[0m[94m ago[0m[94m
[0m
[94mBut[0m , I[94m have[0m not used[94m BO[0m .[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m just[0m used median[94m also[0m gives a[94m form[0m[94m of[0m[94m Cant[0m[94mor[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m theorem[94m,[0m[94m which[0m capt[94mures[0m[94m the[0m logical essence[94m of[0m[94m diagonal[0m[94mization[0m[94m ([0mthis version[94m is[0m by now folklore[94m):[0m[94m no[0m[94m binary[0m relation[94m can[0m parameter[94mize[0m all unary pred[94mic[0mates[94m over[0m[94m a[0m given domain[94m $$[0m[94mU[0m[94m$$[0m ([94mi[0m[94m.[0me[94m.,[0m[94m no[0m[94m binary[0m[94m relation[0m $$[94mR[0m$$ exists such[94m that[0m[94m for[0m[94m all[0m[94m un[0m[94mary[0m[94m pred[0m[94mic[0m[94mates[0m[94m $$[0m[94mP[0m[94m$$[0m[94m over[0m[94m $$[0m[94mU[0m$$,[94m there[0m is[94m an[0m object[94m $$[0ma[94m$$[0m[94m in[0m[94m $$[0m[94mU[0m[94m$$[0m for[94m which[0m[94m one[0m has:[94m for[0m[94m all[0m[94m $$[0mx$$[94m in[0m[94m $$[0m[94mU[0m[94m,[0m[94m R[0m[94m([0ma[94m,[0m[94m x[0m[94m)[0m[94m \[0mlef[94mtrightarrow[0m[94m P[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m))$[94m$.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m sum[94m,[0m Russell’[94ms[0m[94m contradiction[0m[94m shows[0m the[94m critical[0m status[94m of[0m apparently safe logical principles:[94m either[0m one has to give up[94m the[0m[94m assumption[0m[94m that[0m “any propositional function containing only[94m one[0m variable[94m is[0m equivalent[94m to[0m[94m as[0mser[94mting[0m membership for[94m a[0m class[94m defined[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitional[0m[94m function[0m”[94m ([0mi[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m[94m the[0m compreh[94mension[0m[94m principle[0m);[94m or[0m[94m one[0m[94m has[0m[94m to[0m[94m reject[0m[94m the[0m idea[94m that[0m “[94mevery[0m class[94m can[0m[94m be[0m taken[94m as[0m[94m one[0m[94m term[0m[94m”[0m[94m ([0m[94mpp[0m. [94m1[0m02–[94m1[0m[94m0[0m3[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m Russell[0m’[94ms[0m hands the[94m par[0m[94mado[0m[94mx[0m[94m applies[0m[94m to[0m pred[94mic[0m[94mates[0m[94m,[0m classes[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitional[0m[94m functions[0m and[94m leads[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m new picture of[94m the[0m[94m log[0mico-mathematical universe[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m out[94mlined[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m first exposition[94m of[0m[94m the[0m doctrine[94m of[0m types: to each[94m propos[0m[94mitional[0m[94m function[0m $$\[94mphi[0m$$ is associated a[94m range[0m[94m of[0m[94m significance[0m[94m,[0m[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m a class of objects to[94m which[0m[94m the[0m[94m given[0m $$\[94mphi[0m[94m$$[0m applies[94m in[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m[94m produce[0m[94m a[0m proposition[94m;[0m moreover[94m,[0m precisely[94m the[0m[94m ranges[0m[94m of[0m[94m significance[0m form[94m types[0m.[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m are[0m[94m objects[0m[94m that[0m[94m are[0m[94m not[0m[94m ranges[0m[94m of[0m[94m significance[0m; these[94m are[0m[94m just[0m atoms ([94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m[94m u[0mrelemente or individuals[94m)[0m and they[94m form[0m[94m the[0m[94m lowest[0m type.[94m The[0m[94m next[0m type consists[94m of[0m classes or[94m ranges[0m[94m of[0m[94m individuals[0m[94m;[0m[94m then[0m[94m one[0m has classes[94m of[0m classes[94m of[0m objects[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m lowest[0m[94m type[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m so[94m on[0m (see also[94m the[0m entry on type[94m theory[0m[94m)..[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mNew[0m difficulties[94m still[0m[94m arise[0m if[94m one[0m accepts[94m that[0m propos[94mitions[0m form a[94m type[0m ([94mas[0m they[94m are[0m[94m the[0m[94m only[0m objects[94m of[0m which it can[94m be[0m meaningfully assert[94med[0m that[94m they[0m[94m are[0m true or[94m false[0m[94m).[0m First[94m of[0m all[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m are[0m obviously[94m at[0m[94m least[0m[94m as[0m[94m many[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitions[0m[94m as[0m objects[94m ([0m[94mjust[0m consider[94m the[0m map associating with $$x$$ the proposition expressed by $$[94m([0m[94mx[0m = x)$$;[94m p[0m[94m.[0m [94m5[0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m).[94m On[0m[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m hand[0m[94m,[0m[94m if[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m possible[0m to form types[94m of[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitions[0m,[94m there[0m[94m are[0m[94m more[0m types[94m of[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitions[0m than[94m propos[0m[94mitions[0m[94m,[0m[94m by[0m Cant[94mor[0m’[94ms[0m[94m argument[0m[94m.[0m[94m Then[0m[94m we[0m[94m can[0m inject types[94m of[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitions[0m[94m into[0m[94m propos[0m[94mitions[0m[94m certain[0mty and knowledge.)[94m
[0m[94m

[0m[94mInd[0m[94meed[0m[94m,[0m[94m he[0m does at times seems[94m to[0m[94m be[0m focused[94m on[0m winning if anything[94m else[0m[94m.[0m[94m

## Class Sol[94mver[0mVariable[94m()[0m[94m
[0m
[94mSol[0m[94mver[0mVariable[94m([0mparent='MODEL[94m',[0m name[94m='[0mSol[94mver[0mVariable_[94mn[0m[94m',[0m label[94m='[0mSol[94mver[0m[94mVariable[0m[94m_[0m[94mn[0m[94m',[0m[94m
[0mactive[94m=[0m[94mTrue[0m[94m,[0m use_[94mic[0m=[94mFalse[0m[94m,[0m ic[94m=[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m is[94m_[0mimplicit[94m=[0m[94mFalse[0m[94m,[0m static[94m_[0mhold[94m=[0m[94mFalse[0m[94m,[0m[94m aut[0m[94mob[0malance[94m='[0mDefault[94m',[0m[94m
[0m[94mpen[0m[94mb[0m" or[94m the[0m[94m number[0m[94m of[0m permut[94mations[0m[94m of[0m b b-bit numbers[94m ([0mie a[94m single[0m[94m b[0m[94m*[0m[94mb[0m[94m-[0mbit[94m-[0mwide int).[94m With[0m IPv6[94m it[0m'[94ms[0m going[94m to[0m be even harder[94m to[0m keep track[94m of[0m lots of IP addresses[94m,[0m[94m or[0m even checking through them for[94m the[0m presence of one[94m.[0m[94m ##[0m Fun[94m Hey[0m my mental[94m g[0mears aren[94m'[0m[94mt[0m turning and[94m I[0m[94m have[0m[94m no[0m energy[94m or[0m motiv[94mation[0m so[94m I[0m[94m'[0m[94mm[0m going[94m to[0m[94m work[0m[94m on[0m something fun for[94m a[0m[94m break[0m[94m.[0m Possibly[94m one[0m of[94m those[0m graphical[94m effects[0m with[94m the[0m structure sensor. ## The[94m simple[0m case[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m a[0m[94m point[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m vector[94m components[0m[94m ([0mcoordinates[94m)[0m along each axis added together[94m to[0m make[94m one[0m[94m vector[0m[94m and[0m[94m thus[0m[94m point[0m[94m.[0m[94m But[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.)[0m[94m equival[0m[94mently[0m[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mD[0m[94m and[0m lower[94m spaces[0m[94m as[0m[94m expressed[0m[94m in[0m our [94m3[0m[94mD[0m space world,[94m but[0m not equivalent[94m in[0m[94m higher[0m dimensional[94m spaces[0m[94m,[0m[94m expressed[0m[94m in[0m[94m our[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mD[0m[94m space[0m world[94m,[0m[94m we[0m can also think[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m-point[94m([0ms)[94m as[0m[94m the[0m intersections[94m of[0m[94m the[0m hyper[94m-[0m[94mplan[0m[94mes[0m[94m ([0m[94m3[0mD normal vector[94m +[0m distance[94m)[0m[94m where[0m[94m each[0m plane[94m is[0m[94m at[0m a[94m distance[0m along[94m the[0m axis[94m ([0m[94mwhich[0m[94m are[0m[94m ske[0mwed,[94m to[0m fit all[94m together[0m in a[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94mD[0m[94m space[0m representation[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m normal[0m is[94m obtained[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m direction[94m of[0m[94m that[0m[94m ([0mske[94mwed[0m) axis vector[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m result[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m-[0mpoint[94m inter[0m[94msections[0m for [94m4[0m[94mD[0m[94m space[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m [94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m-[0m[94mpoint[0m[94m inter[0m[94msections[0m[94m for[0m[94m [0m[94m7[0mD[94m space[0m[94m,[0m etc[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m ske[0m[94mwed[0m axes can also[94m be[0m[94m used[0m with[94m method[0m #[94m1[0m[94m,[0m but[94m with[0m addition[94m of[0m a[94m vector[0m along[94m the[0m ske[94mwed[0m axes[94m.[0m You[94m can[0m[94m use[0m[94m the[0m axes for[94m whatever[0m[94m you[0m[94m want[0m[94m:[0m x[94m,[0m[94my[0m[94m,[0mz and L[94mAD[0mC as[94m described[0m in Section[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m4[94m.[0m1[94m.[0m1 and are summar[94mized[0m[94m in[0m Table[94m [0m[94m2[0m-[94m2[0m8[94m.[0m Page [0m[94mThe[0m SelectionPolicyType template parameter refers[94m to[0m[94m the[0m strategy[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m compute[0m[94m the[0m[94m ([0m[94mappro[0m[94mxim[0mate[94m)[0m[94m objective[0m[94m function[0m[94m.[0m The[94m Full[0mSelection and Random[94mSelection[0m classes[94m are[0m available[94m for[0m use; custom behavior[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m achieved[0m[94m by[0m implementing[94m a[0m class[94m with[0m[94m the[0m same method signatures[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m convenience[94m the[0m[94m following[0m[94m types[0m can[94m be[0m[94m used[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m C[0mMAES<>[94m ([0mequivalent[94m to[0m[94m C[0mMAES<Full[94mSelection[0m[94m>[0m): uses[94m all[0m separable functions[94m to[0m[94m compute[0m objective
[94m•[0m Appro[94mx[0mC[94mMA[0m[94mES[0m ([94mequ[0m[94mivalent[0m[94m to[0m[94m C[0m[94mMA[0m[94mES[0m[94m<[0mRandom[94mSelection[0m[94m>[0m[94m):[0m[94m uses[0m[94m a[0m small[94m amount[0m[94m of[0m[94m separ[0m[94mable[0m[94m functions[0m[94m to[0m[94m compute[0m[94m approximate[0m[94m objective[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### Attributes[94m
[0m
[94mtype[0m name[94m description[0m default[94m
[0m[94msize[0m_t lambda The population[94m size[0m[94m ([0m[94m0[0m uses[94m a[0m default[94m size[0m). [94m0[0m[94m
[0mdouble lowerBound Lower[94m bound[0m of decision[94m variables[0m[94m.[0m[94m -[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m[94mdouble[0m[94m upper[0m[94mBound[0m[94m Upper[0m[94m bound[0m[94m of[0m[94m decision[0m[94m variables[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0m[94msize[0m[94m_[0mt batchSize Batch[94m size[0m to use for[94m the[0m objective[94m calculation[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94msize[0m[94m_[0m[94mt[0m maxIter[94mations[0m[94m Max[0m[94mimum[0m[94m number[0m[94m of[0m[94m iterations[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m
[0mdouble toler[94mance[0m Max[94mimum[0m absolute toler[94mance[0m[94m to[0m terminate algorithm[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0me[94m-[0m[94m5[0m[94m
[0mSelectionPolicy[94mType[0m selectionPolicy Instantiated selection policy used[94m to[0m[94m calculate[0m[94m the[0m[94m objective[0m[94m.[0m Selection[94mPolicy[0m[94mType[0m[94m()[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAttributes of the optimizer may also[94m be[0m changed via[94m the[0m member methods[94m L[0mambda(), LowerBound[94m(),[0m[94m Upper[0m[94mBound[0m[94m(),[0m[94m B[0m[94match[0m[94mSize[0m[94m(),[0m[94m Max[0m[94mIter[0m[94mations[0m[94m(),[0m Tol[94mer[0m[94mance[0m[94m(),[0m and[94m Selection[0m[94mPolicy[0m().[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe selection[94mPolicy[0m attribute allows[94m an[0m instantiated SelectionPolicyType to[94m be[0m given[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m Full[0m[94mSelection[0m policy has[94m no[0m need[94m to[0m[94m be[0m instanti[94mated[0m[94m and[0m[94m thus[0m the[94m option[0m[94m is[0m[94m not[0m[94m relevant[0m when[94m the[0m C[94mMA[0m[94mES[0m<> optim[94mizer[0m type[94m is[0m being[94m used[0m[94m;[0m[94m the[0m Random[94mSelection[0m[94m policy[0m[94m has[0m the constructor Random[94mSelection[0m([94mf[0m[94mraction[0m[94m)[0m where fraction spec[94mifies[0m[94m the[0m percentage[94m of[0m separ[94mable[0m[94m functions[0m to use to estimate[94m the[0m[94m objective[0m[94m function[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m####[94m Ex[0m[94mamples[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mRosenbrockFunction f;[94m
[0marma::mat coordinates =[94m f[0m.GetInitialPoint();[94m
[0m[94m
[0m//[94m C[0m[94mMA[0m[94mES[0m with[94m the[0m[94m Full[0m[94mSelection[0m policy[94m.[0m[94m
[0mC[94mMA[0m[94mES[0m<> optimizer([94m0[0m[94m,[0m -[94m1[0m[94m,[0m [94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m1[0m[94me[0m[94m-[0m[94m4[0m[94m);[0m[94m
[0moptim[94mizer[0m.Opt[94mim[0mize[94m([0m[94mf[0m, coordinates);[94m

in[94m \[0mactive ion beam facilites and projects[94m.[0m Some examples[94m can[0m[94m be[0m found[94m in[0m ref. [2[94m].[0m During[94m the[0m past[94m few[0m[94m years[0m[94m,[0m new[94m ins[0m[94mights[0m[94m were[0m[94m gained[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m physical processes driving[94m these[0m delicate[94m devices[0m[94m,[0m[94m very[0m[94m often[0m[94m submitted[0m to harsh chemical, thermal[94m or[0m[94m radi[0mological conditions [[94m3[0m[94m].[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m requirements[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m dedicated facility[94m like[0m CERN-[94mME[0m[94mD[0mICIS[94m are[0m[94m different[0m[94m,[0m[94m not[0mably because[94m high[0m[94m effic[0m[94mien[0m[94mcies[0m[94m,[0m[94m moder[0m[94mate[0m chemical[94m select[0m[94mivity[0m[94m,[0m high reli[94mability[0m[94m with[0m large is[94mot[0m[94mope[0m beam curr[94ments[0m[94m is[0m[94m more[0m[94m particularly[0m[94m required[0m[94m.[0m Investig[94mations[0m[94m in[0m[94m some[0m[94m cases[0m[94m have[0m[94m been[0m done[94m to[0m[94m develop[0m[94m specific[0m ion source[94m devices[0m for[94m medical[0m radioisot[94mope[0m[94m elect[0m[94mromagnet[0m[94mic[0m mass separation[94m [[0m[94m4[0m[94m].[0m[94m However[0m the[94m large[0m[94m spectrum[0m[94m of[0m separation[94m conditions[0m[94m require[0m[94m more[0m[94m dedicated[0m develop[94mments[0m[94m to[0m[94m reach[0m separation yields[94m that[0m[94m are[0m comm[94mens[0m[94mur[0m[94mate[0m[94m with[0m[94m more[0m traditional[94m radio[0mchem[94mistry[0m separation processes used[94m in[0m[94m conventional[0m[94m medical[0m is[94mot[0m[94mope[0m production[94m methods[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m this contribution[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m will[0m report[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m large[0m[94m spectrum[0m[94m of[0m[94m separation[0m[94m processes[0m[94m intended[0m at C[94mER[0m[94mN[0m[94m-[0m[94mME[0m[94mD[0m[94mIC[0m[94mIS[0m[94m,[0m together[94m with[0m[94m information[0m already[94m available[0m[94m from[0m recent ion[94m source[0m[94m develop[0m[94mments[0m at Isol[94mde[0m and at[94m other[0m is[94mot[0m[94mope[0m mass[94m separation[0m facilities[94m.[0m In[94m particular[0m[94m,[0m large[94m separation[0m[94m process[0m yields[94m can[0m already[94m be[0m obtained for[94m med[0m[94mically[0m[94m important[0m radionuclides[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m $[0m^{[94m2[0m[94m2[0m5[94m}$[0mRa[94m and[0m[94m $[0m[94m^{[0m[94m2[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m}$[0mFr[94m,[0m[94m gener[0m[94mators[0m of[94m one[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m few[94m alpha[0m[94m-[0memitting $[94m^{[0m[94m2[0m[94m2[0m5[94m}$[0m[94mAc[0m medical[94m radio[0m[94mis[0m[94mot[0mopes[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m for[0m[94m more[0m pros[94mpective[0m[94m H[0mg[94m Aug[0m[94mer[0m electron emitting[94m radio[0m[94mis[0m[94mot[0mopes[94m.[0m Develop[94mments[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m separation[94m of[0m[94m cycl[0m[94mot[0mron-produ[94mced[0m[94m $[0m[94m^{[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m9[0m[94m}$[0m[94mT[0mb, only[94m available[0m up until now[94m at[0m spallation ISOL facilities[94m,[0m is[94m on[0m[94mgoing[0m.[94m
[0m[94mPart[0m[94m of[0m these investig[94mations[0m are[94m done[0m[94m with[0m[94m collabor[0mating instit[94mutes[0m[94m of[0m[94m M[0m[94mED[0m[94mIC[0mIS[94m and[0m in[94m the[0m[94m European[0m[94m program[0m M[94mED[0mICIS[94m-[0mProm[94med[0m[94m [[0m[94m5[0m[94m].[0m[94m

[0m## Idea[94m
[0m[94m
[0mA zero[94m loc[0m[94mus[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m set[0m[94m of[0m polynomials[94m is[0m[94m an[0m aff[94mine[0m algebraic[94m variety[0m;[94m m[0m[94mim[0mick[94ming[0m[94m this[0m[94m situation[0m[94m Alexandre[0m Vinogradov[94m has[0m introduced[94m a[0m geometric object[94m related[0m[94m to[0m systems[94m of[0m[94m non[0m[94mlinear[0m[94m differential[0m[94m equations[0m[94m,[0m the diffieties.[94m Cl[0m[94mos[0mely[94m related[0m not[94mions[0m[94m in[0m[94m various[0m flavours[94m of[0m[94m geometry[0m[94m are[0m[94m the[0m cry[94mst[0m[94mals[0m[94m of[0m schemes[94m ([0mGroth[94mend[0m[94mieck[0m[94m),[0m[94m D[0m[94m-[0mvari[94meties[0m[94m ([0mMalgrange[94m),[0m D[94m-[0m[94msch[0memes[94m ([0m[94mBe[0m[94mil[0m[94minson[0m, Drinfeld)[94m and[0m differential algebras[94m ([0m[94mR[0mitt,[94m Kol[0mchin[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## References[94m

[0m# NAG Library Function Document[94mn[0m[94mag[0m_opt[94m_[0mnlp[94m [0m[94m([0m[94me[0m[94m0[0m4[94mu[0m[94mcc[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## [94m1[0m  [94mP[0murpose
[94m
[0m[94mn[0mag_[94mopt[0m[94m_[0mnlp[94m [0m[94m([0m[94me[0m[94m0[0m4[94mu[0mcc[94m)[0m is designed[94m to[0m[94m minim[0m[94mize[0m[94m an[0m[94m arbitrary[0m[94m smooth[0m[94m function[0m subject[94m to[0m constraints[94m ([0m[94mwhich[0m may include simple[94m bounds[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m variables[0m[94m,[0m linear[94m constraints[0m[94m and[0m[94m smooth[0m nonlinear[94m constraints[0m[94m)[0m using[94m a[0m sequ[94mential[0m quadratic programming (S[94mQ[0m[94mP[0m[94m)[0m[94m method[0m[94m.[0m[94m You[0m[94m should[0m supply as[94m many[0m first derivatives[94m as[0m[94m possible[0m;[94m any[0m[94m un[0m[94mspec[0mified derivatives[94m are[0m approxim[94mated[0m[94m by[0m[94m finite[0m[94m differences[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m[94m not[0m intended[94m for[0m[94m large[0m[94m sparse[0m[94m problems[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mn[0m[94mag[0m[94m_[0m[94mopt[0m[94m_[0mnl[94mp[0m [94m([0m[94me[0m[94m0[0m[94m4[0m[94mu[0mcc[94m)[0m[94m may[0m also[94m be[0m used[94m for[0m[94m un[0mconst[94mrained[0m[94m,[0m[94m bound[0m-[94mconst[0m[94mrained[0m and[94m linear[0m[94mly[0m const[94mrained[0m optimization[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## 2  [94mSpec[0mification[94m
[0m[94m
[0m #include #include[94m
[0m[94mvoid[0m  nag[94m_[0m[94mopt[0m[94m_[0mnlp [94m([0mInteger [94mn[0m[94m,[0m[94m Integer[0m[94m [0m[94mn[0mbris from[94m the[0m[94m outer[0m solar system[94m.[0m Each[94m of[0m[94m the[0m terrestrial planets[94m must[0m[94m have[0m originally[94m had[0m similar atmos[94mpher[0m[94mes[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m Mercur[94my[0m[94m was[0m[94m too[0m[94m small[0m[94m and[0m too hot to retain[94m its[0m gas[94m.[0m[94m The[0m Moon probably[94m never[0m had[94m an[0m[94m atmosphere[0m[94m since[0m[94m the[0m material composing[94m it[0m[94m was[0m[94m de[0m[94mple[0m[94mted[0m[94m in[0m volatile materials[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m pre[0mdomin[94mant[0m volatile[94m gas[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m terrest[94mrial[0m[94m plan[0m[94mets[0m[94m is[0m[94m now[0m carbon[94m dio[0m[94mx[0mide ([94mCO[0m[94m2[0m[94m),[0m[94m but[0m initially[94m there[0m[94m were[0m[94m probably[0m[94m also[0m hydro[94mgen[0m[94m-[0mcontaining g[94mases[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m this[0m more chem[94mically[0m[94m [0m[94mredu[0m[94mced[0m[94m [0m([94mh[0m[94mydro[0m[94mgen[0m[94m-[0mdominated[94m)[0m[94m environment[0m[94m,[0m[94m there[0m should have[94m been[0m large[94m amounts[0m[94m of[0m[94m carbon[0m mon[94mox[0m[94mide[0m[94m ([0m[94mCO[0m)[94m and[0m[94m traces[0m[94m of[0m am[94mmon[0m[94mia[0m[94m ([0mN[94mH[0m3[94m)[0m and m[94meth[0m[94mane[0m[94m ([0m[94mCH[0m[94m4[0m[94m).[0m Ultrav[94mio[0mlet light from[94m the[0m Sun split[94m apart[0m[94m the[0m[94m mole[0mcules[94m of[0m[94m reducing[0m g[94mases[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m inner[94m solar[0m[94m system[0m[94m,[0m however[94m.[0m Most[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m light[0m hydro[94mgen[0m atoms escaped[94m,[0m[94m leaving[0m behind the oxidized ([94mox[0m[94my[0m[94mgen[0m[94m-[0mdomin[94mated[0m[94m)[0m[94m atmos[0m[94mpher[0m[94mes[0m we see[94m today[0m[94m on[0m [94mE[0m[94marth[0m,[94m [0m[94mV[0m[94men[0m[94mus[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94mM[0mars[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m fate[94m of[0m water was different on[94m each[0m of[94m these[0m[94m three[0m[94m plan[0m[94mets[0m[94m,[0m depending[94m on[0m its[94m size[0m[94m and[0m[94m distance[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m Sun[0m[94m.[0m[94m Early[0m in its[94m history[0m[94m,[0m Mars apparently[94m had[0m[94m a[0m thick atmosphere[94m with[0m abund[94mant[0m liquid water[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m it[0m[94m could[0m[94m not[0m[94m retain[0m those conditions[94m.[0m[94m The[0m CO[94m2[0m necessary for[94m a[0m substantial greenhouse effect[94m was[0m lost[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m temperature[0m dropped,[94m and[0m[94m eventually[0m the remaining[94m water[0m froze.[94m On[0m[94m Ven[0m[94mus[0m the[94m reverse[0m process took place[94m,[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m run[94maway[0m green[94mhouse[0m effect leading[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m permanent[0m[94m loss[0m[94m of[0m[94m water[0m[94m.[0m[94m Only[0m Earth managed[94m to[0m[94m maintain[0m[94m the[0m delicate[94m balance[0m that perm[94mits[0m liquid water[94m to[0m persist[94m on[0m[94m its[0m[94m surface[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWith[94m the[0m water gone[94m,[0m[94m Ven[0m[94mus[0m[94m and[0m[94m Mars[0m each[94m ended[0m[94m up[0m[94m with[0m[94m an[0m[94m atmosphere[0m of about[94m [0m[94m9[0m6 percent carbon[94m dio[0m[94mx[0mide[94m and[0m[94m a[0m few percent nitro[94mgen[0m.[94m On[0m[94m Earth[0m[94m,[0m the[94m presence[0m[94m first[0m of water and then of life led[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m very[0m different[94m kind[0m[94m of[0m[94m atmosphere[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m CO[94m2[0m[94m [0mwas removed[94m and[0m depos[94mited[0m[94m in[0m marine sed[94miment[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m pro[0m[94ml[0mifer[94mation[0m[94m of[0m life[94m forms[0m that could photosynthes[94mize[0m eventually[94m led[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m release[94m of[0m more o[94mxygen[0m than natural[94m chemical[0m reactions can remove from the[94m atmosphere[0m[94m.[0m[94m As[0m[94m a[0m[94m result[0m[94m,[0m[94m thanks[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m life[94m on[0m its surface[94m,[0m[94m Earth[0m finds itself[94m with[0m[94m a[0m great[94m def[0m[94mic[0m[94miency[0m of CO[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m nit[94mro[0m[94mgen[0m as[94m the[0m most[94m abund[0m[94mant[0m gas[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m only[0m planetary atmosphere that contains free o[94mxygen[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m
[94mIn[0m[94m the[0m[94m outer[0m[94m solar[0m[94m system[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0mT[94mitan[0m[94m [0m[94mis[0m[94m the[0m[94m only[0m[94m moon[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m00_physicell[94m_[0mcell[94ms[0m[94m.[0mmat
./[94mF[0mOLDER[94m/[0m[94mFILE[0mBASE[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m2_physicell[94m_[0mcell[94ms[0m.mat
[94m...[0m[94m
[0m./[94mF[0m[94mOL[0m[94mDER[0m[94m/[0m[94mFILE[0m[94mBASE[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m1[94m0[0m_[94mphys[0m[94mic[0m[94mell[0m[94m_[0m[94mcell[0m[94ms[0m[94m.[0m[94mmat[0m[94m
[0m[94m([0m[94mSee[0m[94m the[0m config file to set[94m F[0m[94mOL[0m[94mDER[0m[94m and[0m FILEBASE[94m)[0m[94m
[0m
povwriter[94m x[0m[94m1[0m,...,xn[94m :[0m run povwriter[94m on[0m data[94m in[0m F[94mOL[0m[94mDER[0m with[94m indices[0m x[94m1[0m,...,[94mx[0m[94mn[0m[94m
[0m

[94m
[0m[94mNow[0m[94m,[0m open that file[94m in[0m PO[94mV[0m-ray[94m ([0mdouble[94m-[0mclick the[94m file[0m if[94m you[0m are[94m in[0m Windows),[94m choose[0m[94m one[0m[94m of[0m your resolution[94ms[0m in[94m your[0m[94m le[0m[94mf[0mthand dropdown[94m ([0mI’[94mll[0m choose [94m2[0m[94m1[0m60×[94m2[0m1[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94m no[0m[94m ant[0mialiasing),[94m and[0m click[94m the[0m[94m green[0m “run” button[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mYou can watch[94m the[0m[94m image[0m[94m as[0m it rend[94mers[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m result[0m[94m should[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m.6[94m7[0mE-05 [94m6[0m.19[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m8[94m.[0m[94m5[0m[94m1[0m[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m R[0mNW 3[94m.[0m4[94m5[0mE[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m [94m6[0m[94m.[0m16[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m45[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m MA[94mDE[0m N[94mW[0m 3[94m.[0m2[94m7[0m[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m5[94m.[0m[94m5[0m[94m5[0m[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m1[94m1[0m[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m R[0m[94mN[0m[94mW[0m[94m [0m2[94m.[0m[94m6[0m[94m9[0m[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m5[94m.[0m[94m5[0m9[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m1 Note: [94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m3[0m[94m2[0m[94mE[0m[94m-[0m[94m0[0m8 denotes[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m3[0m[94m2[0m×[94m1[0m[94m0[0m−[94m8[0m[94m

[0mTop[94mics[0m:[94m
[0m[94m1[0m A w[94molf[0m[94m e[0m[94mats[0m[94m [0m5[94m.[0m5 K[94mg[0m of meat in[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m days[0m[94m.[0m A[94m baby[0m tiger[94m e[0m[94mats[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m K[0m[94mg[0m[94m of[0m[94m meat[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m [94m1[0m[94m1[0m Jul[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m,[0m [94m1[0m[94m2[0m:[94m3[0m[94m8[0m[94m

[0m256 megaby[94mtes[0m[94m
[0minput[94m
[0mstandard input[94m
[0moutput[94m
[0mstandard[94m output[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mC[0mthulhu decided[94m to[0m catch Scaygerboss[94m.[0m Sc[94may[0mger[94mb[0moss[94m found[0m it[94m out[0m and[94m is[0m trying[94m to[0m hide in[94m a[0m pack[94m of[0m[94m his[0m[94m sc[0maygers[94m.[0m Each scayger[94m except[0m[94m Sc[0m[94may[0mgerb[94moss[0m[94m is[0m either[94m a[0m male[94m or[0m a[94m female[0m[94m.[0m[94m Sc[0m[94may[0mger[94mb[0m[94moss[0m'[94ms[0m gender[94m is[0m[94m "[0mother".[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSc[0m[94may[0mgers are scattered[94m on[0m[94m a[0m two-dimensional[94m map[0m divided[94m into[0m cells[94m.[0m A sc[94may[0mger[94m looks[0m[94m n[0m[94merd[0my and loveable if it is staying[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m cell[0m with exactly one[94m sc[0m[94may[0m[94mger[0m of[94m a[0m[94m gender[0m[94m that[0m[94m is[0m[94m different[0m[94m from[0m its own gender[94m.[0m[94m C[0mthulhu[94m will[0m not[94m be[0m[94m able[0m[94m to[0m catch Sc[94may[0mger[94mb[0m[94moss[0m[94m if[0m all[94m the[0m sc[94may[0mgers on[94m the[0m[94m map[0m look nerd[94my[0m and love[94mable[0m.[94m
[0m
[94mThe[0m sc[94may[0mgers[94m can[0m move[94m around[0m[94m at[0m[94m different[0m[94m spe[0m[94meds[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m each[94m sc[0m[94may[0m[94mger[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m are[0m given[94m the[0m[94m time[0m[94m it[0m[94m takes[0m this[94m sc[0may[94mger[0m[94m to[0m[94m move[0m from a cell[94m to[0m an adjacent[94m cell[0m[94m.[0m[94m C[0mells are adjacent[94m if[0m[94m they[0m share[94m a[0m common side[94m.[0m At any[94m point[0m of[94m time[0m[94m,[0m each[94m cell[0m[94mx[0m@[94m(([0my@[94my[0m[94m)[0m@[94my[0m[94m)$.[0m[94m From[0m these observations[94m,[0m it[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m now[0m straightforward[94m to[0m[94m ax[0miomatize[94m.[0m[94m –[0m [94mL[0muca Ghidelli Aug[94m [0m[94m4[0m '[94m1[0m[94m7[0m at[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m:[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m

[94mOn[0m[94m this[0m view[94m,[0m[94m only[0m prediction errors[94m are[0m[94m propag[0m[94mated[0m to higher[94m levels[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m processing hierarchy[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m this[0m[94m signal[0m[94m should[0m[94m thus[0m[94m be[0m[94m lower[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m predicted than an unpred[94micted[0m[94m dist[0m[94mractor[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m could[0m[94m cause[0m[94m sens[0m[94mory[0m at[94mten[0m[94mu[0m[94mation[0m[94m.[0m Importantly[94m,[0m[94m the[0m prediction errors[94m are[0m[94m also[0m weight[94med[0m[94m by[0m[94m their[0m expected[94m precision[0m[94m,[0m where[94m this[0m[94m precision[0m weighting[94m is[0m[94m generally[0m[94m taken[0m[94m as[0m corresponding to[94m the[0m cogn[94mitive[0m[94m-[0mps[94mych[0m[94mological[0m concept[94m of[0m[94m attention[0m ([94mF[0meldman[94m &[0m[94m F[0mriston[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m0; H[94moh[0mwy[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m):[94m

7[94m5[0ma0[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94me[0m[94m [0m98 67[94m [0m[94m7[0m2[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m1[0m 70 [94m6[0m[94m8[0m [94m8[0me a[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m8[0md[94m [0m91[94m [0m[94m5[0m2[94m [0m[94m0[0m0[94m [0m00[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m6[0m [94m6[0mf[94m [0m[94m7[0m2 9[94m6[0m 03[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94me[0m f4 c[94m1[0m [94m6[0m7[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m3[0m b[94m2[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94me[0m[94m [0m93[94m [0m[94m5[0m4[94m [0m[94m6[0m8[94m [0m[94m9[0m0 b[94m8[0m[94m e[0m[94m3[0m[94m n[0m.[94mgraph[0m....R..[94mfor[0m..[94mN[0m[94m..[0m[94mg[0m#[94m...[0mTh[94m...[0m
75c0[94m [0m[94m6[0m5 [94m9[0m3[94m [0m[94m7[0m[94m4[0m [94m7[0m[94m2[0m 6f[94m [0m7[94m5[0m[94m [0m white dwarfs[94m:[0m[94m G[0m2[94m2[0m[94m6[0m-[94m2[0m9, Wolf [94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m, Wolf[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m8[0m and SDSS J1[94m6[0m[94m0[0m40[94m1[0m.3[94m1[0m+0[94m8[0m3[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m9[0m.[94m0[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mI[0m[94m'[0m[94mm[0m hope[94mful[0m[94m that[0m one day we[94m'[0m[94mll[0m[94m find[0m[94m a[0m transiting object orbit[94ming[0m a[94m metal[0m-[94mp[0molluted white dwar[94mf[0m,[94m and[0m[94m if[0m[94m we[0m do,[94m it[0m'[94mll[0m[94m be[0m worth[94m the[0m trouble[94m.[0m Because[94m think[0m[94m about[0m it[94m this[0m[94m way[0m[94m:[0m[94m we[0m[94m know[0m[94m the[0m interior composition[94m of[0m[94m the[0m Earth pretty[94m well[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m we[0m[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m know[0m[94m the[0m interior[94m composition[0m[94m of[0m exop[94mlan[0mets without making[94m loads[0m[94m of[0m[94m assumptions[0m[94m.[0m[94m But[0m[94m for[0m an[94m object[0m[94m trans[0m[94miting[0m a[94m metal[0m[94m-[0m[94mp[0m[94moll[0m[94muted[0m[94m W[0mD[94m,[0m[94m we[0m'[94mll[0m[94m have[0m[94m the[0m[94m g[0muts of its[94m sib[0m[94mling[0m plan[94mets[0m sme[94mared[0m out across[94m the[0m surface of[94m the[0m white[94m d[0m[94mwar[0m[94mf[0m host[94m,[0m signalling to us[94m the[0m precise abundances[94m of[0m[94m the[0m met[94mals[0m that[94m make[0m[94m up[0m[94m ([0m[94mthe[0m sib[94mlings[0m[94m of[0m)[94m the[0m rock[94my[0m plan[94mets[0m[94m that[0m we see[94m trans[0m[94miting[0m[94m.[0m I[94m can[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m wait[94m for[0m[94m that[0m day.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mJ[0m[94muly[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m1[94m9[0m[94m:[0m[94m Machine[0m Learning[94m Day[0m[94m [0m2[94m
[0m
[94mWhat[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m a convolutional neural network[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mY[0mesterday[94m I[0m[94m wrote[0m[94m that[0m[94m I[0m[94m would[0m explain[94m what[0m[94m a[0m[94m convolution[0m[94mal[0m neural net[94m is[0m[94m,[0m and I[94m'[0mm[94m real[0m[94mizing[0m now[94m that[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m hard[0m[94m to[0m[94m explain[0m without[94m figures[0m[94m or[0m anim[94mations[0m[94m,[0m[94m so[0m maybe it[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m not[0m suited well[94m to[0m this blog'[94ms[0m[94m format[0m[94m.[0m But[94m I[0m[94m'[0m[94mm[0m going[94m to[0m try[94m to[0m[94m explain[0m in words what[94m I[0m[94m'[0mve[94m learned[0m[94m this[0m[94m week[0m,[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m hopes[0m[94m that[0m[94m it[0m helps[94m me[0m write[94m up[0m the paper that[94m I[0m'[94mm[0m working[94m on[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mA neural[94m network[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m thought[0m[94m of[0m[94m as[0m[94m a[0m[94m series[0m[94m of[0m neur[94mons[0m[94m,[0m[94m where[0m a neur[94mon[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m function[0m which takes[94m inputs[0m[94m from[0m data[94m or[0m other neur[94mons[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m sends[0m[94m outputs[0m[94m to[0m[94m yet[0m[94m more[0m neur[94mons[0m[94m.[0m Ne[94mur[0mons[94m are[0m[94m grouped[0m into "layers",[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.[0m there[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m first[0m the input[94m signal[0m ([94myour[0m data[94m),[0m[94m then[0m[94m that[0m signal passes onto[94m a[0m[94m layer[0m of neur[94mons[0m[94m ([0m[94mfunctions[0m[94m),[0m which[94m produce[0m[94m outputs[0m[94m that[0m trigger neur[94mons[0m in[94m the[0m[94m next[0m[94m layer[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m so[0m[94m on[0m until[94m the[0m output[94m layer[0m[94m,[0m[94m where[0m[94m the[0m resulting vector[94m typically[0m estimates[94m the[0m[94m ~[0mlik[94melihood[0m[94m that[0m your input data belong[94m to[0m[94m a[0m set[94m of[0m labels[94m on[0m[94m which[0m[94m the[0m model was trained[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis[94m is[0m[94m a[0m super[94mvised[0m learning[94m technique[0m[94m,[0m[94m where[0m[94m you[0m pass pre-labeled data[94m into[0m the model,[94m let[0m[94m it[0m[94m filter[0m through[94m the[0m[94m various[0m layers[94m of[0m neur[94mons[0m[94m and[0m produce an output[94m.[0m[94m Then[0m[94m the[0m predicted[94m output[0m[94m is[0m compared[94m against[0m[94m the[0m[94m true[0m labels[94m of[0m[94m the[0m data[94m.[0m[94m Through[0m iteration tails[94m
[0m[94m=[0m max#[94m [0m∘ scanr (⊙[94m)[0m []

with[94m the[0m definition[94m of[0m[94m given[0m above[94m.[0m It turns[94m out[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m rather[94m simple[0m[94m algorithm[0m[94m:[0m[94m we[0m scan[94m through[0m[94m the[0m list,[94m and[0m[94m in[0m[94m each[0m[94m step[0m[94m we[0m[94m choose[0m among[94m three[0m outcomes: [],[94m [[0m[94mx[0m[94m],[0m[94m and[0m[94m x[0m : ys[94m.[0m Like[94m the[0m maximum[94m segment[0m sum problem[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m simple[0m[94m algorithm[0m[94m whose[0m correctness[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m that[0m[94m easy[0m[94m to[0m justify.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m algorithm[94m would[0m[94m be[0m linear-[94mtime[0m if[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m computed[0m in constant[94m-[0m[94mtime[0m[94m.[0m[94m With[0m[94m the[0m[94m presence[0m[94m of[0m[94m p[0m[94m in[0m , however[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m unlikely[0m[94m the[0m[94m case[0m.
[94m
[0m### Efficient Test[94ming[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSo[0m let us[94m compute[0m[94m,[0m[94m during[0m[94m the[0m[94m fol[0m[94md[0m[94m,[0m[94m something[0m[94m that[0m[94m allows[0m[94m p[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m determined[0m[94m efficiently[0m[94m.[0m[94m Assume[0m[94m that[0m[94m there[0m exists[94m some[0m [94mφ[0m :: [[94mA[0m[94m][0m →[94m B[0m that[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m fol[0m[94md[0m[94m ([0mφ[94m =[0m foldr [94m⊗[0m[94m [0mι for[94m some[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0mι[94m),[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m[94m p[0m (x : xs[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m p[0m xs [94m∧[0m[94m f[0m x[94m ([0mφ xs[94m)[0m[94m for[0m[94m some[0m[94m f[0m[94m.[0m[94m Some[0m[94m example[0m[94m choices[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94mφ[0m[94m and[0m[94m f[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m p[0m[94m =[0m ascending[94m.[0m We may[94m pick[0m[94m:[0m
[94m
[0mφ xs[94m =[0m if null xs then Nothing else Just (head xs[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94mf[0m x Nothing[94m =[0m[94m true[0m[94m
[0mf[94m x[0m (Just y[94m)[0m[94m =[0m x ≤ y[94m
[0m• p[94m xs[0m[94m =[0m all[94m elements[0m[94m in[0m xs[94m equal[0m[94m mod[0m[94molu[0m[94m [0m3. We[94m may[0m[94m pick[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94mφ[0m[94m xs[0m[94m =[0m[94m if[0m[94m null[0m[94m xs[0m[94m then[0m[94m Nothing[0m[94m else[0m[94m Just[0m[94m ([0m[94mhead[0m[94m xs[0m `mod` [94m3[0m)[94m
[0m[94mf[0m[94m x[0m Nothing[94m =[0m[94m true[0m[94m
[0m[94mf[0m[94m x[0m[94m ([0m[94mJust[0m[94m y[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m x `[94mmod[0m[94m`[0m[94m3[0m ==[94m y[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mLet us[94m tuple[0m[94m m[0m[94mpi[0m with[94m [0m[94mφ[0m[94m,[0m and[94m turn[0m[94m them[0m[94m into[0m one fol[94md[0m[94m.[0m[94m Let[0m[94m [0m⟨ f ,[94m g[0m[94m [0m[94m⟩[0m x[94m =[0m[94m ([0m[94mf[0m[94m x[0m,[94m g[0m x[94m),[0m[94m we[0m derive:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mmax[0m#[94m [0m∘ p[94m [0m[94m�[0m[94m�[0m� ∘ inits[94m
[0m=  [94m {[0m[94m f[0m[94m =[0m[94m f[0mst[94m [0m[94m∘[0m[94m  [0m⟨[94m f[0m ,[94m g[0m[94m [0m⟩,[94m see[0m below[94m}[0m[94m
[0m[94mf[0mst[94m [0m∘[94m [0m⟨[94m max[0m#[94m [0m∘ p[94m [0m[94m�[0m��[94m [0m∘ in[94mits[0m ,[94m [0mφ[94m [0m⟩[94m
[0m=[94m f[0mst[94m [0m[94m∘[0m foldr[94m step[0m ([],[94m [0mι[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mwhere step is given[94m by[0m
[94m
[0mstep[94m x[0m (xs,[94m b[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m|[94m f[0m[94m x[0m b =[94m ([0m[94mx[0m : xs ,[94m x[0m[94m [0m[94m⊗[0m b)[94m
[0m[94m|[0m[94m f[0m[94m x[0m[94m [0mι[94m =[0m ([[94mx[0m],[94m x[0m[94m [0m[94m⊗[0m[94m [0mι[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m|[0m otherwise[94m =[0m ([],[94m [0mι[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mNot[94mice[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m property[94m f[0m[94m =[0m[94m f[0mst[94m [0m∘[94m [0m⟨[94m f[0m ,[94m g[0m[94m [0m⟩[94m is[0m true when[94m the[0m[94m domain[0m of (a)[94m position[0m of an electron in an[94m $\[0mmathrm{H}$ atom (b) frequency of radiation emitted by $\mathrm{H}$ atoms (c) path of an electron in an $\mathrm{H}$ atom (d) wave motion of electrons (c)[94m diff[0mraction patterns produced by electrons (f) diffraction patterns produced by light (g) energy required to remove electrons from H atoms (h) an atom (i) a molecule (j) a water wave[94m
[0mWh[94mich[0m of[94m these[0m are observable[94m?[0m (a[94m)[0m position of an electron[94m in[0m an $\mathrm[94m{[0mH[94m}$[0m atom ([94mb[0m[94m)[0m frequency[94m of[0m radiation em[94mitted[0m[94m by[0m $\[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94mH[0m[94m}$[0m[94m atoms[0m[94m ([0m[94mc[0m[94m)[0m path[94m of[0m[94m an[0m[94m electron[0m[94m in[0m[94m an[0m[94m $\[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0m[94mH[0m[94m}$[0m[94m atom[0m[94m ([0m[94md[0m[94m)[0m wave motion[94m of[0m electrons[94m ([0mc[94m)[0m diff[94mraction[0m patterns produced[94m by[0m electrons (f[94m)[0m diff[94mraction[0m[94m patterns[0m[94m produced[0m[94m by[0m[94m...[0m[94m
[0m[94m####[0m# The weight[94med[0m mean[94m of[0m[94m the[0m numbers [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m6[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m weight[94med[0m[94m mean[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m numbers[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m6[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m7[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m. [0m####[94m#[0m A charged particle[94m located[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m origin[0m creates[94m an[0m electric[94m field[0m[94m of[0m[94m $\[0mleft[94m\[0mlangle[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m \[0m[94mtimes[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m^{[0m[94m3[0m[94m},[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m0[0m[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m\[0m[94mrangle[0m[94m \[0mmathrm[94m{[0m[94mN[0m[94m}[0m[94m /[0m[94m \[0m[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0mC[94m}$[0m[94m at[0m a[94m location[0m[94m $\[0m[94mlangle[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m.[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m,[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m0[0m\[94mrangle[0m \[94mmathrm[0m[94m{[0mm[94m}[0m .[94m$[0m What is[94m the[0m particle[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m charge[0m?[94m
