[0m[94mThe[0m direction at various[94m points[0m are pointed[94m towards[0m the center[94m of[0m[94m the[0m circle[94m.[0m Thus[94m,[0m[94m at[0m A[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m direction[0m[94m is[0m towards the negative[94m $[0mx$[94m axis[0m[94m.[0m At[94m B[0m[94m,[0m it[94m is[0m[94m $[0m[94m4[0m5^{\[94mcirc[0m[94m}$[0m[94m counter[0m[94mclock[0m[94mwise[0m to the[94m negative[0m[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94m axis[0m, at[94m C[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m pointed towards the negative[94m $[0my[94m$[0m[94m axis[0m[94m,[0m[94m at[0m[94m D[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m towards[0m[94m $[0m[94m4[0m[94m5[0m[94m^{\[0m[94mcirc[0m[94m}$[0m clock[94mwise[0m from[94m the[0m positive[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94m axis[0m[94m,[0m[94m at[0m[94m E[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m towards[0m the positive[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94m axis[0m[94m,[0m at[94m F[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m towards[0m[94m $[0m[94m4[0m[94m5[0m[94m^{\[0m[94mcirc[0m[94m}$[0m counter[94mclock[0m[94mwise[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m positive[0m[94m $[0mx \[94mtext[0m[94m{[0m,}$[94m at[0m G it[94m is[0m[94m towards[0m the positive[94m $[0m[94my[0m[94m$[0m[94m axis[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m at[94m H[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m towards[0m[94m $[0m[94m4[0m[94m5[0m[94m^{\[0m[94mcirc[0m[94m}$[0m[94m clock[0m[94mwise[0m to[94m the[0m negative[94m $[0m[94mx[0m[94m$[0m[94m axis[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m(f[94m)[0m The tangential acceleration is zero[94m since[0m speed[94m is[0m[94m constant[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m(g[94m)[0m Acc[94meler[0m[94mation[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m vector sum[94m of[0m[94m cent[0m[94mrip[0m[94metal[0m[94m and[0m[94m tang[0m[94mential[0m acceler[94mations[0m[94m.[0m But since[94m the[0m tang[94mential[0m acceleration[94m is[0m[94m zero[0m[94m,[0m acceleration[94m is[0m[94m same[0m[94m as[0m the[94m cent[0m[94mrip[0m[94metal[0m acceleration[94m.[0m[94m

[94mThe[0m Polygon M[94mixed[0m-[94mT[0m[94mate[0m[94m type[0m which[94m is[0m understood quite[94m well[0m[94m in[0m algebraic geometry[94m.[0m This[94m will[0m enable us[94m to[0m[94m go[0m[94m into[0m[94m the[0m subtleties[94m of[0m[94m the[0m comput[94mations[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m of[0m relating[94m the[0m Galois conjug[94mates[0m[94m of[0m a[94m Fe[0mynman amplitude[94m associated[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m graph to periods[94m of[0m motives[94m of[0m its[94m sub[0m-quot[94mient[0m[94m graphs[0m[94m.[0m [94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94mam[0m[94m,[0m Seminar Room[94m
[0m4[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m4[0m.[94m1[0m[94m9[0m Johan L[94mer[0may[94m ([0mUniversity Paris [94m1[0m3) Double Po[94misson[0m algebras[94m up[0m[94m to[0m[94m hom[0m[94mot[0m[94mopy[0m The notion[94m of[0m[94m double[0m[94m Po[0m[94misson[0m[94m algebra[0m, introduced[94m by[0m Van den Bergh in[94m [0m2[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m8[0m[94m,[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m non[0mcomm[94mut[0m[94mative[0m[94m analog[0mous[94m of[0m Po[94misson[0m structure[94m.[0m After recall[94ming[0m what is[94m a[0m Po[94misson[0m[94m structure[0m[94m and[0m[94m present[0m[94ming[0m and[94m mot[0m[94miving[0m[94m this[0m new[94m algebraic[0m[94m structure[0m[94m,[0m I will define[94m the[0m notion[94m of[0m ([94mpr[0m[94m)[0moperads[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m are[0m[94m algebraic[0m objects used[94m to[0m encode many algebraic[94m structures[0m[94m.[0m I[94m will[0m[94m show[0m how[94m we[0m[94m can[0m[94m use[0m[94m this[0m notion[94m to[0m[94m understand[0m what[94m is[0m[94m double[0m Po[94misson[0m algebras[94m up[0m[94m to[0m[94m hom[0m[94mot[0m[94mopy[0m[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0mpm[94m,[0m Synge[94m
[0m[94m8[0m[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m0[0m5[94m.[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m Analysis[0m[94m,[0m Ge[94mometry[0m and[94m Al[0m[94mgebra[0m Conference[94m

[0m[94m2[0m7[94m-[0m[94m3[0m[94m1[0m.[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m H[0m[94mMI[0m[94m Work[0m[94mshop[0m Hom[94mot[0m[94mopy[0m[94m meets[0m hom[94mology[0m[94m

[0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m.[94m9[0m.[94m1[0m8 James Griff[94min[0m ([94mC[0m[94mov[0mentry[94m)[0m[94m The[0m[94m space[0m of[94m circles[0m[94m To[0m[94m define[0m[94m a[0m[94m paths[0m may[94m be[0m[94m character[0mised as those[94m that[0m are[94m "[0m[94md[0m[94mou[0mbly[94m light[0m-like[94m"[0m[94m using[0m[94m a[0m complexified version[94m of[0m Mink[94mowski[0m space[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m configuration[0m[94m space[0m[94m of[0m[94m k[0m pair[94mwise[0m[94m un[0mlink[94med[0m circles[94m has[0m[94m fundamental[0m The[0m[94m hom[0m[94mology[0m[94m groups[0m[94m of[0m[94m this[0m[94m subgroup[0m was[94m computed[0m[94m by[0m[94m J[0mensen[94m,[0m McCammond[94m,[0m[94m and[0m [0m[94m
[0m##[94m What[0m[94m is[0m prim[94mality[0m?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m fact[0m[94m about[0m a[94m property[0m[94m being[0m known[94m as[0m either[94m a[0m[94m prime[0m[94m or[0m[94m not[0m a[94m prime[0m[94m is[0m[94m said[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m prim[0m[94mality[0m[94m.[0m[94m While[0m[94m trial[0m division[94m is[0m[94m stated[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m a quite simple but a[94m slow[0m method to know or[94m to[0m verify[94m prim[0m[94mality[0m of[94m a[0m[94m number[0m[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m there[0m[94m are[0m other kinds[94m of[0m[94m tests[0m[94m which[0m are[94m put[0m in to[94m use[0m[94m to[0m know[94m the[0m[94m prim[0m[94mality[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m large numbers[94m.[0m[94m And[0m[94m one[0m[94m of[0m[94m them[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m Miller – Rab[94min[0m prim[94mality[0m[94m test[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m[94m test[0m[94m is[0m though fast still has[94m small[0m probability of error.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWh[0m[94mile[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m hand[0m[94m,[0m[94m A[0mKS[94m prim[0m[94mality[0m[94m test[0m[94m comes[0m[94m up[0m with[94m the[0m[94m correct[0m[94m answer[0m[94m that[0m too in[94m the[0m polynomial time[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m end[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m stated[0m to[94m be[0m[94m a[0m little slow to be practical enough[94m.[0m[94m An[0m individual will be[94m able[0m[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m possible solution to[94m this[0m[94m question[0m[94m in[0m the form[94m of[0m[94m M[0m[94mers[0m[94menne[0m[94m numbers[0m[94m.[0m While[94m the[0m largest prime[94m number[0m to[94m be[0m ever known or at[94m the[0m[94m least[0m till[94m January[0m[94m of[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m is[0m stated[94m to[0m[94m be[0m  [94mdec[0mimal[94m digits[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## What[94m is[0m[94m the[0m use[94m of[0m[94m a[0m prime[94m number[0m?[94m
[0m[94m
[0mBas[94mically[0m[94m,[0m prime[94m numbers[0m or[94m simply[0m pr[94mimes[0m[94m are[0m[94m put[0m[94m in[0m to use[94m in[0m[94m the[0m following fields[94m,[0m[94m information[0m technology[94m in[0m[94m general[0m &[94m public[0m –[94m key[0m[94m crypt[0m[94mography[0m in specific[94m as[0m this makes[94m use[0m[94m of[0m the properties like[94m that[0m of the difficulties faced[94m when[0m factor[94ming[0m large[94m numbers[0m especially to[94m their[0m[94m prime[0m[94m factors[0m[94m.[0m[94m Additionally[0m[94m,[0m[94m these[0m[94m prime[0m[94m numbers[0m come up[94m with[0m[94m several[0m[94m different[0m[94m general[0m[94mizations[0m[94m in[0m[94m some[0m or the other[94m mathematical[0m domains like[94m that[0m of algebra[94m &[0m[94m especially[0m[94m for[0m[94m prime[0m elements[94m besides[0m[94m the[0m[94m prime[0m ide[94mals[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m How[0m to[94m use[0m online[94m prime[0m[94m number[0m[94m calcul[0m[94mator[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIndividuals who wish[94m to[0m make[94m use[0m of[94m the[0m[94m prime[0m[94m number[0m calcul[94mator[0m[94m will[0m[94m have[0m[94m to[0m first[94m enter[0m[94m the[0m[94m number[0m in[94m the[0m field marked for it[94m before[0m[94m they[0m click on calculate tab to know[94m the[0m[94m answer[0m[94m.[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m Tag Info[94m
[0m
[94mThe[0m QCD Lagrangian that[94m has[0m[94m a[0m[94m CP[0m violating symmetry[94m is[0m $${\cal L[94m}[0m[94m~[0m=~-\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0mg[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m}{[0m4[94m}[0mF[94m_{[0mab[94m}[0mF^{ab[94m}[0m[94m~[0m-~\frac[94m{[0m[94mg[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m\[0m[94mtheta[0m[94m}{[0m[94m4[0m[94m}[0m {[94mF[0m[94m_{[0mab[94m}}[0m^* F[94m^{[0mab[94m}[0m[94m~[0m+~\bar\psi(i[94m\[0mgamma^[94ma[0m D_a sure what I should do though[94m in[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m[94m probability[0m in[94m the[0m ground state[94m.[0m
For[94m the[0m[94m first[0m excited energy I know I[94m need[0m[94m to[0m use the[94m raising[0m operator[94m in[0m[94m order[0m[94m to[0m[94m get[0m[94m the[0m wave[94m function[0m,[94m which[0m would give[94m me[0m $$[94m(\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mm[0mw[94m}{[0mh[94m})[0m[94m^\[0m[94mfrac[0m{[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}$$[0m times $$Ψ[94m_[0m[94m0[0m[94m$$[0m but[94m again[0m i'[94mm[0m uns[94mure[0m how[94m to[0m find[94m the[0m probability.[94m
[0m
[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m Nov[0m [94m2[0m4[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m
[94m
[0m###[94m Simon[0m Bridge[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mExpress[0m[94m the[0m[94m original[0m state in[94m terms[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m new ones.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m3[94m.[0m Nov[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m Aegis[94mAnd[0mAtrophy[94m
[0m[94m
[0mI'[94mm[0m[94m not[0m exactly[94m sure[0m what you[94m mean[0m[94m in[0m order[94m to[0m go about doing[94m that[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m4[94m.[0m Nov[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m Simon Bridge[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m particle[0m[94m still[0m has the[94m same[0m[94m wave[0mfunction after the potential has[94m been[0m changed[94m.[0m[94m
[0mHowever[94m,[0m[94m that[0m no longer corresponds[94m to[0m an[94m energy[0m eigenstate[94m.[0m
[94mExpand[0m the original[94m wave[0m[94mfunction[0m[94m as[0m a linear[94m sum[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m new energy[94m eigen[0m[94mstates[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0mWhat do[94m the[0m coefficients[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m expansion[0m[94m represent[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m5[94m.[0m[94m Nov[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m A[0meg[94mis[0m[94mAnd[0m[94mAt[0m[94mro[0mphy[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSo[94m I[0m should expand Ψ =∑[94mC[0mnΨn where[94m |[0m[94mC[0m[94mn[0m[94m|^[0m[94m2[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m probability[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m new[0m[94m energy[0m[94m eigen[0m[94mstate[0m?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m6[94m.[0m[94m Nov[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m4[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m A[0m[94meg[0m[94mis[0mAnd[94mAt[0m[94mro[0mphy[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mDoes[0m[94m the[0m change in[94m time[0m from t<0[94m to[0m[94m t[0m=0 not affect it[94m in[0m any way[94m?[0m
[94m
[0m7[94m.[0m[94m Nov[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m4[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m1[94m4[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m Simon Bridge[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe effect[94m is[0m in[94m the[0m[94m possible[0m outcome[94m of[0m future measurements[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m8[94m.[0m Nov[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m4[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m v[0mela
[94m
[0mStaff[94m Emer[0mitus
[94mThis[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m ground[0m[94m state[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m system after[94m the[0m[94m potential[0m is disp[94mla[0m[94mced[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m'[94ms[0m not the[94m state[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m particle[0m at $t[94m=[0m[94m0[0m[94m$,[0m which[94m is[0m[94m still[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m state[0m[94m
[0m$$[94m\[0mPsi([94mx[0m[94m,[0m0[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0mleft[94m(\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94mm[0m[94m\[0m[94momega[0m[94m}{[0m[94mπ[0mh}\[94mright[0m)[94m^\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m4[94m}[0m e[94m^{-\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0mm\[94momega[0m x[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0mh[94m}}[0m.$$[94m By[0m the way,[94m the[0m frequency[94m is[0m[94m denoted[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m Greek letter $\omega[94m$,[0m not $[94mw[0m$.
[94m
[0mLook up[94m the[0m definition[94m of[0m the probability amplitude.[94m This[0m[94m is[0m a is handled[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m Sp[0m[94mread[0mSheetPlugin[94m.[0m[94m Ar[0m[94mound[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m functions[94m are[0m[94m available[0m[94m,[0m ...[94m

[0m### Beat[94m the[0m[94m drum[0m[94m

[0m##[94m#[0m[94m Num[0m[94mbers[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mPy[0mCon'[94ms[0m financial[94m aid[0m[94m program[0m[94m is[0m[94m quite[0m large[94m.[0m There[94m are[0m[94m a[0m number[94m of[0m reasons[94m for[0m[94m that[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Py[0m[94mCon[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m financial[0m[94m aid[0m[94m program[0m[94m has[0m been[94m around[0m[94m for[0m many[94m years[0m[94m,[0m[94m so[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m quite[0m m[94mature[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m The[0m[94m program[0m[94m can[0m count on support[94m from[0m Py[94mCon[0m leadership and[94m the[0m Python Software Foundation[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m Because[0m[94m Py[0m[94mCon[0m US is[94m the[0m largest Py[94mCon[0m in[94m the[0m world[94m,[0m[94m it[0m acts[94m as[0m[94m a[0m ne[94mx[0mus[94m for[0m people[94m across[0m[94m the[0m[94m glo[0mbe;[94m therefore[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m important[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m Python[0m community[94m that[0m as many[94m people[0m[94m as[0m[94m possible[0m have[94m a[0m[94m chance[0m[94m to[0m[94m attend[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThis[0m[94m is[0m[94m just[0m[94m to[0m give[94m you[0m[94m a[0m ballpark idea[94m of[0m our[94m numbers[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mReg[0m[94mard[0m[94mless[0m[94m of[0m[94m what[0m[94m your[0m numbers will[94m be[0m[94m,[0m expect[94m that[0m[94m the[0m primary bott[94ml[0m[94mene[0mck[94m of[0m[94m your[0m[94m financial[0m[94m aid[0m program[94m will[0m[94m simply[0m be lack[94m of[0m[94m funds[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m Conf[0musing parts[94m and[0m sad[94m truth[0ms[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m No-shows
[94m
[0mA lot[94m of[0m[94m people[0m[94m will[0m[94m not[0m show[94m up[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m not[0m notify[94m you[0m[94m ([0mor notify you[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m days[0m[94m around[0m[94m the[0m conference). [0m[94m
[0mFrom[94m the[0m perspective[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m Fin[0m[94man[0m[94mcial[0m[94m A[0m[94mid[0m[94m Chair[0m[94m,[0m no-shows[94m are[0m terrible[94m.[0m It[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m a[0m dead[94m grant[0m: money that[94m'[0m[94ms[0m been[94m allocated[0m that can'[94mt[0m[94m easily[0m[94m be[0m translated into[94m an[0m extra atten[94mde[0m[94me[0m[94m.[0m[94m Hence[0m[94m,[0m many[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m suggestions[0m I make[94m for[0m running financial[94m aid[0m processes[94m are[0m focused[94m on[0m minim[94mizing[0m no[94m-[0m[94msh[0m[94mows[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m#[0m[94m Vis[0mas and travel[94m
[0m[94m
[0mMany recip[94mients[0m[94m have[0m[94m to[0m[94m cancel[0m because[94m they[0m[94m are[0m unable[94m to[0m acquire vis[94mas[0m[94m to[0m Canada or[94m the[0m United[94m States[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m some[94m cases[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m vis[0m[94ma[0m process[94m took[0m several months[94m and[0m simply did[94m not[0m[94m complete[0m in[94m time[0m for[94m the[0m conference[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m others[0m[94m the[0m[94m vis[0mas[94m were[0m declined[94m for[0m various[94m reasons[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mOcc[94mam[0m'[94ms[0m razor tells[94m me[0m[94m that[0m[94m many[0m[94m in[0m both cases[94m,[0m[94m one[0m can ask for a[94m space[0m of[94m B[0mPS-states — on[94m multiple[0m M5-branes in[94m ([0m[94m1[0m.4), and on a single M5-brane in ([94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m6[0m[94m)[0m — which[94m is[0m precisely what was proposed[94m as[0m[94m a[0m candidate[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m kn[0mot homology[94m ([0mresp[94m.[0m[94m H[0mOMFLY homology[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m rotation[0m symmet[94mries[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m ([94m1[0m[94m.[0m7[94m)[0m[94m U[0m([94m1[0m)[94mP[0m×U[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m)[0m[94mF[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mHere[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m two[0m factors correspond,[94m respectively[0m[94m,[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m rotation[0m[94m symmetry[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m tang[94ment[0m and[94m normal[0m[94m bundle[0m[94m of[0m[94m in[0m a[94m [0m4[94m-[0mman[94mif[0m[94mold[0m .[94m In[0m[94m particular[0m[94m,[0m in both frameworks[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m4[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m6[0m[94m),[0m[94m the[0m former[94m is[0m responsible for[94m the[0m[94m -[0mgrad[94ming[0m[94m of[0m ,[94m which[0m[94m corresponds[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m conserved angular momentum[94m derived[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m rotation[0m symmetry[94m of[0m .[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0m well[94m-[0m[94mknown[0m feature[94m of[0m[94m the[0m large[94m-[0m[94m du[0m[94mality[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m rank[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m gauge[94m group[0m turns[94m into[0m a[94m geometric[0m parameter of[94m the[0m[94m dual[0m[94m system[0m[94m ([0mcf[94m.[0m [[94m1[0m3[94m][0m or[94m [[0m[94m1[0m[94m4[0m[94m]).[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m present[94m case[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m K[0mäh[94mler[0m[94m mod[0m[94mulus[0m of[94m the[0m Cal[94mabi[0m[94m-[0m[94mY[0m[94mau[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m-[0mfold :
[94m
[0m ([94m1[0m[94m.[0m8[94m)[0m[94m N[0m∼log[94m([0m[94ma[0m)=Vol[94m([0mCP[94m1[0m).[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m reason[94m we[0m[94m denote[0m[94m the[0m[94m K[0m[94mäh[0m[94mler[0m parameter[94m by[0m[94m rather[0m[94m than[0m is[94m that[0m[94m with[0m this convention[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m standard[0m variable of[94m the[0m[94m H[0m[94mOM[0m[94mFL[0m[94mY[0m polynomial[94m /[0m[94m kn[0m[94mot[0m hom[94mology[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAn[0m[94mother[0m feature familiar[94m to[0m[94m the[0m practitioners of[94m the[0m[94m ref[0mined / motivic[94m Donald[0m[94mson[0m[94m-[0mThomas theory[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m can[0m[94m jump[0m as[94m one[0m varies[94m stability[0m conditions [[94m1[0m6, 1[94m7[0m,[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m2[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m21[94m].[0m[94m Thus[0m[94m,[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m closely[94m related[0m[94m type[0m IIA superstring compactification on[94m a[0m[94m Cal[0m[94mabi[0m[94m-[0m[94mY[0m[94mau[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m-[0m[94mfold[0m ,[94m the[0m[94m stability[0m parameters[94m are[0m[94m the[0m[94m K[0m[94mäh[0m[94mler[0m[94m mod[0m[94muli[0m[94m of[0m ,[94m and[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m present[0m[94m case[0m there[94m is[0m[94m only[0m[94m one[0m[94m K[0m[94mäh[0m[94mler[0m[94m mod[0mulus[94m ([0m[94m1[0m.[94m8[0m[94m)[0m[94m given[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m volume of[94m the[0m[94m cycle[0m[94m in[0m .[94m Therefore[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m conclude[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m space[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m2[94m)[0m can jump as one changes the stability[94m parameter[0m .[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mL[0m[94muck[0mily[94m,[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m case[94m where[0m is[94m the[0m[94m total[0m space of[94m the[0m bundle[94m over[0m[94m relevant[0m[94m to[0m our What[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m effective[0m annual[94m rate[0m[94m?[0m Let us explain[94m.[0m[94m As[0m can[94m be[0m[94m seen[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m hour[94mly[0m[94m paper[94m is[0m to present a[94m non[0m[94m-[0mNewtonian blood flow model[94m with[0m[94m the[0m effect[94m of[0m different[94m geometry[0m of stenosis[94m on[0m[94m various[0m flow [0m

[0m[94m

[0m[94m

[0m[94mF[0m[94mraction[0m workshop[94m allows[0m[94m users[0m[94m to[0m[94m practice[0m ordering[94m,[0m[94m reducing[0m, adding[94m,[0m[94m subtract[0m[94ming[0m[94m,[0m[94m multip[0m[94mlying[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m div[0m[94miding[0m fra[94mctions[0m[94m and[0m mixed[94m numbers[0m[94m.[0m[94m So[0m[94m let[0m&39;[94ms[0m say[94m that[0m I[94m have[0m this square[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m complete[0m[94m square[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m example[0m[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m/[0m[94m6[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m/[0m[94m3[0m[94m.[0m[94m L[0m’[94mis[0molation de[94m la[0m[94m to[0miture permet donc[94m d[0m’[94m&[0m[94m2[0m[94m3[0m3;pargner beaucoup[94m d[0m’[94m&[0m[94m2[0m[94m3[0m[94m3[0m[94m;[0mnergie[94m et[0m[94m d[0m’argent[94m.[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m But[0m[94m you[0m[94m can[0m&[94m3[0m9[94m;[0mt[94m get[0m[94m it[0m[94m to[0m print[94m it[0m[94m exactly[0m[94m the[0m[94m way[0m[94m you[0m[94m declared[0m[94m it[0m[94m.[0m[94m Vi[0m er[94m distrib[0m[94mut[0m[94m&[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m8[94m;[0mr av E[94mika[0m[94m Kap[0mitalforvaltning[94m,[0m[94m distrib[0m[94mut[0m[94m&[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m8[0m[94m;[0m[94mr[0m[94m av[0m[94m E[0m[94mika[0m[94m K[0mredittbank[94m,[0m[94m distrib[0m[94mut[0m[94m&[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m8[0m[94m;[0m[94mr[0m[94m av[0m[94m E[0m[94mika[0m[94m F[0m[94mors[0mikring[94m.[0m[94m

[0m[94m
[0mdst[94m
[0m[94mHow[0m[94m about[0m a[94m perfect[0m sphere[94m of[0m some finite radius[94m,[0m inside[94m being[0m[94m mirror[0m[94med[0m, containing[94m every[0m phot[94mon[0m in[94m the[0m universe except[94m for[0m[94m those[0m required for observation[94m and[0m measurements[94m.[0m[94m Does[0m[94m that[0m have mass[94m greater[0m[94m than[0m[94m the[0m shell[94m?[0m
[94m
[0m[94mWhat[0m would happen[94m if[0m[94m you[0m[94m started[0m rot[94mating[0m it[94m?[0m Et[94mc[0m...[94m
[0m
[94mS[0m[94mho[0moting Star
[94mHome[0mwork Helper[94m
[0m[94mI[0m know[94m that[0m Phot[94mons[0m[94m have[0m[94m no[0m[94m mass[0m[94m at[0m[94m all[0m[94m.[0m[94m Although[0m I[94m read[0m it[94m was[0m something[94m ins[0manely small like [94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m1[0m×[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m−[0m[94m5[0m2 kg base[94m bounded[0m by[94m the[0m curves $$[94my[0m=[94mx[0m^[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m and[94m $$[0m[94my[0m[94m=[0m[94m8[0m-[94mx[0m^[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m and[94m cross[0m[94m-[0msections parallel to the y[94m-[0m[94maxis[0m that are semi[94m-[0mcircles[94m.[0m

Problem Stat[94mement[0m

Calcul[94mate[0m[94m the[0m volume[94m of[0m[94m a[0m solid[94m with[0m base bounded[94m by[0m the[94m curves[0m $$[94my[0m[94m=[0m[94mx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $$[0m[94my[0m[94m=[0m[94m8[0m[94m-[0m[94mx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m and cross[94m-[0msections[94m parallel[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m y[0m[94m-[0m[94maxis[0m[94m that[0m[94m are[0m[94m semi[0m[94m-[0m[94mcir[0m[94mcles[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mHint

[94mThe[0m diameter[94m of[0m[94m the[0m semi[94m-[0m[94mcircle[0m[94m is[0m the[94m distance[0m[94m between[0m[94m the[0m[94m curves[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mProblem[0m Stat[94mement[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mCalcul[94mate[0m[94m the[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m a[94m solid[0m[94m with[0m[94m base[0m[94m bounded[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m curves[0m[94m $$[0m[94my[0m[94m=[0m[94mx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $$[0m[94my[0m[94m=[0m[94m8[0m[94m-[0m[94mx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m[94m and[0m[94m cross[0m[94m-[0m[94msections[0m[94m parallel[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m y[0m[94m-[0m[94maxis[0m[94m that[0m[94m are[0m[94m semi[0m[94m-[0m[94mcir[0m[94mcles[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m$$\displaystyle{ V =[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m256\pi}{15}[94m }[0m$$[94m
[0m[94m
[0mProblem Stat[94mement[0m
[94m
[0mCalcul[94mate[0m[94m the[0m[94m volume[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m[94m solid[0m[94m with[0m[94m base[0m[94m bounded[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m curves[0m[94m $$[0m[94my[0m[94m=[0m[94mx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $$[0m[94my[0m[94m=[0m[94m8[0m[94m-[0m[94mx[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$$[0m[94m and[0m[94m cross[0m[94m-[0msections[94m parallel[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m y[0m[94m-[0m[94maxis[0m[94m that[0m[94m are[0m[94m semi[0m[94m-[0m[94mcir[0m[94mcles[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mHint[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m diameter[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m semi[0m[94m-[0m[94mcircle[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m distance[0m[94m between[0m[94m the[0m[94m curves[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSol[0m[94mution[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis video sets[94m up[0m[94m the[0m integral but[94m does[0m[94m not[0m evaluate it. Here is[94m the[0m[94m remainder[0m of[94m the[0m solution.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m $$\displaystyle[94m{[0m[94m V[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0mint_{-[94m2[0m}^{2}{ \frac[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m} ([94m4[0m-x[94m^[0m2)^[94m2[0m ~dx } }$$ \[0m[94mright[0m[94m][0m[94m_{-[0m[94m2[0m}^[94m2[0m }$$ $$\[94mdisplaystyle[0m{ V[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m{\[94mpi[0m}{2} \[94mleft[0m[ [94m1[0m6(2)+ \frac{\[94mpi[0m}{2[94m}[0m \left[ 16(-2[94m)[0m[94m +[0m \[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m(-[0m2[94m)^[0m5}{5[94m}[0m -\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m8}{3}(-2[94m)^[0m[94m3[0m \[94mright[0m[94m][0m }[94m$$[0m $$\displaystyle{ V =[94m \[0mfrac[94m{\[0m[94mpi[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}[0m may[94m want[0m[94m to[0m[94m change[0m[94m the[0m[94m way[0m think[94m you[0m[94m should[0m[94m go[0m[94m to[0m Insert[94m Ca[0mption[94m-[0mNumber[94ming[0m, set number Format to[94m a[0m[94m,[0m[94m b[0m[94m,[0m[94m c[0m[94m,[0m[94m…[0m[94m and[0m set He[94mading[0m[94m2[0m[94m in[0m Chapter starts[94m with[0m style[94m.[0m[94m \[0mfootnote[94m{[0mtext}[94m Print[0m[94m foot[0m[94mnote[0m[94m at[0m bottom[94m of[0m[94m page[0m[94m.[0m  [94m The[0m[94m "[0mlabel[94m"[0m[94m is[0m[94m nothing[0m[94m but[0m[94m an[0m[94m a[0msterisk[94m bullet[0m[94m.[0m[94m To[0m[94m handle[0m[94m this[0m situation[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m section[0ming commands[94m have[0m[94m an[0m optional argument that provides[94m the[0m LaTeX[94m Source[0m[94m of[0m Example [94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m document[94m is[0m primarily LaTeX[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m fact[0m[94m,[0m[94m your[0m example[94m is[0m a[0m package[94m.[0m[94m The[0m vertical spacing[94m between[0m references[94m is[0m set by \bibsep[94m;[0m change this with[94m the[0m \setlength command[94m.[0m L[94mATE[0m[94mX[0m has[94m four[0m standard[94m pag[0m[94mest[0myles[94m:[0m.[94m For[0m example[94m,[0m[94m moving[0m[94m with[0m j[94m and[0m[94m k[0m[94m with[0m[94m of[94m the[0m[94m file[0m[94m as[0m with :set number[94m.[0m First[94m of[0m[94m all[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m probably[0m[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m want[0m[94m group[94m.[0m Late[94mx[0m[94m will[0m sort out[94m the[0m layout[94m and[0m any number[94ming[0m[94m for[0m[94m you[0m[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m am[0m editing a[94m Sim[94mply[0m[94m begin[0m the[94m appropriate[0m environment at[94m the[0m desired point[94m within[0m[94m the[0m[94m current[0m[94m list[0m[94m.[0m[94m Re[0m[94mquired[0m for[94m descri[0m[94mptions[0midelines you[94m are[0m trying to follow or[94m conj[0munction type[94m a[0m different method[94m might[0m apply to your case[94m.[0m Please contact us[94m when[0m you[94m need[0m any other[94m collision[0m[94m probability[0m method as[94m the[0m[94m default[0m[94m for[0m your satellite[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mFor[0m[94m the[0m risk estimation classification two[94m criteria[0m[94m are[0m used[94m as[0m[94m a[0m set[94m of[0m th[94mresh[0m[94molds[0m[94m.[0m[94m While[0m setting[94m up[0m[94m a[0m satellite the user[94m can[0m define[94m both[0m.[94m These[0m are[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• the[94m minimum[0m[94m miss[0m[94m distance[0m[94m in[0m meters and
[94m•[0m[94m the[0m[94m accepted[0m collision probability level[94m ([0malso A[94mCP[0m[94mL[0m[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWhen either[94m the[0m estimated[94m miss[0m[94m distance[0m[94m is[0m[94m smaller[0m[94m than[0m[94m the[0m[94m minimum[0m or[94m the[0m collision[94m probability[0m[94m is[0m[94m bigger[0m[94m than[0m[94m the[0m defined[94m A[0m[94mCP[0m[94mL[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m conj[0m[94munction[0m is class[94mified[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m critical[94m.[0m[94m Is[0m[94m the[0m collision[94m probability[0m[94m smaller[0m[94m than[0m[94m the[0m A[94mCP[0m[94mL[0m but[94m bigger[0m[94m than[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m.0 *[94m A[0m[94mCP[0m[94mL[0m the event[94m is[0m set[94m to[0m[94m observe[0m. Any[94m other[0m[94m events[0m are[94m non[0m critical[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m#### Risk Pred[94miction[0m ([94mbeta[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAs[0m many operation[94m teams[0m struggle with[94m finding[0m[94m the[0m[94m correct[0m[94m approach[0m[94m to[0m handling conj[94munction[0m[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m even[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m above th[94mresh[0m[94molds[0m[94m in[0m[94m place[0m[94m,[0m[94m a[0m[94m couple[0m[94m of[0m questions[94m remain[0m:[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• When to[94m act[0m[94m on[0m[94m a[0m conj[94munction[0m?[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Is[94m the[0m[94m collision[0m[94m probability[0m going[94m to[0m change[94m until[0m T[94mCA[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTo[0m address[94m these[0m[94m questions[0m OKAPI[94m:[0mOrbits developed[94m a[0m method[94m to[0m predict[94m the[0m[94m collision[0m[94m probability[0m[94m for[0m[94m most[0m events until[94m T[0m[94mCA[0m[94m.[0m It[94m uses[0m knowledge[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m work[0m[94mings[0m of SSA systems[94m and[0m[94m machine[0m[94m learning[0m techniques[94m to[0m ext[94mrap[0m[94molate[0m[94m the[0m collision[94m probability[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSo how does it work[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mLook[0m[94ming[0m[94m at[0m[94m the[0m[94m general[0m[94m ([0m[94m3[0mD[94m)[0m[94m method[0m[94m of[0m how[94m the[0m[94m collision[0m[94m probability[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m form[94mulated[0m as[94m:[0m $$P[94m_[0mc =[94m \[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{\[0m[94msqrt[0m{\[94mleft[0m[94m([0m[94m2[0m[94m\[0m[94mcdot[0m[94m\[0mpi[94m\[0mright[94m)^[0m[94m3[0m \[94mcdot[0m det[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m([0mC[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)[0m[94m}}\[0mint_{V_[94mc[0m[94m}[0m[94m exp[0m\[94mleft[0m[ -\[94mfrac[0m[94m{[0m[94m1[0m[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m[94mDelta[0m[94m\[0mvec[94m{[0mr}^[94mT[0m\cdot C^{-[94m1[0m[94m}[0m[94m \[0m[94mcdot[0m \Delta[94m\[0m[94mvec[0m[94m{[0m[94mr[0m[94m}\[0m[94mright[0m] dV$$ it becomes[94m apparent[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m three[94m entities[0m:

•[94m Object[0ms' size[94m,[0m expressed[94m as[0m[94m the[0m combined[94m volume[0m Vc,[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Miss distance[94m,[0m expressed[94m as[0m[94m the[0m vector between both[94m positions[0m[94m r[0m[94m and[0m
[94m•[0m[94m Position[0m[94m un[0mcert[94maint[0m[94mies[0m[94m,[0m[94m expressed[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m combined[0m cov[94mar[0m[94miance[0m C,[94m
[0m[94m
[0mdefine[94m the[0m collision[94m probability[0m[94m computation[0m.[94m We[0m already addressed[94m the[0m[94m sens[0m[94mitivity[0m of[94m the[0m objects'[94m sizes[0m[94m in[0m regard[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m computed[0m probability[94m.[0m But[94m while[0m for many[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m CD[0mM[94ms[0m the[94m size[0m of[94m the[0m[94m space[0m objects[94m remain[0m constant[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m computed[0m position[94m and[0m[94m velocity[0m[94m forec[0masts[94m have[0m a[94m compare[0m[94mably[0m low variation,[94m the[0m[94m un[0mcert[94maint[0m[94mies[0m[94m shows[0m�[94m[0m ## FOM[94m:[0m[94m June[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m -[0m July[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m1[0m, [94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m[[0mDate Index[94m][0m[94m [[0mThread Index[94m][0m[94m [[0mFOM[94m Post[0mings[94m][0m[94m [[0mFO[94mM[0m Home[94m][0m[94m
[0m
#[94m F[0m[94mOM[0m[94m:[0m[94m natural[0m examples[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mS[0m[94m B[0m[94m Cooper[0m[94m writes[0m[94m
[0m>[94m App[0mlications[94m are[0m found[94m after[0m[94m the[0m theory is developed[94m,[0m[94m not[0m before[94m.[0m[94m A[0m[94m math[0m
>[94m problem[0m[94m gets[0m[94m solved[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m by[0m accident some engineer[94m gets[0m hold[94m of[0m it[94m and[0m
> says[94m,[0m 'Hey[94m,[0m[94m isn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m this[0m similar[94m to[0m...?[94m Let[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m try[94m it[0m[94m.'[0m[94m For[0m[94m instance[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m

[0m[94mNot[0m[94m univers[0m[94mally[0m true[94m.[0m Finite element methods were[94m used[0m[94m very[0m[94m

[0m[94ms[0m[94mure[0m[94mly[0m intertwines[94m with[0m[94m all[0m human endeavros[94m.[0m[94m A[0m[94m few[0m quotes[94m come[0m to[94m mind[0m[94m:[0m[94m

[0mlen[94m =[0m[94m r[0mle[94m([0m[94ms[0mrt.roll[94m)$[0mlengths; len ##[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m s[0m = max[94m([0m[94mlen[0m[94m);[0m[94m s[0m ##[94m [0m5 # there[94m were[0m[94m five[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m [0m[94m I[0m hope[94m this[0m[94m is[0m enough[94m to[0m show[94m that[0m[94m I[0m[94m am[0m counting[94m$[0m[94mS[0m[94m$[0mas[94m you[0m[94m intended[0m[94m.[0m[94m Sim[0mulation[94m for[0m[94m ten[0m fair six-s[94mided[0m dice.[94m With[0m[94m a[0m million experiments of ten roll[94ms[0m[94m each[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m sim[94mulated[0m prob[94mabilities[0m[94m should[0m[94m be[0m[94m accurate[0m to about[94m three[0m[94m decimal[0m[94m places[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m[94m run[0m shown[94m,[0m[94m possible[0m values[94m of[0m[94m$[0m[94mS[0m[94m$[0mare[94m$[0m[94m2[0m, [94m3[0m[94m,[0m \dots[94m,[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m.$Three is by far the most[94m likely[0m value[94m of[0m$[94mS[0m[94m.$[0m[94mT[0men[94m ([0mgetting[94m the[0m[94m same[0m[94m face[0m on all ten roll[94ms[0m[94m)[0m is[94m extremely[0m unlikely[94m [[0m[94m$([0m[94m1[0m/[94m6[0m)^[94m9[0m[94m$[0m],[94m and[0m[94m did[0m[94m not[0m happen[94m to[0m[94m occur[0m[94m during[0m this[94m simulation[0m run[94m.[0m[94m m[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m10[94m^[0m[94m6[0m;[94m s[0m[94m =[0m numeric(m);[94m f[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m;[94m d[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m; die[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m:f[94m for[0m (i in [94m1[0m:m[94m)[0m { srt.roll = sort[94m([0msample[94m([0mdie, d[94m,[0m[94m re[0mpl=T)) s[[94mi[0m[94m][0m = max[94m([0mrle[94m([0m[94ms[0mrt.roll)$length[94ms[0m)[94m [0m }[94m

[0m
[94mNote[0m[94m:[0m[94m If[0m[94m you[0m are[94m familiar[0m[94m with[0m R, you[94m can[0m try out additional[94m runs[0m[94m with[0m different[94m parameter[0m values[94m,[0m[94m to[0m compare[94m with[0m any analytical[94m results[0m you get[94m.[0m[94m With[0m[94m m[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m^[0m[94m6[0m the program takes[94m a[0m couple[94m of[0m[94m minutes[0m[94m to[0m[94m run[0m, mainly because of[94m the[0m sorting;[94m you[0m might[94m find[0m m =[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m^[0m5 gives enough accuracy[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m you[0m[94m'[0m[94mre[0m[94m not[0m[94m familiar[0m[94m with[0m[94m R[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m could[94m easily[0m[94m get[0m[94m it[0m[94m for[0m free from www[94m.[0mr-project[94m.[0morg (Windows, Macrightarrow \infty}$. However[94m,[0m[94m this[0m[94m is[0m[94m not[0m quite[94m accurate[0m[94m,[0m[94m because[0m some moments[94m ([0mnamely those with[94m all[0m exponents ${[94ma[0m_i}$ even)[94m have[0m[94m the[0m[94m “[0mwrong” asymptotic value[94m,[0m leading to[94m some[0m unwanted correlation between[94m the[0m two variables[94m.[0m For instance[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m events[0m ${\mu(n)=[94m0[0m}$[94m and[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mmu[0m[94m([0m[94mn[0m+[94m4[0m[94m)=[0m[94m0[0m[94m}$[0m have[94m a[0m strong correlation[94m with[0m each[94m other[0m[94m,[0m[94m basically[0m because[94m they[0m[94m are[0m[94m both[0m strongly correl[94mated[0m with[94m the[0m event[94m of[0m[94m ${[0m[94mn[0m[94m}$[0m[94m being[0m divis[94mible[0m[94m by[0m[94m ${[0m[94m4[0m[94m}$.[0m A more accurate interpretation[94m of[0m[94m the[0m Chowla conject[94mure[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m random variables ${\[94mmu[0m[94m([0m[94mn[0m[94m+[0m[94m1[0m),\ldots[94m,\[0m[94mmu[0m[94m([0m[94mn[0m[94m+[0mk[94m)}$[0m[94m are[0m asympt[94mot[0mically conditionally independent[94m of[0m[94m each[0m[94m other[0m[94m,[0m[94m after[0m conditioning on[94m the[0m[94m zero[0m[94m pattern[0m ${\[94mmu[0m[94m([0m[94mn[0m[94m+[0m[94m1[0m[94m)^[0m2[94m,\[0m[94mldots[0m[94m,\[0m[94mmu[0m[94m([0m[94mn[0m[94m+[0m[94mk[0m[94m)^[0m[94m2[0m[94m}$[0m;[94m thus[0m[94m,[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m sign[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m M[0mö[94mb[0mius function[94m that[0m[94m fl[0muct[94mu[0m[94mates[0m[94m like[0m random noise[94m,[0m rather than[94m the[0m[94m zero[0m pattern[94m.[0m[94m ([0m[94mThe[0m[94m situation[0m is[94m a[0m bit cleaner[94m if[0m[94m one[0m works[94m instead[0m with[94m the[0m[94m Li[0mou[94mville[0m function ${\[94mlambda[0m[94m}$[0m[94m instead[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m M[94mö[0m[94mb[0m[94mius[0m[94m function[0m[94m ${\[0m[94mmu[0m}$,[94m as[0m[94m this[0m function[94m never[0m vanishes[94m,[0m[94m but[0m we will stick[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m traditional[0m[94m M[0m[94mö[0m[94mb[0m[94mius[0m[94m function[0m formalism[94m here[0m[94m.)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0m[94m more[0m[94m recent[0m form[94mulation[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m M[0m[94mö[0m[94mb[0m[94mius[0m random[94mness[0m[94m he[0m[94mur[0mistic[94m is[0m the[94m following[0m[94m conject[0m[94mure[0m[94m of[0m[94m S[0marnak.[94m Given[0m[94m a[0m bounded[94m sequence[0m[94m ${[0mf[94m:[0m {\[94mbf[0m N}[94m \[0mrightarrow {\[94mbf[0m C}}$, define[94m the[0m[94m topological[0m[94m entropy[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m sequence[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m the least[94m exponent[0m[94m ${\[0m[94msigma[0m[94m}$[0m with[94m the[0m property[94m that[0m[94m for[0m[94m any[0m[94m fixed[0m[94m ${\[0mepsilon[94m >[0m [94m0[0m}$,[94m and[0m[94m for[0m[94m ${[0mm}$[94m going[0m[94m to[0m infinity[94m the[0m set ${\{ ([94mf[0m(n[94m+[0m[94m1[0m),\[94mldots[0m[94m,[0mf[94m([0m[94mn[0m[94m+[0mm)): n \in {\[94mbf[0m[94m N[0m[94m}[0m[94m \[0m}[94m \[0msubset {\bf C}^m[94m}$[0m[94m of[0m[94m ${[0m[94mf[0m[94m}$[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m covered[94m by[0m[94m ${[0mO[94m([0m[94m \[0mexp( \[94msigma[0m m[94m +[0m o([94mm[0m[94m)[0m ) )[94m}$[0m balls of radius[94m ${\[0m[94mepsilon[0m[94m}$.[0m ([94mIf[0m[94m ${[0m[94mf[0m[94m}$[0m[94m ar[0m[94mises[0m from[94m a[0m[94m minimal[0m[94m topological[0m dynam[94mical[0m[94m system[0m[94m ${[0m(X[94m,[0mT[94m)}$[0m by[94m ${[0m[94mf[0m(n[94m)[0m := f[94m([0mT^[94mn[0m x[94m)[0m[94m}$,[0m[94m the[0m[94m above[0m notion[94m is[0m equivalent[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m usual[0m notion[94m of[0m[94m the[0m topological[94m entropy[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m dynam[94mical[0m[94m system[0m[94m.)[0m For instance[94m,[0m if[94m the[0m[94m sequence[0m[94m is[0m a[94m bit[0m sequence[94m ([0m[94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.[0m[94m it[0m[94m takes[0m[94m values[0m in ${\[94m{[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m1[0m\}}$[94m),[0m[94m then[0m[94m there[0m[94m are[0m only ${\exp[94m(\[0m[94msigma[0m m[94m +[0m o([94mm[0m[94m))[0m[94m}$[0m ${m[94m}$-[0m[94mbit[0m patterns[94m that[0m[94m can[0m appear[94m as[0m[94m blocks[0m[94m of[0m[94m ${[0m[94mm[0m}$ I increased the[94m corner[0m frequency[94m of[0m[94m the[0m lock[94mins[0m for[94m the[0m arm signals from 0[94m.[0m5Hz to[94m [0m[94m1[0mHz[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWith[0m[94m the[0m[94m new[0m configuration[94m the[0m arm alignment converges[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94msec[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m input[0m pointing[94m does[0m in ~[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94msec[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m actu[94mation[0m[94m to[0m the[94m input[0m[94m pointing[0m TTs are done[94m together[0m with[94m the[0m feedforward actu[94mation[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m arms[94m.[0m[94m
[0mThis way we[94m can[0m avoid too[94m much[0m coupling[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m input[0m pointing servos to[94m the[0m[94m arm[0m alignment serv[94mos[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m corresponding script /[94mopt[0m/rtcds/cal[94mtech[0m/[94mc[0m[94m1[0m[94m/[0mscripts/ASS[94m/[0m[94mY[0mARM[94m/[0m[94mD[0m[94mIT[0mHER_Arm[94m_[0m[94mON[0m.py was also modified[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAtt[94machment[0m [94m1[0m[94m:[0m[94m Y[0m[94mAR[0m[94mM[0m[94m_[0mASS[94m.[0mpng[94m
[0m[94mAtt[0m[94machment[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m:[0m[94m S[0mcreenshot[94m.[0m[94mpng[0m[94m
[0m[94m8[0m[94m5[0m[94m5[0m[94m4[0m   Wed May[94m [0m[94m8[0m [94m2[0m2:[94m3[0m[94m6[0m:[94m4[0m[94m2[0m 20[94m1[0m[94m3[0m Koji[94mUpdate[0mASS[94mX[0mAR[94mM[0m[94m A[0mSS[94m ([0m[94mY[0m[94mAR[0m[94mM[0m[94m A[0m[94mSS[0m[94m -[0m faster and[94m more[0m precise[94m convergence[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mS[0m[94mame[0m ASS[94m setup[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m X arm has[94m been[0m[94m done[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mNow[0m Arm[94m A[0m[94mSS[0m[94m can[0m[94m run[0m[94m simultaneously[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mI[0m revert[94med[0m[94m the[0m number[94m of[0m the lockin banks[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m for[0m[94m future[0m[94m implementation[0m[94m of[0m[94m A[0m2[94mL[0m for[94m the[0m IT[94mM[0m[94mX[0m[94m by[0m[94m co[0mil balancing[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mSince[0m[94m A[0m[94m2[0mL for the ITM[94mX[0m[94m is[0m just bare[94mly[0m visible for now[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m am[0m[94m going[0m[94m to[0m leave[94m the[0m[94m co[0mil balance[94m un[0mtouch[94med[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAtt[94machment[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m[94m X[0m[94mAR[0m[94mM[0m[94m_[0mASS[94m.[0m[94mpng[0m[94m
[0m9[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m8[0m   Fri[94m Aug[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m6[94m [0m[94m1[0m3:[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m:[0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m3 Ko[94mji[0m[94mUpdate[0mASS[94mAS[0mX[94m model[0m/[94mscreen[0m[94m clean[0m[94ming[0m[94m up[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m[[0mKo[94mji[0m[94m Man[0masa[94m][0m[94m
[0m
[94mY[0mesterday[94m we[0m clean[94med[0m[94m up[0m[94m the[0m[94m AS[0m[94mX[0m model[94m and[0m[94m screens[0m[94m to[0m[94m have[0m more[94m straight[0m[94m forward[0m structure[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m screen[0m[94m
[0mand[94m the[0m[94m channel[0m names[94m,[0m and to[94m correct[0m mistakes[94m in[0m[94m the[0m model/[94ms[0mcreens[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m true[0m motiv[94mation[0m[94m is[0m that I suspect[94m the[0m[94m excess[0m[94m L[0mF noise of[94m the[0m[94m X[0m arm A[94mLS[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m caused[94m by[0m[94m mis[0m[94malign[0m[94mment[0m
[94mand[0m beam jitter coupling to[94m the[0m[94m intensity[0m[94m noise[0m of the beat[94m.[0m I[94m wanted[0m[94m to[0m see how[94m the[0m[94m noise[0m[94m is[0m affected[94m by[0m[94m the[0m alignment[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94mCurrent[0m[94mly[0m[94m X[0m[94m-[0mend[94m green[0m[94m is[0m highly mis[94maligned[0m[94m in[0m[94m pitch[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m
- Any string "X[94mEND[0m[94m"[0m was replaced[94m by[0m[94m "[0m[94mX[0mARM[94m",[0m[94m as[0m[94m many[0m components in[94m the[0m system is[94m not[0m local[94mized[0m at[94m the[0m[94m end[0m table[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m- The name[94m like[0m[94m "[0m[94mX[0m[94mAR[0m[94mM[0m-[94mIT[0m]$const[94m [0mdoubleInput

[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m:[94m [0m [94m$\[0mmathbf[94m{[0my[94mty[0m[94m}$[0m[94mdouble[0mInput[94m

[0m[94mNote[0m[94m:[0m the dimension[94m,[0m dim to these new strateg[94mies[0m[94m the[0m A[94mI[0m[94m has[0m[94m invent[0m[94med[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mPr[0m[94mism[0mata Review[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mA[0m few month[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m ago[0m I[94m review[0m[94med[0m[94m a[0m[94m game[0m[94m by[0m[94m David[0m Sirlin called Code[94mx[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m attempt[94m to[0m[94m convert[0m[94m a[0m[94m real[0m[94m-[0mtime strategy[94m game[0m[94m,[0m[94m like[0m StarCraft[94m,[0m[94m into[0m[94m a[0m card[94m game[0m[94m.[0m And[94m it[0m actually does a really[94m good[0m[94m job[0m (see[94m the[0m[94m post[0m[94m for[0m details[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mI[0m’[94mll[0m[94m try[0m[94m to[0m not talk[94m about[0m Star[94mC[0m[94mraft[0m very[94m long[0m[94m,[0m[94m because[0m[94m the[0m[94m words[0m will[94m be[0m indeci[94mpher[0m[94mable[0m to anyone[94m who[0m hasn[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m played[0m it (which[94m is[0m probably[94m [0m9[94m9[0m[94m%[0m[94m of[0m[94m people[0m[94m reading[0m[94m this[0m). There is[94m a[0m really old and interesting[94m question[0m[94m about[0m[94m the[0m[94m game[0m[94m:[0m if[94m you[0m strip away everything[94m but[0m[94m the[0m[94m strategy[0m aspect[94m,[0m[94m is[0m[94m it[0m still[94m an[0m[94m interesting[0m[94m game[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis may sound weird[94m to[0m people un[94mfamil[0m[94miar[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m game[0m[94m,[0m because, well[94m,[0m it[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m a[0m real[94m-[0m[94mtime[0m “[94mstr[0m[94mategy[0m”[94m game[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m first[0m[94m rid[0micul[94mous[0m[94m thing[0m[94m when[0m starting Star[94mC[0m[94mraft[0m[94m is[0m how[94m much[0m there[94m is[0m to learn.[94m There[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m probably close[94m to[0m[94m a[0m [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m hotkeys you[94m have[0m[94m to[0m know. There[94m’[0m[94ms[0m the tech tree[94m structure[0m. There[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m around[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m0[0m units[94m,[0m[94m each[0m[94m of[0m[94m which[0m[94m you[0m should know cost, types[94m of[0m attacks[94m,[0m damage[94m,[0m health[94m,[0m shield[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m what[94m the[0m spell-[94mcast[0ming ab[94milities[0m[94m are[0m[94m.[0m[94m Know[0m[94ming[0m[94m those[0m things[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m’[0m[94mll[0m need[94m to[0m[94m learn[0m[94m what[0m coun[94mters[0m what and[94m why[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAnd you[94m might[0m[94m be[0m[94m thinking[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m I[0m[94m’[0m[94mll[0m just click through stuff[94m during[0m a game[94m to[0m find[94m the[0m information[94m.[0m[94m There[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m no[94m need[0m[94m to[0m memor[94mize[0m it[94m.[0m[94m That[0m[94m brings[0m up[94m the[0m[94m other[0m cra[94mzy[0m[94m aspect[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m game[94m:[0m[94m ap[0mm (actions per[94m minute[0m).[94m You[0m[94m are[0m[94m going[0m[94m to[0m[94m have[0m[94m to[0m have [94m2[0m[94m0[0m0-3[94m0[0m[94m0[0m ap[94mm[0m[94m ([0m[94mi[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.[0m clicking[94m or[0m pressing[94m a[0m keyboard key [94m5[0m times[94m per[0m second[94m on[0m average[94m for[0m an entire[94m [0m[94m1[0m5[94m+[0m minute match[94m),[0m[94m so[0m you just don[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m have[0m time[94m to[0m look stuff[94m up[0m during a[94m match[0m even[94m though[0m that information[94m is[0m available[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIf[0m[94m you[0m[94m’[0m[94mre[0m[94m not[0m a Star[94mC[0m[94mraft[0m[94m player[0m[94m,[0m hopefully[94m you[0m[94m’[0m[94mre[0m[94m getting[0m[94m a[0m sense[94m of[0m[94m why[0m[94m the[0m[94m question[0m[94m doesn[0m[94m’[0m[94mt[0m[94m have[0m[94m an[0m[94m obvious[0m[94m answer[0m[94m.[0m[94m You[0m[94m have[0m[94m to[0m play[94m for[0m months just[94m to[0m[94m internal[0m[94mize[0m[94m the[0m hot[94mkeys[0m[94m and[0m[94m learn[0m enough[94m to[0m[94m get[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m point[94m of[0m[94m forming[0m any sort[94m of[0m strategy.

[94mIf[0m[94m you[0m strip out[94m the[0m memor[94mization[0m[94m;[0m If[94m you[0m strip out div[94miding[0m[94m the[0m[94m oppon[0m[94ment[0m’[94ms[0m attention[94m and[0m distract[94ming[0m them; If[94m you[0m strip[94m out[0m[94m the[0m[94m fog[0m[94m of[0m war; If[94m you[0m strip[94m out[0m havingextensions//v[94mLa[0mTeX/cache/latex_[94m0[0m[94m6[0m[94m4[0m3[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m6[0m[94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m6[0mb8[94m7[0m[94m9[0m[94me[0m3[94me[0m[94m2[0m[94m3[0m[94m6[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0ma6[94mb[0m[94m8[0m[94m4[0m[94m6[0mefd[94m7[0m.png" title="[94mG[0m" style="vertical-align:-[94m2[0m[94m0[0m%;[94m"[0m class[94m="[0mtex[94m"[0m alt="G[94m"[0m />[94m-[0mspaces. [0m[94mg[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m Chapter[0m Introduction[94m
[0mNAG[94m C[0m Library Man[94mual[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m[94m On[0m a[94m Str[0m[94mong[0m[94mly[0m[94m F[0m-[94mregular[0m[94m P[0mair[94m ([0mX[94m,[0m \[94mDelta[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mLet[0m $X[94m$[0m[94m be[0m a normal projective variety over[94m a[0m field[94m of[0m characteristic[94m $[0mp>0[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mDelta[0m[94m\[0mgeq[94m [0m[94m0[0m)$[94m be[0m[94m a[0m[94m pair[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m[94m $[0mK[94m_[0m[94mX[0m+\[94mDelta[0m$[94m is[0m $\mathbb[94m{[0mQ}$-Cartier[94m whose[0m index[94m is[0m not divis[94mible[0m[94m by[0m $p[94m$.[0m[94m Also[0m assume[94m that[0m[94m $[0mA[94m$[0m[94m is[0m an effective Cartier divis[94mor[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m $\[0mtau[94m([0mX[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mDelta[0m)=\[94mtau[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mDelta[0m+\varepsilon A[94m)$[0m[94m for[0m[94m $[0m0<\varepsilon\ll [94m1[0m[94m$.[0m[94m Now[0m my question[94m is[0m[94m,[0m if $([94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mDelta[0m)$[94m is[0m Str[94mong[0m[94mly[0m $[94mF[0m[94m$-[0m[94mregular[0m does[94m that[0m imply[94m $[0m[94mS[0m[94m^[0m[94m0[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0mtau[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mDelta[0m[94m)\[0motimes {\mathcal[94m{[0mO}}_[94mX[0m([94mM[0m[94m))[0m=[94mS[0m[94m^[0m[94m0[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mtau[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mDelta[0m '[94m)\[0m[94motimes[0m[94m {\[0m[94mmathcal[0m[94m{[0m[94mO[0m}}_[94mX[0m[94m([0m[94mM[0m[94m))[0m$,[94m where[0m $\Delta '[94m =[0m[94m \[0mDelta+\[94mvarepsilon[0m[94m A[0m[94m$[0m[94m and[0m $[94mM[0m[94m$[0m is a Cartier[94m divis[0m[94mor[0m ?[94m
[0m[94m
[0mI know one of[94m the[0m inclusion is true[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m obvious[0m reason $\[94mDelta[0m '\geq \Delta$, how to prove the other inclusion[94m,[0m[94m if[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m true[94m at[0m all![94m
[0m[94m
[0mThanks

-[94m
[0m
[94mIt[0m[94m isn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m true as stated unfortunately. For example, take[94m $[0mX[94m$[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m an[0m ordinary elli[94mptic[0m[94m curve[0m[94m,[0m $\[94mDelta[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m$ and[94m $[0m[94mM[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m$.[0m[94m Then[0m $[94mS[0m[94m^[0m[94m0[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mtau[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m)[0m \[94motimes[0m[94m O[0m[94m([0m[94mM[0m))[94m =[0m H[94m^[0m[94m0[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m O[94m_[0m[94mX[0m[94m)$.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m for[0m[94m any[0m effective Cart[94mier[0m[94m $[0mA[94m >[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m any[0m[94m $\[0mvarepsilon[94m >[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m$,[0m[94m we[0m[94m have[0m[94m $[0m[94mS[0m[94m^[0m[94m0[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m[94m \[0m[94mtau[0m[94m([0m[94mX[0m[94m,[0m \[94mvarepsilon[0m[94m A[0m)[94m \[0m[94motimes[0m O[94m_[0m[94mX[0m([94mM[0m[94m))[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m$[94m ([0m[94mthis[0m can[94m be[0m checked[94m easily[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m direct computation[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94mHowever[0m[94m:[0m Probably[94m it[0m[94m is[0m true for[94m something[0m like[94m $[0m[94mP[0m^[94m0[0m[94m$,[0m for a definition see Test[94m ide[0mals of non[94m-[0mprincipal ide[94mals[0m[94m:[0m Computations[94m,[0m J[94mump[0ming[94m Num[0m[94mbers[0m[94m,[0m Alter[94mations[0m and[94m Division[0m[94m The[0morems ([94mthere[0m[94m are[0m some modifications[94m one[0m can make to that definition[94m too[0m which might make this easier[94m).[0m
[94mDef[0minitely it[94m is[0m[94m true[0m for $[94m*[0m (s[94m |[0m A[94m))[0m[94m |[0m A[94m =[0m[94m s[0m |[94m A[0m
proof end;

[94mM[0m[94mSS[0m[94mLambda[0m[94m{[0m F[94m1[0m[94m()[0m -> set , F[94m2[0m[94m people[0m[94m are[0m[94m probably[0m[94m even[0m[94m more[0m[94m un[0m[94mk[0m[94mempt[0m[94m than[0m[94m you[0m[94m are[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m suffer[0m[94m from[0m[94m it[0m[94m more[0m[94m than[0m[94m you[0m[94m.[0m[94m Prov[0m[94mide[0m[94m them[0m[94m with[0m[94m some[0m[94m tiny[0m[94m social[0misation[94m which[0m[94m you[0m[94m have[0m[94m lots[0m[94m of[0m[94m and[0m[94m for[0m[94m free[0m[94m.[0m Tell[94m them[0m[94m a[0m[94m story[0m[94m from[0m[94m your[0m[94m tum[0m[94mult[0m[94muous[0m[94m past[0m[94m,[0m[94m tell[0m[94m some[0m[94m life[0m[94m-[0m[94msim[0m[94mpl[0m[94mifying[0m[94m trick[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m your[0m[94m practice[0m[94m every[0m[94m day[0m[94m automatically[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m which[0m[94m they[0m[94m are[0m[94m una[0m[94mware[0m[94m of[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m really[0m[94m nice[0m[94m to[0m[94m teach[0m[94m people[0m[94m how[0m[94m to[0m[94m use[0m[94m hot[0m[94mkeys[0m[94m/[0m[94mshort[0m[94mcut[0m[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m just[0m[94m to[0m[94m make[0m[94m the[0m[94m quality[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m email[0m they[94m send[0m[94m to[0m[94m you[0m[94m better[0m[94m.[0m[94m You[0m[94m can[0m[94m also[0m[94m improve[0m[94m your[0m[94m Chinese[0m[94m this[0m[94m way[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m It[0m[94m really[0m[94m pays[0m[94m off[0m[94m to[0m[94m teach[0m[94m your[0m[94m colle[0m[94magues[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mД[0mля людей[94m,[0m актив[94mно[0m[94m пра[0mктикующих[94m extreme[0m programming[94m,[0m[94m или[0m хотя бы[94m
[0m[94mcode[0m[94m-[0m[94mreview[0m[94m,[0m в этом нет ничего странного[94m,[0m но[94m во[0m[94mоб[0m[94mще[0m[94m г[0m[94mов[0mоря[94m,[0m большинство людей[94m край[0m[94mне[0m[94m у[0m[94mди[0mвляется[94m,[0m когда[94m им[0m пред[94mлага[0m[94mют[0m[94m по[0mрабо[94mта[0mть[94m
[0mв[94mме[0mсте на[94mдо[0m[94m доку[0mмен[94mтом[0m[94m.[0m Чаще всего[94m послед[0mний[94m раз[0m[94m они[0m[94m это[0m[94m дела[0mли в[94m
[0mстаршей школе[94m,[0m[94m и[0m[94m с[0m[94m тех[0m пор[94m фи[0m[94mд[0mбэк по[94m рабо[0mте[94m к[0m[94m [0mним приходил[94m
[0mи[94mск[0m[94mлю[0mчительно в виде[94m “[0mс[94mда[0mл[94m-[0mне с[94mда[0mл[94m”.[0m К сожалению[94m,[0m[94m с[0m[94mда[0m[94mл[0m[94m-[0mне с[94mда[0mл[94m
[0mработает только для[94m человека[0m[94m,[0m который уже на[94mсто[0mлько[94m у[0m[94mв[0mлечён работой[94m,[0m что его уже[94m б[0mессмысленно[94m о[0m[94mце[0mнивать[94m.[0m Поэтому[94m луч[0m[94mшее[0m[94m,[0m что можно с[94mдела[0mть[94m при[0m[94m о[0m[94mцен[0mке[94m работы[0m[94m под[0m[94mчин[0mённого или коллеги[94m —[0m это[94m вы[0m[94mда[0mть ему[94m о[0m[94mцен[0mку[94m тех[0m[94m си[0m[94mл[0m[94m,[0m[94m что[0m[94m он[0m[94m,[0m[94m по[0m[94m т[0m[94mвое[0mму м[94mне[0mнию[94m,[0m в[94mло[0mжил в[94m рабо[0mту[94m.[0m[94m ([0mОценивать[94m рабо[0mту[94m как[0m[94m та[0mковую[94m б[0mессмысленно[94m в[0m[94m вы[0m[94mс[0mшей степени[94m.)[0m А луч[94mше[0m[94m вс[0m[94mё[0m[94m-[0mтаки просто[94m п[0m[94mы[0mтаться[94m работа[0mть вместе[94m,[0m пока[94m колле[0mга не[94m на[0m[94mч[0mнёт[94m дела[0m[94mть[0m[94m так[0m[94m,[0m как[94m ты[0m[94m счита[0mешь правильным[94m.[0m Это[94m буде[0mт[94m луч[0m[94mше[0m[94m и[0m[94m бы[0mстрее[94m,[0m чем[94m те[0m[94mбе[0m ка[94mж[0m[94mется[0m[94m,[0m[94m по[0mтому что[94m с[0m[94m ве[0mроятностью[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m%[0m с[94m [0mним[94m боль[0mше[94m [0mникто[94m во[0m[94mзи[0mться не будет[94m,[0m[94m так[0m что[94m во[0m[94mлей[0m[94m-[0m[94mне[0mволей на[94mч[0mн[94mёт[0m[94m те[0m[94mбя[0m[94m копи[0mровать[94m.[0m[94mС[0mоответственно[94m,[0m[94m х[0m[94mвали[0m[94m —[0m за[94m ста[0m[94mра[0mние[94m.[0m Ру[94mга[0mй[94m —[0m за[94m не[0m[94mве[0mрие в[94m
[0mсоб[94mствен[0m[94mные[0m[94m си[0mлы[94m.[0m Оста H[94m->[0mZZ->[94m4[0ml channel where[94m l[0m denotes[94m to[0m muons and electrons[94m.[0m The[94m results[0m[94m are[0m based[94m on[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m.[94m6[0m fb-[94m1[0m data taken[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m at[0m[94m [0m√s[94m=[0m7TeV[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m3[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m f[0m[94mb[0m[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m data[0m[94m taken[0m[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m√[0m[94ms[0m[94m=[0m[94m8[0m[94mTe[0m[94mV[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m main analysis uses[94m smooth[0med signal[94m and[0m background shapes[94m from[0m simulation[94m.[0m[94m Cross[0m[94m-[0mchecks[94m with[0m[94m are[0m[94m studied[0m[94m use[0m[94m analyt[0mical models[94m for[0m[94m signal[0m and[94m background[0m[94m.[0m[94m Additionally[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m latest[0m[94m per[0m-event[94m error[0m mass fit[94m will[0m[94m be[0m presented[94m together[0m with[94m the[0m fit validation[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m different[0m[94m models[0m[94m using[0m[94m to[0my Monte Carlo studies[94m.[0m[94m
[0mSpeaker:[94m Kar[0moline[94m El[0m[94mfried[0me Selbach[94m ([0mUnivers[94mity[0m[94m of[0m Edinburgh[94m ([0mGB[94m))[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m:[94m2[0m[94m1[0m[94m AM[0m[94m
[0mStud[94my[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m production[94m of[0m[94m a[0m vector bos[94mon[0m decaying to lept[94mons[0m[94m in[0m association[94m with[0m[94m a[0m Z or a Higgs bos[94mon[0m[94m decay[0m[94ming[0m[94m to[0m a bb pair[94m with[0m[94m the[0m ATLAS experiment [94m1[0m[94m2[0mm
We present[94m the[0m[94m latest[0m[94m published[0m results[94m on[0m[94m the[0m search[94m for[0m[94m a[0m Standard Model H[94mig[0m[94mgs[0m[94m bos[0m[94mon[0m produced[94m in[0m[94m association[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m W[94m or[0m[94m a[0m[94m Z[0m[94m bos[0m[94mon[0m and decay[94ming[0m[94m to[0m[94m b[0m[94mb[0m with[94m the[0m[94m A[0m[94mTL[0m[94mAS[0m[94m experiment[0m[94m.[0m No significant excess[94m is[0m[94m observed[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m data[0m collected[94m :[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0mfb[94m-[0m[94m1[0m[94m at[0m[94m sq[0m[94mrt[0m[94m([0m[94ms[0m[94m)=[0m[94m7[0m[94mTe[0m[94mV[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m3[0mfb[94m-[0m[94m1[0m in[94m sq[0m[94mrt[0m[94m([0m[94ms[0m[94m)=[0m[94m8[0m[94mTe[0m[94mV[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m fit[0m procedure[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m detailed[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m particular[94m emphas[0m[94mis[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m validation[0m[94m method[0m employed[94m.[0m[94m As[0m[94m a[0m proof[94m of[0m[94m valid[0mity[94m,[0m[94m W[0mZ and ZZ production[94m have[0m[94m been[0m[94m studied[0m[94m and[0m[94m result[0m in[94m a[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0msigma observation at[94m a[0m[94m rate[0m compatible[94m with[0m[94m the[0m SM prediction[94m.[0m A[94m Standard[0m[94m Model[0m[94m H[0m[94mig[0m[94mgs[0m[94m bos[0m[94mon[0m[94m with[0m mH=[94m1[0m1[94m0[0mGe[94mV[0m[94m is[0m excluded[94m and[0m[94m the[0m observed[94m ([0mexpected[94m)[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m5% C.L. limit on[94m the[0m cross section times branching ratio[94m at[0m[94m m[0m[94mH[0m=[94m1[0m2[94m5[0mGe[94mV[0m[94m is[0m[94m evaluated[0m[94m at[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m8[0m[94m ([0m[94m1[0m.[94m9[0m[94m)[0m times[94m the[0m SM prediction[94m.[0m[94m
[0mSpe[94maker[0m[94m:[0m[94m M[0m[94ms[0m Chiara[94m D[0mebenedetti[94m ([0m[94mThe[0m University[94m of[0m Edinburgh[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m:[0m[94m3[0m[94m3[0m[94m AM[0m[94m
[0m[94mModel[0m dependent measurement of charm mixing[94m and[0m CP[94mV[0m parameters[94m in[0m[94m prompt[0m D0->K[94mSh[0mh dec[94mays[0m[94m at[0m LHCb [94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94mm[0m[94m
[0m[94mWe[0m[94m present[0m[94m a[0m model[94m dependent[0m[94m technique[0m[94m for[0m meas[94muring[0m[94m the[0m charm[94m mixing[0m[94m and[0m CP[94mV[0m parameters[94m in[0m prompt[94m D[0m[94m0[0m->KSh[94mh[0m[94m dec[0m[94mays[0m using[94m [0m[94m1[0mfb-[94m1[0m of data collected by LHCb detector during[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m does[94m not[0m con[94mserve[0m[94m the[0m energy[94m in[0m some special[94m elect[0mromagnet[94mic[0m configurations[94m,[0m particularly for[94m long[0m[94m simulation[0m times[94m.[0m Here[94m,[0m[94m we[0m empir[94mically[0m analyze[94m the[0m[94m energy[0m[94m behavior[0m[94m of[0m Bor[94mis[0m algorithm by[94m applying[0m[94m it[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94mD[0m autonom[94mous[0m[94m Hamiltonian[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m energy[0m[94m behavior[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m Bor[0m[94mis[0m[94m method[0m[94m is[0m found[94m to[0m[94m be[0m strongly[94m related[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m integra[94mb[0m[94mility[0m[94m of[0m our[94m Hamiltonian[0m[94m system[0m[94m.[0m We[94m find[0m[94m that[0m[94m if[0m[94m the[0m[94m invariant[0m tori[94m is[0m[94m preserved[0m[94m under[0m[94m Bor[0m[94mis[0m[94m dis[0mcret[94mization[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m energy[0m error[94m can[0m[94m be[0m bounded[94m for[0m[94m an[0m expon[94mentially[0m long[94m time[0m[94m,[0m otherwise[94m the[0m[94m said[0m error[94m will[0m show[94m a[0m[94m linear[0m growth[94m.[0m[94m On[0m[94m the[0m contrary[94m,[0m for[94m a[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0minte[94mgra[0m[94mble[0m[94m Hamiltonian[0m[94m system[0m[94m,[0m a[94m random[0m[94m walk[0m pattern[94m has[0m been[94m observed[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m energy[0m error[94m.[0m[94m
[0m Nonlinear propag[94mation[0m[94m of[0m[94m an[0m inten[94mse[0m[94m Lag[0muerre-Gaussian las[94mer[0m pul[94mse[0m[94m in[0m[94m a[0m pl[94masma[0m channel[94m M[0mingping [0mIt’[94ms[0m worth a[94m sc[0m[94mram[0m[94mble[0m[94m to[0m[94m get[0m[94m a[0m[94m window[0m[94m seat[0m on[94m a[0m Hawai[94mian[0m inter-is[94mland[0m flight[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m views[0m[94m are[0m[94m full[0m of craggy green[94m cl[0miffs[94m,[0m[94m por[0m[94mcel[0main ocean[94m,[0m[94m and[0m wispy masses of fog[94m and[0m cloud[94m.[0m Sometimes[94m,[0m several islands[94m are[0m visible at once[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m it[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m not[0m hard[94m to[0m imagine[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m arch[0mipelago might extend[94m over[0m[94m the[0m[94m entire[0m[94m glo[0m[94mbe[0m[94m.[0m[94m

[0m##[94m#[0m[94m vert[0my[94m
[0m[94m
