[0m##[94m#[0m QuantumC[94murt[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAh[94mh[0m[94m...[0m[94mI[0m[94m didn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m notice[0m[94m that[0m[94m.[0m Yes[94m,[0m that[94m should[0m have[94m been[0m broken[94m apart[0m[94m into[0m[94m two[0m[94m steps[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mSo far trig[94mon[0m[94mometry[0m[94m seems[0m pretty[94m cool[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m'[0m[94mre[0m still on[94m the[0m bas[94mics[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m I[94m'[0m[94mve[0m preview[94med[0m[94m some[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m material that[94m comes[0m[94m later[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m class[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m it[0m looks[94m like[0m[94m there[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m going[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m some[0m cool[94m stuff[0m[94m coming[0m up[94m.[0m[94m Right[0m[94m now[0m we'[94mre[0m just[94m going[0m over identities[94m and[0m how[94m to[0m[94m use[0m them[94m.[0m The professor[94m doesn[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m seem[94m to[0m[94m want[0m[94m to[0m[94m assign[0m[94m very[0m[94m difficult[0m problems, although[94m that[0m may change[94m as[0m[94m the[0m course moves along.[94m This[0m[94m problem[0m was really the only one[94m that[0m stump[94med[0m[94m me[0m.[94m There[0m[94m were[0m[94m a[0m[94m couple[0m[94m problems[0m that involved using ident[94mities[0m to[94m transform[0m one side of[94m an[0m[94m equation[0m[94m into[0m[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m side[0m[94m that[0m kind[94m of[0m threw me off[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m only[0m[94m moment[0m[94marily[0m.[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m When[94m travel[0m[94ming[0m to[94m a[0m country[94m with[0m[94m a[0m different[94m currency[0m[94m,[0m how should[94m you[0m[94m take[0m your money?[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mRec[0mently my[94m wife[0m[94m and[0m[94m I[0m tra[94mve[0m[94mled[0m[94m to[0m Italy and before we left we[94m got[0m about[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m5[0m%[94m of[0m our[94m money[0m in travelers checks and[94m the[0m[94m other[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m5[94m%[0m[94m we[0m carried[94m on[0m in c[94mash[0m[94m.[0m When[94m we[0m arrived there[94m,[0m[94m no[0m[94m one[0m would take our travel[94mers[0m[94m checks[0m[94m and[0m many places did not accept credit cards[94m.[0m Event[94mually[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m found[0m some currency exchange places[94m that[0m would take[94m the[0m travel[94mers[0m[94m checks[0m and[94m give[0m[94m us[0m Euro'[94ms[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m at[0m a[94m [0m7-[94m1[0m[94m5[0m% fee[94m,[0m[94m which[0m was not really[94m a[0m very[94m fun[0m surprise[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mWh[94mile[0m I[94m was[0m under[94m the[0m impression[94m that[0m[94m it[0m is sa[94mfer[0m[94m to[0m[94m use[0m travelers checks[94m,[0m[94m it[0m seems[94m that[0m[94m they[0m[94m were[0m not[94m really[0m accepted[94m ([0m[94mthe[0m[94m usual[0m explanation being[94m signal[0m (the[94m dem[0modulated output[94m),[0m phase error[94m magnitude[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m P[0mLL locked[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m Figure[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m screen[0m[94mcast[0m video describes[94m how[0m to[94m set[0m[94m up[0m[94m a[0m LabVIE[94mW[0m[94m "[0m[94mM[0mixed Sign[94mal[0m Graph[94m"[0m to plot[94m the[0m wave[94mform[0m data type[94m and[0m Boolean[94m [0m[94m1[0m-[94mD[0m array on[94m a[0m[94m common[0m times[94mc[0m[94male[0m, much[94m like[0m an oscillos[94mcope[0m display[94m with[0m multiple analog and digital[94m signals[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mSet[0m the[94m dem[0m[94mod[0mulator VCO car[94mrier[0m frequency[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m average[0m[94m value[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m mark and space[94m frequencies[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m FSK[94m signal[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mEx[0mperiment[94m with[0m[94m the[0m remaining[94m dem[0m[94mod[0mulator parameters[94m V[0mCO gain[94m ([0m[94mstart[0m[94m with[0m values in[94m the[0m[94m range[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m.[94m0[0m[94m5[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m2[94m0[0m),[94m phase[0m[94m error[0m[94m L[0m[94mPF[0m cut[94moff[0m frequency[94m,[0m[94m and[0m comparator threshold[94m for[0m[94m P[0m[94mLL[0m lock to[94m satisfy[0m[94m the[0m following goals[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Base[0mband signal[94m in[0m[94m F[0m[94mSK[0m[94m region[0m "looks good[94m",[0m i[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.,[0m[94m reason[0m[94mably[0m[94m quick[0m rise[94m time[0m[94m without[0m[94m high[0m[94m-[0m[94mfre[0m[94mquency[0m ring[94ming[0m[94m or[0m[94m other[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0mideal artifact[94ms[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m P[0mLL locked[94m is[0m active[94m ([0m[94mT[0m[94m)[0m only during[94m the[0m F[94mSK[0m signal[94m and[0m is inactive during silence[94m and[0m[94m r[0minger p[94muls[0m[94mes[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mReport your[94m four[0m[94m dem[0m[94mod[0mulator[94m parameter[0m[94m values[0m[94m and[0m plot[94m the[0m[94m mixed[0m[94m signal[0m graph that[94m demonstr[0m[94mates[0m[94m the[0m[94m ability[0m[94m of[0m your[94m system[0m[94m to[0m identify[94m the[0m[94m time[0m region[94m over[0m[94m which[0m[94m the[0m[94m F[0m[94mSK[0m[94m signal[0m[94m is[0m active[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m### Sample[94m the[0m base[94mband[0m[94m signal[0m
[94m
[0mUse regen_[94mSam[0mpler.vi to extract[94m the[0m[94m F[0m[94mSK[0m[94m signal[0m[94m region[0m from[94m the[0m base[94mband[0m[94m signal[0m produced[94m by[0m[94m c[0mid_Dem[94mod[0mulator[94m.[0mvi[94m.[0m[94m Note[0m[94m that[0m reg[94men[0m[94m_[0m[94mSam[0mpler.vi[94m is[0m[94m used[0m like[94m a[0m[94m "[0m[94mg[0mating[94m"[0m circuit[94m here[0m:[94m the[0m[94m P[0mLL locked[94m signal[0m[94m is[0m[94m active[0m over[94m the[0m entire[94m time[0m that[94m the[0m F[94mSK[0m[94m signal[0m[94m is[0m detected[94m,[0m[94m therefore[0m reg[94men[0m[94m_[0m[94mSam[0mpler.vi pick[94ms[0m[94m out[0m[94m every[0m[94m value[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m original[0m audio[94m recording[0m over which P[94mLL[0m locked is active[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAdd[94m the[0m[94m bit[0m sync[94m system[0m[94m to[0m your VI using[94m a[0m[94m zero[0m[94m-[0mcross[94ming[0m compar[94mator[0m,[94m util[0m_EdgeDetector[94m.[0mvi[94m ([0m[94mtwo[0m instances), regen[94m_[0mBit[94mC[0m[94mlock[0m.[94mvi[0m[94m set[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m,[0m[94m2[0m0[94m0[0m H[94mz[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m another[0m[94m instance[0m[94m of[0m reg[94men[0m[94m_[0mSampler[94m.[0m[94mvi[0m[94m.[0m Use[94m the[0m[94m zero[0m[94m-[0m[94mcross[0m[94ming[0m[94m compar[0m[94mator[0m to[94m convert[0m[94m the[0m[94m F[0m[94mSK[0m[94m signal[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m Boolean[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m-[0m[94mD[0m[94m array[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m signal[94m is[0m[94m not[0m[94m a[0m bitstream yet[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m rather[0m serves to identify[94m the[0m beginning[94m of[0m bit[94m intervals[0m[94m.[0m[94m Use[0m[94m one[0m edge det[94mector[0m[94m to[0m[94m produce[0m indicator[94m p[0m[94muls[0m[94mes[0m[94m for[0m each[94m zero[0m[94m crossing[0m of[94m the[0m base[94mband[0m[94m signal[0m[94m ([0m[94mboth[0m rising edges[94m and[0m[94m falling[0m edges[94m).[0m[94m These[0m indicator[94m p[0m[94muls[0m[94mes[0m•[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m0[0mkm[94m to[0m[94m [0m8[94m0[0m[94m/[0m[94m8[0m5[94mkm[0m[94m.[0m

• Neg[94mative[0m temperature lapse rate[94m of[0m[94m d[0mT[94m/[0mdz[94m =[0m[94m -[0m3 K/km.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m Tem[0m[94mper[0m[94mature[0m[94m at[0m top of[94m Mes[0mosphere is ~ [94m7[0m[94m5[0m°[94mC[0m[94m to[0m[94m -[0m[94m9[0m[94m0[0m[94m°[0m[94mC[0m,[94m the[0m coldest[94m in[0m[94m the[0m atmosphere[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mM[0mesopause

•[94m It[0m separ[94mates[0m[94m Mes[0m[94moph[0mere[94m from[0m Thermos[94mphere[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m•[94m It[0m[94m also[0m[94m separ[0m[94mates[0m[94m hom[0mos[94mphere[0m[94m ([0m[94mwhere[0m[94m g[0mases[94m are[0m well mixed[94m)[0m[94m from[0m heter[94mos[0m[94mphere[0m[94m ([0m[94mwhere[0m gases[94m start[0m separ[94mating[0m by mass[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mNote[0m
[94m
[0mWhat[94m conditions[0m[94m are[0m[94m required[0m[94m to[0m see[94m g[0mases separ[94mating[0m by[94m mass[0m[94m?[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Th[94merm[0m[94mos[0m[94mphere[0m[94m and[0m Exos[94mphere[0m[94m¶[0m

[94m[[0m[94mimage[0m: cc-by[94m Lisa[0m[94m R[0mauschenbach][94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTh[0m[94merm[0m[94mos[0m[94mphere[0m

•[94m At[0m ~10[94m0[0m km.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m Extremely[94m low[0m pressure conditions[94m ([0m[94mless[0m[94m than[0m[94m [0m0[94m.[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m hPa[94m).[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m• Tem[94mper[0m[94mature[0m can rise to[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0ms of °[94mC[0m[94m,[0m depending[94m on[0m solar radiation[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mEx[0m[94mos[0m[94mphere[0m
[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m It[0m is the upp[94merm[0m[94most[0m layer[94m in[0m[94m atmosphere[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m[94m It[0m[94m trans[0m[94mitions[0m into interplanet[94mary[0m[94m space[0m.[94m[0m[94m[0m #[94m Calcul[0mator[94m for[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0mx2 determinants[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Online[94m Calcul[0m[94mator[0m[94m for[0m[94m Det[0m[94merm[0m[94min[0m[94mant[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m[94m2[0m
[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m online[94m calcul[0m[94mator[0m calcul[94mates[0m[94m the[0m[94m value[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m determin[94mant[0m of[94m a[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m[94m2[0m matrix.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m###[94m Det[0m[94merm[0m[94min[0m[94mant[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94mx[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m$\[0mmathrm[94m{[0mdet[94m A[0m}=[94m|\[0mbegin[94m{[0marray}{cc}{a}_{1[94m1[0m[94m}&[0m {[94ma[0m[94m}_{[0m[94m1[0m2}\\ {[94ma[0m[94m}_{[0m[94m2[0m1[94m}&[0m {[94ma[0m[94m}_{[0m[94m2[0m2}\[94mend[0m[94m{[0m[94marray[0m}|={[94ma[0m}_{[94m1[0m[94m1[0m}\cdot {[94ma[0m[94m}_{[0m[94m2[0m2[94m}-\[0mleft[94m({[0m[94ma[0m[94m}_{[0m[94m2[0m1[94m}\[0m[94mcdot[0m {[94ma[0m}_{1[94m2[0m[94m}\[0m[94mright[0m)$[94m
[0m[94m
[0mEnter the[94m coefficients[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
[94ma[0m[94m1[0m1[94m=[0m[94m a[0m[94m1[0m2=

[94ma[0m[94m2[0m1[94m=[0m a[94m2[0m2[94m=[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mCalcul[94mated[0m[94m determin[0m[94mant[0m[94m:[0m[94m
[0m
[94mThe[0m[94m main[0m[94m diagonal[0m[94m elements[0m[94m are[0m colored[94m green[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m s[0m[94mcond[0mary diagonal elements[94m are[0m shown[94m in[0m blue color[94m.[0m[94m

[0m[94m

[0m###[94m Over[0march[94m [0m[94m2[0m
[94m
[0m[94mBr[0micks are[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0mcm long[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94mcm[0m high[94m.[0m How[94m high[0m could an arch be built without mortar[94m on[0m a flat horizontal[94m surface[0m,[94m to[0m[94m over[0mhang by [94m1[0m met[94mre[0m? [0m[94m
[0m[94m#[0m Telescop[94ming[0m Series
[94m
[0m##### Stage:[94m [0m5 Challenge Level:[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m [0m1[94m6[0m[94m5[0m4 Blaise Pascal published a[94m general[0m method for[94m sum[0mming powers[94m of[0m positive integers[94m,[0m[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.[0m[94m sum[0m[94mming[0m all[94m the[0m series[94m.[0m $$[94mS[0m_[94m1[0m[94m =[0m [94m1[0m[94m +[0m [94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m +[0m ...[94m +[0m n$$[94m $$[0mS_[94m2[0m =[94m [0m[94m1[0m^[94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m +[0m ... + n^[94m2[0m$$ $$[94mS[0m[94m_[0m[94m3[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m^3[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m^[0m[94m3[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m^[0m[94m3[0m[94m +[0m ...[94m +[0m[94m n[0m[94m^[0m3$$ $$\[94mdots[0m$$ $$[94mS[0m_r[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m^[94mr[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m^[0m[94mr[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m^[0m[94mr[0m[94m +[0m ...[94m +[0m n[94m^[0m[94mr[0m$$[94mP[0mas[94mcal[0m'[94ms[0m method uses[94m the[0m[94m coefficients[0m[94m which[0m appear[94m in[0m[94m Pascal[0m'[94ms[0m triangle[94m and[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m Bin[94momial[0m[94m Theorem[0m[94m,[0m[94m first[0m[94m finding[0m[94m $[0mS[94m_[0m[94m1[0m[94m$,[0m[94m and[0m[94m then[0m[94m using[0m[94m $[0m[94mS[0m[94m_[0m[94m1[0m[94m$[0m to[94m find[0m[94m $[0m[94mS[0m[94m_[0m[94m2[0m[94m$,[0m[94m and[0m then using[94m both[0m[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m $[0m[94mS[0m[94m_[0m[94m3[0m$,[94m and[0m[94m so[0m[94m on[0m[94m.[0m The method[94m applies[0m,[94m where[0m[94m $[0m[94mr[0m[94m$[0m[94m is[0m any[94m fixed[0m positive[94m integer[0m[94m,[0m to:[94m $$[0m[94mS[0m[94m_[0m[94mr[0m[94m =\[0msum[94m_{[0m[94mk[0m[94m=[0m[94m1[0m}^[94mn[0m[94m k[0m^r.$$
[94m
[0m[94mCase[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m:[0m $[94mr[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m$[0m[94m
[0m
Simplify $(k[94m+[0m[94m1[0m)^[94m2[0m - k[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m$[0m[94m and[0m[94m hence[0m show that: $$\sum[94m_{[0m[94mk[0m[94m=[0m[94m1[0m}^[94mn[0m[94m [([0m[94mk[0m[94m+[0mSS program was named Navstar[94m.[0m With[94m the[0m[94m individual[0m sat[94mell[0mites[94m being[0m[94m associated[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m name[94m Nav[0m[94mstar[0m ([94mas[0m with[94m the[0m prede[94mcess[0m[94mors[0m Transit[94m and[0m Timation[94m),[0m[94m a[0m more fully[94m en[0mcomp[94mass[0ming name was[94m used[0m[94m to[0m[94m identify[0m[94m the[0m constellation[94m of[0m Nav[94mstar[0m sat[94mell[0m[94mites[0m[94m,[0m Nav[94mstar[0m-GPS[94m,[0m which[94m was[0m later short[94mened[0m simply[94m to[0m[94m G[0m[94mPS[0m.[10[94m][0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAfter[0m Korean Air L[94mines[0m Fl[94might[0m [94m0[0m[94m0[0m7[94m,[0m carrying[94m [0m[94m2[0m69[94m people[0m[94m,[0m was shot[94m down[0m in[94m [0m1[94m9[0m[94m8[0m3[94m after[0m[94m st[0mray[94ming[0m into[94m the[0m USSR'[94ms[0m prohib[94mited[0m airspace,[[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m][0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m vic[94minity[0m[94m of[0m Sakhalin[94m and[0m[94m Mon[0meron Islands[94m,[0m President Ron[94mald[0m Reagan issued[94m a[0m directive[94m making[0m G[94mPS[0m freely[94m available[0m[94m for[0m civil[94mian[0m use[94m,[0m[94m once[0m[94m it[0m[94m was[0m sufficiently developed[94m,[0m[94m as[0m[94m a[0m[94m common[0m[94m good[0m.[[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m][0m The[94m first[0m satellite[94m was[0m launched[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m8[0m9[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m4[94mth[0m[94m [0m[94ms[0m[94mat[0mellite[94m was[0m[94m launched[0m[94m in[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mInitial[0m[94mly[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m highest[0m quality signal[94m was[0m reserved[94m for[0m military use[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m signal[0m available[94m for[0m[94m civil[0m[94mian[0m[94m use[0m[94m was[0m intention[94mally[0m de[94mgrad[0m[94med[0m ([94mSelect[0mive Avail[94mability[0m[94m).[0m[94m This[0m changed with[94m President[0m Bill Cl[94minton[0m[94m ordering[0m Select[94mive[0m[94m Av[0m[94mail[0m[94mability[0m to[94m be[0m turned[94m off[0m[94m at[0m mid[94mnight[0m[94m May[0m [94m1[0m,[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m, impro[94mving[0m[94m the[0m[94m precision[0m[94m of[0m[94m civil[0m[94mian[0m G[94mPS[0m[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m0[94m0[0m[94m [0mmet[94mers[0m (about[94m [0m3[94m0[0m[94m0[0m fe[94met[0m[94m)[0m[94m to[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m [0m[94mmet[0m[94mers[0m (about[94m [0m65[94m [0m[94mfe[0m[94met[0m[94m).[0m[94m The[0m[94m executive[0m order signed in [94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m to[0m[94m turn[0m[94m off[0m[94m Select[0m[94mive[0m[94m Av[0m[94mail[0m[94mability[0m[94m in[0m[94m [0m2[94m0[0m00 was proposed[94m by[0m[94m the[0m[94m US[0m[94m Secretary[0m[94m of[0m[94m Def[0m[94mense[0m[94m,[0m William Perry, because of[94m the[0m w[94mides[0mpread growth[94m of[0m[94m differential[0m G[94mPS[0m[94m services[0m[94m to[0m[94m improve[0m[94m civil[0m[94mian[0m accuracy and eliminate the US military advantage[94m.[0m[94m Moreover[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m US military was[94m act[0m[94mively[0m developing[94m techn[0m[94mologies[0m[94m to[0m den[94my[0m G[94mPS[0m[94m service[0m[94m to[0m potential advers[94maries[0m on a regional basis.[[94m1[0m[94m3[0m[94m][0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mOver[94m the[0m[94m last[0m[94m de[0m[94mcade[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m U[94m.[0m[94mS[0m[94m.[0m has[94m implemented[0m[94m several[0m improvements[94m to[0m the[94m G[0m[94mPS[0m[94m service[0m[94m,[0m[94m including[0m[94m new[0m signals for[94m civil[0m use[94m and[0m increased accuracy and integrity for[94m all[0m users[94m,[0m all[94m while[0m[94m maintain[0m[94ming[0m compatibility[94m with[0m existing[94m G[0m[94mPS[0m equipment[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mGPS modern[94mization[0m[94m [[0m[94m1[0m4[94m][0m[94m has[0m[94m now[0m[94m become[0m[94m an[0m ongoing initi[94mative[0m[94m to[0m[94m upgrade[0m[94m the[0m Global[94m Position[0m[94ming[0m System with new capabilities[94m to[0m[94m meet[0m growing[94m military[0m,[94m civil[0m,[94m and[0m commercial needs[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m program[0m[94m is[0m[94m being[0m[94m implemented[0m[94m through[0m[94m a[0m[94m series[0m[94m of[0m satellite[94m ac[0mquis[94mitions[0m[94m,[0m[94m including[0m[94m G[0m[94mPS[0m Block III[94m and[0m the[94m Next[0m Generation Oper[94m
[0m## Conclusions[94m

[0m[94m$[0m47$[94m $$[0m696[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m6[0m6[94m0[0m[94m9[0m6 -[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m6[0m[94m3[0m[94m9[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m,[94m is[0m an[94m effective[0m[94m way[0m[94m to[0m determine[94m if[0m[94m a[0m[94m function[0m has[94m an[0m[94m inverse[0m[94m function[0m[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m not[0m[94m.[0m It[94m is[0m[94m test[0m performed which is basically used[94m to[0m[94m determine[0m[94m whether[0m[94m the[0m[94m function[0m[94m is[0m inject[94mive[0m function[94m that[0m[94m is[0m the function is one to one function[94m.[0m[94m All[0m[94m other[0m trademarks and copy[94mright[0m[94ms[0m[94m are[0m the property[94m of[0m their[94m respective[0m own[94mers[0m[94m.[0m Solution for What is[94m the[0m horizontal line test and[94m what[0m does[94m it[0m indicate[94m?[0m If every horizontal[94m line[0m cut[94ms[0m[94m the[0m graph in[94m at[0m most[94m one[0m[94m point[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m the[0m function has[94m an[0m[94m inverse[0m otherwise[94m it[0m does[94m not[0m[94m.[0m[94m To[0m do[94m the[0m test: Make[94m a[0m horizontal[94m line[0m on[94m each[0m[94m point[0m of[94m the[0m[94m graph[0m[94m.[0m [94m1[0m decade[94m ago[0m. to[0m[94m determine[0m[94m whether[0m or[94m not[0m[94m the[0m[94m function[0m[94m y[0m[94m =[0m[94m x[0m 2[94m graph[0m[94med[0m below[94m is[0m[94m invert[0m[94mible[0m[94m.[0m Get solutions[94m In[0m mathematics[94m,[0m[94m a[0m[94m function[0m[94m was[0m originally[94m the[0m idealization[94m of[0m how[94m a[0m … Hor[94mizontal[0m[94m lines[0m do[94m not[0m[94m cross[0m[94m each[0m[94m other[0m[94m.[0m $\begingroup$ See[94m Hor[0m[94mizontal[0m[94m line[0m[94m test[0m[94m:[0m[94m "[0m[94mwe[0m[94m can[0m[94m decide[0m[94m if[0m[94m it[0m is inject[94mive[0m[94m by[0m[94m looking[0m[94m at[0m[94m horizontal[0m[94m lines[0m[94m that[0m intersect the[94m function[0m'[94ms[0m graph[94m."[0m[94m With[0m this[94m test[0m[94m,[0m you[94m can[0m see if[94m any[0m[94m horizontal[0m line[94m drawn[0m through[94m the[0m graph cut[94ms[0m[94m through[0m[94m the[0m[94m function[0m more[94m than[0m[94m one[0m time[94m.[0m[94m Note[0m[94m:[0m The[94m function[0m[94m y[0m[94m =[0m[94m f[0m ([94mx[0m) is a function if[94m it[0m[94m passes[0m the[94m vertical[0m[94m line[0m test[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m result[0m[94m of[0m[94m horizontal[0m[94m line[0m[94m test[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m[94m inject[0m[94mive[0m[94m function[0m[94m.[0m Hor[94mizontal[0m Line[94m Test[0m. However[94m,[0m if[94m we[0m[94m examine[0m[94m the[0m graph[94m of[0m ,[94m a[0m horizontal[94m line[0m[94m can[0m only[94m intersect[0m it[94m at[0m[94m one[0m[94m point[0m[94m regardless[0m[94m of[0m[94m where[0m[94m you[0m place[94m it[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m comes[0m from[94m the[0m word 'horizon[94m',[0m in[94m the[0m sense[94m that[0m[94m horizontal[0m[94m lines[0m[94m are[0m parallel[94m to[0m[94m the[0m horizon[94m.[0m College Al[94mgebra[0m ([94m7[0mth Edition[94m)[0m[94m Edit[0m edition[94m.[0m[94m See[0m[94m the[0m video below[94m for[0m more[94m details[0m! In geometry,[94m a[0m horizontal[94m line[0m[94m is[0m[94m one[0m[94m which[0m[94m runs[0m from[94m left[0m[94m to[0m[94m right[0m across[94m the[0m page[94m.[0m[94m Then[0m see[94m if[0m each[94m vertical[0m[94m line[0m[94m shows[0m[94m [[0m[94mone[0m input[94m],[0m x. Hor[94mizontal[0m[94m line[0m test[94m is[0m used[94m to[0m[94m determine[0m[94m whether[0m[94m a[0m[94m function[0m has[94m an[0m[94m inverse[0m[94m using[0m[94m the[0m graph of the function[94m.[0m Hor[94mizontal[0m[94m Line[0m[94m Test[0m[94m.[0m If[94m the[0m[94m horizontal[0m[94m line[0m touch[94mes[0m[94m the[0m graph more[94m than[0m[94m one[0m time[94m then[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m result[94m of[0m[94m the[0m test the[94m function[0m[94m is[0m not[94m inject[0m[94mive[0m[94m function[0m[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m the[0m[94m horizontal[0m[94m line[0m[94m touch[0m[94mes[0m[94m the[0m[94m graph[0m[94m only[0m[94m once[0m,[94m then[0m[94m the[0mcrease temporal resolution by narrow[94ming[0m the[94m sector[0m width, decre[94masing[0m[94m the[0m[94m image[0m depth[94m,[0m using[94m zoom[0m[94m and[0m using a single[94m focus[0m point[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mOptim[94mize[0m focus point[94m and[0m[94m image[0m[94m depth[0m[94m for[0m each[94m view[0m[94m and[0m[94m region[0m of interest[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mUse[94m fundamental[0m[94m imag[0ming[94m rather[0m[94m than[0m[94m harm[0m[94monic[0m imag[94ming[0m[94m,[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m latter[94m provides[0m poor[94mer[0m axial resolution[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAd[0m[94mjust[0m image gain[94m to[0m improve[94m image[0m contrast[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m remember[0m[94m that[0m[94m this[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m[94m change[0m signal-to[94m-[0m[94mno[0m[94mise[0m ratio[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mR[0medu[94mce[0m[94m the[0m[94m ambient[0m light[94m on[0m[94m the[0m NICU[94m to[0m prevent the need[94m to[0m[94m increase[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0mD gain[94m.[0m A[94m high[0m[94m gain[0m will[94m reduce[0m[94m the[0m contrast between[94m the[0m myocardial wall[94m and[0m chamber[94m and[0m[94m reduce[0m[94m the[0m quality[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m image[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m### Principles of Doppler ultrasound[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThe[94m change[0m[94m in[0m pitch[94m of[0m sound when a[94m vehicle[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m sir[94men[0m passes us in[94m the[0m street[94m is[0m a familiar[94m example[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m Do[0m[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m phenomen[94mon[0m[94m.[0m When travel[94ming[0m[94m towards[0m us the[94m pitch[0m[94m of[0m the[94m sound[0m[94m is[0m[94m artificial[0m[94mly[0m[94m increased[0m as[94m the[0m[94m vehicle[0m[94m has[0m[94m tra[0m[94mve[0m[94mled[0m closer[94m to[0m[94m us[0m[94m with[0m each[94m sound[0m emission, so[94m the[0m sound appears[94m to[0m[94m have[0m[94m a[0m[94m higher[0m[94m frequency[0m[94m.[0m Convers[94mely[0m[94m,[0m[94m when[0m[94m travel[0m[94ming[0m[94m away[0m[94m from[0m[94m us[0m[94m the[0m frequency appears lower[94m.[0m In ultras[94mound[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m concepts[0m[94m are[0m similar as[94m the[0m same[94m shift[0m[94m in[0m[94m frequency[0m occurs as sound is reflected off[94m a[0m moving[94m object[0m[94m.[0m The extent[94m of[0m[94m this[0m Do[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m shift[94m ([0m[94mthe[0m[94m difference[0m[94m between[0m the[94m em[0mitted[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m received[0m ultras[94mound[0m frequencies[94m)[0m depends primarily[94m on[0m[94m the[0m velocity[94m of[0m[94m the[0m moving t[94missue[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m angle of[94m in[0msonation[94m between[0m[94m the[0m ultras[94mound[0m beam[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m direction[0m[94m of[0m[94m movement[0m[94m ([0mFig[94m.[0m [94m8[0m[94m).[0m Do[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m applications can[94m be[0m[94m used[0m[94m to[0m quant[94mify[0m velocity of blood[94m flow[0m[94m and[0m my[94moc[0m[94mard[0m[94mial[0m[94m t[0m[94missue[0m motion[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m angle[94m of[0m[94m in[0m[94mson[0m[94mation[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m ul[94mtras[0m[94mound[0m[94m beam[0m[94m has[0m[94m a[0m great impact[94m on[0m[94m the[0m extent[94m of[0m[94m Do[0m[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m shift[94m,[0m[94m such[0m that[94m minim[0mization[94m of[0m[94m the[0m angle[94m of[0m[94m in[0mson[94mation[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m key[0m[94m step[0m[94m in[0m all[94m approaches[0m[94m to[0m Do[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m[94m measurement[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m practice[0m[94m,[0m an[94m angle[0m[94m of[0m[94m in[0m[94mson[0m[94mation[0m[94m of[0m <[94m2[0m[94m0[0m°[94m is[0m[94m considered[0m acceptable[94m since[0m this produces only a[94m [0m[94m6[0m%[94m reduction[0m[94m in[0m velocity estimation[94m ([0mFig[94m.[0m [94m8[0m[94m).[0m[94m If[0m[94m necessary[0m[94m correction[0m can[94m be[0m[94m made[0m[94m for[0m remaining angle[94m of[0m[94m in[0m[94mson[0m[94mation[0m[94m,[0m but[94m at[0m[94m high[0m angles this process becomes[94m more[0m inac[94mcur[0m[94mate[0m[94m.[0m If[94m the[0m direction[94m of[0m movement[94m is[0m[94m orthogonal[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m imag[0ming plane no Do[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m shift[94m is[0m produced. While[94m higher[0m[94m frequency[0m probes provide optimal spatial resolution[94m,[0m[94m lower[0m[94m frequencies[0m[94m may[0m[94m be[0m[94m required[0m[94m to[0m[94m provide[0m ade[94mqu[0m[94mate[0m Do[94mpp[0m[94mler[0m[94m information[0m[94m,[0m especially[94m at[0m[94m higher[0m flow veloc[94mities[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m) and formation rates[94m of[0m Pop III stars[94m,[0m from[94m which[0m[94m we[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m temporal vari[94mability[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m after[0mglows[94m and[0m[94m ultimately[0m[94m the[0m[94m length[0m[94m of[0m[94m time[0m JWST[94m and[0m[94m S[0mPICA can detect them[94m.[0m In[94m the[0m[94m range[0m[94m of[0m plaus[94mible[0m[94m Pop[0m[94m III[0m GRB parameters[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m after[0m[94mg[0m[94mlow[0m[94ms[0m[94m are[0m[94m always[0m detect[94mable[0m[94m by[0m[94m these[0m instruments during[94m the[0m[94m is[0motrop[94mic[0m emission[94m,[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m[94m minimum[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m5[0m days[94m and[0m[94m a[0m[94m maximum[0m[94m of[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m.[94m7[0m years[94m.[0m[94m The[0m average[94m number[0m[94m of[0m detectable[94m after[0m[94mg[0m[94mlow[0m[94ms[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m9[94m6[0m$\[94mtimes[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m5[0m[94m}$[0m[94m per[0m S[94mPI[0m[94mCA[0m field of view[94m ([0mFO[94mV[0m[94m)[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m7[0m[94m8[0m[94m$\[0m[94mtimes[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m^{-[0m[94m6[0m[94m}$[0m[94m per[0m J[94mW[0m[94mST[0m FO[94mV[0m[94m.[0m[94m These[0m[94m are[0m lower limits[94m,[0m using[94m a[0m[94m p[0m[94mess[0mim[94mistic[0m estimate[94m of[0m[94m Pop[0m[94m III[0m star formation[94m.[0m An[94m optimal[0m obser[94mving[0m strategy[94m with[0m S[94mPI[0m[94mCA[0m could identify[94m a[0m[94m candidate[0m[94m or[0m[94mphan[0m after[94mg[0m[94mlow[0m in $\sim[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m3[0m[94m$[0m[94m years[0m[94m,[0m[94m with[0m[94m a[0m [94m9[0m0[94m percent[0m[94m probability[0m[94m of[0m[94m confirm[0m[94mation[0m[94m with[0m[94m further[0m[94m detailed[0m observations[94m.[0m A[94m be[0mamed GR[94mB[0m[94m will[0m[94m align[0m[94m with[0m[94m the[0m[94m FO[0m[94mV[0m of[94m the[0m planned GR[94mB[0m det[94mector[0m Energetic X[94m-[0m[94mray[0m Imaging Survey Teles[94mcope[0m[94m once[0m[94m every[0m[94m [0m[94m9[0m[94m years[0m[94m.[0m Pop[94m III[0m GR[94mB[0ms[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m more[0m easily[94m detected[0m[94m by[0m[94m their[0m is[94motrop[0m[94mic[0m[94m [0mProject[94mive[0m reduction[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m discrete[0m Painlevé[94m system[0m[94m of[0m type[94m A[0m2[94m +[0m A[94m1[0m[94m ([0mwith K. Kajiwara and[94m N[0m[94m.[0m Nak[94maz[0m[94m

[0m[94mare[0m called[94m an[0m[94m eigen[0m[94mvalue[0m[94m and[0m an[94m eigen[0mvector of A[94m,[0m respectively.[31[94m][[0m[94m3[0m2[94m][0m The[94m number[0m [94mλ[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m eigen[0m[94mvalue[0m[94m of[0m[94m an[0m n×[94mn[0m-[94mmatrix[0m[94m A[0m if[94m and[0m[94m only[0m[94m if[0m A−[94mλ[0m[94mIn[0m is not invert[94mible[0m[94m,[0m[94m which[0m[94m is[0m[94m equivalent[0m[94m to[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m${\displaystyle[94m \[0mdet({\mathsf {[94mA[0m}}[94m-\[0m[94mlambda[0m {\mathsf[94m {[0m[94mI[0m[94m}}[0m)=[94m0[0m.}$ [33][94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m polynomial[0m[94m p[0mA[94m in[0m an ind[94met[0m[94merm[0m[94minate[0m X given[94m by[0m evaluation[94m the[0m[94m determin[0m[94mant[0m[94m det[0m[94m([0mXInA[94m)[0m[94m is[0m called[94m the[0m[94m characteristic[0m[94m polynomial[0m[94m of[0m[94m A[0m[94m.[0m[94m It[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m mon[0m[94mic[0m[94m polynomial[0m[94m of[0m[94m degree[0m[94m n[0m[94m.[0m[94m Therefore[0m[94m the[0m[94m polynomial[0m equation[94m p[0m[94mA[0m[94m([0m[94mλ[0m[94m)[0m = [94m0[0m[94m has[0m at[94m most[0m[94m n[0m[94m different[0m solutions[94m,[0m[94m that[0m[94m is[0m[94m,[0m eigenvalues[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m matrix[0m.[[94m3[0m[94m4[0m[94m][0m They may[94m be[0m complex[94m even[0m[94m if[0m[94m the[0m[94m entries[0m[94m of[0m A[94m are[0m real[94m.[0m[94m According[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m C[94may[0m[94mley[0m–[94mH[0m[94mamilton[0m[94m theorem[0m[94m,[0m p[94mA[0m[94m([0m[94mA[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m that[94m is[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m result[0m[94m of[0m subst[94mitut[0m[94ming[0m[94m the[0m[94m matrix[0m itself[94m into[0m its own[94m characteristic[0m[94m polynomial[0m[94m yields[0m[94m the[0m[94m zero[0m[94m matrix[0m[94m.[0m[94m

[0m[94m9[0m[94m.[0m[94m ^[0m أ[94m [0mب[94m Pro[0m[94mt[0mter &[94m Mor[0mrey[94m ([0m[94m1[0m9[94m7[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m[94m p[0m[94m.[0m 8[94m6[0m[94m9[0m)[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m.[0m[94m ^[0m Kre[94mys[0mzig[94m ([0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m7[0m2[94m,[0m pp[94m.[0m [94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m1[0m,[94m2[0m4[94m4[0m[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m ^[0m Schneider[94m,[0m Hans;[94m B[0marker, George[94m Phill[0m[94mip[0m[94m ([0m[94m2[0m0[94m1[0m[94m2[0m), Matrices and Linear Al[94mgebra[0m, Dover Books on Mathemat[94mics[0m, result. It[94m is[0m[94m said[0m[94m that[0m[94m commut[0m[94mative[0m diag[94mrams[0m play the[94m role[0m[94m in[0m category[94m theory[0m[94m that[0m equations play in algebra[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m category[94m theory[0m[94m,[0m[94m a[0m[94m branch[0m[94m of[0m[94m mathematics[0m, a[94m mon[0mad is[94m an[0m endofunctor[94m,[0m together[94m with[0m[94m two[0m natural transformations[94m required[0m[94m to[0m ful[94mfill[0m certain coh[94mer[0mence conditions[94m.[0m Mon[94mads[0m[94m are[0m[94m used[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m[94m theory[0m[94m of[0m[94m pairs[0m[94m of[0m[94m ad[0m[94mjoint[0m fun[94mctors[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m they[0m general[94mize[0m[94m closure[0m operators[94m on[0m partially ordered[94m sets[0m to arbitrary categories[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m the[0m mathematical fields[94m of[0m topology[94m and[0m K-theory[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m Ser[0m[94mre[0m[94m–[0mSwan[94m theorem[0m,[94m also[0m called Sw[94man[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m[94m theorem[0m[94m,[0m[94m rel[0m[94mates[0m[94m the[0m geometric notion[94m of[0m[94m vector[0m[94m bund[0m[94mles[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m algebraic[0m[94m concept[0m[94m of[0m[94m project[0m[94mive[0m modules[94m and[0m gives[94m rise[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m common intu[94mition[0m[94m throughout[0m[94m mathematics[0m:[94m "[0mproject[94mive[0m[94m modules[0m[94m over[0m commut[94mative[0m rings[94m are[0m like[94m vector[0m[94m bund[0m[94mles[0m[94m on[0m[94m compact[0m[94m spaces[0m".[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m mathematics[94m,[0m[94m a[0m comma category[94m is[0m[94m a[0m[94m construction[0m in category[94m theory[0m.[94m It[0m[94m provides[0m[94m another[0m[94m way[0m of[94m looking[0m[94m at[0m morph[94misms[0m: instead[94m of[0m[94m simply[0m[94m rel[0mating[94m objects[0m of a category[94m to[0m one[94m another[0m[94m,[0m morph[94misms[0m[94m become[0m[94m objects[0m[94m in[0m their own right.[94m This[0m notion was[94m introduced[0m in[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m[94m6[0m[94m3[0m[94m by[0m[94m F[0m. W[94m.[0m Lawvere[94m,[0m although[94m the[0m technique did[94m not[0m become generally known until many[94m years[0m[94m later[0m[94m.[0m Several[94m mathematical[0m[94m concepts[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m treated[0m[94m as[0m comma[94m categories[0m[94m.[0m Comma[94m categories[0m also[94m guarantee[0m[94m the[0m[94m existence[0m[94m of[0m[94m some[0m limits[94m and[0m colimits[94m.[0m The name comes[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m notation[0m[94m originally[0m[94m used[0m[94m by[0m Lawvere[94m,[0m[94m which[0m involved[94m the[0m comma punctu[94mation[0m mark[94m.[0m[94m The[0m name pers[94mists[0m even[94m though[0m standard notation[94m has[0m[94m changed[0m[94m,[0m since[94m the[0m use[94m of[0m[94m a[0m comma as[94m an[0m[94m operator[0m[94m is[0m[94m potentially[0m confusing,[94m and[0m[94m even[0m Lawvere dislikes[94m the[0m[94m un[0minform[94mative[0m term "com[94mma[0m category[94m".[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mIn mathematics[94m the[0m[94m Kar[0moubi envelope[94m of[0m a[94m category[0m C is[94m a[0m[94m classification[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m ide[94mmp[0m[94mot[0ments[94m of[0m C[94m,[0m by means of an auxili[94mary[0m category[94m.[0m[94m T[0making[94m the[0m Kar[94mou[0m[94mbi[0m[94m en[0m[94mvelope[0m[94m of[0m[94m a[0m pre[94madd[0m[94mitive[0m category[94m gives[0m[94m a[0m pseudo[94m-[0mabel[94mian[0m[94m category[0m[94m,[0m hence[94m the[0m construction[94m is[0m sometimes called the[94m pseudo[0m[94m-[0m[94mabel[0m[94mian[0m completion.[94m It[0m[94m is[0m named[94m for[0m[94m the[0m French[94m math[0m[94mematic[0m[94mian[0m Max Kar[94mou[0mbi[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mF[0mibred categories[94m are[0m abstract[94m entities[0m[94m in[0m[94m mathematics[0m used[94m to[0m provide[94m a[0m general[94m framework[0m[94m for[0m[94m descent[0m theory[94m.[0m[94m They[0m formalise[94m the[0m various situations[94m in[0m[94m geometry[0m[94m and[0m[94m algebra[0m[94m in[0m which[94m inverse[0m images[94m of[0m[94m objects[0m[94m such[0m as[94m vector[0m[94m bund[0m[94mles[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m defined[94m.[0m[94m As[0m[94m an[0m example[94m,[0m[94m for[0m each[94m topological[0m[94m space[0m there is the category[94m of[0m vector[94m bund[0m[94mles[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m space[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m for[0m every[94m continuous[0m[94m map[0m[94m from[0m[94m a[0m topological[94m space[0m[94m X[0m[94m to[0m[94m another[0m[94m topological[0m[94m space[0m[94m Y[0m[94m is[0m associated the pull[94mback[0m fun[94mctor[0m taking bund[94mles[0m[94m on[0m[94m Y[0m to bund[94mles[0m[94m on[0m[94m X[0m[94m.[0m[94m F[0m[94mib[0m[94mred[0m of[94m objects[0m secure[94mly[0m[94m from[0m[94m a[0m[94m secure[0m[94m hash[0m[94m,[0m[94m then[0m[94m dist[0m[94mribute[0m[94m that[0m hash later[94m.[0m[94m ...[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m Services[94m

[0m[94mH[0möld[94mer[0m conditions[94m for[0m continuous[94m Gaussian[0m[94m processes[0m[94m.[0m [94mZ[0m[94mbl[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m5[0m[94m5[0m.[94m6[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m[94m2[0m[94m7[0m
[94mM[0m[94marc[0m[94mus[0m[94m,[0m Michael[94m B[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m9[0m70
On the domain[94m of[0m att[94mraction[0m of $$[94me[0m[94m^{-[0m[94me[0m[94m^{-[0mx}}$$. [94mZ[0m[94mbl[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m1[94m6[0m9.[94m5[0m[94m0[0m[94m couple[0md brain oscill[94mations[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m mixed[94m in[0m[94m such[0m[94m a[0m[94m way[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m resulting[0m[94m linear[0m[94m mixture[0m[94m has[0m[94m a[0m[94m non[0m[94m-[0mGaussian distribution[94m.[0m We evaluate[94m this[0m[94m argument[0m analyt[94mically[0m for[94m amplitude[0m-modulated narrow[94m-[0mband[94m oscill[0mations which[94m are[0m either phase[94m-[0m[94mphase[0m[94m or[0m amplitude[94m-[0mam[94mplit[0m[94mude[0m[94m CF[0m couple[94md[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m valid[0mated[94m N[0mID[94m extens[0m[94mively[0m with sim[94mulated[0m EEG obtained[94m with[0m[94m real[0mistic head[94m mod[0melling[94m.[0m[94m The[0m method extracted nonlinear[94mly[0m interact[94ming[0m[94m components[0m reli[94mably[0m even[94m at[0m[94m S[0mNRs as[94m small[0m[94m as[0m $−[94m1[0m5[94m$[0m[94m ([0m[94md[0m[94mB[0m[94m).[0m Additionally[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m applied[0m NID[94m to[0m[94m the[0m resting-state E[94mEG[0m of[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m1[0m subjects[94m to[0m character[94mize[0m[94m CF[0m[94m phase[0m[94m-[0mphase[94m coupling[0m[94m between[0m alpha[94m and[0m[94m beta[0m oscillations[94m.[0m[94m The[0m extracted sources were[94m located[0m in temporal, parietal and front[94mal[0m areas[94m,[0m[94m demonstr[0m[94mating[0m[94m the[0m[94m existence[0m[94m of[0m diverse[94m local[0m[94m and[0m distant non[94mlinear[0m interactions[94m in[0m rest[94ming[0m[94m-[0m[94mstate[0m[94m E[0m[94mEG[0m data[94m.[0m[94m All[0m codes[94m are[0m available public[94mly[0m via GitHub[94m.[0m
[94m

[0m[94mAuthor[0m[94m([0m[94ms[0m[94m):[0m[94m Thomas[0m[94m R[0m[94m.[0m[94m Bar[0m[94mrick[0m,[94m Catherine[0m[94m A[0m[94m.[0m[94m Sp[0m[94milling[0m[94m,[0m[94m Car[0mson[94m In[0m[94mgo[0m[94m,[0m[94m Jer[0m[94memy[0m[94m Mad[0migan[94m,[0m[94m Jer[0m[94memy[0m[94m D[0m[94m.[0m Isaacs[94m,[0m[94m Philip[0m[94m Rich[0m[94m,[0m[94m Tim[0m[94mothy[0m[94m L[0m[94m.[0m[94m Jones[0m[94m,[0m[94m Richard[0m[94m L[0m[94m.[0m[94m Mag[0m[94min[0m[94m,[0m[94m Matt[0m[94m G[0m[94m.[0m Hall[94m,[0m[94m Frank[0m[94mlyn[0m[94m A[0m[94m.[0m[94m How[0m[94me[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAbstract
[94m
[0m[94mTo[0m enable[94m application[0m[94m of[0m[94m non[0m-[94mG[0m[94maussian[0m[94m diffusion[0m magnetic reson[94mance[0m imag[94ming[0m[94m ([0mdM[94mRI[0m[94m)[0m techniques in large-scale clin[94mical[0m trials[94m and[0m facil[94mitate[0m[94m translation[0m[94m to[0m clin[94mical[0m practice there[94m is[0m a[94m requirement[0m[94m for[0m fast, high[94m contrast[0m[94m,[0m[94m techniques[0m that[94m are[0m sensitive[94m to[0m[94m changes[0m[94m in[0m t[94missue[0m structure which[94m provide[0m diagnostic[94m sign[0m[94matures[0m[94m at[0m the[94m early[0m[94m stages[0m[94m of[0m disease[94m.[0m Here we describe[94m a[0m new[94m way[0m[94m to[0m[94m compress[0m[94m the[0m ac[94mquisition[0m[94m of[0m[94m multi[0m[94m-[0mshell[94m b[0m-value[94m diffusion[0m data[94m,[0m[94m Qu[0masi[94m-[0mDiffusion M[94mRI[0m[94m ([0m[94mQ[0m[94mDI[0m[94m),[0m[94m which[0m[94m provides[0m[94m a[0m[94m pro[0mbe of subvoxel tissue[94m complexity[0m using[94m short[0m ac[94mquisition[0m times[94m ([0m[94m1[0m–[94m4[0m min[94m).[0m We[94m also[0m[94m describe[0m[94m a[0m coh[94mer[0ment[94m framework[0m[94m for[0m[94m multi[0m[94m-[0m[94mdirection[0m[94mal[0m[94m diffusion[0m gradient[94m ac[0m[94mquisition[0m[94m and[0m[94m data[0m processing that[94m allows[0m[94m computation[0m[94m of[0m[94m rotation[0mally invariant[94m quasi[0m[94m-[0mdiff[94musion[0m tensor imaging ([94mQ[0mDT[94mI[0m[94m)[0m maps[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mQDI is[94m a[0m quant[94mitative[0m[94m technique[0m[94m that[0m is[94m based[0m[94m on[0m[94m a[0m special[94m case[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m Continuous[94m Time[0m Random Walk model of diffusion dynamics[94m and[0m[94m assumes[0m[94m the[0m[94m presence[0m[94m of[0m non[94m-[0mG[94maussian[0m[94m diffusion[0m properties[94m within[0m t[94missue[0m[94m micro[0mstructure[94m.[0m Q[94mDI[0m[94m parameter[0mises[94m the[0m[94m diffusion[0m signal[94m at[0m[94mten[0m[94mu[0mation[94m according[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m rate[0m[94m of[0m decay[94m ([0mi[94m.[0m[94me[0m[94m.[0m[94m diffusion[0m coefficient[94m,[0m[94m period[0m,[94m the[0m[94m measurement[0m system shall[94m not[0m[94m require[0m[94m any[0m[94m correct[0mive maintenance[94m,[0m repair[94m,[0m replacement[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m adjust[0m[94mment[0m other[94m than[0m that clearly[94m specified[0m[94m as[0m[94m required[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m operation[94m and[0m[94m maintenance[0m manual[94ms[0m[94m as[0m[94m routine[0m[94m and[0m expected during[94m a[0m[94m one[0m[94m-[0m[94mweek[0m[94m period[0m[94m.[0m If[94m the[0m[94m measurement[0m[94m system[0m[94m oper[0m[94mates[0m within[94m the[0m[94m specified[0m performance parameters[94m and[0m[94m does[0m[94m not[0m[94m require[0m correct[94mive[0m[94m maintenance[0m[94m,[0m[94m repair[0m[94m,[0m[94m replacement[0m or[94m adjust[0m[94mment[0m other[94m than[0m[94m specified[0m above[94m,[0m during[94m the[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m68-hour test period[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m oper[0m[94mational[0m[94m period[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m successfully[0m concluded[94m.[0m Fail[94mure[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m measurement[0m to meet this[94m requirement[0m shall call[94m for[0m[94m a[0m repet[94mition[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m [94m1[0m[94m6[0m[94m8[0m[94m-[0m[94mhour[0m[94m test[0m[94m period[0m[94m.[0m Port[94mions[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m test[0m which[94m were[0m satisfactor[94mily[0m completed[94m need[0m not[94m be[0m repeated[94m.[0m Fail[94mure[0m to[94m meet[0m any[94m performance[0m[94m specific[0m[94mations[0m shall[94m call[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m[94m repet[0m[94mition[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m one[94m-[0m[94mweek[0m performance test[94m period[0m and[94m that[0m portion[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m testing[0m which[94m is[0m[94m related[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m failed specification.[94m All[0m maintenance[94m and[0m[94m adjust[0mments[94m required[0m[94m shall[0m[94m be[0m recorded.[94m Output[0m read[94mings[0m[94m shall[0m[94m be[0m[94m recorded[0m before and[94m after[0m all adjust[94mments[0m.
[94m
[0m6[94m.[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m9[0m Performance[94m Spec[0m[94mifications[0m Testing Fre[94mquency[0m.[94m In[0m[94m the[0m event[94m that[0m[94m significant[0m repair[94m work[0m[94m is[0m[94m performed[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m system[94m,[0m[94m the[0m[94m company[0m shall[94m demonstrate[0m to[94m the[0m Administr[94mator[0m[94m that[0m[94m the[0m[94m system[0m still[94m meets[0m[94m the[0m[94m performance[0m[94m specific[0m[94mations[0m listed[94m in[0m Table[94m I[0m of this append[94mix[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m Administr[0m[94mator[0m may require[94m a[0m[94m performance[0m test[94m at[0m[94m any[0m[94m time[0m he[94m determ[0m[94mines[0m that such[94m test[0m[94m is[0m[94m necessary[0m[94m to[0m verify[94m the[0m[94m performance[0m of[94m the[0m measurement[94m system[0m[94m.[0m[94m

[0m• Thank[94m you[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m[94m time[0m and effort[94m you[0m[94m have[0m[94m put[0m into replying[94m.[0m[94m Since[0m[94m it[0m[94m is[0m[94m not[0m[94m possible[0m[94m to[0m[94m do[0m with numbers[94m,[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m chosen[94m to[0m[94m do[0m[94m it[0m[94m with[0m[94m letters[0m[94m.[0m This has[94m required[0m changing[94m my[0m sorting[94m patterns[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m fort[94mun[0m[94mately[0m[94m,[0m[94m all[0m my nomencl[94mature[0m[94m is[0m[94m in[0m one[94m location[0m[94m in[0m[94m the[0m document[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m have[0m used[94m A[0m in[94m front[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m prefixes[94m for[0m[94m all[0m[94m entries[0m which[94m are[0m not[94m in[0m groups[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m then[0m[94m used[0m[94m D[0m[94m and[0m[94m S[0m[94m in[0m[94m front[0m[94m of[0m[94m entries[0m[94m of[0m[94m two[0m[94m groups[0m[94m.[0m[94m After[0m[94m this[0m[94m,[0m[94m I[0m can then[94m organ[0mised each[94m entry[0m[94m with[0m[94m additional[0m letters[94m and[0m numbers[94m.[0m Thanks[94m for[0m your help.[94m Its[0m a shame[94m it[0m isn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m possible directly,[94m but[0m maybe in[94m the[0m future[94m it[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m :) – slew1[94m2[0m3 Apr [94m4[0m '1[94m9[0m at [94m2[0m[94m2[0m:[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m[0m[94m[0m[94m #[0m Home[94mwork[0m Help[94m:[0m Stretch[94ming[0m[94m W[0mires Problem[94ms[0m[94m

### Catch[94mfire[0m

Hello first post here[94m.[0m These[94m problems[0m[94m aren[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m for a specific course just working through[94m an[0m old textbook[94m specifically[0m V[94mibr[0mations[94m and[0m Waves by[94m A[0m.P[94m.[0m French. I[94m hope[0m[94m it[0m[94m'[0m[94ms[0m al[94mright[0m that I include[94m two[0m[94m problems[0m[94m in[0m one thread[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m The problem statement[94m,[0m all variables[94m and[0m given/known data[94m
[0m[94mQ[0m[94m [0m[94m3[0m[94m-[0m[94m7[0m) A wire of[94m un[0mstretch[94med[0m length L[94m0[0m is[94m extended[0m[94m by[0m[94m [0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m^-[0m[94m3[0m[94mL[0m[94m0[0m[94m when[0m a mass m[94m is[0m hung[94m from[0m[94m it[0m'[94ms[0m end[94m.[0m If[94m this[0m same wire[94m is[0m[94m connected[0m[94m between[0m[94m two[0m[94m points[0m A[94m,[0mB hor[94mizont[0m[94mally[0m[94m and[0m then[94m the[0m[94m same[0m mass is[94m hung[0m[94m from[0m[94m the[0m middle of[94m the[0m[94m wire[0m, how large[94m is[0m[94m the[0m de useful to[94m consider[0m[94m the[0m[94m stabil[0miser group $\[94mmathcal[0m G[94m$[0m[94m formed[0m[94m by[0m products[94m of[0m $P \in[94m \[0mmathscr S[94m$.[0m)[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAl[0mmost[94m all[0m quantum error correction codes that people consider in pract[94mise[0m are stabiliser[94m codes[0m[94m.[0m This[94m is[0m[94m one[0m reason[94m why[0m[94m you[0m[94m may[0m[94m have[0m[94m problems[0m distingu[94mishing[0m[94m the[0m[94m two[0m terms[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m require[0m[94m that[0m[94m a[0m[94m quantum[0m[94m error[0m[94m correction[0m[94m code[0m be a[94m stabil[0miser code —[94m just[0m as in principle we[94m do[0m[94m not[0m[94m require[0m[94m a[0m classical[94m error[0m[94m correction[0m[94m code[0m[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m a[0m linear code[94m.[0m St[94mabil[0miser[94m codes[0m[94m just[0m happen[94m to[0m[94m be[0m[94m an[0m[94m extremely[0m[94m successful[0m[94m way[0m of[94m describing[0m[94m quantum[0m[94m error[0m correcting[94m codes[0m[94m,[0m just[94m as[0m linear[94m error[0m[94m correct[0m[94ming[0m[94m codes[0m[94m are[0m an[94m extremely[0m[94m successful[0m[94m way[0m[94m of[0m[94m describing[0m[94m classical[0m[94m error[0m[94m correct[0m[94ming[0m[94m codes[0m[94m.[0m And indeed[94m,[0m[94m stabil[0miser[94m codes[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m regarded[94m as[0m[94m a[0m natural generalisation[94m of[0m[94m the[0m[94m theory[0m[94m of[0m classical linear codes to[94m quantum[0m[94m error[0m[94m correction[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mAs[0m people[94m are[0m often[94m interested[0m just[94m in[0m low[94m-[0mweight operators[94m which[0m are[94m less[0m than half the code distance[94m,[0m[94m the[0m set[94m of[0m[94m stabil[0mis[94mers[0m[94m is[0m[94m often[0m[94m all[0m people say about an stabiliser correction code[94m.[0m[94m However[0m[94m,[0m to[94m specify[0m[94m the[0m[94m set[0m[94m of[0m errors $\[94mmathcal[0m E[94m$[0m[94m against[0m[94m which[0m[94m the[0m code[94m can[0m protect[94m,[0m it[94m is[0m[94m necessary[0m also[94m to[0m specify[94m a[0m[94m relationship[0m[94m $\[0msigma[94m$[0m[94m between[0m Pauli product operators $[94mE[0m[94m$[0m[94m and[0m subsets[94m $[0m[94mS[0m \subseteq[94m \[0m[94mmathscr[0m[94m S[0m[94m$,[0m[94m such[0m[94m that[0m
[94m
[0m•[94m $[0m[94mE[0m$[94m ant[0micommutes with[94m $[0mP \in \[94mmathscr[0m[94m S[0m[94m$[0m[94m if[0m[94m and[0m only[94m if[0m[94m $[0m[94mP[0m[94m \[0m[94min[0m[94m S[0m[94m$[0m for[94m $\[0m[94msigma[0m[94m([0m[94mE[0m[94m,[0m[94mS[0m[94m)$[0m[94m;[0m[94m
[0m[94m•[0m If[94m $[0m[94mE[0m,[94m E[0m'$ both satisfy $\[94msigma[0m[94m([0m[94mE[0m[94m,[0mS[94m)$[0m[94m and[0m[94m $\[0msigma[94m([0m[94mE[0m',[94mS[0m)$, then[94m $[0m[94mE[0m E[94m'[0m \[94min[0m[94m \[0mmathcal[94m G[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0mlangle[94m \[0mmathscr[94m S[0m[94m \[0m[94mrangle[0m$.[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThis defines[94m a[0m set[94m $$\[0mmathcal[94m E[0m =[94m \[0m[94mbig[0ml\{ E[94m \[0mmathbin{\[94mbig[0m[94m\[0mvert}[94m \[0mexists[94m S[0m[94m \[0msubseteq[94m \[0m[94mmathscr[0m[94m S[0m:[94m \[0msigma[94m([0m[94mE[0m[94m,[0m[94mS[0m[94m)[0m \bigr\}$$ of[94m errors[0m[94m against[0m[94m which[0m the code[94m can[0m[94m protect[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m subsets[94m $[0m[94mS[0m[94m \[0m[94msubseteq[0m[94m \[0m[94mmathscr[0m[94m S[0m[94m$[0m[94m are[0m[94m called[0m error synd[94mrom[0m[94mes[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m the[0m[94m relation[0m[94m which[0m[94m I[0m've called $\[94msigma[0m$ here[94m ([0mwhich you[94m don[0m[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m usually[0m[94m see[0m given an explicit[94m name[0m[94m)[0m associ[94mates[0m synd[94mrom[0m[94mes[0m[94m to[0m[94m one[0m[94m or[0m[94m more[0m[94m errors[0m[94m which[0m[94m '[0mc[94mause[0m'[94m that[0m syndrome[94m,[0m and whose effects[94m on[0m the code[94m are[0m[94m equivalent[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m'[0m[94mS[0mynd[94mrom[0m[94mes[0m[94m'[0m represent information that can[94m actually[0m[94m be[0m[94m obtained[0m about[94m an[0m[94m error[0m[94m by[0m[94m '[0m[94mco[0mherent measurement[94m'[0m —[94m that[0m[94m is[0m[94m,[0m by meas[94muring[0m operators $P[94m \[0m[94min[0m[94m \[0m[94mmathscr[0m[94m S[0m[94m$[0m[94m as[0m observables ([94ma[0m[94m process[0m which[94m is[0m[94m usually[0m sim[94mulated[0m[94m by[0m[94m eigen[0m T[94m.[0mtext([94mn[0m[94m,[0m fmt[94m=[0mmyfmt[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94mand[0m[94m my[0mfmt is[94m target[0m[94med[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m node[0m type[94m that[0m[94m is[0m[94m
[0m[94mb[0m[94migger[0m[94m than[0m[94m the[0m[94m node[0m[94m type[0m[94m of[0m[94m n[0m[94m,[0m[94m
[0m[94mthen[0m[94m the[0m[94m so[0m-[94mcalled[0m[94m desc[0m[94mending[0m[94m leads[0m[94m to[0m an[94m empty[0m[94m
[0m[94msequence[0m[94m of[0m nodes[94m and[0m[94m hence[0m[94m to[0m[94m an[0m[94m empty[0m string[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mexp[0mlain[94m:[0m boolean[94m,[0m optional[94m False[0m
[94mThe[0m[94m logic[0m[94m of[0m[94m this[0m function[94m is[0m subtle[94m.[0m[94m

[0m[94m M[0m[94m2[0mc[94m≈[0m[94m3[0m[94m2[0mα[94m≈[0m[94m2[0m[94m3[0m[94m1[0mγ[94m([0mγ−[94m1[0m[94m)[0mζ ([94m1[0m4)[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mag[0m[94main[0m[94m.[0m8[94m8[0m8One subtlety here[94m is[0m that[94m the[0m hydrodynamic Reyn[94molds[0m[94m stress[0m[94m,[0m and[94m/[0m[94mor[0m[94m the[0m diss[94mip[0m[94mation[0m on[94m small[0m[94m scales[0m[94m,[0m[94m is[0m[94m domin[0m[94mated[0m[94m by[0m[94m the[0m longitud[94minal[0m[94m ([0mcom[94mpress[0mive[94m)[0m component[94m.[0m[94m So[0m[94m this[0m[94m relation[0m actually determ[94mines[0m , not necessarily .[94m But[0m[94m for[0m[94m our[0m purposes[94m,[0m[94m this[0m[94m is[0m particularly convenient[94m,[0m[94m as[0m[94m it[0m[94m allows[0m[94m us[0m[94m to[0m drop[94m the[0m term[94m from[0m[94m our[0m[94m earlier[0m[94m deriv[0m[94mation[0m[94m.[0m[94m We[0m[94m now[0m see how this[94m rel[0m[94mates[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m theory developed[94m in[0m[94m this[0m[94m paper[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mIn[0m[94m the[0m[94m language[0m here[94m,[0m[94m increasing[0m[94m enters[0m[94m our[0m theory by[94m –[0m[94m as[0m discussed[94m in[0m[94m the[0m text – changing[94m the[0m[94m equilibrium[0m balance[94m between[0m thermal[94m and[0m tur[94mbul[0m[94ment[0m energy,[94m i[0m[94m.[0m[94me[0m.[94m [0mthe Mach number.[94m As[0m[94m cool[0m[94ming[0m becomes[94m less[0m efficient[94m,[0m[94m maintain[0m[94ming[0m[94m the[0m same needed to[94m power[0m the tur[94mbul[0mence[94m ([0m[94msince[0m[94m spir[0m[94mal[0m waves[94m are[0m[94m still[0m generated[94m)[0m requires[94m a[0m smaller tur[94mbul[0m[94ment[0m disp[94mersion[0m[94m,[0m hence[94m makes[0m[94m the[0m system “more[94m stable[0m[94m.”[0m
[94m
[0m####[94m [0m[94m6[0m.1.2 A Statist[94mical[0m St[94mability[0m[94m C[0mriterion[94m
[0m[94m
[0mBut[94m this[0m[94m also[0m[94m suggests[0m[94m an[0m improved statistical stability criter[94mion[0m[94m,[0m[94m account[0m[94ming[0m not[94m just[0m[94m for[0m[94m regions[0m where[94m but[0m[94m also[0m for[94m st[0mochastic[94m local[0m tur[94mbul[0m[94ment[0m[94m density[0m fl[94muct[0m[94mu[0m[94mations[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m[94m a[0m[94m given[0m ,[94m we[0m[94m have[0m[94m calculated[0m[94m ([0mFig[94m.[0m [94m2[0m[94m)[0m the[94m Mach[0m[94m number[0m above which the system[94m will[0m[94m be[0m probabil[94mist[0m[94mically[0m[94m likely[0m[94m to[0m fragment on[94m a[0m[94m given[0m times[94mc[0male[94m.[0m Eq. [94m1[0m4 allows[94m us[0m[94m to[0m translate[94m this[0m[94m to[0m[94m a[0m[94m minimum[0m .[94m We[0m[94m can[0m do[94m this[0m exactly[94m by[0m simply[94m reading[0m[94m off[0m[94m the[0m[94m numer[0m[94mically[0m calculated[94m values[0m[94m,[0m[94m but[0m[94m we[0m can[94m also[0m[94m obtain[0m[94m an[0m accurate[94m analyt[0mic approximation[94m by[0m[94m the[0m following[94m ([0msee § [94m8[0m[94m).[0m Recall[94m that[0m[94m for[0m a[94m system[0m[94m which[0m evol[94mves[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m total times[94mc[0male[94m ([0m[94mtime[0m in[94m the[0m[94m dimension[0mless units we adopt),[94m we[0m[94m obtain[0m[94m the[0m approximate[94m Eq[0m[94m.[0m [94m9[0m[94m for[0m[94m the[0m needed[94m to[0m[94m ensure[0m :[94m
[0m[94m
[0m Q≥[94m1[0m[94m2[0mexp[[94m√[0m[94m2[0mln[94m([0mτ[94m0[0m[94m)[0m[94mln[0m[94m([0m[94m1[0m[94m+[0mM[94m2[0m[94mc[0m[94m)][0m (15[94m)[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mWe[0m[94m can[0m invert this[94m to[0m[94m find[0m[94m the[0m[94m maximum[0m for statistical[94m stability[0m7 [94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m4[0m[94m)([0m5 [94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m [94m2[0m4[94m [0m[94m8[0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m6[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m1[0m[94m [0m[94m6[0m8[94m [0m1[94m2[0m[94m1[0m)([94m6[0m [0m[94mWin[0mForms version[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mNone
[94m
[0m## How[94m does[0m[94m it[0m[94m work[0m
[94m
[0m[94mAll[0m[94m program[0m logic[94m and[0m[94m processing[0m is specified[94m by[0m[94m functional[0m dependencies between[94m N[0modes[94m.[0m Dependencies[94m can[0m[94m be[0m cy[94mclic[0m[94m and[0m[94m exception[0m handling[94m by[0m rollback is[94m provided[0m[94m.[0m N[94modes[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m[94m used[0m[94m in[0m[94m any[0m[94m situation[0m[94m,[0m for[94m console[0m apps[94m,[0m batch[94m apps[0m[94m,[0m[94m or[0m[94m apps[0m[94m using[0m any GUI library that[94m has[0m[94m a[0m[94m Python[0m API[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mTo[0m make life easier[94m,[0m[94m a[0m set[94m of[0m Views[94m is[0m available.[94m Each[0m[94m View[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m thin[94m layer[0m[94m on[0m top[94m of[0m[94m a[0m GUI Widget class[94m from[0m[94m the[0m[94m underlying[0m GUI[94m library[0m[94m.[0m View[94ms[0m[94m can[0m[94m be[0m connected[94m to[0m N[94modes[0m[94m using[0m Link[94ms[0m[94m.[0m Typ[94mically[0m a[94m View[0m[94m will[0m[94m be[0m[94m connected[0m[94m to[0m multiple[94m N[0m[94modes[0m[94m,[0m but also[94m a[0m Node can[94m be[0m[94m connected[0m[94m to[0m[94m multiple[0m View[94ms[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m this[0m way a[94m complete[0m GUI[94m app[0m can[94m be[0m “wired[94m”[0m together[94m.[0m Layout[94m is[0m dynamic[94m.[0m[94m Both[0m[94m data[0m[94m and[0m layout[94m are[0m persistent[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Practical[94m experiences[0m[94m using[0m Eden
[94m
[0m[94mUsing[0m[94m E[0m[94mden[0m in[94m every[0mday practice has proven[94m a[0m pleasure[94m.[0m E[94mden[0m[94m has[0m[94m been[0m[94m in[0m[94m use[0m[94m for[0m[94m multiple[0m[94m years[0m[94m now[0m by multiple[94m people[0m[94m working[0m[94m on[0m diverse engineering[94m projects[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m resulting[0m applications[94m involve[0m do[94mz[0m[94mens[0m[94m of[0m modules[94m,[0m most[94m of[0m them[94m with[0m do[94mz[0m[94mens[0m[94m of[0m[94m nodes[0m[94m,[0m[94m some[0m[94m nodes[0m carrying[94m many[0m[94m meg[0maby[94mtes[0m of[94m data[0m[94m.[0m[94m A[0m[94m characteristic[0m[94m of[0m[94m both[0m[94m projects[0m[94m is[0m[94m that[0m requirements rapidly evol[94mved[0m during[94m the[0m[94m project[0m[94m.[0m[94m With[0m[94m E[0m[94mden[0m it[94m proved[0m remark[94mably[0m easy[94m to[0m[94m follow[0m[94m the[0m changing requirements[94m.[0m In spite[94m of[0m[94m the[0m fact[94m that[0m requirements[94m changed[0m frequently[94m and[0m deeply[94m,[0m application structure[94m has[0m[94m remained[0m lean and clean[94m.[0m[94m Unfortunately[0m these projects[94m,[0m[94m that[0m otherwise[94m might[0m[94m have[0m[94m very[0m[94m well[0m[94m served[0m as[94m coding[0m[94m and[0m[94m style[0m examples, were[94m all[0m propriet[94mary[0m[94m.[0m[94m One[0m[94m of[0m[94m the[0m people[94m working[0m[94m on[0m[94m a[0m[94m project[0m remarked[94m that[0m[94m with[0m E[94mden[0m, coding clean[94m,[0m flexible[94m and[0m maintain[94mable[0m program logic was as easy[94m and[0m rout[94min[0mely[94m as[0m drawing[94m up[0m[94m a[0m shopping list[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Learning E[94mden[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mAl[94mthough[0m[94m the[0m tutorial examples[94m are[0m simple[94m for[0m anyone[94m to[0m compreh[94mend[0m[94m,[0m[94m they[0m[94m by[0m[94m far[0m don[94m’[0m[94mt[0m cover all[94m the[0m features[94m.[0m[94m Moreover[0m they[94m are[0m[94m too[0m[94m small[0m[94m to[0m reve[94mal[0m[94m issues[0m[94m of[0m[94m overall[0m program organisation[94m,[0m[94m like[0m[94m the[0m use[94m of[0m[94m the[0m Module[94m mechanism[0m[94m.[0m[94m Using[0m[94m E[0m[94mden[0m[94m in[0m[94m an[0m[94m effective[0m way[94m for[0m a non[94m-[0m[94mt[0m[94mrivial[0m app[94m has[0m[94m a[0m ste[94mep[0m[94m ([0mbut short[94m)[0m[94m le[0maring curve.[94m It[0m[94m has[0m[94m proven[0m[94m feas[0m[94mible[0m[94m to[0m get[94m a[0m “[94mf[0mresh[94m”[0m developer[94m u[0mpto speed in a few days[94m of[0m side by side tutor[94ming[0m.[94m There[0m[94m’[0m[94ms[0m[94m a[0m[94m real[0m need[94m for[0m a freely available[94m elabor[0m[94mated[0m example[94m,[0m[94m though[0m[94m.[0m Currently[94m I[0m[94m concent[0m[94mrate[0m[94m upon[0m[94m the[0m CPython[94m +[0m[94m K[0miv[94my[0m version[94m,[0m[94m since[0m mobile[94m-[0m and tablet platforms[94m are[0m where most[94m of[0m[94m the[0m action[94m is[0m.[94m One[0m[94m public[0m[94m domain[0m[94m application[0m[94m that[0m[94m uses[0m[94mSim[0mon Bridge
Home[94mwork[0m Helper[94m
[0m[94mYou[0m[94m need[0m[94m to[0m show[94m that[0m[94m the[0m area under[94m the[0m graph from 0[94m to[0m[94m [0m9[94m0[0mdeg[94m is[0m[94m the[0m[94m same[0m for sin[94m and[0m[94m cos[0m[94mine[0m[94m to[0m any[94m power[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0m[94mYour[0m[94m first[0m[94m step[0m[94m is[0m[94m to[0m understand[94m the[0m problem - try sketch[94ming[0m[94m the[0m[94m graphs[0m[94m for[0m[94m a[0m[94m few[0m[94m powers[0m[94m and[0m shading[94m the[0m[94m area[0m[94m in[0m question[94m to[0m see what[94m you[0m are up against[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThere is[94m a[0m rule[94m for[0m integr[94mating[0m powers of sin[94m and[0m[94m cos[0m[94m ...[0m[94m you[0m[94m can[0m derive it[94m from[0m integration by parts[94m.[0m[94m Know[0m[94ming[0m the[94m rule[0m[94m,[0m[94m you[0m[94m can[0m probably just do it algebra[94mically[0m[94m.[0m
[94m
[0mOr you[94m can[0m try[94m a[0m substitution in[94m one[0m[94m like[0m $x=\[94mfrac[0m{\pi[94m}{[0m2[94m}-[0mu[94m$[0m[94m and[0m explo[94mit[0m[94m the[0m[94m par[0mity of[94m the[0m[94m functions[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mS[0morry[94m,[0m to[94m clarify[0m[94m,[0m[94m the[0m hint says:[94m
[0mUse[94m a[0m[94m trig[0m[94mon[0m[94mometric[0m[94m identity[0m and substitution. Do not solve the deﬁnite integr[94mals[0m
[94m
[0m[94mG[0m[94miven[0m[94m this[0m[94m information[0m[94m,[0m[94m how[0m would[94m you[0m recommend[94m solving[0m?
[94m
[0m[94mSam[0mmyS[94m
[0mSt[94maff[0m[94m Emer[0mitus[94m
[0mHome[94mwork[0m Hel[94mper[0m[94m
[0m[94mG[0mold Member[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Home[94mwork[0m Stat[94mement[0m[94m
[0m
[94mG[0miven[94m that[0m[94m n[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m positive[94m integer[0m[94m,[0m prove[94m [0m∫sin^[94mn[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m)[0m[94mdx[0m[94m=[0m[94m∫[0m[94mcos[0m[94m^[0m[94mn[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m)[0m[94mdx[0m[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m -> pi[94m/[0m[94m2[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## Home[94mwork[0m[94m Equ[0mations[94m
[0m[94m
[0mPerhaps[94m sin[0m[94m^[0m2[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m)+[0m[94mcos[0m[94m^[0m[94m2[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m)=1[94m?[0m Not sure[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m## The Attempt at[94m a[0m Solution[94m
[0m[94m
[0mI honest[94mly[0m don[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m even[0m know where[94m to[0m start[94m.[0m[94m Should[0m I set[94m u[0m=sin[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m)[0m[94m or[0m cos[94m([0m[94mx[0m)? Doesn[94m'[0m[94mt[0m[94m seem[0m[94m to[0m[94m get[0m[94m the[0m[94m right[0m[94m answer[0m either way...[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m co[94m-[0m[94mfunction[0m identity states[94m that[0m $\displaystyle \[94mcos[0m[94m([0m[94mx[0m[94m)[0m[94m =[0m[94m \[0m[94msin[0m[94m\[0m[94mleft[0m[94m(\[0m[94mfrac[0m[94m{\[0mpi[94m}{[0m[94m2[0m[94m}-[0mx[94m\[0m[94mright[0m[94m)\[0m .[94m$[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0mThanks[94m![0m[94m I[0m[94m got[0m so[94m far[0m:

[0m=∫[94msin[0m[94m^[0m[94mn[0m[94m([0m[94mpi[0m[94m/[0m[94m2[0m-[94mx[0m[94m)[0m[94mdx[0m[94m from[0m[94m [0m[94m0[0m[94m to[0m[94m pi[0m[94m/[0m[94m2[0m[94m

[0m[94m
[0m##[94m Using[0m Android[94m s[0m[94mdk[0m.dir property[94m to[0m locate[94m E[0mMDK'[94ms[0m jar Library[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mOb[0msolete -[94m My[0m personal preference[94m is[0m[94m to[0m reference[94m Z[0m[94meb[0m[94mra[0m’[94ms[0m E[94mMD[0m[94mK[0m[94m jar[0m[94m library[0m[94m in[0m gradle’[94ms[0m dependencies,[94m and[0m[94m this[0m requires to indicate[94m the[0m[94m correct[0m[94m path[0m[94m to[0m[94m the[0m[94m library[0m[94m.[0m[94m So[0m far so good if[94m you[0m’[94mre[0m working[94m on[0m a[94m single[0m machine[94m.[0m This[94m short[0m post shows a better[94m way[0m[94m to[0m indicate[94m E[0m[94mMD[0m[94mK[0m[94m library[0m path independently from[94m the[0m machine[94m where[0m[94m you[0m[94m’[0m[94mre[0m building your[94m app[0m[94m.[0m [[94mRead[0m[94m More[0m[94m][0m[94m[0m[94m[0m # [94m4[0m.[94m1[0m.[94m3[0m[94m.[0m[94m3[0m Build[94m Resource[0m[94m-[0monly DLL in Visual Studio [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mThe[0m[94m Origin[0m Dialog Project Template[94m ([0m[94mod[0mialog[94m.[0m[94maw[0mx[94m)[0m[94m is[0m[94m only[0m compatible[94m with[0m[94m Visual[0m Studio[94m [0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m[94m This[0m article[94m will[0m walk[94m you[0m[94m through[0m[94m the[0m[94m steps[0m necessary[94m to[0m make[94m a[0m[94m resource[0m[94m-[0m[94monly[0m DLL[94m using[0m Visual Studio[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m0[0m8[94m,[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m0[0m[94m,[0m [94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m2[0m[94m and[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m[94m1[0m[94m5[0m Community.[94m It[0m[94m will[0m[94m then[0m[94m show[0m[94m you[0m[94m how[0m[94m to[0m[94m use[0m[94m your[0m DLL[94m in[0m Origin[94m C[0m.[94m
[0m[94m
[0m##[94m Creating[0m[94m a[0m Resource[94m-[0mOnly DLL[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94mHere[0m[94m is[0m[94m an[0m[94m example[0m[94m of[0m[94m how[0m[94m to[0m[94m build[0m[94m a[0m[94m resource[0m[94m-[0m[94monly[0m DLL that[94m is[0m accessible[94m in[0m[94m Origin[0m[94m C[0m. After[94m following[0m[94m these[0m[94m steps[0m you[94m will[0m[94m have[0m a Visual[94m Studio[0m solution[94m for[0m[94m building[0m[94m a[0m 32-bit DLL[94m.[0m[94m The[0m next section[94m will[0m then[94m show[0m[94m you[0m[94m how[0m[94m to[0m add[94m [0m6[94m4[0m-[94mbit[0m support[94m to[0m[94m your[0m[94m solution[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m1[94m.[0m La[94munch[0m Visual Studio[94m.([0mThis example[94m has[0m been tested in Visual Studio Community [94m2[0m[94m0[0m1[94m5[0m[94m.)[0m[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m Select[94m "[0mFile > New > Project..."[94m to[0m[94m create[0m[94m a[0m[94m new[0m[94m project[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m3[0m[94m.[0m In the[94m "[0m[94mNew[0m[94m Project[0m[94m"[0m dialog[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m[94m Select[0m[94m "[0mVisual C++[94m"[0m templates[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m Select[0m[94m "[0mWin3[94m2[0m Project".[94m
[0m[94m3[0m[94m.[0m Enter a name for[94m your[0m[94m project[0m[94m.[0m[94m For[0m this[94m example[0m[94m we[0m[94m will[0m name our[94m project[0m[94m "[0m[94mWel[0m[94mcome[0m".[94m
[0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m Click[94m the[0m[94m OK[0m[94m button[0m.[94m
[0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m[94m In[0m[94m the[0m[94m "[0m[94mWin[0m3[94m2[0m Application Wizard[94m"[0m dialog[94m:[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m[94m.[0m Click[94m "[0mNext[94m"[0m until[94m you[0m[94m see[0m "Application Settings[94m".[0m[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m Set[0m[94m "[0mApplication type[94m"[0m[94m to[0m[94m "[0mDLL".[94m
[0m[94m3[0m[94m.[0m Under "Additional options", check[94m "[0m[94mEmpty[0m project".[94m
[0m[94m4[0m[94m.[0m Click[94m the[0m Fin[94mish[0m[94m button[0m[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m5[0m[94m.[0m In[94m "[0mSol[94mution[0m Explorer[94m",[0m right[94m-[0m[94mclick[0m[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m project[0m group[94m and[0m[94m choose[0m Properties[94m.[0m[94m
[0m[94m6[0m[94m.[0m In the[94m "[0mProperties[94m P[0m[94mages[0m[94m"[0m dialog:[94m
[0m1[94m.[0m[94m Set[0m Configuration[94m to[0m "All Configur edit[94m in[0m Business Standard[94m,[0m a main[94m piece[0m[94m there[0m by Abheek Barua[94m and[0m another by Subir Gokarn[94m.[0m

[0m[94m
[0m[94m1[0m.[94m will[0m it[94m be[0m possible[94m for[0m[94m you[0m[94m to[0m elaborate[94m a[0m bit[94m on[0m[94m the[0m[94m following[0m[94m concept[0m[94m,[0m "[94mim[0m[94mpossible[0m trinity[94m of[0m[94m open[0m econom[94mics[0m macroe[94mconom[0m[94mics[0m[94m"[0m[94m
[0m[94m
[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m[94m impossible[0m[94m tr[0minity[94m of[0m[94m open[0m[94m economy[0m macro[94me[0m[94mconom[0m[94mics[0m[94m as[0m[94mser[0m[94mts[0m that[94m you[0m[94m can[0m'[94mt[0m simultaneously have:[94m a[0m[94m fixed[0m exchange[94m rate[0m,[94m an[0m[94m open[0m capital account[94m,[0m[94m and[0m autonomy of monet[94mary[0m policy[94m.[0m[94m If[0m[94m the[0m[94m capital[0m account techn[94mologies[0m have[94m been[0m shown to have low spectrum efficiency[94m.[0m[94m I[0m[94m used[0m[94m the[0m amaz[94ming[0m works[94mhe[0mets provided[94m by[0m Don[94m'[0m[94mt[0m Pan[94mic[0m[94m,[0m The[94m Answer[0m[94m is[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m2[0m[94m.[0m[94m The[0m exponential moving average[94m strategy[0m[94m is[0m[94m a[0m classic[94m example[0m[94m of[0m[94m how[0m to[94m construct[0m[94m a[0m simple EMA cros[94mso[0m[94mver[0m system[94m.[0m[94m To[0m learn[94m key[0m[94m properties[0m[94m of[0m[94m an[0m exponential random[94m variable[0m[94m,[0m[94m such[0m[94m as[0m[94m the[0m[94m mean[0m[94m,[0m[94m variance[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m moment generating[94m function[0m[94m.[0m Square Ro[94mots[0m[94m A[0m fun[94m million[0maire game about square[94m roots[0m[94m and[0m expressions with radical[94ms[0m[94m.[0m[94m Just[0m[94m as[0m[94m with[0m other parent[94m functions[0m[94m,[0m[94m we[0m[94m can[0m[94m apply[0m[94m the[0m[94m four[0m[94m types[0m[94m of[0m transformations—shifts[94m,[0m[94m ref[0m[94mlections[0m[94m,[0m[94m st[0mret[94mches[0m[94m,[0m[94m and[0m[94m compress[0m[94mions[0m—[94mto[0m[94m the[0m parent[94m function[0m[94m.[0m Cre[94mated[0m Jan[94m [0m[94m8[0m,[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m0[0m1[94m8[0m[94m.[0m Know and[94m apply[0m[94m the[0m properties[94m of[0m integer ex[94mponents[0m[94m to[0m[94m generate[0m equivalent[94m numerical[0m expressions[94m.[0m Example[94m:[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m [94m2[0m[94m +[0m[94m [0m[94m2[0m[94m [0m[94m5[0m[94m =[0m[94m [0m[94m4[0m[94m⋅[0m[94m4[0m[94m+[0m[94m2[0m[94m⋅[0m[94m2[0m⋅2⋅2⋅[94m2[0m[94m =[0m[94m
